We can give you several tips of what to do in Rio and we can put you in contact with our partners that offer touristic services.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá !
 
 Sejam todos bem-vindos ao meu Airbnb no Rio.
 
 Será um imenso prazer hospeda-los na minha casa de verão :D
 
 Contem comigo e com o Omar (meu co-anfitrião) para tudo que precisarem antes, durante e depois da sua estadia.
 
 Estamos a sua espera, venha !

reviews.comments: Localição perfeita para curtir a praia :)

Apartment is very basic. If you just want a clean room with a view and across the street from the beach this is it. Omar was great at responding to questions and apartment staff was very kind. I enjoyed my stay here in Rio and would stay again!

Apartamento e bem localizado, faz acesso perto de tudo, só teve uns problemas na recepção mandaram por outro apartamento , não teve organização na portaria e ficamos sem levado um dia, tive que 12 andares. O senhor Omar bem atencioso
Optimal location. Clean. Nice view.
Foi ótimo. Tudo corresponde ao anúncio. Recomendo!
Cumpre exatamente o que promete, ideal para casais.
El departamento tiene una muy buena ubicación, es un lugar confortable, de fácil acceso y muy seguro, la preocupación de Omar genial
Recomendo
Tuvimos un problema con el calefon y lo solucionaron muy bien! Mas alla de eso todo OK!! :)
Excelente localização, só o banheiro que deixa a desejar um pouco, não tem ducha higiênica e o vaso sanitário estava muito bambo.

Ótimo custo/benefício. Localização excelente, em frente ao melhor posto da praia de Copacabana, perto de ótimos restaurantes, lojas, mercados. Quarto exatamente igual as fotos e devidamente equipado. Prédio seguro, silencioso e tranquilo. O porteiro Sr. Antonio é muito gente boa e prestativo. Omar e Hugo extremamente rápidos em responder quaisquer dúvidas. Super recomendo! :)
Muy buen departamento cerca de playa!

name: Small sunroom. Sydney Harbour at your doorstep
summary: Light airy sunroom with queen bed.
space: 2 bedroom apartment in a quiet leafy street, within a stones throw of beautiful Sydney Harbour.
description: Light airy sunroom with queen bed. 2 bedroom apartment in a quiet leafy street, within a stones throw of beautiful Sydney Harbour. Toilet, bathroom, kitchen and lounge room. Happy to socialise or leave you to your own devices. Quiet leafy green residential street. Close to harbour, beaches, parks, restaurants and golf course. Plumer Road shops is a 2 minute walk with a fantastic french bakery, 2 cafes, butcher, small grocery store, take-away pizza and take away chicken and salads, bottle shop, newsagency and dry cleaner Rose bay shops is a little further up the road and has plenty of cafes, restaurants and retail stores. It is an easy and beautiful tree lined twenty minute walk to Bondi Beach. Rose Bay has a beautiful dog friendly harbour beach.  Beautiful harbour foreshore walk will take you to Milk Beach and Nielsen Park. Redleaf beach is a 15 minute walk. Loads of bus and ferry options all at your doorstep. Watsons Bay is a ten minute ferry ride, Circular Quay and the Opera House is
neighborhood_overview: Quiet leafy green residential street. Close to harbour, beaches, parks, restaurants and golf course. Plumer Road shops is a 2 minute walk with a fantastic french bakery, 2 cafes, butcher, small grocery store, take-away pizza and take away chicken and salads, bottle shop, newsagency and dry cleaner Rose bay shops is a little further up the road and has plenty of cafes, restaurants and retail stores. It is an easy and beautiful tree lined twenty minute walk to Bondi Beach. Rose Bay has a beautiful dog friendly harbour beach.  Beautiful harbour foreshore walk will take you to Milk Beach and Nielsen Park. Redleaf beach is a 15 minute walk.
notes: Sunroom is off the main bedroom. You need to walk through my bedroom to get to it.
transit: Loads of bus and ferry options all at your doorstep. Watsons Bay is a ten minute ferry ride, Circular Quay and the Opera House is a 12 minute ferry ride. Bondi Junction, Bondi Beach are 15 minute bus rides. Plenty of on street parking.
access: Toilet, bathroom, kitchen and lounge room.
interaction: Happy to socialise or leave you to your own devices.
house_rules: - No shoes in the house. Smoking is OK in rear courtyard

host.host_about: Easy going ocean loving single father

reviews.comments:
Shawn is a great host, he did everything to make our stay confortable and gave us some really nice places to go visit. 
The room is very cosy and just 5 minutes from the ferry wharf to get you to the city center. 
We had a lovely stay there and would definitely go back :)

Shaun's apartment is in a nice neighbourhood. Rose Bay is quiet, beautiful and great located area. You can find bus and ferry direct to the center. Shops and cafes are very near. Although, the most important thing about that place is the owner. It was a pleasure to get to know Shaun. He is very kind and helpful person. Thankful to his tips, it was easy to go around Sydney.
Nice accomodation in superb location! 12 mins ferry to CBD, 30 mins walk to Bondi beach. Shaun is nice host too! We enjoyed our stay 100%
Simply good!

Nice place, very close to Rose Bay (5 mins walk) where you can easily hop on the ferries. You can find some small shops nearby for almost everything you need. Also, Shaun's hospitality was the best and he was more than willing to help and explain how to get around the city!

The apartment was extremely clean throughout the visit. It is sunny and spacious. Bathroom and kitchen was in perfect condition. 

The bed was comfortable and the location of the apartment was close to the bus stop and the Ferry.

The communication was great and the check-in was hassle-free. Shaun was very welcoming and we felt at home during our stay.

All in all we loved our stay with Shaun and highly recommend the apartment.

We had a great stay at Shaun's place. The area is great, with a beach, buses and stores/restaurant nearby.
The bed was very confortable and the kitchen well equiped. Shaun was a very nice host, the quality/price  ratio is really good, I recommend the place!
A generous and very accomodating host. Accessable to the ferry ride to CBD.. :)
Shaun house is great choice to stay in . It is very clean. Shaun was very helpful.
The place could be a little cleaner and bug/spiderfree but bedides that the value you get is very good for the price you pay
Nice and quiet neighborhood, pretty close to Bondi Beach by walk. The landlord is a very social and kind person.

First time to Sydney and Shaun's place was key to my amazing experience. Relaxing room, close to transit and tasty food, and walking distance to Bondi made for a perfect base for exploring Sydney. I definitely recommend staying here!

We really enjoy our stay in Shaun's flat. Shaun is a real nice host, very helpfull. We had interessant discussions. The flat is located in a nice area, 10 minutes from the town center by ferry. We recommand his Airbnb !

Hey, for me  -perfect- close to ferry to city ( walkable) if you stay late in the city ferry close at 9pm. I don’t cook means I don’t know about kitchen, Room is small but enough to sleep the nite and go, place is great value for me.

Good place to be. Close to the bus stop and ferry but not train. If u plan to travel and get back late at night u probably wont be able to find the bus and ferry as well. The bed is great and very comfy. The apartment is quite and clean. The bathroom is abit old and has be kept clean. The overall is great. Shaun is a nice guy!!

Shaun is a very kind and helpful person. He is also very flexible in terms of check-in and check-out time if no one is coming to the room that day. The place in located just nearby Rose Bay Wharf and a ferry would take you to the central (near Harbour Bridge/Opera House) in 12 minutes. It was a good stay at Shaun's place. :-)

시드니 시티와 이곳은 페리로 최단거리로
갈수있고 페리타고 시티까지 가는 경치는
너무 아름답다 그리고 버스 정류장도
가까이있어 움직이기가 너무 편했다
무엇보다도 shaun의 친절함은 엄청났다
떠나는날 집에다가 선글라스를 놓고왔는대
나한테  먼저 알려줘서 금방 찾을수있었다
다음 시드니 여행때에도 shaun과 함께
하고싶다~^^ 집안에 식기 조미료 다있어요~ 편안한 공간입니다!!!

Shaun have been an amazing host. 

The house was clean and quite and Shaun was always available in case needed. 

Rose Bay is a very nice neighbourhood and the house is located in a convenient position.

Location of Shaun's place was amazing. I just had to walk a couple blocks away, catch the ferry, and go anywhere I liked. He recommended some good places to go and I love them all. Loved having the kitchen and all the necessary appliances needed to cook for myself, lovely cute place!

shuan's place is close to rose bay, 10minutes from sydney opera. it's my 1st time in sydney and his place is much recommended if you want to see opera house and bondi beach.
close also to train station about 10 minutes from rose bay via ferry. 
shaun's is quick to response in all y inquiries. easy to communicate with.
Rose bay is beautiful, the buses are 4 minutes walk and the 7 minutes. The entrance to your bedroom is through Shaun’s bedroom, though I did not find that a problem

I'm glad I didn't let my perceived awkwardness of having to walk through the bedroom to get to the guest room get in the way of choosing this property. I did nearly all my SYD travel via ferry and it was fast and convenient. Also a half hour walk to Bondi Beach and the cliff walk. I felt welcome and the bath products are great. :)

Shaun was very welcoming and also very respectful of our space during the stay. He was always ready to help when we needed something. We totally recommend to stay at his house. Rose Bay is a lovely place and is only one stop from Circular Quay if you take the ferry which is pretty near Shaun’s house.

Probably the most comfortable bed I slept in on my whole trip through Australia! Shaun was quick to answer any questions I had. He has a great kitchen to cook in and the location of the house is close to both the bus and ferry. It was a very quiet, relaxing stay. Cheers!
Shaun was very communicative,and his apartment was clean and close to public transport,I would recommend this apartment and Shaun as a host.
Excellent location. I haven't seen Shaun as I was always visiting the city when he was home but all the communication was great before and during our stay
Shaun is very good people, he made us feel at home. Nice person to have a talk and have a beer!

Shaun is an amazing host! He pretty much makes me feel like in a home. I can wander around and use many facilities in the house. Also Shaun responded text or in person very quick and kind. The room is big and clean. but the whole house's too cold to me. One thing I'd like to suggest to Shaun is that "the hot water only running 8 mins" should be info on the house profile, so people can consider if this condition fits them.
Shaun is a great host, the flat is conveniently located near public transportation and a short walk away from Bondi Beach.

Shaun is a really Nice guy, me and my girlfriend are pleased To meet him, he is obliging.
Nice first impression of australia.

il parle aussi très bien français pour aider les frenchies a leur arrivé. vous ne pouvez rêvé meilleur hôte !

All good.
Everyone can enjoy yourself here.
Contactable.
great host, made sure I was all checked in ok. great location a 30 min walk to Bondi beach and a bus that can take you to the city just by the house.

Shaun’s place is great and unbeatable value for the budget traveler, a super convenient spot close to public transport. I had everything I needed for staying 6 nights and would definitely book again. Shaun was very helpful and quick in replying too. Thanks Shaun!

房間位置有點尷尬,是跟屋主的房間連在一起(就是要進去房間時會先經過屋主的房間的意思),有隔著門但沒有鎖｡浴室也沒有鎖(很怕用到一半有人突然進來)｡會介意的人可能要考慮一下
在浴室看到不少小蟑螂
房間空間很小(除了床剩下一條小走道,大概跟床一樣長,跟枕頭的長一樣寬),無法打開2個人的行李箱,不太方便,當時我們是把一個人的行李箱放在外面,要拿東西的時候打開,拿完再關起來｡
洗澡的時候熱水大概7分鐘就會沒有,當時洗完頭髮還沒洗澡就沒熱水
離市區有一段距離,但交通還算方便,出去走5分鐘就有通往市區的公車,走8分鐘就有渡輪可以到環形碼頭
跟機場的交通比較麻煩,要轉2-3次的大眾運輸
Very clean room. Much privacy whether Shaun was there or not. Immediately felt like home.
Nice place and very accessible to the  City!

This place suited me perfectly. I’m not sure if it’s the same for everyone but it was for me. Very clean and functional. Small but enough for my use. Vicinity to Rose Bay wharf is unbelievably close. 

I would come back here if I needed to stay in the vicinity.
Shaun is a really nice and helpful guy, but the place was just dirty. I am really sorry to say that, but unfortunately it is true.

Shaun has been the first guy I met in Australia when I flew from Canada.  I very appreciated our conversation and the advices he gaves me about where to go and what to do around! If you're looking for something cheap around Sydney, I would totally recommand it! Cheers

It’s not the ritz but it’s cozy and comfortable. Perfect for those of us that can’t afford the moon. Shaun was super helpful with suggesting places to see and is very kind hearted. Also the bed is very comfy! I had the best night sleep!

I enjoyed my stay at Shaun's place. It had everthing I needed, comfortable bed, nice kitchen, great location, minutes away from bus stops, ferry to the city but most of all Shaun's a helpful, nice and easy going guy. Highly recommended !

name: Luxurious One Bedroom Apartment in Kings Cross
summary: Beautiful, large one bedroom apartment in the heart of Kings Cross! Located at the top of Bayswater Road, right by the famous Coke sign, is a well appointed one bedroom apartment with all the amenities you may need!  All guest are welcome!
space: The apartment contains all amenities that you may need including an internal laundry with washing machine and dryer.  The kitchen is stocked with all necessary appliances/crockery/cutlery and pots and pans. The convenience of the Coles located next door means that you have the choice to cook your own meals at home.  The bedroom is large and there will be hangers provided for your clothes. The bedroom can be separated from the main apartment with sliding doors or can be left open for a more spacious feel.  The apartment does not have an outdoor area and looks into an internal courtyard so does not have a view. However, given this, it is so quiet at night despite it's location! There is a tv fitted with an Apple TV, a chrome cast and a set top box, so feel free to connect your own Netflix so you can continue right where you left off with your favourite shows! There are innumerable great restaurants in the area, ranging from easy take away or more up market restaurants just down the road

neighborhood_overview: Amazing location! You could not ask for a better spot to stay.
transit: The Kings Cross Train Station is a 2 minute walk from the front door giving easy access to the train system. However, given the convenience of the location, it is easy to walk into the city and around the area.  A bus stop is located in front of the building, as is a taxi rank. There are always ubers available in the area1
interaction: I will meet you at the apartment and give you a quick run down, answer any questions you may need and give you tips for your stay in Sydney (if you need). I will be in Sydney during your stay so will only be a call away if you have any questions or concerns!
house_rules: - Small, quiet gatherings are allowed, but no large parties that may garner noise complaints from other residents.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Best apartment ever! Very stylish, clean, well appointed and a great comfy bed. The location is perfect. Will definitely stay again :)

name: 合家歡樂同住喜｡
summary: 現今社會住屋方面寸金呎土｡令大家有喘息感覺｡忙碌一日返到家中完全無私人空間｡心情失意只想一個人靜下來｡但完全無機會一個人思考｡租住日本新創意太空艙完全可以擁有私人空間｡艙內環境衛生｡設有通風系統｡保險箱!每一個房間有獨立窗和冷氣｡只須要攜帶新份證和一個月上期加按金便可以入住｡歡迎國內同胞｡單身人土和國外朋一起嘗試新生活!多謝大家
description: 現今社會住屋方面寸金呎土｡令大家有喘息感覺｡忙碌一日返到家中完全無私人空間｡心情失意只想一個人靜下來｡但完全無機會一個人思考｡租住日本新創意太空艙完全可以擁有私人空間｡艙內環境衛生｡設有通風系統｡保險箱!每一個房間有獨立窗和冷氣｡只須要攜帶新份證和一個月上期加按金便可以入住｡歡迎國內同胞｡單身人土和國外朋一起嘗試新生活!多謝大家 除房外｡還可以有大廳可作活動空間 我會同房客保持良好溝通｡大家就像一家人｡理解｡包容｡信任｡誠心誠意!我的承諾一定做得到! 旺角通菜街相信對每一個香港人都唔會陌生嘅街名｡又名金魚街｡係非常發達方便嘅地標｡旺中帶靜嘅住所｡一分鐘內找到你所喜好嘅食物｡晚上約埋三五知已酒吧街啤一啤｡實在應有盡有! 交通方便步行地鐵和東鐵只須幾分鐘內｡只須要三分鐘就可以乘搭過海巴士把以送到你目的地｡就在前面不遠處就有小巴去很多不同地區｡喜愛返深圳浦朋友絕對係佳之選｡通宵大巴直達黃崗口岸｡ 畢竟10個房客突然係陌生環境一同住｡我希望大家能夠忍讓和彼此尊重｡相信每一個房客都想住所清潔舒適｡請盡量處理個人衞生｡為已為人｡多謝合作
neighborhood_overview: 旺角通菜街相信對每一個香港人都唔會陌生嘅街名｡又名金魚街｡係非常發達方便嘅地標｡旺中帶靜嘅住所｡一分鐘內找到你所喜好嘅食物｡晚上約埋三五知已酒吧街啤一啤｡實在應有盡有!

reviews.comments: 地理位置超棒,逛街,坐地铁方便

We have enjoyed our experience in these brand new sleeping pods. It is nice to have this cosy private space. The owners were very kind and helpfull. Location was absolutly great, at the end of the 'goldfish street', near a metro exit, steaming foodstalls, and a short walk to the Mongkok city malls.
位置很不错,在太子站附近,就是床铺感觉有一些不洁净…不过这个价格已经十分不错了…性价比高,住习惯了其实挺舒服的…下次去香港还去~
不错,房东人也很好,就是房间不够隔音,说话小小声担心吵到别人
房东姐姐很热心,刚入住给我讲很多细节｡我出街时让我在外小心｡注意安全!总觉得和亲人一般!感谢姐姐!

name: Water-view 5-star living
summary: Waterfront apartment located in center of Rhodes. Super nice water view! Nice host ^~^ 6 mins walk from the Rhodes train station; 2 mins walk to the bus stop. Stylish and popular cafes around my property. 2 mins drive to Rhodes shopping center and Ikea. Close to Sydney Olympic park. 15mins walk to ferry wharf. 25 mins to city by train. Minimum 1 night.
description: Waterfront apartment located in center of Rhodes. Super nice water view! Nice host ^~^ 6 mins walk from the Rhodes train station; 2 mins walk to the bus stop. Stylish and popular cafes around my property. 2 mins drive to Rhodes shopping center and Ikea. Close to Sydney Olympic park. 15mins walk to ferry wharf. 25 mins to city by train. Minimum 1 night.

name: Large Private Studio w/Full Kitchen
summary: Our large spacious studio is a perfect room for parties of 2-4. Our Awakea Studio provides a great environment to enjoy the beauty of Hawaii with your family, friends, or loved ones.This unit is complete with central air conditioning, a full kitchen, King size bed, a private bathroom, a spacious layout with a fold out futon couch, and a beautiful outside sitting area. This unit is centrally located in Kailua with a short 5 min walk to the famous Kailua beach and a 10 min walk into Kailua town.
space: This large spacious studio is located on our Awakea property. Our  Awakea property is centrally located with a short 5 minute walk to Kailua Beach, which is recognized as one of the most beautiful beaches in the world, and a 10 minute walk into Kailua town. As an added feature, this unit has a full kitchen with all the necessary cookware & utensils for preparing meals.

neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is a safe, well lite, family neighborhood. We have a park (Triangle Park) across the street from our property which includes a swing set and jungle gym play area for the kiddos.
notes: *PLEASE NOTE: THERE ARE MULTIPLE UNITS ON THIS PROPERTY!!!
transit: Our public transit system is good however I would recommend renting a car or a bicycle depending on how much of the island you want to see during your stay.
access: Our guests have access to free parking in the front of the property, coin operated washing machine & dryer, as well as a plethora of beach toys & accessories for all ages.
interaction: We love interacting with our guests however we are respectful of their privacy. We interact as little or as much as each of our guests allows during their stay with us.

host.host_about:
Aloha, My name is Brandyn. I am so blessed to offer people from all around the world the chance to experience the breath taking scenery and beautiful culture of an island paradise I have called home for my entire life. My family has been in the vacation rental business for over 30 years and it all started with my grandmother Kay (hence Kay's Ali'i Vacation Rental). Now myself, my mother Brenda, my wife Kristina, and my aunt Lucy have taken over the reins and are continuing the legacy my grandmother started. 

Our families journey in the vacation rental industry started with one small simple unit and slowly evolved into something special for generations to come. We now we have 3 vacation rental properties in Kailua with multiple units on each. Our goal is to offer parties of all sizes the chance to visit our island paradise without having to break their bank accounts. We have 2, 3, & 4 bedroom units for larger groups or extended family getaways. We have 1 bedroom units & large studios for our guests who are traveling with their immediate family and we also have a private rooms for those of our guests who want to get away by themselves or with their significant other to relax and enjoy our beautiful Hawaiian weather. No matter what group size you have we can accommodate you. Take a look at our listing and feel free to message us. We look forward to hearing from you soon. :-)

reviews.comments: This was an excellent location and a roomy place to stay.  Much better than staying at a hotel in Waikiki.  Minimal interaction with Brenda other than at check in.  I would definitely stay again if given the opportunity.

Brenda was more than helpful. We had and still have rooms at her location. We were arriving and departing and Brenda always made room for us. Some of us are still there. We had a family emergency and Brenda saved the day for us by have a place to stay. I can't say enough about her kindness. If we go back to Kailua, We would definitely stay here.

The host was awesome, we had tons of privacy.  The rooms are exactly as advertised.  Just what you need for a vacation.  The location was second to none.  We went all over the island and our location was our favorite!

Staying at this location was perfect for us during the week of our stay. It was within walking distance of the beach and multiple food places like buzz's and Island snow. It had everything you needed, and the host was kind enough to supply beach chairs and snorkel gear which we took advantage of. We used the kitchen for breakfast and the tv very little due to being in Hawaii :). I would highly recommend staying here, and the host was always available for questions.
The host helped me find the correct place where I was staying.  The pictures do not do it justice.
We felt welcomed and cared for during our stay. The studio unit couldn't have a better location across from a park, and walking distance to great activities.
It was a fantastic experience staying here :) !!!

The studio was amazing - the best airbnb experience I've had so far. The studio was very clean, spacious, and comfortable. My sister and I were there for about a week in December - the weather was so nice that we left the windows open to enjoy the cool breeze in the room. We absolutely loved the king size bed and our own bathroom and kitchen. We got to meet with Kay and her family in person, and they're the nicest hosts ever. We recommend this place to anyone who wants to have an enjoyable, peaceful experience in Kailua. The studio is only 10 minutes walk from Kailua beach, 10 minutes walk from Kailua downtown, and 30 minutes walk from Lanikai beach (if you take a bike, it would be 10 minutes from Lanikai beach.) Thank you to Kay and her family for making our stay enjoyable. If we get to visit Kailua again, we will definitely stay here again.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We love Kailua and this spot was perfect for us.

The positive thing was the location, it was so nice to be so close to the beach, to the cute market for coffee and breakfast, and across the street from the park where our kids could play. The downside was a new roach infestation... We are aware it is the tropics so we expected to see geckos, bugs, and roaches, but at night they really started coming out all over the house, even though we had all food in the refrigerator, left out no toiletries, and kept our luggage zipped up. We notified Brandyn and AirBnB, and all parties quickly remedied the situation. We got into a new AirBnB right away, and Brandyn was able to get in to do some exterminating. We were very pleased with how it was all quickly handled and Brandyn apologized for the problem.

We enjoyed our stay in this light, spacious studio, with its comfortable king bed. The check-in and check-out were easy and flawless. Brandyn was responsive and very helpful, as well. We loved the location, which was an easy walk to Kailua's downtown in one direction and Kailua Beach Park in another. All in all, it was a nice and very convenient place to stay!

We went to the beach and a playground every day. My son enjoyed too.
It's a very convenient location. We didn't rent a car. We used Uber or taxi. 
We are going to stay next too  again.
Thank you :)

子連れでしたがﾚﾝﾀｶｰなしで､ﾋﾞｰﾁも買い物も食事も楽しめました｡部屋も明るく広く静かです｡次回も海まで歩けるここに泊まりたいです｡
Great place to stay in Kailua! Check in and out were made easy and quick and the place was not hard to find! The location was perfect and the place was nice and clean.
Het is een prima locatie in rustige straat. Het is schoon maar gedateerd. Buiten verblijf is beperkt. Meer heb je in Hawaii niet nodig

8월 말에 4일 있었는데 아기가 있어 전자렌지를 이용할 수 있어 좋았어요. 넓고 바닥이 마루로 되어 있어 청소도 편했고 주택가라 조용해서 좋았어요.(저희 아기가 첫날 둘째날 밤마다 울어서 그게 조마조마ㅜㅜ)  호스트도 친절하고 방에 파라솔, 모래놀이  장난감 등 구비되어 있어요. 저희는  차 렌트해서 비치까지 갔는데 비치, 마트, 식당도 걸어서 갈 수 있어 편해요.

This place is a great location if you want to be close to Kailua town, and the beach. Both an easy walk on foot if you have no small children. Nice quiet local street. 
The studio apartment had a full kitchen. Everything we needed was in the studio (except a bottle opener!), including suncream, beach towels, hairdryer etc. This studio is quite dated, but was clean. Only thing that may not suit some travellers is how the noise travels. There is an internal door that connects the studio to the main house (but you have your own private entrance, internal door is locked). This internal door is very thin, and we could hear everything that happened in the room beyond the door (entire conversations, cupboards being opened and closed etc). They were not unusually noisy. However I was always concerned about how much noise I may be making, which made it very hard for me to relax. They were never intrusive, but I didn't have the sense of privacy I would prefer as a traveller.

I am writing this to assist the next travelers with clearer vision of what to expect not to "cut a low cos"t place down.

This "studio" looked good in the Arbnb images . So I booked it . Then I get the address and find out it as converted garage space. Too late for me so I stayed there. Glad my girlfriend was not a long it would have been upsetting to her. There are windows but frosted glass so no views. The door to next door is paper thin. So when others arrived with two young children my peace was over.  I could here every scream and snore. Welcome to Kailua. 

There is a nice Whole Foods in town. Beaches are great. Golf near by is fantastic. This "Studio" place was a bit too rustic for me.

Not to let you think I am bad mouthing this place. The 2 and half forks was what you had to eat with . Yes one was broken in half and still cleaned and put back in the drawer. 

I suggest for the owner to buy some new silverware and glasses. Spray for the termites that you wake up with each morning crawling around on you.

Thanks
Brandyn’s place is great and so is the location! Everything is exactly as advertised. We really enjoyed our stay, and would return anytime! We recommend it for sure!
This place is a great kid friendly spot near the beautiful Kailua beach. The hosts are very warm and accommodating. I will be recommending to friends and family.

This place was awesome! A TON of room for me and my wife to move around and not step on each other’s toes. The location is in downtown Kailua, which is unbeatable. Short distance from the beach as well. Would definitely stay here again!!!

I enjoyed Brandyn's place. The efficiency was roomy and clean with a large comfortable bed. With its small but practical kitchen it was more than competitive with similar places in the Kailua area. It is situated about half way between the commercial district and the beach. It's a bit of a walk but a quick drive to either. The hosts are there if you need them, they won't bother you if you don't. No problem parking in you have a vehicle. The only issue is a limited amount of hot water from what is evidently a limited capacity for all residents including the hosts. Sometimes there was plenty, sometimes not so much. So unless you just like lukewarm or cold bathing water this can make for an occasional very quick shower. This should not be a deal killer but neither should you be surprised. Overall this is a clean and efficient apartment, nothing fancy but eminently practical.

The place is awesome! We really enjoyed the stay. 
- Location is great! You feel emerged in real Hawaiian life, will not get such expirience in hotel
- The Studio is large and have everything that is necessary for comfortable stay.
- Owners are very helpful and friendly.   
- Host is providing snorkeling equipment, boogie boards, kids beach toys etc...
- This particular Studio is isolated from the other rental rooms and adjacent to owner house - so people noise was not major concern for us.  
- Good for kids. The owners do not mind noisy little people :)
Thinks to note: 
- The place is not upscale 4 or 5 stars resorts. its rather basic with budget in mind. But that's exactly what we were looking for
- Windows are not sound proof and car noise in the morning was mild inconvenience but did was not deal-breaker for us
Thanks so much Brandyn and Family for fantastic stay!

This place is a nice decent sized studio. The location is fantastic, quick drive to Kailua and Lanikai Beach. It's near many restaurants as well, so there's a wide food selection to pick from. Brandyn, the host, is not intrusive at all. You don't even have to meet him at check in or throughout the stay if you prefer not to. If you're looking for a host really involved, this isn't the place, but he has a binder of recommendations around the island. This is an attached garage with private entrance, kitchen, & bathroom. The noise is no different than being in a hotel with occasional people passing, if any! We didn't even cross paths with Brandyn or his family members during our one week stay. The neighborhood is nice, clean, and quiet. I would definitely stay here again :) Thanks Brandyn!
An excellent stay.  Clean, close to town, no surprises.  Easy parking.  I recommend without any reservations.
Great location and a spacious enough studio for the three of us.

Brandyn communicated promptly and clearly from booking to check out. The property is in a great location to navigate Kailua. The studio is a comfortable space with basic amenities. The A/C was a nice luxury too. I recommend Brandyn and his properties without hesitation.
The studio is just like the picture. The best beach in the world is just a few steps away!
place was neat and tidy and in a great location close to beaches etc. Room is spacious with good amenities. walls are a little thin though.

Good:Location was amazing,  no view but close enough to walk to Kailua beach and Kailua town. Studio stayed a confortable temperature despite July heat. There's an AC unit but was just ok at cooling the studio.
Bad: Pretty dirty, Pest problem. it's a little run down and old. 
 **
Host is very nice, and if they fix pest problem this will be a good place. Just a place to flop and cook meals in small kitchen. Neighborhood is safe so we didnt mind the lock on door was basic, no deadbolt.
Great place to stay if you’re in the Kailua area.
Great location - very close to beautiful Kailua beach. Very clean. It is pretty loud and there is a lack of privacy, didn’t spend much time in the room though so not a huge issue.

Our stay was fantastic! Great location on a peaceful and safe street within walking distance to the most beautiful beach. It was as clean as it could be with the exception of a few bugs (typical for Hawaii). Brenda is the other host, aside from brandyn and she was very friendly, gracious, and made me and my friend feel welcome and safe. Her place looks exactly like the pictures. We will be back 100%.
Great place! Very convenient for shopping and beach. Amazing hospitality!
This was an excellent location in a quiet neighborhood. The place was roomy, comfortable, and clean. Great value!

Brandyn's place is in a great location-close to the beach and to town.   It could use some sprucing up and you do hear voices and noise from the other parts of the home.  This did not bother us but felt it should be noted.  The place was very large and the table and desk area was a nice touch.  Everything was very clean and comfortable. We very much enjoyed our stay!
Staying at Brandyn‘s studio was great. A perfect home away from home! We look forward to coming back again! Mahalo!

部屋に入るとﾌﾟﾙﾒﾘｱのお花が随所に置かれていて嬉しく思いました｡
2歳の娘と二人での滞在には十分な広さでした｡
たまに現れるﾔﾓﾘ､小さい蟻やｺﾞｷﾌﾞﾘに､虫が苦手な私は少し戸惑いました｡
滞在期間が長い場合､ﾌﾛｰﾘﾝｸﾞの掃除をしたいと思いましたが､掃除道具が無かったので､Swifferなどが置いてあれば更に快適に過ごせたと思います｡

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Great location close to the beach and downtown Kailua. Kailua is a great little town away from the hustle and bustle of Honolulu. Would definitely recommend Brendyn’s place and would stay again!

Excellent location in Kailua -- easy walk to the beach, downtown restaurants, and local amenities. Their place was quiet and private, and the neighborhood was good for walking. Highly recommended if that location works for your purposes.

This place was perfect for our stay in Kailua. Located almost right between Kailua town and Kailua beach, a short walk or quick drive in either direction gets you to where you want to be quickly. Private entry, full kitchen and full bathroom with a HUGE shower. The value of this space and the location is worth every penny and I will absolutely be booking here on our next trip to the island. Brandyn reached out to me after our first week because I literally didn't need to contact them for anything. Everything was provided exactly as described and it was all excellent. If you're looking for a place that makes you feel like you live in Hawaii while you are just vacationing there, then look no further and book this place today. You will not be disappointed!

name: Historic Rio, Samba City and Olympic Rio
summary: Location close to the main public transportation in Rio de Janeiro (subway, bus, boat, train, VLT, taxi points). 20 minutes from Copacabana, near Gamboa, the Aquarium of Rio (Aquario), Boulevard Olimpico, Candelaria, Pedra do Sal and Lapa, you can walk to the main museums, cultural centers and libraries of the country. Next to the sambadrome and the samba city.
description: Location close to the main public transportation in Rio de Janeiro (subway, bus, boat, train, VLT, taxi points). 20 minutes from Copacabana, near Gamboa, the Aquarium of Rio (Aquario), Boulevard Olimpico, Candelaria, Pedra do Sal and Lapa, you can walk to the main museums, cultural centers and libraries of the country. Next to the sambadrome and the samba city.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Midlevels apt with an amazing view
space: Apartment: Located on the 24th floor (top floor) of a great building in the Midlevels on Caine Rd with a private rooftop.  Apartment and rooftop are both 450 sqf in size.  The Apartment has a queen bed and a pull out couch which can accomodate up to 4 people.  The rooftop has seating for up to 6 plus sun beds.   The bedroom, living room and roof all have a great view of Central Hong Kong.   Location:  The neighborhood is extremely convenient to a great restaurant and nightlife scene in both Soho and LKF as well as easy access to transportation and other great features of Hong Kong. 1 minute walk to midlevels escalator and Soho; less than 10 minutes walk to LKF and Central MTR for easy transportation access.  15 minute walk to Central pier for ferries to Kowloon and the outlying islands.   Full disclosure I have had a few complaints in the past about guests being very loud late at night.  Please cooperate and respect the neighbors after 11pm.
description: Apartment: Located on the 24th floor (top floor) of a great building in the Midlevels on Caine Rd with a private rooftop.  Apartment and rooftop are both 450 sqf in size.  The Apartment has a queen bed and a pull out couch which can accomodate up to 4 people.  The rooftop has seating for up to 6 plus sun beds.   The bedroom, living room and roof all have a great view of Central Hong Kong.   Location:  The neighborhood is extremely convenient to a great restaurant and nightlife scene in both Soho and LKF as well as easy access to transportation and other great features of Hong Kong. 1 minute walk to midlevels escalator and Soho; less than 10 minutes walk to LKF and Central MTR for easy transportation access.  15 minute walk to Central pier for ferries to Kowloon and the outlying islands.   Full disclosure I have had a few complaints in the past about guests being very loud late at night.  Please cooperate and respect the neighbors after 11pm. I will be away during the time period so gue
notes: Please be respectful of my neighbors and please keep quiet when coming home late at night as they work early in the morning.
transit: The closest MTR (subway) stop is Central (7-10 min).  The apartment is near the mid-levels escalator and is on a road with frequent taxis and buses.  It is also a short taxi ride from the Airport Express train.
interaction: I will be away during the time period so guests will have the whole place to themselves.
house_rules: Please do not smoke in the house, but feel free to smoke on the rooftop.  On the rooftop please refrain from throwing anything off the edge. Please try to keep the apartment tidy and the surfaces clean once you leave.  Turn off aircon and lights when going out, as I have to pay the bills for all that. There is a rubbish bin in the stairwell immediately outside of the apartment for easy disposal.

host.host_about: I'm from the US, I enjoy sports and outdoor activities such as hiking.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
My parents stayed in this fabulous apartment very comfortably!
The location was amazing with spectacular views. 
They were able to walk most places escalators and bus stops were very close by. His neighbour Luke met us at the apartment and made us feel very welcome.
Definitely the perfect location, bars, restaurants, supermarkets all you need is here and from there will have a amazing view on these glamourous buildings !
The apartment was very well equipped and had everything we needed. 
They had a wonderful stay and if they have to return to Hong Kong would definitely stay here again!

You can book it with your eyes closed !

Dan's place was great - clean, spacious (for Hong Kong) and well equipped. 
We were met by Dan's neighbour as Dan was away, but he'd left clear instructions on how everything worked and what we needed to do. Any questions we asked Dan directly or we could again refer to the neighbour to solve. A delightful place and a great host.

We stayed at Dan's apartment for 3 nights. Everything was as we expected and just perfect for our use. We were 4 friends, 1 big double bed for 2 and the sleeping couch is also really big enough for 2. Clean rooms and very safe building. I had a very friendly contact with Dan before the arrival and his neighbour Luke how gave us the keys. 
Also the location was perfect for us- easy to get to all the sightseeing places and no long way home after a few drinks in Soho and LKF :)

I would definitely book the apartment again when I come back!! :)

The apartment was clean and very basic, with everything you need provided. The location is very convenient, located a minute away from the Mid Levels escalators. We had a difficult time getting the toilet to flush during our stay (we are told this never happens, so we were most likely just unlucky), but Dan was always reachable via (Hidden by Airbnb) and his neighbour Luke did come over to help. I didn't get the chance to see the rooftop, so cannot comment on that.

Great place to stay! Excellent view and location in Midlevels, it's a 5 minute walk to SoHo and a 15 minute walk to Central by taking the neighborhood escalators. It was super easy to coordinate arrival and departure. The place was nicely kept and the two places to sleep (the bed and pull out sofa bed) were comfortable. Recommended for 1-3 guests, especially if you want to stay in a proper neighborhood away from the hotels.
Great crash pad for exploring Hong Kong. Super close to escalators. Great bakery on the block. Crazy restaurants and bars within  crawling distance. The roof deck is GORGEOUS. Highly recommended!

Very nice location and nice appartment with a great rooftop. Dan was very nice and answered all the questions we had right away. Very good deal for Hong Kong if you want to be near Soho. We had a great time, will stay here next time in HK.
It was an amazing time staying at Dans place. It was in the heart of soho/mid levels - very convenient for everything. The view was great also! We had a good time overall.

Thanks a lot to Dan for being very flexible dates and very helpful.
Apartment is located in good location and can be easily reached by midlevel escalators. It has great view and everything you need even if you are staying with an infant, but watch out for the parquet as a child can take pieces out. Aircons a bit on the noisy side, but you get used to it after a while.
There is a supermarket and Starbucks across the road, which is very handy to get coffee in the morning when you're going to the city and groceries for dinner on the way back.
Overall great place to stay!
Everything good
It's a nice place. Especially really well situated in Hong Kong. You are next to everything. Very nice staying there.

Dan si è dimostrato premuroso e disponibile anche se nel momento del nostro soggiorno era in Europa, ha sempre risposto ai miei messaggi nonostante la differenza di fuso orario!!!
L'appartamento è carino e confortevole la posizione eccezionale! Lo consiglio.

Dan's appartment is ideally located to make the most out of your time in HK, only minutes away from LKF! The place is very clean and is comfortable enough for 4 people, and Dan had prepared towels and clean sheets for everyone and was great in communicating with me to arrange check in and check out

Great apartment with very central location close to mid-level escalators. Apartment was clean and as described, we had 3 people and didn't feel at all cramped. Dan is a great host, easily contactable throughout and very helpful in being flexible. Would recommend.

We booked Dan's place at the very last minute during New Year and stayed for 5 days. Dan was very helpful and friendly. He waited for us to arrived to pass the key. His place was very clean and tidy and what we love the most about Dan's apartment was the rooftop. For a group of four people who loves taking photos, that rooftop was awesome.  

Located at Caine Road in Hong Kong Island, most of taxi driver know how to get to his place. If you wanna get to the nearest train station by walking, it would be The Central Station and will take you around 15 minutes walking by the elevator full with cafes and reastaurant along the sidewalk with a great city view. Thank you Dan for your hospitality.

Dan was really great. He helped me whenever I wanted.
Location was good. big enough for 3 late checkin possible.
We didn't find any inconvenience in Dan's apt.

Apartment with excellent location. Grocery stores and restaurants are within walking distance from home. Prior to Central MTR station to the terminal and the Macao Ferry 10 minutes. Opposite the entrance is a bus stop. The apartment has everything for a comfortable stay. All the appliances in working condition. The apartment has a good view. There is access to the roof.

Dan was a great host, he always made himself available if any issues came up- had great suggestions for places to eat at. 

Even had his helper fix a slight issue with the TV - loose plug. 

I didn't get to use the rooftop deck access but it would've been a great add on - however weather didn't permit due to rain. the location is high up the midlevels and was true to the description of 8mins to LKF - very safe and doorman available 24/7. 12 mins walking to the Central / HKG MTR station
We had a really good time in Dan's apartment! The apartment is located very convenient and everything just as same as Dan's described and photos.

Dan made all the organisation really straightforward. In spite of our constantly changing arrival times, he remained unfazed and relaxed! All emails were answered immediately and everything worked really well. The location of the apartment is brilliant, it is the perfect place to base a Hong Kong trip.  Beds were comfortable and all instructions clear. The accommodation is very compact but to be honest we only wanted somewhere to sleep- not spend our days in- so it was totally perfect for us. Our first Airbnb experience and a really good one.

The area always felt safe with a locked front door that requires a code and a guard who was always smiling, and saying hi. 

The apartment has an amazing view, and the location could not be any better. 

The bed was by far the most comfortable I've slept in through 2 trips to Hong Kong, and Japan. When I say the bed was comfortable I mean it really was super comfortable. The previous beds I slept in at hotels that cost more than 3 times Dan's place don't even compare. 

The building and neighbors are quiet so you will always get a good night's sleep.

Although Dan was traveling himself he took the time to message me to make sure everything was okay. 

I would 100% definitely stay here again!

Thanks Dan for opening up your home which made my stay that much more enjoyable!
Dan's place is located in a very convenient midlevel/soho/central part of HK. We had a good stay and we appreciate his response to our minimal questions. Thank you Dan.

Dan is really nice, he told me every information of what I would like to know, not just simply left message and did nothing. Room is clean, bed is comfortable. The location is also great,  Lan Kwai Fong was nearby, that was fabulous. We really enjoyed our family vacation. Strongly recommend!

The arrival was easy, the key left with security who are very helpful every day.
The apartment is on the top floor so the views a fantastic, the place is light and airy. There is plenty of room and it is a comfortable place. 
I can't say much more than it's on the top of my list.

Dan's flat was in the perfect location, close to everything including the escalators. He was really easy to community with and check in www made super easy. If you stay here, you must take advantage of Dan's private roofdeck! Awesome views! I would stay here again next time I am in Hong Kong!
Dan is extremely helpful and initiative. The view of the apartment is simply splendid. Anytime again
Smooth check-in experience, great location, great view! I'd highly recommend staying here if you have the chance.

Great location in the heart of Hong Kong, walking distance to anywhere you need to get to. Dan was very responsive to all of our needs, he actually lives here and it shows in the quality of the living area.
Great location and very comfortable apartment for two people. I would book and stay again.
Great location in HK, Dan is very responsive and helpful.  We would happily stay here again.

Dan's place is in the perfect location and being able to stay in this part of Hong Kong really provided us with a very different experience compared to our previous stays. Communication was very prompt and the place as in the pictures.

Lovely stay. The apartment is great and in an amazing area. Close to everything you may need - restaurants, shops, and the Central district of HK. Communication with Dan was easy and he was available to answer all my questions. Definitely would recommend it
Super central location. Small but cozy apartment
Very nice place ! Nice host !
Dan's apartment was great. Location is perfect in the nicest area of the city and the view when waking up is spectacular. Dan responds very quickly. Thank you!

Dan’s place is one of the best Airbnb I’ve stayed in HK! Location is fabulous, apartment is spacious, especially for HK, and everything was arranged for perfectly.  Exceptional value for money - would recommend to anyone!

The apartment is in a very central location and very close to the Mid-Levels escalators, which helps if you are arriving in Hong Kong station from the airport and don't want to take a taxi. Easy way up. Dan gave very clear directions and left instructions for everything. The place was very clean and ready to go, with some pretty good views of the city. We loved the place but think we might have been unlucky as there were issues with the water supply in the building in some of the days we stayed in. While Dan was very responsive, we did have to re-adjust some of our plans because of this. Perhaps not an issue if you do not have a tight agenda when you visit/the water supply problem was a one-off.
Easy and convenient stay. Host was more than helpful.
Great location  and perfect clean space. Would stay there again!

Dan's place completed our HK vacation. The apartment was bigger than expected. Check-in was easy and Dan left a doc with info on the apartment on the coffee table. Nice TV channel selection and strong wifi...the wifi continued to work well even when we had 5+ devices connected. The shower had good water pressure and the water heater worked great. The main bedroom was clean and had more space than anticipated and the bed was very comfortable with a great window view. (The roof access offered great views as well, as Dan's place is in one of the tallest buildings in the area.) The futon in the main room pulled out into a bigger bed and was also great. The living area was of decent size and the extra chairs meant we could have sit-down meals at the table. The kitchen allowed us to cook for ourselves and we appreciated having a variety of cups, plates and silverware to fit our needs. The washer was perfect for a post-hike load and allowed us to pack lighter. Dan was an amazing host himself, and replied quickly to our questions with very helpful answers. The building was quiet (no loud neighbors) and the guys who worked the front desk were very nice and friendly. If I come back to HK, I'd rebook Dan's place as it was a spacious, clean property in a central, convient location with an amazing, responsive host.
整洁干净,各种电器生活用品一应俱全!

The perfect home base for our stay in Hong Kong. Dan was an excellent host. From the booking throughout the stay he was always responsive and had great suggestions for seeing the city. We loved being right off the escalator- it was extremely convenient for exploring or getting down to the ifc to catch a ferry. The neighborhood is quiet, but with quick access to restaurants and night life. There was a small grocery store right down the street and an excellent bakery called LeVian. We purchased bread and eggs to make breakfast before heading out for the day. The apartment is well-stocked with dishes and cookware, and the space was comfortable for three adult travelers. We made it up to the rooftop one night to hang out and watch the lights. Super cool private space to experience the city. Highly recommend Dan’s apartment for your stay in HK.

I travel a lot to HKG on business and Dan's place is always one I check to see if available, one of my favourites. Dan is a great host, always responds quickly, his place is in a fantastic position and even though it's on Cain Rd it is quiet because it is so high up.
It is only few minutes from the escalator, plenty of bars and eating within a few minutes walk, and the buses are right out the front.
The place is clean and tidy, great facilities, everything works and access is quick and simple.
I look forward to my next stay.
Dan was perfect host. Responsive and super helpful. Flat in a perfect location. Everything you might need within 10min walk. Highly recommend

Dan's apartment is very clean and its close to the bus (Website hidden by Airbnb) also close to Lan Kwai Fong but there is no noise around.Dan is very patient.I aked lots of questions and I always got reply quickly and detailed.
Dan的房子离半山扶梯很近,然后楼下门口就有一个公交站,地铁的话要走个几分钟,楼上视野比较好没有什么遮挡物｡房子很干净整洁,一应俱全,我们烧饭什么都很方便｡Dan非常耐心,各种问题都回复及时并且详细,入住过程很顺利,虽然他不在,但是不受影响｡无线也很快,电视有的台可能稍微有点卡｡整体很推荐!感觉住在中环这边又安静又方便｡
Great location, could be cleaner

Квартира находится в прекрасном месте рядом с эскалатором, магазинами и кафе. Вид из квартиры изумительный! Wi-fi был очень быстрым. Квартира небольшая и вся заполнена вещами владельца. Фотографии, видимо, были сделаны давно и не совсем отражают действительность. Диван очень старый с неприятным запахом, белье и полотенца влажные и с неприятным запахом тоже, кондиционеры шумные, но без них в квартире запах сырости. Не подходит для путешественников с детьми (небезопасные окна, огромное количество стеклянных бутылок на полу). В ванной отличный напор. Мы всегда останавливались в отеле Bishop чуть выше, что и планируем сделать при следующей поездке. Dan был очень мил, отвечал на все вопросы при бронировании. Мы не виделись, но встреча была организована наилучшим образом. Я бы рекомендовал данную квартиру при условии проведения небольшого ремонта и подготовки площади для комфортного проживания гостей.
Dan’s place has the perfect location to explore Hong Kong, plenty of very good restaurants and bars are in walking distance. Awesome view as well (top floor)!
It was a really nice experience.
Amazing location with a great view. The rooftop was excellent. Dan was very responsive and all procedures were very clear.
Amazing location, close to everything you need but a nice private apartment that isn’t noisy. I know HK pretty well as I live here for 5 years. Dans apartment was the perfect choice.
房间还是很宽敞的,只是有些凌乱｡

Dan's place is in a great central location to explore hong kong. It's a 15 min walk to Central station via the escalators. The apartment is a bit small for four people since there's not much space to store luggage, but still a great apartment. Dan always responded immediately when we had questions.

Dan's place is in a great location in Midlevels. It's close to the escalators to go down to Central, there's a bus stop right in front of the building, various cafes, supermarkets and places for children in the same street. 

The apartment is in a nice building with fast elevators. Being up on the 24th floor gives you a great view, especially at night. Dan's place had the perfect size for us, a family of 4 with small children. The bedroom is separated by a door from the living area, which was great to separate our toddler from the baby at night. Dan made up the pull out couch for us so that we had 2 beds to sleep in. The bathroom has a bathtub which also was good for the kids. The kitchen had all basic amenities. For Hong Kong standards, his place has a pretty good size.

Check in and check it went smoothly and easy. Dan is very communicative and fast in responding. He was very flexible with our check out time. We'd stay at his place again if we're back in Hong Kong and can recommend it to other guests.
Dans place is in a great location and has amazing view of Hong Kong. Would recommend to others!

name: Little Manly retreat
summary: A quaint little apartment in Little Manly with water views, overlooking the city and beautiful Balmoral Beach. A stones throw to some of Sydney's most beautiful harbour beaches and a 10 minute walk down the hill to the heart of Manly and Main Beach.
description: A quaint little apartment in Little Manly with water views, overlooking the city and beautiful Balmoral Beach. A stones throw to some of Sydney's most beautiful harbour beaches and a 10 minute walk down the hill to the heart of Manly and Main Beach.

reviews.comments: Close to everything Manly has to offer

name: Studio32 - Brand New & Self Contained
summary: Brand New Modern Studio in Sydney’s inner west suburb of Leichhardt just 6kms from The CBD of Sydney. Private and self contained with a queen bed, ensuite and kitchenette. Ideally located with access to various modes of transport and walking distance to a shopping centre, restaurants, cafes and pubs.
space: The space is suited to 1-2 adults with a comfy queen sized bed, lounge space containing a big screen TV and laptop desk with unlimited wi-fi.  The ensuite bathroom has a large rain shower, fluffy towels and a hairdryer.  A kitchenette with bar fridge, toaster & kettle, microwave and sink with some basic supplies.  An iron and ironing board, hangers and hanging space is also provided. A quiet, bright airy space with block out blinds for privacy and sleeping. Reverse cycle air-conditioning to keep cool in summer and warm in winter!

Ideally located with access to various modes of transport and walking distance to a shopping centre, restaurants, cafes and pubs. The ensuite bathroom has a large rain shower, fluffy towels and a hairdryer.  A kitchenette with bar fridge, toaster & kettle, microwave and sink with some basic supplies.  An iron and ironing board, hangers and hanging space is also provided. A quiet, bright airy space with block out blinds for privacy and sleeping. Reverse cycle air-conditioning to keep cool in summer and warm in winter! Located at the rear of the property above our garage, private access is via a secure digital entry gate to the studio. The rear lane is well lit at night with a s
neighborhood_overview: Leichhardt is located in Sydney’s Inner West approximately 6km from the CBD. Famously known in the past as “Little Italy” for it’s Italian culture and restaurants, there is now a much more varied selection of dining options available. We are a 3 minute walk from the local shopping centre, Leichhardt Marketplace that has Woolworths, Aldi, a bottle shop, Chemist, Butcher, Grocer/Deli, Bakery and specialty stores/services.  Cafes, a pub, restaurants and laundromat are located a short 5 minute walk away on Marion Street, Leichhardt. A 10 minute walk will get you to the famous Norton Street where there is a vibrant selection of pubs, restaurants, cafes, wine bars, bookstore, cinema and specialty stores. Leichhardt is a convenient suburb with easy access to all modes of transport to get you around Sydney and its sights from Bondi to the City and to The Blue Mountains!
notes: Located in the inner west suburb of Leichhardt, we are subject to some aircraft noise.  As Sydney airport is under a curfew there isn’t any aircraft movement between the hours of 11:00pm and 6:00am. Check In: 2:00pm Check Out: 10:00am Early check in and late check out is possible subject to availability.  Please note, there is a security surveillance camera on the entry gate from the rear lane.
transit: Trains, buses and the light rail are all within walking distance from the Studio. The train is a short 5-10 minute walk away and is a 14 minute ride to the CBD. Alternatively the light rail is a 10 minute walk away and the bus stops are a 3-5 minute walk away depending on where you want to go. A taxi to/from Sydney airport is approximately $35 to $45. Unmetered street parking is available if you are travelling with a vehicle. We can provide you with a map of where to park in close proximity to the studio.
access: Located at the rear of the property above our garage, private access is via a secure digital entry gate to the studio. The rear lane is well lit at night with a street light directly above our gate and a sensor light in the side passage entryway. With private digital entry you can come and go as you please.  Unmetered street parking is available in surrounding streets if you have a vehicle.  Note there is a narrow staircase of 17 steps up to the studio, please refer to images.
interaction: Being a young working family, we come and go from the main house throughout the day however are just a phone call away. We are happy to assist with any advice on local attractions, dining, amenities and transport. A smooth and simple check in and check out with all digital entry, the exchange of keys is not required.
house_rules: - No Smoking in the studio or on the property. - Please be respectful of us and our neighbours and keep noise levels to a minimum. - We appreciate that our guests will expect clean, well maintained accommodation and ask that you respect the property during your stay.

reviews.comments: We had a great stay at Tracey's studio. It was very clean and comfortable with everything we needed. Tracey was responsive and gave us good instructions to find the place. Would definitely recommend.

This is my fifth or sixth times I stayed with Airbnb, and all I can say is this is the best experience I’ve ever had! Tracey is a very nice and caring owner, she always answer to my questions in a short period of time, very responsive. The apartment is very clean and new, with a modern interior and stylish decorations. The location is convenient, only 10 -15 mins driving distance to the city. If I ever go back to Sydney I would definitely stay there again, highly recommended.

A lovely apartment, very comfortable and hosts are a lovely young couple. Good value and close to public transport and all that Leichhardt brings, an inner city oasis with hidden gems. Would recommend to friends and family.

Studio32 is a little heaven that made us feel very comfortable after a long trip. Tracey has done a great job setting it up with all you need. It’s exceptionally clean and has a slick design. The proximity to the airport was the key feature for us, however, as Tracey correctly stated in the description the planes do not Tack-off or land during the late hours of the night. We’d recommend the studio32 to anyone.

Tracey is an amazing host, she is very helpful with directions and respond promptly. My partner and I love her place as it’s close to restaurants, shops and public transport. The place is a modern studio on top of a garage which was very tidy, relaxing and quiet. Would love to come back again for our next trip! :)

Tracey's place was the perfect pad to explore Sydney from. We appreciated the modern, comfortable nature of the place and the 24/7 keypad access, removing the need for keys.. It's a 10 minute walk to Lewisham station and a 25 minute train ride to the city. We were also grateful for the small tocuhes, such as WiFi, milk and tea. Overall great experience!

Clean and excellent location! Tracey provides clear and accurate instructions. Perfect for an overnight stay.
Great location, extremely clean and easy check-in. Highly recommend
This place is great, so clean, private highly recommend.

All in all a good private place very clean & tidy 
Great location within walking distance of a park ,Market place & many Restaurants 
Breakfast in the form of oatmeal sachets
& condiments Tea & Coffee 
Unrestricted parking on the street close bye
We had an amazing one night here. Had everything we needed for our short stay and was in an awesome location.  The room was really private which we loved. Thanks Tracey

Tracey’s place is fantastic. We have stayed twice now and it is conveniently located, close to great restaurants and cafes and easy to catch the train. The space, especially the bathroom, is comfortable and plenty big enough for two. Wouldn’t hesitate to stay there again.

name: Artist Studio
summary: My home is located in the heart of Sydney with bars,Restaurants, Café, Supermarket, Museums, Hospital, Darlinghurst, Surry Hills and famous Oxford Street just walking distance also you can hop on the train to nearby beaches or any other outdoor activity with parks & Elizabeth bay just nearby and come home unwind & get ready for a fun night out where nightlife thrives here at Kings Cross As for me, I'm an Artist who host parties and shows and travel from time to time for work. This is my home. :)
space: Before you book this place please do read through all additional information.  Its a smart pricing system from 90~118 AUD.  Thats about $45~59 AUD PP for one night.  I do not charge any hidden extra fee for 2 people.  Other than one-time cleaning fee. $66 I work hard and travel a lot so I know sometimes some host can be unhelpful with your needs but I only treat people how I want to treat it. :) This is a safe, clean space. Please don't bring a guest or hosting a party of any kind.  The apartment is an oldie but goodie. I love my home. Please treat it the same way as you would for our own home. :)
