neighborhood_overview: Kings Cross, Potts Point is known for nightlife, especially the neon-lit clubs and bars of Kings Cross. Daytime brings a buzzing cafe scene, with locals heading to Macleay Street for bistro brunches and edgy fashion. On Sundays, Kings Cross Market is filled with craft vendors and food stalls. Nearby, Llankelly Place is a foodie hub of hip multicultural eateries, while Victoria Street has backpacker pubs amid terraced houses. It sits on a ridge immediately east of Woolloomooloo, west of Elizabeth Bay and Rushcutters Bay and north of Darlinghurst. The suburb has a roughly trapezoidal shape, and at its greatest extent is no more than one kilometre long by 200 metres wide. Potts Point's eastern boundary is Macleay Street. The suburb's other boundaries include Darlinghurst Road to the southeast, William Street to the south, Brougham Street and part of Cowper Road to the west. ---Wiki & (Hidden by Airbnb) maps
notes: This is not a party house.
transit: Bus & Kings Cross station just near by
interaction: My phone always on. I can easily be reached by phone or texts
house_rules: Be able to clean up after yourself   also no shoes in the house. :)

host.host_about: Artist

reviews.comments: It’s wonderful place. Very close to station

We stayed at Griffin's space in Kings Cross/ Potts Point for a week and enjoyed it - the flat was bigger than I was expecting and being high up got beautiful light which we loved. It really had everything we needed. Griffin was very quick to respond to my messages and checked up on us mid week to make sure everything was fine which we appreciated. The location is fantastic being a couple of minutes to Kings Cross station and all the amenities the area has. The only thing I would mention is that being so central it can get a bit noisy in the flat, especially as the slatted window in the kitchen doesn't close as far as we could see and there was an air conditioning unit or something on the other side of it. But with ear plugs this didn't bother us too much and all the other excellent points more than made up for it. Thanks Griffin! Lucy and Ben

Wonderful little place! Great location, easy access to Kings Cross, and close to plenty of food options. Griffin was prompt with responses, helping out with a check in time and very accommodating. Would stay again!
Nice, small apartment. Perfect for short trips to Sydney.

Griffin was responsive, relaxed and very helpful. The studio is cute, well equipped for what you need as a city pad and location great for nightlife, transport links and shops. Tastefully decked out, its size isn’t an issue as it’s well put together. Lovely touch of flowers and fruit from the market too ;)
Cosy and clean apartment in a vibrant area. Griffin is very responsive and thoughtful host. We liked complimentary coffee and snacks provided. Recommended!

Awesome stay! Perfect home-base for exploring Sydney that’s got lots of fun nightlife and coffee shops within a few blocks for anyone who wants to do a little work and plenty of play. Would definitely stay again!
cool place to stay and near everything.

Griffin was an amazing host and after a long haul flight from London we arrived to groceries as the supermarkets would be shut for ANZAC day! It was these small touches along with a stylish and extremely clean apartment that made our stay well worth it. If we ever come back to Sydney we will definitely be staying here again. Thank you Griffin!!
Lovely studio, not the easiest entrance with any amount of bagage. Studio is lovely however.

Great spot for a short trip to Sydney. Very close to public transport and great food options all around Darlinghurst and Potts Point. Griffin was an excellent host and we really enjoyed our stay in his nice little apartment.
Great place. Griffin is very available

We had a great stay here. Griffin is an awesome and genuine host - very helpful and attentive! It was the perfect location for us as we spent a lot of time walking and exploring all surrounding areas. It’s a compact space which Griffin has done a very good job of making very effective and had everything we could have needed. And a very comfortable bed and pillows ! Plus very good wifi
Would highly recommend Griffin's place - fantastic location, very clean, excellent communication
This is a sweet little central apartment. Great access to transport, entertainment and food!

We had a lovely week staying at Griffins. The place itself is tiny but it had everything we needed! Amazing location right beside Kings Cross Station so super convenient to catch public transport. 

My favourite part was that One Yoga is literally 2 doors down! Also the restaurant right across the street - Silly Tart - is a must visit! 

Griffin was quick at responding if we had any questions and very accommodating. Thanks again!
Griffin was a lovely host and was very communicative when we needed him. Room was a little smaller than anticipated but was very neat, tidy and well kept.
Griffin was a great host! He was so kind & welcoming when we met him at check-in. The studio was perfect for a quick trip to Sydney.  Cute, clean and adorably decorated. Loved it!

Griffin was an exceptional host with great hospitality. He was very welcoming and experienced with his explanations and tips. Really appreciate the aesthetically designed apartment with complementary condiments provided by Griffin! Overall, extremely pleased with Griffin, the apartment and it’s convenient location (very near the train station and surrounded by lots of food)! (:

Griffin is a doll. He's very generous. The studio has everything you would ever need, including a white cockatoo on the rooftop across the way, bellowing. So easy to get to, and to get around, whether by transit or walking. Loved it.

Griffinin asunto oli siisti ja viihtyisä. Siellä oli kaikki mitä tarvitsin viikon majoittumiseen. Sijainti oli hyvä: parin minuutin kävely Kings Cross asemalle. Alueella on kauppoja ja ravintoloita, jotka ovat myöhään auki. Miinuspuolena onkin, että katu/alue oli alkuyöstä usein aika meluisa. Alue on trendikäs ja eläväinen ja se kuului myös asuntoon. Parina ensimmäisenä yönä naapurit pitivät niin kovaa meteliä, että minun oli vaikea nukkua. Kerroin tästä Griffinille, joka lupasi ystävällisesti selvittää, voiko tehdä asialle jotakin. Loppuviikon nukuinkin paremmin, eivätkä naapurit enä häirinneet samalla tavalla. Griffin on ystävällinen ja avulias majoittaja, kommunikointi hänen kanssaan sujui mutkattomasti.

Griffin's place was perfect for our 3 day stay in Sydney. The location was very close to the train station and also a reasonable walk to the harbor. The place was also well decorated and we had no problems checking in and out! Would definitely recommend for anyone visiting.
Nice amenities (Coles opposite) , very close to King Cross Station. Unit has no lift, can be difficult for client with large luggage.
Griffin’s place, is super central - train and bus station within a 1 minute walk, a lot of restaurants, super cozy clean studio.

This apartment is decorated nicely and in a great location. It’s a real apartment and not a hotel room, so expect the charms and imperfections of an apartment in an old building. Everything works and is clean and check-in was easy.

Highly recommended. Griffin is a great host and very helpful to any questions! We love the location of it, very close to Kingscross Station. The studio is lovely with everything I need for a weekend, i.e a big comfy bed by windows. The apartment is a few storey up in the building which requires a few staircase walking. Mindful if you have mobility issues.

Très bon séjour chez Griffin qui m'a très gentiment accueillie et renseigné sur les sorties possibles dans le week-end. L'appartement était propre, bien équipé avec une vraie petite cuisine et quelques ingrédients de base. Une corbeille de fruits était également à disposition. J'ai particulièrement apprécié la Wi-Fi portative !
Nice!
Griffin's place was clean and conveniently located. And the bed was super comfortable. Griffin was also very accommodating with our early check-in time. Great stay overall!

Griffin was a lovely host who helped us out with everything we needed for our stay in Sydney. His apartment was cute and clean and perfect for our long weekend away. Good location near a supermarket, lots of cafes/restaurants and the train station. Thanks Griffin!

Kings  Cross is packed with cool bars and good places to eat. The flat is next to the train station making it very quick and easy to get to central Sydney and out east to Bondi etc. 
The flat is basic but well laid out with a nice cosy feel. Kitchen and bathroom are very small so a long stay might  it be ideal for 2 people.
Had a great time and would be happy to stay again if visiting Sydney! Thanks
Griffin was very helpful and responded quickly to messages. The studio is in a fantastic location for exploring Sydney.
Nice, stylish apartment with a comfortable bed! Easy communication. Area is a bit rough, former red light district, but house felt really safe.

Enjoyed my stay in Sydney at Griffin’s place.  Although small, it worked perfectly for me.  Great location and very clean with lots of charm.  Griffin met me as planned and let me in.  Great communication from booking until check out.

Griffin's place was amazing! It is an old apartment, but super clean and very charming. Griffin was incredibly prompt with communication and our check in and check out was smooth. Griffin was super understanding as well when our flight was canceled last minute! The apartment is located in Kings Cross, really close to the train station which was great and really easy to get to and from the airport. However, it is Kings Cross be warned. One business next to the apartment is an adorable dog grooming parlor and the business on the other side was a gentleman's club...strange mix! However, considering Kings Cross is a "drinking area" we had no issues with noise from the street and felt safe walking around at night (there was two of us). There is no aircon in the apartment but the little fan works nicely. Also there is no fly screen on any of the windows which means you have to watch the windows if they are open (think bugs and birds). Griffin left some sparkling water and fruit in the apartment which was really lovely too. All in all, I recommend the apartment and would stay again!
Great location and great place! I would highly recommend staying here while visiting Sydney.

Griffin is a great host; friendly, flexible and kind. We were confronted with bad weather conditions in Sydney (our flight was cancelled) and he gracefully let us stay longer to accomodate alternative travel. Also Griffin answered  quickly and accurately to all our questions. 

The appartment is near Kings Cross Station and is easy to get to by tube from the airport and city center. You can walk from the city center, it is not far but you have to like climbing like I do! 

The building is an oldie but goodie. It is functional, nice and light. 
The appartment is on the 5th floor so I was greatful that Griffin could get my suitcase upstairs. I would never have been able to do it on my own.

The place consists of 3 spaces: a bedroom with a confy bed, table and a closet,  a bathroom with a bathtub and connecting this a small kitchen where  you can cook.
Griffin left for us water and some stuff in the kitchen which was very kind and handy for the first day.

There are 2 big supermarkets 2 minutes away.

There is an baggage airbnb nearby if you need to store your luggage. Very easy and good.

Great little place to stay for a couple, excellent location, just a street up from the train station, Holey Moley and restaurants and coles. We felt very safe around the area, considering the bad reputation Kings Cross has, and being told we were next to a Gentlemen’s Club. Would recommend, perfect for a couple.
Perfectly located, bright, airy and stylishly decorated. Griffin was a very helpful host and we had a lovely stay here.
Griffin was a great host and the apartment was perfect for our needs. Compact, minimal and clean it was the ideal base from which we could explore the city. Highly recommended.
Griffin was a great host! Highly recommend his place!

Extremely well-located, Griffin’s place is ideal for either lone travellers or a couple. Also to note the area felt safe and the studio apartment was beautifully decorated and the bed extremely comfortable and the place very clean. Would recommend!

Such a great little place! Perfect location, legit two minute walk from the train station and amazing restaurants/shops. Griffin was an amazing host, such quick communication with great responses. My only suggestion would be to get a microwave. ;)
lovely studio! nice location, clean room. almost everything you need is provided. room decorations are good.

Griffin's met us for check in which was super nice as we arrived quite late, he had also got us some fresh fruit. The place is in the perfect location for transport around the city. It is a pretty busy area at night on the weekends but this isn't an issue in the apartment. Everything was as we expected, lovely and clean. This place is perfect for a trip to Sydney.

Griffin’s apartment was amazing!! The space was beautifully decorated and had plenty of space, even for a small apartment. The kitchen had all the basics needed, and the whole apartment was super clean when we arrived. The location is excellent- only a couple minutes walk to Kings Cross Station, and we walked to the Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge in 25-30 mins. The WiFi was also great- a little box you could take around with you in the city so you could always have access to internet (handy for maps!). Overall we had an excellent stay!

This apartment is all about the access and convenience to get into the city and It’s true to description and size.

What I loved is you are literally a block from King’s Cross Station which gets you to all the trains in the city.

The apartment is located about 4 flights of stairs (no elevator) so just preplan on luggage.

There is a full size grocery store 2 blocks away and a upscale Woolworths also within a couple of blocks not to mention tons of cafes.

There was a small challenge at checkin but I was impressed with how quickly Griffin stepped in to remedy the situation.

Overall great experience and provided everything I needed to enjoy my visit to Sydney.

name: One Bed available in Bondi for Chrismas!!!
summary: Hey! One bed in a twin room is going to be available from 22th of December till the 4th of January  You'll be sharing a room with a girl from Chili The flat has 4 bedrooms(2ppl each), 2 bathrooms, big kitchen and living area and private garden. Quiet area but close to bus stops, beach (7min by walk), many shops, cafes, pubs etc We are a mix of foreign people (22-35yo) We enjoy having dinner, BBQ or outdoor activities together every now and then Join our family during the best season in Bondi!!

name: Single room with private balcony close to CBD
summary: Single room with private balcony in a shared house very close to CBD and University of Sydney. The room comes with single bed, desk, closet and hangers. Bathroom is shared with just one other person. Spacious kitchen, living room and back yard with bbq. Free access to laundry and WiFi connection. The other housemates are all international students/workers aged 23-30. Everyone is very respectful, social and welcoming. Bus stop for the city just across the road.

reviews.comments: Really enjoyed staying with Serena and Mohmed!

Quality appliances:  fridge/freezer, oven/microwave/grill/hotplate, toaster, kettle, coffee percolator. Freshly painted, with bamboo flooring & ceiling fan.  A garment rack to hang your clothes and shoes, and an outdoor table and chairs to enjoy your morning coffee.  Free street parking and super fast WIFI.

Long-term guests will enjoy the convenience of ducted vacuuming.  1km from local shops (including Coles/Woolworth, and take-away options).  Companion pets considered.

neighborhood_overview: A quiet, peaceful neighbourhood with great local parks for children and pets
notes: - Some guests have reported noise. We live upstairs so you will hear footsteps and sometimes small pets padding along the floor. If this is going to bother you, please consider carefully before booking.  -The toilet/shower are combined, and separated from the sink only by a glass door. Meals can be prepared in the kitchenette in the main room if this is an issue. -The flat is studio-sized
transit: Local transport options:  •	Seven Hills Train Station  •	Joseph-Banks T-Way (for buses)  •	Local buses service the street and can transport you to the local train station or T-Way.  •	All transport information in Sydney, including ferries, trains, buses and light rail:  (Website hidden by Airbnb) –  •	These transport apps are also great for planning journeys: o	Opal Travel (download from AppStore onto your smartphone)  o	 (Website hidden by Airbnb)  o	 (Website hidden by Airbnb) - I like Tripview •	You will need an Opal Card for all public transport: (Website hidden by Airbnb) – you can get one online, train stations, retailers such as newsagencies, Transport Customer Service Centre at Circular Quay (opposite wharf 5) or Central Station, by cal (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) •	Fares. You can find full details here: (Website hidden by Airbnb) but basically adult train journeys under 10km cost $3.46, most ferry journeys cost $5.88 (Manly is $7.35), light rail and buses costs $2.15/3.58
access: Self-contained flat includes private front entrance, main bedroom/lounge combined, wet room (shower/toilet), and small kitchenette with a sink.  Check-in is via a keypad safe containing keys.
interaction: I am more than happy to assist with any questions or queries to make your stay easy and enjoyable. I will respect your privacy, and all interactions will be on your terms ;)
house_rules: - Unreturned and/or lost house keys will be charged a $25 replacement fee. -All overnight guests must be approved in advance through the booking process and are subject to an additional fee as noted in the price. -Please ensure all dishes are washed and rubbish placed in the bin.

host.host_location: Kings Langley, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about:
I love meeting new people, hosting, and travelling. 

My life passions are my research (paediatric epilepsy) and cute pets.

reviews.comments: Great location, just off the M7 but quiet neighbourhood. Private entrance with car park right out the front. Easy checkin, even on Christmas Day. Comfy bed. Old bathroom with European style toilet in shower but worked well enough for us.

Sam was as amazing host! The place was in perfect condition, and the bed was super comfy. During our stay, Sam provided us with fresh sheets and towels, also giving us opportunity to use the house upstairs. Thank you for everything Sam! :)
Nice clean 1 bedroom unit. Everything you need to make yourself comfortable. Clean and tidy and in a great location. Thanks for the awesome accomodation.
Great little spot. Neat and tidy. Sam was a great communicator and nothing was too much trouble

Lovely studio with all the homely features. Sam was outstanding with communication and responding. She was very accomodating and flexible to make sure our stay was fantastic! Highly recommend this beautiful place :)
Great people, great service, can be a little noisy if you are a light sleeper, Overall we’re very accomodating
Very cozy and comfortable. Very quiet neighbourhood and a lovely room. A great host as well! Enjoyed our stay!
Excellent value for money.. cant get anything else at this price.

Very nice place, Sam was very informative and a great host. 
Thanks
Lovely, modern, cosy apartment. Friendly hosts, easy to communicate with! Good value for money!
Clean place, comfy bed, pillows and couch!
Great place to stay
Stayed 2 nights at sams . Easy check in , shops walking distance.
Sam is a wonderful  host and great with Communication.The place is Lovely and Modern.

Sam place is really well located to visit Sydney ! Don’t take your car if ypu have one and jump in the public transports ! Easy to take and really near the airbnb ! And whenever you need tips or help Sam and her boyfriend are really helpful for it ! The area around is nice and quiet perfect after daily trips in the city to breath out ! And plus I really enjoy doing my yoga every morning outside with the singing parots around ! Will recomend it even more for couple to stay in but no problem if you are comfy about sharing the bedroom/living room with your friends or family as we did with my mum ! Come there and enjoy your stay !

Great little place! Sam communicated very well with us before and throughout our stay. Very well equipped place; we found it perfect for our needs. Parks and shopping centre within walking distance. Wouldn’t hesitate to stay again!

Sam is such a great host who went above and beyond to help make sure my needs are accommodated. That does not mean travelers can be demanding of her. Be nice to this charming lady! Lol! The place is also very convenient with a nearby mall and bus station. Suitable for single or couples traveler.
Sam is beyond helpful with any questions you have or if you need anything. Extremely friendly and welcoming. We really enjoyed staying here

Basic facilities but no proper kitchen. Adequate for s short stay for a couple but too small for comfort for an extended stay and kitchen/cooking facilities not reaaly suitable for cooking evening meals. Great wifi and pleasant, friendly and helpful hosts.
This is a neat studio flat, its in a quiet road near to shops not far from highway to City. Basic fascilities as per description. Clean and great for short term use.
Nice place, good value for money!
Very nicely styled studio.. Nice stay.. good privacy.

Very happy with my stay @Sam's place.  Cute apartment feel with modern touch and privacy. All the basics were provided. Well maintained and kept. Sam had a info booklet, which helped me alot with my stay and exploring the area- really liked that. 

Will surely come and stay here again. Highly recommend it.
Good  location in quiet neighbourhood.
Comfortable, clean and convenient, below family home so expect a bit of normal family noise.
Sams place is really nice and cozy.. was perfect for my family.. quite nice and central as well. Would be happy to stay here again..
Great value, nice touches including a beer in the fridge! No hassle stay

Sam was so hospitable and thoughtful. Equipped with everything I needed, including comfort. Quite location yet close to motorways. I strolled to the local shop, easy walk. The manual provided was detailed. I will be booking again in the future.
Sam was so lovely. Such a beautiful space, with everything you need.

Sams place is nestled  in very quiet, peaceful and resedential area. Place was very tidy, comfortable bed and sofa. Sam and husband were great host, showed excellent hospitality. Perfect for two of us. Would recommend anybody and will
stay again if I get an opportunity.
Good
Aussie living exp.
Great location and very clean. Amazing
Great thanks for the coffee and milk
Polite helpful hosts, great location close to amenities, but still private enough to relax. Lovely clean space with everything you need.
Really lovely space, nice and close to transport and shops. Sam was really helpful and quick to respond.

my stay there was pretty good and they helped me a lot.
They are very kind and patient.

Sam is ver professional. Her responses were very quick and outstanding. The residence is in a lovely suburb of Sydney, Kings Langley. If you're looking for a nice self contained unit, please give it a go!
Easy to get to, good value for money and great communication.
Excellent location overall very quiet n cozy plc n cost wise very reasonable clean n tidy ..
Good place to stay for a couple if you want to stay in that suburb. Close to bus stop if you don’t want to drive
Was great to come back to after a busy day! Thoughtful touches and great amenities.
Great spot and really cozy stylish place.

Great if you don’t like the city but still want to be super close to shops and things to do. As mentioned you can hear some footsteps from the home above however Sam and everyone that lived there were courteous and there was no extreme noise or anything like that. I’d stay again!

Sam should get extra positive points... when was the last time your host UNDERSTOOD how to sleep comfortably. This is the only host to use proper pillows that support your neck, thus spine, for a good sleep.

The accommodation: 
It is oddly picturesque as a converted garage situated at the bottom of the main house.

The greatness:
•Friendly residents. 
•The USB plug socket. 

Accommodation Tip: 
The towel rack is attached to the doorway between the main room and the kitchen.

Recommendations: 
Go to Church Street for those evening vibes. 

What felt missing from an Airbnb superhost: 
That welcome home goody bag feeling - this would incident a typical bathroom cup to put one's toothbrush in, cold water in the fridge, a full loaf of bread or dietary snack alternatives with spreads, an option of tea/coffee during the stay; these finer super host experience touch was being missed. However there was the salt and pepper condiments. 

The minutiae of an Airbnb feel was not felt, like a pen and pad, a welcome book with recommended foods and attractions. 

The neutral (for light sleepers): 
1. Only for the well instructed, and using your own power source. Good luck getting your Android to work with the MirrorCast device; don't forget to bring a 2A USB charger. 
2. The 6am singing from the bird wildlife for about 30mins. This is AUS, this should be expected and accepted by residence, otherwise try the CBD. 
3. The road noise in the distance (this is hardly noticed if not sensitive to sound) 
4. As mentioned by the host. The acoustics are not great and you can hear upstairs. This made it into the next category below.

The not so satisfying: 
Unfortunately as the accommodation is a conversion of the ground floor on the property, you can clearly hear the TV, conversations, wonderful chimes from the doorbell and footsteps through the front door from the property owner(s) upstairs. 
• The accommodation does not retain heat. 
• The digital signal for the TV in the accommodation always cuts off. 
• Bowls are provided :-) , but there are no larger size bowls... :-( 
• The accommodation door does not stop a cold  draught 
• The Wi-Fi is a home network. If you're able to connect, you will be sharing your devices visibility over the router during busy times with the others in the above property. You can accidentally play your music/videos to the wrong TV or speaker and shock the people in the building upstairs. This is also a security issue for the tech. savvy. 
• There's only one mirror and one sink, it is head height and is only in the kitchenette-shower. 
•The bed blanket visually looks like it has seen better days. 
• Bring your own coffee capsules for the machine.
Overall is good

Sam is a wonderful host. The apartment was very clean and tidy. All the necessary facilities and amenities are provided. Being so close to a shopping centre also is a huge plus. I will definitely stay at this apartment in the future. I highly recommend it if you are looking for good accommodation.
It was good experience. Thank you.
Serene location, close to shops and public transport (buses), good communication by host and we'll maintained property.

Price and position were ideal for my trip. Place was clean and organized. If you’re a light and early sleeper be mindful of the noise from upstairs - just TV, walking etc. Otherwise all good, thanks Sam.

It was a nice place to stay. Had some issues with the linen and pillow which the host was happy to solve or offer solution.....

Overall good stay....

Cute. Compact. Private. A coffee machine with coffee, milk, sugar provided was lovely. Bed was comfy and really liked the pillows, not too soft, not too hard. We liked that the toilet was within the shower stall as it’s self-cleaning. A bit of a noise issue coming from upstairs which we did not mind at all. Close to bus stops and a good 15-minute walk to shops which was handy.
Good place - simple, cheap & just what we needed!

Fantastic place has a base camp for Western Sydney however it is more suitable for business trips or for short stays due to the limit space. House is located in an ideal spot close to major highways and local shopping centre but nested inside the suburbs so you escape the noise pollution.

Nice little flat. Everything we needed. Good location for me. Coffee machine and a few DVD's were nice added touches. Tv is a bit small though.
The place is easy to find and access. Apart from the sound of some foot steps from time to time through the floor/ ceiling above, The place is peaceful & quiet and we weren't disturbed at any point during our stay.
Would definately consider staying there again.
Thanks

Stayed at Sam‘s place and although near a busy road the place was relatively quite and peaceful. 

The coffee place a quick 5minute drive was my daily stop. Breakfast, lunch and dinner.   Great food. 

Comfortable bed and overall a clean, neat place with a lovely view.  

Would definitely stay here again.
Suitable for my needs.
It was a nice place to stay. Quiet, nice, clean, comfortable, and spacious! I liked the easy check in and out system as well. Thank you Sam and Lee!
Don't be taken in by the photo and description. I found the accommodation wanting and wouldn't stay there again.
It is as advertised. 100% would recommend this place

The description of the property is fair but the finish in the bathroom/toilet/kitchen was poor compared to the lounge/sleeping area. Room enough for 2 people but I doubt for four, steep driveway, less suitable for older people.
Sams was excellent
Nice place
The place is nice and Sam reacts very quickly which was great!
great place, terrific and attentive host.
The accomodation was functional and provided everything I needed for my stay. Sam is a super friendly host and always responds quickly with a friendly reply.
Great location. Safe neighbourhood.  Easy walk to supermarkets and restaurants and quick drive to major freeways.  The accommodation was perfect for our needs.
Well setup space for the size. Had everything I needed for my work trip. Would stay here again.
Well worth checking out Sam's place, simple, clean and good location
its good to book in advance and nice place to stay

name: Double Bay Apartment with Stunning Harbour Views
summary: Light, bright, and airy apartment with epic harbour views... 8 minutes to BONDI and equidistant to the CBD. We're sure you too will love the location, the privacy and creative charm of this home. A stones throw 5 minute walk to the seaside Double Bay village where you'll find cafes, fine dining, chic bars and boutique shopping. 2 mins walk Edgecliff station which offers transportation: bus, rail and city cabs.
space: Large north facing balcony where you can watch the sun rise and fade. Entry to the apartment is via a secure door to the lobby and guests can be greeted through the apartment intercom. Each bedroom has a fan for comfort and robes. The Master Bedroom has an Ensuite, whilst the main bathroom has a bath/shower and aromatherapy burners with a separate toilet.
description: Light, bright, and airy apartment with epic harbour views... 8 minutes to BONDI and equidistant to the CBD. We're sure you too will love the location, the privacy and creative charm of this home. A stones throw 5 minute walk to the seaside Double Bay village where you'll find cafes, fine dining, chic bars and boutique shopping. 2 mins walk Edgecliff station which offers transportation: bus, rail and city cabs. Large north facing balcony where you can watch the sun rise and fade. Entry to the apartment is via a secure door to the lobby and guests can be greeted through the apartment intercom. Each bedroom has a fan for comfort and robes. The Master Bedroom has an Ensuite, whilst the main bathroom has a bath/shower and aromatherapy burners with a separate toilet. North facing courtyard equip with basketball hoop, and fairy lights. transit: CBD (Shops, restaurants) - 5 minute Train King's Cross (bars, clubs) – 2 minute Train Oxford Street (bars, clubs) - 8 minute car/Uber Opera house - 11 minute car/Uber Bondi beach – 8 minute car/Uber Bondi Junction (shops) - 4 minute car/Uber Bus & Train – 2 minute walk Edgecliff Station
access: North facing courtyard equip with basketball hoop, and fairy lights.
house_rules: - Cancel up to 2 days before check in and get a 50% refund (minus service fees). Cancel within 2 days of your trip and the reservation is non-refundable. Service fees are refunded when cancellation happens before check in and within 48 hours of booking.  Please treat this home well and be respectful of the furniture, fittings and fixtures. Please respect our clients wishes – parties are forbidden. Any damage will be on-charged. Please ensure the apartment is in a clean state when checking out and keep noise levels to a reasonable level that won't disturb neighbours tranquility.

host.host_about:
I am a New Zealand born architect and love my little slice of paradise in Edgecliff. My apartment has fantastic harbour views, 8 minutes to BONDI and equidistant to the CBD. I am sure you too will love the location, the privacy and creative charm of my home.
A stones throw 5 minute walk from the seaside Double Bay village where you'll find cafes, fine dining restaurants, chic bars and boutique shopping. The Edgecliff station is even closer which offers transportation: bus, rail and cab across the city and beyond.

reviews.comments: Our family of 4 had fantastic time staying at Sarah’s stylish place with  harbor view! We could not wish for a better place for New Year’s Eve. 3 minutes walk from the major transport hub, close to the CBD  and Bondi beach. Sarah was a great host who looked after us and made sure we were very comfortable. Super fast communication, clean place, fast WiFi, much more! Thank you Sarah for being our host!  Highly recommended.

I’m sorry to write a bad review but we are very disappointed about this booking. I’ve sent this comments to the owner but we haven’t received any response or assistance. 

The place was very dirty. It Looks this hasn’t been cleaned to receive people. Actually it looks it has not been cleaned in a while.

There were cockroaches all around the place, mainly in the living room and the kitchen.
 
Bed clothes in the Bedroom were used (you expect clean sheets when you book a place)

Sitting in a sofa so dirty is disgusting. And the tv and electronics were not properly connected to use. Everything is full of dust and dirtiness.
We had to clean the chairs and table to be able to use them. 

The add says “breakfast provided” but that was not been arranged.

The humidity smell is really bad and it should be a comment in the description warning about that before booking.

To sum up, our stay in this place was not pleasant. We came with a lot of expectations to have a good time for new year in Sydney. This is the first time I have a bad experience with Airbnb.

My family want to have a good time and don’t want to waste all our days being uncomfortable. 
They asked me to move to a clean place from the beginning. This was a big problem because booking with no anticipation here, these days is very difficult to find and also is very expensive. I would like to cancel from the first day but we couldn’t find another place until now.

I’m claiming for the full refund plus the cleaning fees since this apartment hasn’t been cleaned for receiving us. I also ask for the service fees to compensate this really bad experience. 

This is the first time I have a bad experience booking a place with Airbnb. I know this is just an isolated case and I trust that the company will resolve my dispute fairly.

name: Lovely room in a charming Surry Hills terrasse
summary: Very charming Surry Hills terrasse . Filled with positive energy and beautiful vibes . The house is quiet , clean and lovely . We got a sunny backyard at the back where we all can enjoy
description: Very charming Surry Hills terrasse . Filled with positive energy and beautiful vibes . The house is quiet , clean and lovely . We got a sunny backyard at the back where we all can enjoy
house_rules: The basic stuff guys . You can use the kitchen, cook but you just have to clean up after yourself .  Be clean and respectful . That’s all I need :)

host.host_about:
Hello there 
I'm Ombeline ,30, been living in this beautiful house for almost 3 years.
I'm really into positive energy and good vibes so it's important for me that the guests that I host are respectful and nice . 
I like yoga , practice reiki , study kinesiology and eat healthy food . 
I like to live in a peaceful atmosphere. 


This is a really quiet and tidy house that I cherish and I hope you'll love it.

My flatmate Thomas lives also in this house 

I'm happy yo help you if you need advices about Sydney . 

Looking forward to meet you guys

name: Waterside appartments in Rhodes
summary: 1 min to shopping centre, IKEA. 5mins to train station . Water side apartment with outdoor swimming pool. Big bright room,Queen size bed , wood floor, inside balcony. Private bathroom.
description: 1 min to shopping centre, IKEA. 5mins to train station . Water side apartment with outdoor swimming pool. Big bright room,Queen size bed , wood floor, inside balcony. Private bathroom.

name: Take a Coastal Walk from a Stylish Flat
summary: Holiday in modern, sophisticated style in this sleek penthouse conveniently located just two minutes from Coogee Beach. Relax on luxurious furnishings and admire calming ocean views from the bedroom, living area, and the roomy, open terrace.
space: WHAT WE LOVE      Perfect for a summer holiday, this stylish 2-bedroom luxury apartment is 200 meters away to Coogee Beach. Embracing the calmness of this sophisticated Art Deco glamour apartment and take advantage of its self-contained private rooms with brand-new luxury furniture. Close enough to all that Coogee has to offer, but tucked away in your own little piece of seclusion, a range of fine dining options and the beach are mere footsteps away. Try Farinha Pizzas e Massas Restaurant and many more just around the corner. Head along the famous Eastern Suburbs coastal walk down to Coogee Beach where you can dine at your pick of café along Coogee Bay road or pick up supplies from Woolworths supermarket if you’d rather cook up a feast at home. If you happen to visit on New Years Eve enjoy great views of the Coogee fireworks from Blenheim Park, a few minutes up the road. With kids, walk with them to a fenced children's playground which is located on the perimeter of the oval on the cor
description: Holiday in modern, sophisticated style in this sleek penthouse conveniently located just two minutes from Coogee Beach. Relax on luxurious furnishings and admire calming ocean views from the bedroom, living area, and the roomy, open terrace.
neighborhood_overview: Close enough to all that Coogee has to offer, but still nicely tucked away and secluded, a range of fine dining options and the beach are mere footsteps away. Try The Coogee Pavilion and many more just around the corner.
notes: No other additional notes
transit: See transport NSW website for the easiest quickest root available around sydney
access: Guests have access to everywhere in the property.
interaction: We will be available over phone should the guest need it
house_rules: 1. Identification of all guests to be sent upon request to L'Abode Accommodation via Airbnb prior to the access instructions sent out. If ID has not been received (if requested), we reserve the right not to send out access details. 2. Please make sure you follow the departure instructions and leave the keys back in the lockbox. If keys are not left in the requested spot, a $150 fee will be charged. 3. The cleaning charge on Airbnb includes linen, towels, a starter pack of amenities and toilet paper (once these are used up, the guest will need to purchase more), and the exit clean. Should you require a mid-stay clean or additional linen, there will be an additional charge. Please message us through Airbnb for a quote. 4. Please be mindful of your neighbours and keep noise to a minimum between 9pm - 8:00am.  5. Maintenance Issues: We do our best to attend to all maintenance issues as and when we are notified during typical work hours. However, please note if you contact us over the weeke

host.host_about:
L'Abode Accommodation Specialists provide accommodation and concierge services for families, corporate clients and holiday makers where they can rent affordable accommodation to cater for all of there needs while they are either searching for long term permanent accommodation or are only living in Sydney for a short period of time.

All of our properties are fully equipped and fully furnished this includes:

 - all furnishings
 - Wifi and Internet 
 - Power
 - hotel quality luxury linen
 - welcome amenities, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body lotion, dishwashing liquid, tablets, washing powder, tea, coffee, milk, sugar 
 -  appliances
 -  crockery
 -  cutlery
 
-  entertaining, cooking


This is to ensure this is your home away from home and that you are feeling comfortable and relaxed for your stay.

reviews.comments: We have stayed at many Airbnb homes, this is our all time FAVOURITE place! The apartment is brand new, perfect layout, dual level which offers both privacy + space. For even the most fussiest of travellers - I highly recommend you book as this you couldn't hope for a better team then L'Abode, so thank you for making our holiday so great!!
This was a great place. Highly recommended based on location and quality of the accommodation and value for money
Perfect, very clean, suitable for family live, kitchen have all things needed. Beach is very closed, woolworths is about 7 min walk. Our family like this house very much.
A superb two floor property in a great location just minutes from the beach. Clean, fantastic amenities and in reach of airport and city as required. Would highly recommend this property to all.
It was a great stay! Pictures do not do it any justice as view from balcony was absolutely amazing and it was a very stylish apartment for a nice girls weekend.

This is a great apartment with an awesome rooftop terrace and great sea view. Everything was brand new (Feb 2018) and barely used. Very comfortable for 2 couples. 

Great location close to the beach and all things you need to have in daily life are close by.

The penthouse is clean and amazing. We loved the outdoor bbq area as well as the spacious balcony. It is only 2 mins walk to Coogee beach which is super convenient. Will definitely book again next time when we want a weekend getaway to the beach! :)

This apartment was the best was very very comfortable and soooo close to absolutely everything we didn’t venture far just to all the amazing eating and drinking holes we didn’t cook once although everything u need is right there in the kitchen.  the rooftop was everything we needed for our catch up with our girlfriends who came from nz and interstate for a long awaited catch up it was just fabulous would definitely recommend this apartment for a relaxing getaway.
Excellent apartment in a great location, with a great view

We had a fantastic stay with plenty of room for a family of 3 teenage boys.  The location was ideal (a quick stroll down to the rockpool and beach each morning for a swim before breakfast) and the views from the balcony are breathtaking.  We sipped drinks watching the sunset and city lights begin to twinkle. The apartment seems practically brand new and is perfectly equipped with everything you need.  Thanks for a lovely Coogee holiday - we'll definitely be back.
This apartment is beautiful, from the decorations to the spectacular view from the balcony. You will feel right at home

The Bream Penthouse was perfect for our mini-break. Close to the beach, restaurants, bars and cafes but far enough away to be nice and quiet. And luxury at such an affordable price!!!  Thank you guys for a fabulous stay. Will be back for sure.

This is an amazing apartment in a great location! Entering the property the first time can be a bit tricky, and if the cleaners can up their game slightly, the experience at this apartment would have met our expectations and more.

This apartment is a in a great location and is almost new. The furniture was modern and nice, bed comfortable. Very quite in the bedrooms. However, we had a number of maintenance issues that were clearly there prior to our arrival and left unfixed. This was disappointing and seemed careless. For example the toilet seat in the ensuite was broken and not stable to sit on, the ensuite door handle had been snapped off so if the door closed could not be opened from the bedroom, there was a broken drying rack that had been dumped on the patio, the towel rail in the main bathroom was broken off and there was no where to hang towels, the coffee machine was broken and the heating system on the top floor emitted a really bad smell. I guess there was a dead mouse or rat in the system or roof.

This property is exactly as pictured, which does not do justice to how good this place is. 

Spotless and everything is in great condition, bathrooms are clean and the outdoor area is the perfect spot to spend an afternoon overlooking the water. 

Plenty of space and great contact from the host make this the perfect place to stay. Hope to be back!!!
Great apartment. Central location. Clean and fabulous :)
Beautiful place in a great location
Value for the location it is at and the amenities it has.
Great location, beautiful apartment.
Beautiful clean apartment, great views and close to everything
Lovely place to stay

The apartment is a great location for anyone looking to stay in or around Coogee. The quality of the apartment is fantastic and the balconies are great spaces for lounging, dining or viewing a sunset.

Communication was easy and quick, with check-in and parking made clear with detailed instructions upfront.

There's everything you need for a comfortable stay, I would highly recommend it.

Great location, very neat property, “on the ball” host
Will book again

What a lovely space! Clean and quiet with lots of light, gorgeous patio with a view of the ocean, fully equipped kitchen with cool filtered water, close to Coogee Beach and shops, quiet and cool bedrooms on lower level with all amenities. Plenty of bedding and towels. Hosts are responsive to questions. Loved the keyless entry. Large flight of stairs inside apartment so not good for those with a disability or bad knees. Perfect space for my friend and I as we had our own bedroom and bathroom,  and a hope step and jump to the beach. Thanks for a fantastic stay I will be back!

name: Bonito y cómodo loft en el centro
summary: El piso consiste en un amplio espacio salón-comedor-cocina y una habitación interior para dormir. Recibe luz todo el día y especialmente a la tarde. Está reformado, completamente amueblado y equipado con lo necesario para pasar unos días muy agradables. Situado en el barrio del Raval, entre el mercado de Sant Antoni y la Rambla del Raval. La zona es animada y cosmopolita, llena de tiendas de comida, terrazas, restaurantes, museos, bibliotecas... Muy bien comunicado.

host.host_location: Sant Pere de Ribes, Catalonia, Spain

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 43 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Apart-Hotel Triplex Praia Flamengo
space: Building details: - Modern apart hotel - There is a sauna and open air swimming pool in the building.  - Laundry service/room (Monday to Friday - cheaper than other laundromats in the neighbourhood), closed Sundays and bank holidays. - Free wi-fi - Gym - Small restaurant/coffee-shop that serves meals. You can eat at one of the Restaurant's tables located in the leisure area of the building or you can order "room service" at no extra cost.  - Cleaning/maid service at an extra cost.  Apartment Details:  - It's a 3-level apartment.        1st floor: lounge/dining area with LCD flatscreen and pull-out sofa, fully functional kitchen and balcony with a view to the pool/leisure area of the building.         2nd floor: Bedroom with bathroom ensuite and LCD flatscreen        3rd floor: 2nd Bedroom 2 single beds.        There is also a second bathroom (without shower) in the apartment.  - Full apartment is yours and is private. I keep it clean so I would expect you to do the same.  - Apartment i

You can eat at one of the Restaurant's tables located in the leisure area of the building or you can order "room service" at no extra cost.  - Cleaning/maid service at an extra cost.
