There is also a second bathroom (without shower) in the apartment.  - Full apartment is yours and is private. I keep it clean so I would expect you to do the same.  - Apartment i
house_rules: No pets allowed. No smoking. No unauthorized additional overnight guests.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Staying at Elias' was absolutely wonderful. The apartment is perfectly located. Elias is in one word, incredible! He provided us with everything we needed to make our stay perfect. He was warm, very helpful in helping us with directions to places and suggestions for places to eat. His home was cosy, and really comfortable. I highly recommend staying at his place!

We had a great experience in Elias' appartment in Flamengo, Rio. We were staying with the three of us and the flat was beyond our expectations. It's a beatiful modern flat with a large master bedroom (with a view on the Corcovado for the real Rio feeling!), a smaller second bedroom, a bathroom, two toilets, a well equiped kitchen and a living room with balcony. 

The flat is in Flamengo neighbourhoud, which appeared to be a safe upmarket neighbourhoud with more than plenty lively restaurants and bars around. Public transport to Copacabana/Ipanema, Pão de Azúcar, Corcovado, Santa Teresa, Central, Niteroí and the two airports is excellent with bus and metro-stops next door.

Elias is a very friendly and helpful host. He bought us food and drinks and he was very flexible with our arrival and departure times. He did his utmost best to make our stay as comfortable as possible. We can definitely recommend this appartment! Elias, thank you!

Elias has an amazing apartment really well located (near metro and in front of Flamengo) in a quiet neighbourhood. We went with many friends and everybody enjoyed its stay. Elias has been very kind and helpful for what we needed. I would recommend and go back there if needed for my next stay in Rio!!

My family loved the apartment!
There're real beds for 6 persons, a living room, a nice kitchen and a bathroom. And it's also near to several nice places, such as bars, markets and the beach. It's located in a wonderful and safe area!!! 
It's important to say that the building has a restaurant with delicious food at a cheap price. You can order one plate for two (a lot of food), for +/- 16 reais (8 dollars).
Elias was very polite and helped us a lot!
I would definitely rent again and tell my friends about this apartment!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Minha família adorou o apartamento!
Lá está camas reais para 6 pessoas, uma sala, uma cozinha agradável e um banheiro. E também é perto de vários lugares agradáveis, tais como bares, mercados e da praia. Ele está localizado em uma área maravilhosa e segura!
É importante dizer que o edifício tem um restaurante com deliciosa comida a um preço barato. Você pode pedir um prato para duas pessoas (um monte de comida), por + / - 16 reais (8 dólares).
Elias foi muito educado e nos ajudou muito!
Eu iria alugar de novo e dizer aos meus amigos sobre este apartamento!

Ótima estadia, tudo foi perfeito. Elias é bem atencioso e nos ajudou em tudo que precisamos. O apartamento é confortável e agradável. A localização também é muito boa, perto tanto do centro quanto de Copacabana. Recomendo.

la estadia en en apartamento de elias fue maravillosa, un lugar muy comodo con los elementos necesarios para hacer mas facil y entretenida nuestras vacaciones, cerca de importantes centros turisticos, cerca de estacion de metro, supermercados y restaurantes, es realmente lo ofrecido en la pagina, lo recomiendo, seguro, gente muy cortes de conserje y vecinos.
The apartment is excellent! Very well located and exactly as showed at the photos. I and my family recommend it. For sure, when we come back to Rio, this will be the place to stay and enjoy.

The apartment is very comfortable and fully equiped!!! We are a family of 5 members and it was like being at our own home. The apartment has a/c in every room and is very well ventilated. The building is located in one of the best neighborhoods of Rio. You can just take a bus to the beaches of Copacabana or Ipanema in front of the building. In the sorrounding area are shops, restaurants, grocery stores, pharmacies, etc.
And the most important: Elias and Paula are very good people. They were really kind with us and always ready to help us with any question. So, nice place, convenient price and great people managing the apartment is an awesome combination.

We had really great time with Elias & Paula: perfect apartment, great communicative and friendly hosts, really nice location. Public transport is good, there are nice restaurants close, and the area is nice and safe to walk even at night. The apartment itself is clean and spacious - we were two people, but it would easily work for a family or a group too. Fully equipped kitchen too. I definitely hope to book the apartment again when I return to Rio!

Very nice apartment in a very good neighborhood.
We are a family with 4 children and could sleep very comfortably.
There is a nice beach a few minutes away and lots of shops.
Elias is a very sympathic and attentive host. He did heel come us very nicely and did his best to help us.
Great place to stay in Rio. We would definitively come back.

O apartamento é ótimo, igual às fotos, super limpo e bastante confortável! A infraestrutura do prédio e sua localização são muito boas! Tem fácil acesso aos pontos turísticos da cidade, seja de taxi ou metro. O proprietário Elias foi super receptivo e nos ajudou muito! Tudo correu exatamente da forma como planejamos.

O apartamento é muito agradavel, limpo e arejado, próximo de tudo. O Elias é um excelente anfitrião, muito simpatico e educado. Adoramos nossa estadia. Rio de Janeiro é maravilhoso, pena que só foi 3 (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza recomendo e espero poder voltar em breve.

Apartamento é otimo e muito bem localizado.  Onibus em frente para quase todas as praias. Metro só caminhar algumas quadras por ruas muito tranquilas, vizinhança boa. Perto do apê tem supermercado, padaria e restaurante. Pra quem gosta de correr ou caminhar, só atravessar a avenida e desfrutar da paisagem maravilhosa da praia, mutio verde e o vista pro pao de açucar enquanto se exercita. Perfeito!!
Pra quem gosta de sair a noite, Lapa esta a apenas R15,00 de Taxi. Super recomendo o apê
O apartamento é bonito e super agradável, ficamos bastantes confortáveis nele e ele correspondeu a tudo que precisávamos para uma boa estadia. Recomendo.

Great apartment in a great and safe location. Close to the subway, bus stop just infront of the building. Great amenities - swimming pool, sauna, fitness. You can see the Jesus from the master bedroom!

Good apartment at a central place in Flamengo. The apartment is next to the subway (Flamengo) and to some bus stops. A map with directions is in the apartment. Some nice restaurants and bars are in walking distance. A supermarket is also nearby. A fast wireless Internet access is available at the apartment (upgraded 12/2012). The communication with the host is very good. He is very friendly and helpful and speaks good English. We can recommend the apartment.

Very nice apt. Super good location, very nice neighbourhood. Elias was very polite and helpfull.The building has a doorman 24/7 so checking in nd out was no problem at all eventhoug we arrived late in the evening. Air con in all rooms, super quiet. We totally recomend it. :)

We really enjoyed our stay in Rio at Elias and Paula's appartment. The flat is cozy, clean and is located in the nice and safe area. You can easily get to most touristic attractions from this location - to the beaches Copacabana, Ipanema, Leblon in the south and citi center (Lapa, St. Teresa, etc) in the north. Elias was very nice to show us around the city on the first day of our stay. We do recommend to stay in this flat and if we come back to Rio we would definately consider this option again:)

We really enjoyed our stay in Rio at Elias and Paula's appartment. The flat is cozy, clean and is located in the nice and safe area. You can easily get to most touristic attractions from this location - to the beaches Copacabana, Ipanema, Leblon in the south and citi center (Lapa, St. Teresa, etc) in the north. Elias was very nice to show us around the city on the first day of our stay. We do recommend to stay in this flat and if we come back to Rio we would definately consider this option again:)
Oleg and the Russian team

O Elias é um anfitrião muito atento e camarada, durante nossa estadia se mostrou sempre a disposição para atender qualquer necessidade.
O apart é muito aconchegante, limpo e organizado; adoramos os dias que minha família e eu passamos nele. Agradeço e recomendo a todos!!

Piso limpio, amplio, tiene todas las facilidades, en una de las mejores zonas de Rio, tranquila y bien comunicada con servicios cerca. Se pueden dormir 6 personas. 
El dueño es muy servicial y correcto. yo volveria.

Elias, thank you very much for your hospitality, helpfulness an responsiveness! Elias&Paula' s apartment is very specious, well equipped and very well located. The apartment and Flamengo area are very suitable if you are visiting Rio with your family: located away from all big tourism crowds in a safe and green area, yet well connected to all destinations, as it has very convenient metro connection to Copacabana, Ipanema (15 min), Pão de Açúcar, Sambadrom and Santa Teresa. There are several very nice restaurants around in the area, where you can get super-delicious Brazilian food and escape tourism crowds and pricing  having the dinner together with local people. I was really pleased to discover Rio from this perspective.

Ótimo apartamento, nos sentimos muito à vontade. Mesmo com duas visitas inesperadas, totalizando sete pessoas no apartamento, nao achamos nem um pouco apertado. 
No próprio prédio existe um restaurante com preços amigáveis e porçoes gigantescas.

É bem localizado, de frente para a praia do flamengo. De ônibus são menos de 20 minutos para copacabana/ipanema/leblon.

O Elias também se disponibilizou em caso de qualquer dúvida, foi extremamente amigável. 

Obrigado novamente pelos lindos dias que passamos no rio!

Lucas
O apartamento é original e está bem situado para se locomover pela cidade. O edifício é tranquila e tem portaria 24 horas. Encontramos nele todos os móveis necessários. A experiência foi positiva

The apartment of Elias and Paula is well situated on the Praia de Flamengo near the beach. Safe area and close to some great restaurants. The flat is well laid out and I was able to watch Wimbledon!
I would recommend this well situated as well laid out apartment! Bart

This is the second time I have stayed at Elias and Paula's place! In a word -fantastic -location, location , location!
I have Verna regular at the Belmonte -a must just down the street!
Walks on the beach -great! Safe neighborhood!
@Onze Internet cafe has great beer!!
Bart

Thanks a lot to Elias. The apart was nice, well furnished and very central for all turism activities in Rio. The fridge was full of food for us for our first days and Elias was very reactive to our questions.
Very pleasant stay in Rio.

O apartamento fica num otimo lugar com tudo perto, e é muito agradavel para quem quiser ficar alguns dias no Rio.
Voltarei com certeza!
Great apartment to stay at one of the best locations in Rio. Probably best value for the price. Any destination in Rio convenient to go from this place. Be the guest of Elias is pleasure. Thank you.

Estivemos no Rio este final de semana e nos hospedamos no Flat do Elias.  O Flat está bem localizado na Praia do Flamengo, próximo ao Aeroporto Santos Dumont e é exatamente igual às fotos. Devo ressaltar que fomos agradavelmente recebidos pelo Elias, um anfitrião muito atencioso e prestativo. Realmente nos sentimos "em casa". O flat acomoda bem 6 pessoas, muito funcional e bem equipado, não sentimos falta de nada para nosso (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos ao Rio e ao flat do Elias!

Minha experiência foi positiva, gostei muito do apto., espaçoso, limpo, tudo muito fiel as fotografias postadas, localização perfeita. O Elias foi um anfitrião perfeito, nos atendeu prontamente em todas as nossa necessidades. Indico o apto., e com certeza, me hospedarei novamente.
Obrigada por tudo!
Cris :)

This is truly an AWESOME apartment to stay in. It is clean, spacious, and with all amenities you can wish for. The location is great as Copacabana, Ipanema, Sugar Loaf (walking distance), and Christ the Redeemer are all close.  Good restaurants, bars and breakfast places are also just a couple of blocks away. The complex has a laundry service and a cafe with reasonably priced and very tasty food.
Elias, your host, is great!!! As a world-traveler himself, he understand the needs of travelers and helps wherever he can. This place is well worth the $$$. We genuinely enjoyed our stay in the apartment and would not hesitate to come back.

Minha estadia foi maravilhosa, Elias é um ótimo anfitrião, tratou eu e a  minha família com todo carinho e respeito, com certeza vamos retornar e aproveitar mais alguns dias. O apto é muito bem localizado, próximo ao Aeroporto e com bares, restaurante e supermercados nas redondezas, sem contar que apto é bastante limpo,  Elias ficou a total disposição da minha família a fim de resolver qualquer problema, mas nem teve a necessidade  foi super tranqüilo.
Great host and great location! Thanks Elias for your attentions.

Localização muito boa! Praia na frente do apartamento. E saindo pela parte de trás do prédio, você fica a poucos metros do metrô - estação Flamengo, farmácias, restaurantes e bares. Local tranquilo para sair a noite e seguro. O Apartamento é antigo, mas vale o custo benefício. O Elias foi super cordial e solicito também.
Super indico.

A friend and I stayed at Elias' place in flamengo for 4 days and it was terrific! The place has everything you need for a comfortable visit. There were even some grocery items and coffee already available to use. The place is exactly as advertised and Elias couldn't have been more accommodating from first contact, to checking in and finally...checking out. Sem problemas!! Highly recommend his place.
Great apartment!
Once again, Elias was a great host for a great stay
O apartamento é super bem localizado e espaçoso. Tem TVs grandes na sala e no quarto e a cozinha é muito bem equipada.
O apartamento é muito bom, exatamente como se vê nas fotos. Ótima localização e atendimento. Recomendo.

The apt is just like You see IT on photos! Good location, good transport possibilities close to the apt. Very good contact with owners. It was very nice of them to leave us some snacks on our arrival. The neighborhood is safe, metro in walking distance, bus station just next to the apt. I would recommend it to my friends!

Nossa estadia foi ótima! Anfitrião super atencioso. Roupa de cama e banho limpas e perfumadas. Suporte integral e esclarecimento de dúvidas de forma (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza será sempre minha primeira opção no Rio.
Our stayer Paula's place was unmemorable. Paula and Elia have a very nice place near everything and their hospitality was superb!

La experiencia fue muy buena.
El apartamento está muy bien ubicado y es muy cómodo.
Durante las semanas previas Paula & Elias estuvieron en contacto permanente. Y en el primer día de la estadía hubo un problema con la TV y lo solucionaron inmediatamente.

Paula and Elias were great hosts! They kept in constant communication prior to check in and were easily reached if we needed anything during our stay. They went above and beyond to provide us with local information such as taxis/restaurants/transportation etc. The place itself comfortably sleeps 4 or 6, there are two bathrooms, and one shower. The brought a cleaner in half way through our 12 day stay to provide us with fresh sheets and towels which was fantastic! The area is residential and we always felt safe. There are some nice bars and restaurants nearby, travel to copacabana/ipanema only takes about 15 minutes on the metro which is a 5 minute walk from the apartment, very easy. When heading back to Rio I would definitely stay here again! Thanks Paula and Elias!

Paula was a great host, extremely helpful with any questions we had. Location was perfect, all amenities within walking distance. The apartment itself is great - spacious and clean. Definitely recommend this spot for your stay in Rio!

We stayed at the apartment for 2 weeks and totally enjoyed the stay. The apartment was clean & bright and perfect for our stay. The neighborhood is very safe and directly across from the beach, which makes for lovely walks. There are many good places to eat in the area and it is convenient to all forms of transportation including the subway. For us it was close to where our son and family live so we could walk there quickly.

The apartment is in a very quiet building and everyone there was very friendly. We highly recommend this apartment & would surely stay there again on future trips.

Apartamento exatamente como nas fotos, localização maravilhosa! Perto do metrô, ponto de ônibus, taxi na porta, restaurantes e barzinhos por perto! Do 1º quarto é possível ver o Cristo! Foi uma tremenda surpresa. Os porteiros do prédio são extremamente solícitos e o Elias e a Paula foram super acessíveis e simpáticos. Roupa de cama e de banho cheirosinhos em nossa chegada e o chuveiro é uma delícia, principalmente após uma longa caminhada pelo Rio. Indico demais!

Fomos em 5 pessoas em outubro, ficamos por 3 dias. O lugar e excelente, limpo e organizado. Localizacao perfeita perto de tudo. O anfitriao muito cordial nos ajudou em todas as questoes sempre respondendo as mensagens com rapidez. Todos adoramos o local e com certeza nos hospedaremos la novamente.
Obrigada Elias e Paula.

the staying at Elias & Paula`s apartment was cool. Well situated and cozy. The only problem, which has nothing to do with the host, is about the laundry service. You give the guy a quality of clothes, enough to being washed in maximum 2 washes, and he washes in 4 to get money extra. His name is Sr. João. Don`t trust this cheater. Besides that, the place and the attention Elias gives to the hosted, are really great.

O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos. Bem localizado. Próximo ao metrô. Não levamos mais do que 15 minutos de taxi para ir aos lugares turísticos. O apartamento estava bem limpo. Fomos surpreendidos pelos anfitriões com itens para o café da manhã. Tudo estava ótimo. Ficamos boa parte da estadia sem água no apartamento por conta de obras realizadas na cidade, mas esse não é um problema do apartamento ou do prédio, o bairro todo ficou sem água. Recomendaria para outras pessoas! A cidade é incrível!

It's always a pleasure to be hosted in Elias and Paula's apartment. The apartment is in excellent condition. It has all  the necessary equipment  to make you feel at home. Elias and Paula are great people, they are always willing to help. The neighborhood where the apartment is located is very safe and it's very easy to move around Rio from there.
Thanks again Elias and Paula and I hope to visit you again very soon!!!
Christian

A casa de Elias e Paula é ótima para visitar o Rio de Janeiro. Grande, bem localizada e com muitos serviços. Os anfitriões são bem disponíveis e educados. Como host, e nesse caso Guest, de Air Bnb, super recomendo o lugar.

O APTO é exatamente como o anúncio apresenta, ou seja, valeu a pena ! Excelente localização e porteiros atenciosos ! O Elias e a Paula foram atenciosos e responderam os questionamentos com agilidade ! 
Aprovado !

We had a great time in our stay in Rio.. Elias is a very nice and kind person.. he helped us with all the details and explained about the city.. Flat is large up to 4person and area is wonderfull.. i highly recommend..

Um dos melhores apartamento que jà ficamos. Excelente estrutura e espaço. Localização perfeita para quem gosta de caminhar e esporrros Pois esta Na frente do Aterro e praia do Flamengo. Supermercados bons proximos. Utensilios de cozinha também foram perfeitos Pra nós. Filtro de água fornecendo o liquido Mais fundamental de graça e 24h .Fogão e geladeira novos.
Elias e Paula pessoas sensacionais. Conversar com Elias é enriquecedora e muito agradàvel. O problema com o ar que tivemos Durante a nossa estada, Eles fizeram questão de ajudar o màximo possivel com tudo. Paula chegou a esperar uma tarde inteira para esperar pelos responsàveis pelo ac. 
Por isso e tudo , agradecemos Mais uma vez.
Jà estamos planejando Voltar se houver disponibilidade do ap.

Elias foi cordial e atencioso quando solicitado.
O apto atendeu as expectativas e se encontrava limpo e conforme as fotografias.
O Flamengo é, sem dúvida, um dos melhores bairros do Rio de Janeiro.
Elias e Paula foram muito atenciosos. O apartamento é muito bem localizado e perto de tudo. Nossa ida ao Rio foi a trabalho. Tudo limpo e perfeito. Super indico.

Elias and Paula's apartment was wonderful.  It's in an unbeatable location near Flamengo beach, Porcão, and all sorts of transportation options.  The kitchen was well stocked with supplies, and the bed in the main bedroom is really comfortable.  Also,  it was very easy to communicate with Paula and Elias and they accommodated all of our requests.  Also, the doormen were very helpful with keys, luggage, taxis etc.

Tudo certo com o apartamento. Estacionamento no Rio acaba sendo o diferencial e como fomos em um grupo com 4 motos, foi fundamental em nossa escolha.  A localização também é muito boa e o bairro do Flamengo super agradável.  Voltaremos!

O Elias e a Paula foram ótimos anfitriões. As fotos refletem exatamente como é o flat. A vizinhança é ótima, com supermercado próximo, linhas de ônibus que passam em frente para irmos aos pontos turísticos, também é muito próximo ao aeroporto Santos Dumont (vale mais a pena ir de táxi que ônibus). O flat é equipado com tudo o que você precisa para passar o dia lá (rede, TV, piscina, academia), para confraternizar com os hóspedes, pois a cozinha é estilo americana.
Adoramos a estadia e indicamos!

Tivemos uma ótima experiência! O apartamento é excelente, totalmente compatível com as fotos, com localização também muito boa! Ficamos em 5 pessoas, confortavelmente instaladas. Elias foi super atencioso e nos recebeu na chegada. Voltaremos com certeza na próxima viagem ao Rio!
Elias was anazing host! He was available 24/7 and help us whenever we need. The apartment really nice and big. Location good close to everythings!

O Elias é realmente um excelente anfitrião! Me deu todo suporte antes de chegar, tirou dúvidas com muita agilidade e fez questão de deixar tudo pronto para que, quando chegássemos, tivéssemos a melhor experiência possível. O apartamento é realmente super confortável, nos acomodou bem, as camas são boas e ele tem utensílios básicos de cozinha que ajudam muito! Além de cafeteira e sanduicheira, que quebram um galhão! Eu e meus amigos gostamos muito e recomendamos fortemente este apartamento! Preço justo, localização excelente, boa infra-estrutura (até piscina e saúna tem no prédio) e receptividade bem acolhedora!

Apartamento muito bem localizado, com ótima infraestrutura, super residencial, com quartos, sala, banheiros em ótima conservação.
As fotos anunciadas foram extremamente fieis ao que foi publicado no site.
Tive o grande prazer de conhecer pessoalmente o Sr. Elias, que foi super atencioso, prestativo e disponível a nos ajudar no que foi preciso.
Super recomendo o imóvel para quem procura conforto associado ao bem estar.
Sempre que possível terei o prazer de retornar ao mesmo com minha família.
Obrigado por tudo Sr. Elias & Paula.

As fotos são fiéis ao imóvel que estava bem organizado e limpo. O proprietário foi super prestativo e educado antes e durante toda a nossa estadia. O apartamento é bem localizado (próximo à estação de metrô, pontos para aluguel de bicicleta e de comércio). Recomendo!
Fueron unos días maravillosos. El departamento era tal cual lo mencionado e incluso mejor de lo que esperábamos es muy recomendable y confiable la gente del edificio muy amable.

зручна, повністю обладнана для комфотного перебування чотирьох людей квартира. Чисто, тихо, сучасно. З господарем не бачилися, але листування було оперативне. Розташуваня нормальне,поруч пляж, неподалік супермаркети і метро. Таксі з GIG коштує 60 реалів, до SDU 20 реалів. Жодних ознак криміналу не зустріли.
A experiência de alugar o apartamento de Elias & Paula foi muito boa. O apartamento é confortável, o prédio é seguro e bem interessante para crianças e o bairro bastante residencial.
Todo perfecto, teníamos todas las comodidades necesarias. Nos gusto el barrio ya que teníamos el metro cerca y todo estaba al alcance. El apartamento muy limpio y todo tranquilo

Minha experiencia com esta propriedade foi excelente!!!
O imóvel fica em ótima localização próxima a comercio, transporte e entretenimentos.
Possuí acomodação confortável para até 6 pessoas, internet wi-fi e os funcionários do prédio são bem prestativos.
Os Anfitriões (Paula e Elias) foram bastante rápidos nas respostas aos esclarecimentos prévios solicitados e prestativos.
Foram também muito simpáticos e amigáveis.
Recomendo e volto sempre que precisar.
Abraços,
Julio Lapidus
Triplex très mignon ! Très proche de la plage de Flamengo qui est très calme, peu de monde. Beaucoup de petits magasins, supermarchés dans les alentours. Nous avons passé une semaine magique à Rio !
SENSACIONAL !!! Apto exatamente como anunciado, com todas as facilidades (supermercado, farmácia, táxi, metrô) muito próximas.

Agradeço a hospitalidade do Elias e Paula. O apartamento e as comodidades disponíveis são incríveis. Eu e meus amigos adoramos nossa semana e o conforto que tivemos. A localidade é ótima e oferece muita coisa.

La estancia fue muy buena. El apartamento tiene muy buena localización en el barrio de Flamengo, a 5-10 min caminando del metro. Es un barrio muy agradable y con muchos bares/restaurantes. El apt tiene todo lo necesario para pasar una buena estancia y el condominio presenta algunos equipamientos como la piscina y el gimnasio que mejoran aún mas la calidad de la estancia.

Elias & Paula nos atenderam muito bem antes mesmo de nos hospedar, muito solícitos.
Imóvel exatamente como no anúncio.
Localização excelente!
Appartement bien situé dans un quartier résidentiel agréable proche des commerces et de la plage de flamengo. Immeuble calme et sécurisé.
Très bien.logement agréable et bien situé.tres belle chambre principale

Fantástico!

Super Recomendo. Muito atencioso. 

Cheguei sem problemas ao local. 

As fotos descrevem literalmente o Flat.

Nota 10!!
Apartamento fica muito bem localizado. Os funcionários do prédio são excelentes!

Excelente anfitrião!
O Elias foi super atencioso desde o início e se preocupou em nós auxiliar para que tivéssemos a melhor experiência enquanto hospedados no flat dele.
Muito obrigado, Elias! As acomodações são ótimas e sua atenção deixa muito melhor a experiência!

O anfitrião é muito atencioso, ajudou o que podia, deu dicas. Ficamos muito satisfeitos!! Um ponto de destaque para nós em nossa estadia foi a prédio ter portaria, pois chegamos de madrugada (Horatio de chegada do vôo) e pudemos fazer o check in naquela hora mesmo. Muito outros lugares não negaram a nossa reserva por esse motivo. É um local, que assim que der, pretendemos voltar!!

Tudo muito bom. Conforme combinado. 
Apto bem localizado, limpo e agradável. 
Elias é gente muito boa. 
Recomendo.

Muy cómodo el duplex, es tal cual como sale en la descripción, con todos los servicios. Elias tenía mucha disponibilidad de ayudar en caso de cualquier duda, sus explicaciones son las exactas. Me agradó mucho, volvería a arrendarlo

A estadia no apartamento foi maravilhosa. Além da ótima localização, a casa é toda equipada, limpa e aconchegante. Volto com toda certeza. 
E o Elias me recebeu quando cheguei por lá, e esteve disponível com muitas dicas. Super indico!
exelente ubicacion ,muy agradable dpto. anfitrion exelente....lo recomiendo.
O apartamento é igual as fotos, e bem localizado, o único ponto negativo é a limpeza, que deixou bastante a desejar.
Ótimo anfitrião. Atencioso e tranquilo.

Apartamento perfeito, super confortável, silencioso e com uma ótima localização, muito perto da praia do Flamengo e do centro. 
Super completo, as com facilidades dentro do condominio. A piscina no final da tarde é uma opção mais que perfeita. O restaurante tem um preço super em conta que pode ajudar quando bater aquela preguiça pra sair pra comer. A lavanderia do prédio e a academia também ajudam quando se precisa delas.
Excelente triplex na praia do Flamengo, com piscina, sauna e estacionamento. Otima localização, ar condicionado em todos os ambientes. voltarei com certeza abs Elias

Este espaço é muito interessante! Acomoda bem uma família de até 6 pessoas e fica estrategicamente localizado, próximo a metro e muito central.
O anfitrião é muito atencioso e recebe muito bem.
Super indico!!!
Segunda vez que ficamos no apto do Elias e da Paula. Condomínio e localização excepcionais. Elias sempre solicito as mensagens. Muito obrigado por tudo.
Localização excelente, perto do Centro, da Lapa e da Zona Sul. O apartamento é ótimo e o Elias é super atencioso. Ficamos 4 pessoas no apartamento e todos adoraram. Recomendo com certeza.
Muy amable y muy buena comunicación, buen precio y excelente ubicación, equipamiento completo y cerca de comercios, farmacias y supermercados.

This is a great flat in a great location. Flamengo beach is just in front of the building - with beach walks and outdoor gyms. The Flamengo area is a "real" local area, not a touristy one, and there are lots of supermarkets (really, lots and lots!) cafés, restaurants etc closeby. The beaches of Copacabana and Ipanema are only a close metro ride away (metro is safe and clean and just 2,5 blocks away). Centro is only 4 km away - it's walkable (if it's not too hot). 

The flat itself is narrow with lots of stairs - i.e. not recommended for persons with mobility issues. There are two bedrooms and a sofa bed in the living room, and they provide plenty of sheets and towels. It had everything we needed in terms of equipment. There are ACs in both bedrooms and a fan in the living room. And you can see the Christ statue from the balcony! 

Elias is a great host, he was very attentive the whole time and helped us with anything we needed. He even stocked up the fridge for us since we arrived late one Saturday evening during Carnival. He really went out of the way to be helpful!
Ótima localização, totalmente fiel às imagens publicadas, tudo muito bom. O Elias muito atencioso e prestativo. Eu e minha família voltaremos com certeza.
Lugar excelente!! O anfitrião foi super atencioso! Adorei a estadia.

Ficamos hospedados para dar suporte à um filho e sua família, que mudaram para fora do Brasil. Sr Elias foi prestativo e gentil em responder nossas perguntas e atender todos nossos pedidos. 
O local é muito bom. Perto de restaurantes, supermercados, padaria, casa de sucos, etc. 
Os porteiros são gentis e bem prestativos.
As duas crianças, nossos netos, aproveitaram e brincaram muito na piscina.
Bem próximo do aeroporto Santos Dumont.
Recomendo para quem quer ficar perto dos bairros Flamengo e Botafogo.
Ótima recepção, anfitrião muito educado, solícito e camarada.
El departamento súper bueno, excelente ubicación, muy bonito. No recomendado para niños pequeños por las escaleras. La comunicación con Elias siempre fue fluida y muy amable. Recomendado.
Not to bed

Fomos em 6 pessoas, incluindo uma criança de seis anos. Ficamos 4 noites.
O Flat foi carinhosamente projetado e pensado para receber o viajante da maneira mais acolhedora possível: 
As fotos condizem exatamente com o espaço. Tudo limpo e organizado, confortável e aconchegante! Utensílios, eletrodomésticos, roupas de cama mesa e banho semi-novos e de boa qualidade. Destaque para o Chuveiro que é um colosso! A localização é um espetáculo, está a uns 200 metros da praia do Flamengo, uma área perfeita pra passear, correr, pedalar, se exercitar, tanto de dia quanto a noite, sem contar c a praia que é uma graça e bem limpa. 
No entorno há vários mercados, bares e restaurantes. Metrô/ônibus fica há +- 1,5 Km, o que facilita muito a visita a outros lugares.
Quanto ao proprietário, Sr Elias, muito solicito e atencioso. Às pouquíssimas vezes que o requisitei fui prontamente atendida.  Não titubeou em liberar algumas horas a mais no Checkout. 
Enfim, quando formos ao Rio não teremos que procurar outros espaços, este com certeza será nosso cantinho!

l'appartement de Elias est très agréable et pratique pour une famille. L'immeuble dans lequel il est situé est dans un quartier très agréable. On est vraiment en face de la plage. il y a toutes les commodités dans l'immeuble ( piscine, salle de sport, jeux pour enfants, laverie ...). Elias est très gentil et accueillant et très réactif si on a besoin de Lui. Je recommande vivement l'endroit a qui veut découvrir Rio en toute sérénité.

Really nice 2 floor appartment, nice to have that balcony with nice sunset view over the flamengo neigboorhood. Good location for soccer match, and every essentials are nearby.  The building felt really safe. Thank you Elias!

Um excelente custo/benefício. Atende perfeitamente as expectativas em relação ao preço da hospedagem e a localização. Tivemos uma boa experiência durante a nossa viagem ao Rio de Janeiro, em agosto/2018. Ponto alto para a interação com o responsável pelo imóvel, Sr Elias.

O lugar surpreendeu...quarto espaçoso e roupas de cama limpas e cheirosas..
Elias sempre prestativo e respondendo todas as solicitações..

A minha estadia no apartamento foi muito agradável. O apartamento é ótimo, especialmente o quarto principal é muito comfortável. A localização do apartamento é boa; perto do Aterro do Flamengo e do comércio. O apartamento estava limpo e organizado e o prédio conta com uma piscina e uma pequena academia. Quanto ao Elias: a interação com ele foi realmente excelente. Elias foi muito flexível, prestativo e fez tudo para que me sentisse em casa. O único ponto negativo é que os muros são muito finos e portanto as vezes pode ser um pouco barulhento. Fora disso tudo foi ótimo. Recomendo o alojamento e agradeço Elias pelo excelente serviço.
Elias foi muito atencioso e a comunicação foi ótimo. Apartamento em ótima localização.
Ótimos anfitriões! As acomodações são como as fotos mesmo. Localização muito boa. Recomendo!
Apartamento limpo, estruturado, com piscina e restaurante/bar. Ótima localização no Flamengo.
O senhor Elias é um excelente anfitrião!!! A casa corresponde as expectativas e super indico! Façam suas reservas!

reviews.comments: 房子超赞的,两室一厅一厨一卫,新装修,所有东西都是新的,离太子地铁站超级近,走路也就两分钟吧,路不饶,小姐姐带走一次就顺利记得,房门是密码锁,所以离开时交房很方便,如果下次住香港,一定要再选这间｡房东小两口颜值很高诶,人又nice,小哥哥超帅,小姐姐眼睛大大的,很可爱~~由于香港跟大陆的插座不同,需要带英标插头或者转换器哟~~
离太子地铁站很近,很方便,房东很热情,很细致,服务很周到,值得推荐

The whole place is amazing and is definitely worth more than what you pay for based on my experience. The host is super enthusiastic and accomodating and would put an extra effort just to make sure you will have your best stay in Hong Kong, Would definitely come back here if I'll be in Hong Kong in the future.
交通方便,价格便宜,室内卫生干净,适合几口人一起住｡房东热情,回复快｡美中不足楼下是臭口腐档,房子是新装修的,对气味敏感的人要注意一下｡

What we like about wilsons apartment is that it’s near shops, mtr station and market. The place is excellent when your travelling with family because it has 2 rooms and enough beds. It’s clean and cozy. Amenities are well provided. I hope that they will add microwave oven so that it is much easier to cook or heat food. Also, please improve the hot and cold shower because it is a bit complicated to use. Overall, i will really recommend the place for everyone

We rented 2 apartments of Wilson. Both of his units are really good and amazingly suites 7-9 adults & 2 kids. The kitchen will allow you to cook food, the water heater functions really well, and bedroom will allow you to rest really well after a long day of touring the city. Thanks Wilson & ur wife for accommodating us. We had a satisfactory stay in your place. 

Just note that his place is located at 4th floor, this will really test ur cadio.. but overall everything is great!

Pro : Great place with complete home appliances like fridge, washer + dryer, stove , water kettle, water heater, smart tv (you can watch youtube) , internet, aircond etc. Feeling like in my own home. I was there on a coldest month in HK where the lowest temp I recorded was about 6-7 degree at night, I never use Aircond. Water heater works very well. Home were decorated with modern concept. The place is very near to MTR station (prince edward) about 2 minutes walking. If you want to go to ladies market without using MTR, its just 10 minutes walking from the location.

Cons : Its on 4th floor without lift. Prepared your foot to climb upstairs. Another thing I doesn't like is sometimes the smell from tofu shop downstairs .
Wilson’s place is clean and near the MTR station. It’s such a convenient place to stay.
房子非常干净,而且离地铁站近,很方便!
房子在旺角地铁站和太子地铁站之间,很方便,走路不到5分钟就到地铁口,离旺角闹市区也很近,而且房型也很适合一家人入住…房东很热情,给了很多出行的建议,十分感谢
地理位置很不错,离地铁站很近,出行方便,房间不大但是布置很温馨,美中不足的地方是新装修还有一点点气味,而且没有电梯,如果拖着行李箱可能会不是很方便｡不过总体而言性价比很高,是很不错的一次体验!
房东人很好,来时帮我们提行李,回程了也来送我们,真的很贴心

Wilson is a great host and his place is  totally recommendable. Easy accessible by bus from the airport and there is also a metro station very close (just 2 mins walking distance). Wilson was very helpful all the time. He made sure that our stay at his place was comfortable and convenient. Thank you :)
The host is friendly and having quick responses. Love the place so much.
Nice place
Best place to stay if you want to enjoy and feel the vibe of Hong Kong’s shopping district :)

Wilson's place is at superb location, amenities are convenience. A self service laundrette (laundr yup 24hrs) is just across the street.Flat is on 4th floor but stairs are short flight,we stopped at 2nd floor,take a deep breath and carry on. My mum has bad leg but can do so without complaint. Stayed for 7nights and we all got used to it on day 3  Air conditioning in the flat was life saver as humidity was high. To us(7adults2kids), it's definitely value for money as it was holiday season. Hotel prices were high when compared to what we paid. what we save was our spending money

I went to Hongkong with my family ( 5 adults & 3 kids) on 11-16 April 2018. Wilson’s home was a good place near the Mtr Prince Edward. The place so clean I cooked my own meal for our children with the kitchen tool. I appreciated that Wilson find me at bus stop because I didn’t know how to go to his place thank you again. If you find place to stay in Hongkong, this home is a good choice
Great place and near MTR station
房东非常热情,入住当天体贴的帮我们几个女生把行李提上楼,很细心的教我们使用一些设施,还给我们分享了一些附近的美食店｡提供的住宿环境也很干净整洁,内部装饰也挺温馨,四个人住着很宽松,可以把行李箱铺地上整理这点在香港来说很棒｡电器设施挺齐全的,空调制冷快,热水器出水快｡总体而言是一次非常棒的住宿体验,下次来香港优先考虑住这｡
还是蛮好的一次体验,房东姐姐热情好客,最后一天还延长了时限,值得推荐

Location of the apartment is within a prime spot. An MTR station is just a few steps away, and there are a lot of stores near the area. 

The apartment itself is big, could easily fit 7 people. 

Checking in was a breeze. Wilson will guide you every step of the way.

Everything is great except there’s no elevator, which is expected since it was also mentioned by the previous renters. After a long day of walking around the city, going up to the room is a challenge. (Extra workout if you ask me, which is fine by us). Wilson’s home is almost complete of amenities; has a stock of garbage bags, salt, adaptors, tissues, towels, body wash and liquid hand soap. Although we were hoping to use the laundry, it was one of the major factors that we looked forward to since we were staying for 7 days but the washing machine was broken, we were advised after we checked in. We met Wilson when we checked in and he was very welcoming and accommodating. When we had a problem with the induction in the middle of 2am, he replied instantly and provided us resolution as soon as after lunch the next day. We weren’t able to cook food for a day, but it’s alright because overall our stay at Wilson’s home is fantastic! Definitely going to recommend to friends!!
Nice place. Friendly host. Great location. I would like to stay here again for next time.

The place is so amazing, clean, cozy and great location. Wilson was really helpful he gave me recommendations and his response so quickly.. I’m sure if I’ll come back to HK I prefer to stay in this apartment again :) thanks

Staying at the place was great as it was close to public transport and the street markets. The host gave us tips on where to eat and responded quickly to our messages. Though there were quite a few flights of stairs to climb to get to the apartment, on the day we left the host helped us to bring our luggage down.
需要爬楼梯,不方便爬楼梯的人不建议入住
位置就在地铁口转弯几步就到了｡除了要爬几层楼｡别的都很好｡但爬楼过后进屋感觉房间清新!特别有种家的感觉!性价比很高
The place is near shopping area and  a walking distance to MTR
Nice place near the MTR. Place was clean. Only drawback was no elevator.
离地铁站很近,不错
This was a good space. It was small but enough sleeping room for my family of 6. The bathroom and kitchen were tiny. But overall a great experience and great place.
nice
第一次使用爱彼迎,找到这家民宿,离地铁口非常近,卫生环境很好,一次非常好的住宿体验｡
if u don't mind to climb 4 floors everyday, it's actually a very convenient place to move around. Foods, convenient shops, MTR, bus station & etc are just around the corner

Thank you for the extra-mile hospitality and I wish you continued success in your business! It's been rainy (LoL) pleasant. I hope to catch you Manila if you find yourself travelling there, don't hesitate to reach out :)
Convenient location, had a great stay in hong kong, thanks
good
房东很热情,回复很及时,还有推荐当地好吃的地方,非常贴心~房子地理位置很好,交通便利~

The place was perfect for us. Close to the MTR, and Wilson made sure everything went smoothly when we arrived. Plenty of air con throughout the apartment and the place was safe and secure. Cheers Wilson!

Everything went very smoothly! 
The apartment was clean and Wilson always reachable via messenger.
Just expect a fourth floor place

It’s @ the 4th floor so expect to climb. too much luggage is a challenge. But location is accessible to everything. Transpo, food and shopping tourist spots destination plus host is accomodating hospitable and firendly.

地理位置很方便,离地铁站挺近,附近好吃的店也挺多的｡要是有机会还会再来的｡
就是楼梯爬的我毫无购物欲｡房东他们看到我们是早班机还尽量提前打扫完让我们入住的,感谢!
我是和老公,还有一位3岁小朋友,加爸妈共5人住,很棒的位置,离地鉄也近很好找,下次还会选择住这边｡很感觉热心教怎么去澳门等等~~

Value for money. Overall the location of the stay is good, the only things want to concern is the stay is located at 4th floor. If there is any parent with your trips, you might put this in your concern. Host is guiding me from the airport until we reach the stay and make sure we had checked in successfully. May consider to come back with Wilson's stay in next future HKG trip. Peach !
Great

Wilson's unit is worth its price. Did not expect much as Hongkong's units are really small but Wilson's apartment is better. Hopefully Wilson can provide more info about the places around and how to get there as well as more detailed instructions on how to go to his unit and how to go to nearest mtr (based on experience from other airbnb that knows their visitor is a tourist :D, others provide pdf files for everything  ) "2 mins away from mtr" isn't really helpful. :)
I am also expecting a 4F place but i did not expect the the "1F" will start from the 2nd floor  it was quite tiring after a whole day of walking but it's a good excercise 
Overall our stay at Wilson's place is good.

Wilson's apartment is cool, clean, fast wifi, and the location is just a walking distance from the MTR (Prince Edward).  The area is accessible from malls, stores, and restaurants. A recommended place to stay!

P.S. With free beer :D
nice place for a budget accommodation, great location
与照片上显示的一致,房东也及时提前联系我们顺利入住,离开地铁旺角站D1和D2都近,楼下吃的东西很多附近的港式茶餐厅都是香港本地人吃的较多,我们入住的几天每天更好着吃早餐和晚餐｡唯一就是入住的地方是4楼我们几个女汉纸箱子拿着上去和下来就是拖的｡在香港这个价住到这样的地方性价比还是可以哦.
lots of stairs!
位置非常好｡去2次都住他家｡楼下吃饭和地铁都只是几步路｡
Fantastic location whether arriving by airport bus or mrt. wilson helped with the luggages on arrival. great street food and shopping along lanes.
It was very close to the mtr station .if you don’t mind to walk to 4floor it a great place!

Wil’s was a perfect host. He responded in detail whenever we contacted him. He was very knowledgable of the surrounding area and provided great suggestions. He was very concerned for my family and would check in to make sure we were okay. The apartment was very conveniently located. It was no more than a 5 minute walk to major markets, and we were surrounded by metro stations, stores, and restaurants all within 1 minute of walking from the apartment. It was completely safe, clean, and comfortable. We truly enjoyed our stay.
Highly recommended! The amenities in the apartment were commendable.
房間設計好好 房東也好熱情 有什麼問題問他也會立即回覆 住址位置也十分容易找到 在太子站 十分方便
位置很好,去旺角太一地铁很近,周围有很多吃饭的地方

1.位置很便利,地铁公交很方便｡
2.生活很方便,楼下有百佳生活超市､万宁､7-11,各种小吃,甚至有中国式盒饭｡
3.房间设施应有尽有,就跟住家一样便利,唯独就是缺少牙刷牙膏｡
周边吃的地方很多,离太子地铁站很近｡
满意哦
地點優

name: Private centrally located self contained apartment
summary: This centrally located self contained 1 bedroom apartment boasts a fully equipped modern kitchen with an open plan lounge/dining area with a smart TV. The apartment’s convenient location makes this the perfect base for a business trip, sporting weekend or a sightseeing adventure
space: This Kingsford apartment is in perfect central location. It is fully self contained, fully equipped, light and airy - very comfortable. Private entry at the front of the house. The living/kitchen area opens onto a large private outdoor courtyard area - perfect if you’re travelling with pets. The living area has a coffee table, smart TV and a sofa convertable to a very double comfortable bed.  The kitchen is fully equipped and includes a cook top  oven as well as a fridge, dishwasher, microwave and a washing machine. The bedroom has a queen size bed and a wardrobe. Bedding and linen supplied - pillows, quilt blanket, towels etc. The bathroom has a double bath as well as a shower.
description: This centrally located self contained 1 bedroom apartment boasts a fully equipped modern kitchen with an open plan lounge/dining area with a smart TV. The apartment’s convenient location makes this the perfect base for a business trip, sporting weekend or a sightseeing adventure This Kingsford apartment is in perfect central location. It is fully self contained, fully equipped, light and airy - very comfortable. Private entry at the front of the house. The living/kitchen area opens onto a large private outdoor courtyard area - perfect if you’re travelling with pets. The living area has a coffee table, smart TV and a sofa convertable to a very double comfortable bed.  The kitchen is fully equipped and includes a cook top  oven as well as a fridge, dishwasher, microwave and a washing machine. The bedroom has a queen size bed and a wardrobe. Bedding and linen supplied - pillows, quilt blanket, towels etc. The bathroom has a double bath as well as a shower. The apartment is situated at the
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in a very convenient location within walking distance to Kingsford's many restaurants and cafes.  South Juniors Club and its restaurants, gym, pool and entertainment facilities is directly across the road. University of NSW and NIDA are within walking distance (15-20 minutes).  Randwick’s vibrant shopping precinct surrounded by an array of high street shops, boutiques, cafes and restaurants is also very close and easy to get to by either a longer walk, or short bus ride. This also applies to the Spot precinct with its Ritz cinema and Maroubra junction shopping precinct. A direct short bus ride to Royal Randwick Racecourse, three major hospitals, Allianz Stadium, Sydney Cricket Ground, Coogee and Maroubra Beaches and Westfield Eastgardens shopping centre
notes: The apartment is fully self contained and there are no shared spaces, it is however at the front (attached) to the main house where the hosts live. This is a pet friendly property. The owners cat has a tendency to visit if windows are open, for this reason it is not suitable for people with pet related allergies.
transit: Public transport is easy with Kingsford Five Ways just a short walk away with its many buses going frequently in many directions.  If driving off street parking is easy during the day, or a space can be made available on the driveway in front of the house.
access: The apartment is situated at the front of our house and has private access at the front of the house.
interaction: The hosts live at the back of the house and can be contacted by email, text or mobile at any time.

reviews.comments: This was a great space. The host was responsive, friendly and extremely hospitable. A short walk to places like Dan Murphy's, cafes and lots of cheap and cheerful restaurants. Close to public transport (30 minutes from CBD), and 15 minutes by Uber to CBD, Newtown and most of the iconic beaches (Bondi, Coogee etc.) The dogs also had a blast! Great value for money. Would definitely stay here again!

Nice and spacious  BnB with a very nice, spacious sunny terrasse. Near to the airport,  Maroubra and Cogee beaches.  35 min with the bus  to the CBD.  Although it's near to the airport and you can see a lot of airplanes, it is not too noisy.
Attentive and nice host.  I would certainly recommend it to my friends.

Good communication & friendly host. Apartment is in good proximity to the city and sights. Very easy to get around if you have a car, with the host allowing you to park out the front for free. The apartment had everything we needed but unfortunately needed a thorough clean. With a good clean this apartment would be a great place to Base yourself whilst exploring Sydney.
这是我第一次在BNB上订房,对这次住宿体验十分满意,房间宽敞､明亮､干净,卧室里准备了我们所需的床上用品,卫生间有洗漱用具､毛巾､香薰等,厨房用品里一应俱全,房东考虑的十分周到｡我女儿到新南威尔士大学读书,这里离大学不到5分钟的车程,很方便｡一次愉快的经历｡

Agata is a great host. She was here everytime we needed her.
The apartment is very well located and easy to reach thanks to the bus.
In addition the apartment was very well equipped. We would have liked to have a vacuum cleaner for more cleanliness but we do not regret our choice. I highly recommend Agata's apartment.
Loved the space, it was close to public transport making getting around Sydney very easy. Perfect size for what we were after as well.

Posto fantastico per chi viaggia  , chi Cerca una vera casa. Comodo, pulito, molto famigliare. Agata e Jason sempre la pronti per dare una mano in qualsiasi momento. Posizione no ne centrale, ma con centinaia di pullman si muove bene dappertutto. Questa zona “Asiatica” come negozi e locali maggior parte ci sono solo loro. 4 banche 2 minuti da casa. Centro circa 20 min in pullman. Le spiagge 15, 20 ,30 minuti: scegli dove vai ogni giorno ( una nuova).Aeroporto vicino( ma nessun fastidio ,o rumore forte) . Letto comodo , tutto molto bello. Gatto e cane sono simpatici.  Grazie Agata e Jason per tutto! Sono stata bene ! Nataliya
Great location,near public transport restaurants and supermarkets.Agata is really kind and hospitable,everything we need was provided,highly recommend this apartment.

Exactly as described. Great location and value especially if you need access to UNSW/NIDA. Was very close to lots of yummy Asian eateries that I didn’t have a chance to explore but looked fabulous. The hosts were lovely and good communicators, but happy to leave this introvert alone as well.
Perfectly convenient location with good amenities.

Agata's place was very nice and cozy. It had its own private entrance and we were able to use a parking spot in the driveway. We visited Sydney in the winter, so the temperatures were a bit cool, but there was a little electric heater that was sufficient to keep us warm. We also appreciated the nice roomy bath tub which can be very convenient after a cool day outside. The kitchen provided everything we needed. Agata even left a tube of Vegemite in the kitchen cabinet, so guests can try this Australian speciality even if they are afraid to buy the whole thing for themselves. We would definitely recommend this place!
Agata was a great host, with very quick responses, nothing was too much trouble. Well worth it.
Lovely spot to stay for a bit. Stayed with a few friends. The balcony is great. Would love to stay again
great spot. super easy and clean and had everything I needed. would gladly recommend
Great place to stay with everything you might need. Location was pretty good. Easy to get buses everywhere.

Wonderful place ! Everything you need in a beautiful space. Communication and check in/out was 10/10 ! 
Would stay here again.
Nice cosy space for two people
交通非常便利,离UNSW步行只需要15分钟｡周围有许多餐馆可供选择,也可以在家烹饪简单的早餐｡Agata回复非常及时,也很热心帮助解决问题｡非常推荐这个地方｡

Agata was very responsive and provided all info we needed about access to / getting settled into the unit both ahead of our stay and during it.

The unit was basic however had everything we needed for our trip to Sydney, since we didn’t spend a lot of time at the unit. We had clean towels and sheets provided, and the bathroom had everything we needed. 
It was clean but it was an older unit, which I think people can sometimes mistake for dirty (based on previous reviews I read).

We were able to park our car on one half of the shared driveway, being sure to leave the other half of the driveway for Agata and her family to access their garage + home (which backs into to the unit and the garage provides their access to their home). There was also street parking though. We had a brief interaction with Agata and her family by chance as we were heading out one day, which was very pleasant. Agata was very kind and hospitable, however was sure not to be a presence during our stay.

Since our stay fell on a warm time of the year, it did get quite hot inside in the afternoon and evening. There is no air con, just a pedestal fan which was in the bedroom. Which could be moved about if you needed it in the lounge room. However I feel in summer it would get super hot inside.

Our two dogs felt right at home there - there is a good outdoor space perfect for dogs (secure gate and fences, small grass patches with trees, and a large secure deck area).  There is also a park about a 10 minute walk away from the unit which was great!!

Thank you for welcoming us and our two dogs into your home Agata. We had a great trip and appreciated the convenient location & solid base for our time in Sydney.
Super easy and pleasant owner, handy location
Great host
Had a great stay, thanks!
房子周边很安静,道路两边都可以停车｡屋内设施齐全,厨房用具都很干净｡会推荐朋友们也来选择此房源｡

I stayed at Agata’s place for the first three weeks after I moved to Sydney, and I absolutely loved the apartment. It’s a self-contained apartment with a private entrance and a wonderful patio, which is particularly delightful during the Australian summer. The place felt very much like home right away, and it’s close to buses and local shops and restaurants. Buses take less than 30 minutes to the beach and the city, and UNSW and Randwick village are both within walking distance. The bed is comfortable and the TV has Netflix, while both the kitchen and bathroom is equipped with all the basics (such as shampoo, soap, toothpaste, essential toiletries, washing powder, milk, oil, salt, pepper, etc.). Agata was a fabulous host: she was quick to respond to requests (such as replacing the bug spray when it ran out), and kindly received some mail for me too. I couldn’t have wished for a better place to start off my time in Sydney, and I highly recommend Agata’s place!
Fantastic hosts. I would rebook in a heartbeat

There were very nice amenities, and it also felt like a really safe and secure place to stay.  Agata has thought of everything you need for an extended stay.  We made all breakfasts, lunches and even some suppers at home and we had every kitchen amenity that we needed.  The community has great coffee shops, a grocery, excellent bakery, liquor store all within a 15 minute walk to UNSW campus.   This apartment is EXCELLENT for visiting scholars to UNSW and I strongly recommend it.  The wifi is excellent and if any problems come up, Agata responds quickly to help.  The great outdoor space is a huge plus and the privacy of the unit makes you feel like you have your own home.  It is close to multiple public transit stops to get you where you need to go, and a nice 30 minute walk to the beach.  We were visited by a few spiders and beetles, but once again Agata responded quickly to help and had left bug spray in the unit to handle any unwanted guests.  I would happily return to Agata's unit for a repeat visit to the university.

name: Experience the Sydneysider lifestyle!
summary: It is bright and spacious, well furnished two bedroom house, a large 15 Sq.M double bedroom will be available to host up to two guests with all the necessary furnishings. The rest of the house is fully furnished with tastefully selected modern furniture, appliances and other utilitarian items.
space: The room is furnished with two single beds with comfortable spring mattresses. The outdoor terrace is located upstairs.
description: It is bright and spacious, well furnished two bedroom house, a large 15 Sq.M double bedroom will be available to host up to two guests with all the necessary furnishings. The rest of the house is fully furnished with tastefully selected modern furniture, appliances and other utilitarian items. The room is furnished with two single beds with comfortable spring mattresses. The outdoor terrace is located upstairs. Guests can use their room and everything within it.  If they like they can use the common toiletries provided such as hand wash, toilet paper. Kitchen and Laundry Appliance use incurs additional charges. Please feel free to ask if you need to use them. I am available should you need any thing, feel free to ask. Located on the Lower North Shore close to the spectacular and breathtakingly beautiful Sydney’s world famous Harbour, It's Iconic Bridge, the Opera House and the Sydney CBD are all within walk able distance. You can take a short stroll down to Blues Point Road to experien
neighborhood_overview: Located on the Lower North Shore close to the spectacular and breathtakingly beautiful Sydney’s world famous Harbour, It's Iconic Bridge, the Opera House and the Sydney CBD are all within walk able distance. You can take a short stroll down to Blues Point Road to experience unparalleled view of these Sydney Icons or bask in the postcard view of sailboats and the harbour at McMahons Point and Lavender Bay, only 7 Minute away from the house.
notes: The House is Only 2-Minutes from the North Sydney Train Station and North Sydney CBD. Supermarkets & Convenience stores such as Coles, Aldi, IGA, Greenwood Shopping Center are all nearby and are just a few meters away.
transit: Train Station and bus stops are  just down the road 2-3 minutes away from the house. You even catch a Ferry across the harbor at McMahon's Point Wharf. Local ride sharing cars, bikes are also easily available around the area.
access: Guests can use their room and everything within it.  If they like they can use the common toiletries provided such as hand wash, toilet paper. Kitchen and Laundry Appliance use incurs additional charges. Please feel free to ask if you need to use them.
interaction: I am available should you need any thing, feel free to ask.
house_rules: - Quite Hours : 10pm -  7am - Please leave your shoes near the door. - No Intoxicants or Drug use in the house. - Please seat yourself for all performances in the Toilet.

host.host_location: North Sydney, New South Wales, Australia

reviews.comments: Imran was friendly and hospitable, and I slept very well in the bed in the large room.  The apartment is very close to North Sydney station which so convenient and wonderful when travelling to things in Sydney.  The room is also great value. The apartment has simple decor and is in an old block of flats, but the other benefits more than make up for it. Thanks Imran !

to get to your room or to the kitchen you have to go through the room where the host is sleeping .you have to share the same toilet with him.
the location is very central and for that usually possibly very silent (during my booking unfortunately there was construction work next door going on).
the house  has also a very nice roofgarden (in case you are smoker)
An amazing man with a wonderful flat which is good location,  clean & tidy! I love to communicate with the owner who always have a lot of imagination.
Great host and a great location.

name: Large loft in Old Montreal
summary: In the heart of Old Port, the oldest and most vibrant area of the city, near all the main attractions – steps away from Basilica Notre-Dame, Centre Des Congrès, Downtown & Chinese District. The most beautiful street of MTL, countless restaurants, coffee shops, souvenirs & Québec products. Conveniently located near the Orange Subway Line. If you are looking for the best location to explore the city with your family or friends, this units is perfect for you to book right away!
space: This unit is a superb condo apartment with huge windows within a luxurious building dating from the Old Montreal Era and that can easily accommodate up to 6 people. The apartment has one closed bedroom with a Queen-Sized bed and an adjacent bathroom and air mattresses along with bedding and an automatic pump to inflate them into Queen-Sized beds. The unit possesses its own Washer/Drier for your convenience as well as basic hygiene products and basic kitchen amenities to ensure a smooth stay. The condo has AC and is equipped with a flat screen TV with cable (IPTV).  Parties and undeclared guests:  the apartment is located in a building shared by year-long tenants. That being said, it is strictly forbidden to throw any party or to disturb the neighbors after 10PM. Any visitor must be declared in your booking enquiry, under penalty of a 200$ fine. We possess video-cameras in the building’s main hall in order to ensure a smooth and respectful stay to all of our guests and to the other tena

neighborhood_overview: Truly one of the most beautiful area of Montreal, in the center of all the main attractions without being unreasonably overcrowded - you'll be walking everywhere during your stay here and tasting all the amazing street foods.
notes: NO MONTREAL GUESTS - Local guests that instant book will have their booking cancelled
transit: Two-minute walk from Place-d'Armes Metro Station (Orange Line) Bike and Vespa rental services available (Search for BIXI Montreal) Taxi service and Uber friendly  20$/24h parking lot across the street  Parcometer parking available À deux minutes de la station de métro Place-D’Armes (Ligne Orange) Vélos et Vespa à louer à proximité (Recherchez BIXI Montréal) Accès facile pour les taxis/Uber Stationnement 20$ pour 24hrs de l’autre côté de la rue Stationnement à parcomètre directement sur la rue
access: Guests have access to the whole apartment, we are not living in the building but we stay available to help.
house_rules: No parties and no smoking Local Guests cannot Instant book and must inquire first. Any unauthorized booking from local guest will be cancelled One visitor = one booked guest, even if they don't sleep over Camera in hallways

reviews.comments: Frederick was a fantastic host, he was thoughtful and very keen to b make sure I had everything I needed for a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The apartment is a large, study one bedroom with a fully equipped kitchen. Location is right in old montreal, next to the cathedral which for both tourists and business travellers is ideal. I stayed 6 weeks and highly recommend it.
Great location. Very convenient to restaurants, bars, parking lot, etc. Nice renovated loft style apartment. Frederick responded very quickly when I had a question. Thanks!
I attended a conference at the Palais Des Congres and this apartment was perfect for staying nearby. Modern, spacious and had everything I needed in a great location. Highly recommended.
Excelent

We came there for 2 days. It’s a perfect place for roaming around Montreal. The parking is just in front of the apartment which is the best part. (If you come in the car- you can see your car from the window) 
The place was very clean, modern and nicely located.
Extremely stylish loft and building right in the heart of Old Montreal. Tons of natural light and modern finishes. Highly recommend this place!
Appartement très bien placé et bon marché. Hôte très professionnel.

Great loft and great location in old Montreal in a quiet street at night. There were a lot of restaurants and shops nearby. We were able to walk to most points of interest. Check-in and check-out processes were easy to follow. If you drive, there is a parking lot on the other side of the street, which is very convenient. We recommend this loft.

What a great flat and what a great location!  Very sunny apartment with plenty of room.  Right in the middle of Old Montreal so its great for trying out all the amazing restaurants and bars in the area.
Beautiful loft apartment located near many shops and restaurants.  Very clean with excellent amenities inside. Convenient parking out front.  Would highly recommend.

Wow, what a place in Old Montreal. Felt like Monaco during F1, because you step outside and see sports supercars and cobblestone ground right out the front lobby. The place inside was also highly respectable and furnished to complement the great scene outdoors. Really spacious and clean.
Exelente lugar, muy bien ubicado y con todo lo necesario.

Really great stay here! Beautiful giant old windows and a brick wall, brand new kitchen, really nice shower. This was the perfect place for my boyfriend and I to take a long weekend to explore Montreal. Location was perfect too!

Location is very accessible to everything. It is literally right beside the Basilica. Bella was very quick in responding to my questions and instructions are very easy to understand. Would recommend and stay here again!

Just a few steps from Notre-Dame Basilica of Montreal to enjoy the lively city life in old Montreal! Parking is convenient with surface and under ground options. I would recommend to park underground at 500 Place d'Armes, Montreal, QC H2Y 2W2 where only 20 dollars charged per 24 hours and is safe. Also just 2 minutes away from this place.
It’s big enough to accommodate 5-6 people if you don’t mind to share one bathroom.
Great location in the heart of old Montreal.
Clean + great location plus nearby parking spot.  And love the modern amenities.
Amazing place and an amazing host :)
A weird mildew related smell lingers the apartment. Other than that, great location, price, and everything else

Very nice loft in a terrific location for the Old Port, Chinatown and the Jazz Fest. Checkin was very straightforward and overnight parking is easy (either across the street, or if that’s full - as it was for us - just a couple of blocks away). Would stay here again!

Great location and awesome place. We were there on the hottest days of the year and felt the AC unit wasn't doing enough, I struggled to sleep a bit. Otherwise, super cool and would probably be cooler on a not so hot Montreal day.

We were there for the jazz festival. It is a great place in an awesome location - close to most things that matter. Frederick was attentive and flexible. The only thing is that our stay coincided with a heat wave in Montreal and the A/C was not keeping the place cool whatsoever - so it was uncomfortable for 2 of the 3 nights while the hot weather persisted. Other than that, stylish apartment in a great location. We we would be back if given assurance the A/C issue has been addressed.
Proche de presque tout (métro, vieux port, basilique, musée des sciences, place des arts...)appart sympa et propre, communication rapide.
Very modern open space. It was a nice  place to hang out in the mornings with the big windows. Had everything we needed! Would stay again
Great place!

Bon rapport qualité prix bien situé dans le vieux montreal stationnement juste en face. Très pratique 
Merci

Great location in old Montreal. Spacious place for  a few people. 

Only issue I experienced was lack of the water tap working in the bathroom. Notified the hosts, and they were aware of the problem but I was not notified in advance or no apology/was provided for the issue which I found surprising. Other than that the place was as advertised and hosts were responsive.

This is a great choice if you are visiting Montreal's Old Town.  It's very good value for the location, quality and space provided.  We had some problems with the wi-fi and TV, but Fred and Kloe responded and resolved those very quickly.
Very nice and clean space.
Emplacement parfait pour visiter le vieux Montréal (à 2 pas de la basilique Notre dame) avec un design très agréable. Je recommande
A nice, clean place in the perfect location!

My husband and I stayed here last weekend and loved it. It's right in the heart of old Montreal which is perfect for midnight strolls. The place was exactly what it was advertised and it was very clean- which is the most important thing to me being a clean freak. Frederick and Kloe were very responsive and accommodating and if we go back to Montreal I would definitely stay there again. Checking in was easy. We actually stayed in for dinner one night and the place has all the basic appliances, cutlery, etc that worked out nicely. It was also surprisingly quiet on the street side as I was nervous the roaming of the cars would keep me up all night. I imagine there are a few airbnb units in that building so once in a while you do hear loud and inconsiderate guests yelling in the corridors.   But it's not that often.  If there was one thing I could change is the size of the bed as I'm used to larger beds but that is just me being picky. :)
Localisation parfaite.
This is a lovely apartment in a fantastic location next to the cathedral, a short walk from many of the sights of Montreal.

Loved our stay at this loft!  Frederick's instructions for our self check-in were seamless and made our arrival easy and enjoyable.  The space is beautiful and within an interesting building.  Our sleep in the bed was comfortable and the daylight in the space was beautiful.  The location is also central to everything!   Would highly recommend and stay there again on our next visit!

Frederick's place is certainly at the greatest spot in old town Montreal, literally right next to the Basilica Notre-Dame. This place is spotless and has lots of natural light. I had a great time relaxing at his place and explore nice restaurants, bakery, and brewery in old town with a 5-10 mins walk.  It's a vibrant place that you can feel the fun atmosphere from the plaza and on the street. Late night on weekends could be too noisy if you like to sleep in a really quiet room. Overall, this is a great place in old town Montreal. I highly recommend.
Excellente location, tres bel appartement

Fantastic location in Old Montreal. Very easy to find and get into. It seems like most of the building, if not all, are AirBnB units and that the host owns a few of them. I didn't have any problems with the building or room key pass. The walls are very thin and I could hear the neighbors doing things like using the washroom and opening/closing the blinds but thankfully that's the only noise we had to deal with and it wasn't a big deal.

The air mattress was easy to set up (it has a built in pump) and there were plenty of linens to make the bed with. The bed and the air mattress were comfortable. The duvets are thin but warm. The air mattress was easy to deflate and put away.

The shower has really good flow and the water is nice and warm. The handheld unit leaks a bit of water even when it's not activated so be careful that you have it pointed well away from the shower door or else it will leak onto the floor as a few inches of the door seal is ripped/missing.

I didn't use the kitchen at all so I can't comment on it. The only thing I did notice though is that there is no microwave, but there is one of those small toaster oven and an actual oven if you need it.

We had an issue the first night with the heat and had a cold night and morning. There was a lot of back and forth with the host as they weren't understanding me when I was telling them that the thermostat would not let me set it higher than 20, but they solved the problem by the next night (they provided me with details on how to reset the thermostat so now it can be set higher than 20) so hopefully it won't be a problem going forward for anyone else.

Overall a decent stay. It's a bare bones place but it's worth it for the location. If you're there for at least a few days pick up some extra toilet paper as they don't leave you a lot and bring some shopping bags so you can change the bathroom garbage.
Great location for nice restaurants and too see the sights of old port Montreal.  Hosts are very quick to respond to questions.  The place itself has  a lot of nice natural light
Excellent location! Stylish, comfortable place place and an easy rental process. Highly recommend it!
Thank you ! They were really helpful and really reactive. They answered to us really quick and were really nice ! :)
Great location. Clean. Definitely stay here!
Great location and spacious accommodations. Would highly recommend!
Superbe appartement en plein centre de Montréal.
The location is great and communication and check in were efficient. We had a few minor issues with the amenities that kept us from giving this Airbnb a five star rating.
The place is awesome and we really enjoyed the stay.
Well-lit airy space in an unbeatable Old Port location a stone's throw from Notre Dame. I'd stay here again next time I'm in town.
Nice location, lots of Chinese restaurant nearby to explore. The host is nice.
The place is beautiful and appears just as advertised in the pics.  The location was perfect and the decor was just beautiful!  We will definitely return!
Impressively high ceilings and roomy place to stay.

Apartment is very stylish. I really loved the high ceilings and exposed brick. The location was great, it was close to Notre-Dame basilica, cafes, restaurants, shops and a short walk to the Old Port. We stayed with kids and being close to everything was a bonus. Frederick and Kloe were amazing hosts and very responsive. When we had a problem with air mattress, they quickly responded and provided another one. I would definitely recommend this place.
Really great place. We have everything we needed and the place was warm and clean. Paid parking lot across the street. Starbucks and two breakfast places within a two minute walk.
Great location, very clean and spacious. Great communication on very short notice

The room is in a beautiful part of town and was clean and comfortable to stay in. Lots of natural light! 

The locking mechanism for the room when I stayed was somewhat unreliable. The hosts were informed and will hopefully address the issue.

Loved staying at this place. Conveniently located in the heart of old Montreal, super clean, stylish, and extremely comfortable. Everything you need to cook or relax is available at this place. Super spacious with plenty of light. Extremely recommend this place. Easy check-in & check-out. If I ever go back to Montreal, I’ll definitely stay at this place again in a heart heart!
Great location

name: Suitable place for ERASMUS students (Mecidiyeköy)
summary: We are looking for female flatmate who will come with ERASMUS+ programme because I will go to ERASMUS in February. We are 3 female and everyone student at Yildiz Technical University. + Safety place in the city center + You can reach everywhere easily from the home + So close to metro/metrobus/bus stops ( It takes 5-15 min. walking ) + So close to shopping mall, hospital, pharmacy, restaurants, bar + You can easily go to touristic places ( Taksim, Sultanahmet, Eminönü, Kadıköy, Beşiktaş etc. )

We are 3 female and everyone student at Yildiz Technical University. + Safety place in the city center + You can reach everywhere easily from the home + So close to metro/metrobus/bus stops ( It takes 5-15 min. walking ) + So close to shopping mall, hospital, pharmacy, restaurants, bar + You can easily go to touristic places ( Taksim, Sultanahmet, Eminönü, Kadıköy, Beşiktaş etc. ) + 4 Rooms + Full-Furnished and everything you need at home + Public areas ( balcony, kitchen, living room, bathroom) + No smoking in rooms but kitchen and living room are available for smoking. + We care about cleanliness.
notes: + No smoking in rooms but kitchen and living room are available for smoking. + We care about cleanliness.
access: + 4 Rooms + Full-Furnished and everything you need at home + Public areas ( balcony, kitchen, living room, bathroom)

name: Modern and Comfortable one bedroom apartment zmv
summary: Rosebery is one of Sydney's key livable cities. Sydney CBD is less than four kilometers from the straight line, but also one of District's transportation links, connecting downtown Sydney, Trans-City Express and Sydney Airport. The apartment is in a prime location in Rosebery, just steps away from public transport trains and buses and leisure centers.  Guest can use an indoor pool, hot spa, gym and sauna downstairs.
space: 欢迎来到我在Rosebery新装修的公寓｡地处与悉尼市中心与机场之间,并方便地访问公共交通工具,也有地下停车库供你使用｡让你游玩到悉尼最好的地方｡有一个宽敞的开放区域,设有一个舒适的卧室,楼下有一个室内游泳池,SPA,健身房和桑拿浴室,可以作为你在悉尼的避风港｡客厅设有沙发床,公寓最多可容纳四人入住! 酒店距离Green Square station 站仅几步之遥,该站将直接连接到机场和悉尼｡Joynton Avenue上有定期的巴士服务｡
