interaction: Please contact me if need any help (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.comments: The place is super enough, bus rides right at doorstep, amazing urban living pad with selective European cafes just a few footsteps away. Great service and feels saturated for Sydney touring.
Modern and stylish appartments, short walk to shops and the train station. Neat and tidy. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend to future travellers!

This is an amazing place to stay! Very impressed with the presentation and the special touches Wendy has added to make the stay perfect. This is great place and you will not regret the choice. Wendy was attentive and helpful... and  Wow what a bed!! We feel asleep to it’s soothing massages! Will stay here again in a heartbeat. Thanks so much

This place was newly listed with no existing reviews so i did take a risk when booking it. I'm so glad I did because the apartment was spectacular. So modern and roomy with amazing facilities like a gorgeous indoor pool and gym in the complex, with secure parking. The bed was so comfortable, the kitchen fully stocked with everything we needed and the bathroom shower was amazing. Beautiful marble finishes and stylish furniture.

Communication was very easy and fast with Wendy and she made sure to stay in contact with us if we had any questions.

The location is also fantastic, we walked to The Grounds of Alexandria, one of Sydney's best eateries/cafes. We loved the place so much.

very clean and the host is very kind 
if i have a chance i will visit again
It will be a pity to miss that apart. It has comfy and clean furniture and living environment. The host couple are approachable and nice. Highly recommend!
Great little unit. Looked brand new. Overall clean and comfortable. Good location, convenient to airport, city and Eastern Suburbs. I would definitely stay here again
It was good stay, tidy and comfortable. Also good location.
An amazing apartment with great facilities at a good price. Host very helpful... would stay here again!
Nice and clean apartment, great location for access to parts of the city.

Wendy (Host) provided excellent communication while staying at her apartment in Roseberry. The apartment is very new and features all the modern touches expected in such a new development. We were both very impressed with the double bed (adjustable back and foot positions with variable massage settings) and felt the on-site fitness and swimming complex was a cut above the norm. A big thank you must also go out to the host as we left some clothing behind which was posted the very next day, does not sound very much however we are based in New Zealand so I put this down as very much going the extra mile.
Very clean and everythings in great condition. Host was quick to replu y messages. Shops/restaurants around the location.
Very clean and stylish. The stay was super comfortable
Wendy's place is very stylish. She communicates very fast and gives excellent directions for checking in and finding her place. The apartment has special touches to make you feel at home.
Amazing location, beautiful and clean apartment. Great little place. Will definitely stay there again!

Most beautiful apartment iv stayed in, amazing area and very comfortable, house was extremely tidy and smelt amazing , host was so kind and was very quick with response and made sure we had everything we needed for our stay! Will defiantly be staying there again! Absolutely beautiful
Wendy’s place is nice and modern. Even though we did not meet, she responded quickly to any inquiries that we had. Up and coming neighbourhood. Convenient access to airport by Uber.
Wendy was a fantastic host, such a stylish and cozy apartment that was extremely modern and amazing to stay on, would definitely be back

Wendy’s Unterkunft ist sehr modern und schick eingerichtet. Wir waren drei Mädchen, die für drei Nächte hier untergekommen sind. 

Da Wendy unterwegs war, hatte sie vergessen, dass wir zu dritt anreisen und daher war das dritte Bett nicht vorbereitet. Wir informierten sie also, dass wir noch das dritte Bettzeug bräuchten. Sie hat dann ganz schnell jemanden organisiert der uns das dritte Bettzeug und ein drittes Handtuch beschaffen hat. 

Die Kommunikation mit Wendy verlief super schnell und sehr gut. Sie hat sich ganz schnell bemüht uns entgegen zu kommen und uns noch einen Rabatt gegeben für die Unannehmlichkeit. Das fand ich super! 

Das Apartment war ansonsten mit allem ausgestattet was man braucht und das Bad ist sehr schön! 

Unser Check-in lief reibungslos und schnell. Für ein paar Nächte kann man hier gut unterkommen. Verschiedene Busse fahren die Straße runter und ein Schwimmbad sowie ein Fitnessraum bietet die Unterkunft auch. 

Ich würde die Unterkunft weiterempfehlen allerdings nur zu zweit. Das dritte Bett bzw. Sofa nicht ganz so komfortabel ist. Daher hat man allein oder zu zweit hier sicher eine fantastische Zeit. :) ein Supermarkt ist etwas weiter, aber wir haben uns eh viel in der Stadt aufgehalten also war das in Ordnung für uns.

Besonderes Lob für die tolle Kommunikation!

The place was beautiful, modern and easy to get to. Its a quick ride to the international airport and there are great cafés and food spots about an 800m walk from the place. It is located closely to a bus station that can take you straight into the city and other train connections for site seeing and shopping. There is a spare pull out bed which was useful traveling with my dad and a nice little balcony to spend time outside. Id stay here again!

We stayed at Wendy's place for two nights. Wendy is very helpful and easy to reach via Mail. Check in was easy and the place is clean and nice. Wendy offered to help us with our luggage and provided us with all information we needed for the stay. To reach the centre of Sydney is possible by bus that leaves close by. Supermarkets/Restaurants etc. are close by as well as the airport. Can highly recommend Wendy's place.
Wendy is a nice person and this room is quite comfortable and amazing
Was fantastic

After a long day of sightseeing in Sydney it was time to check in this lovely 1BR apartment. 

What a comfort that everything has been taken care of. The cleanliness and comfort to an apartment ready for your arrival. 

Spent the last 3 nights and I could simply call it my second home. 

Wendy has been very accommodating and is happy to help with any questions you may have in relation to the apartment to the area! 

Certainly one apartment not to overlook with a indoor swimming pool, spa and sauna!

Will book here again when I come back to Sydney!

The apartment is nice & clean. it is closely located to the airport & CBD area which was really convenient. Wendy was quick to respond to our queries & was really helpful. It was such a pleasant stay.

The apartment is in a good location, close to the airport ($15.00 Uber) and within walking distance to eateries.  Breakfast at Grandmas 5 minutes down the road was excellent.  The Cannery is also within walking distance where you can get a bite to eat or coffee.  
I found the bed too hard but that may be personal preference whereas my husband likes hard beds.
We were unable to get the TV to work at all as there two remotes to the TV set up and looked everywhere for instructions but there wasn't any.  Eventually I called Wendy for instructions which we followed and still nothing so contacted her again, same thing, so I contacted her again and eventually she said she would send someone the next day as she thought it was too late but we said it was okay and someone came within 25 minutes.  Wendy's communication was good however she should have known about the new TV set up.  The only access to the TV was through UTube.   We were disappointed with the lack of utensils.  There was a wok to cook in and no saucepans or frypan. There no salad servers or spatula, basically just basic.  I looked in the drawers for clean tea towels and found two small cloth placemats which I used as a tea towel.  There were no sponges or dishwasher tablets.  I did find a used tea towel in the laundry but did not want to use it.  The only thing in the apartment was some tea bags which I am sure was left by the previous tenants. Every Airbnb we have stayed at has been great and provided basic cooking provisions such as oil, salt and pepper, coffee, tea, condiments etc and some hosts have been very generous and left fresh bread, fruit and other lovely delights. Not that we expect that this is what every host should provide but the basics I think is not asking too much Every Airbnb we have stayed at has provided either a Nespresso machine/ plunger or both. 2 bath towels and hand towels were provided but there was no bath mat.  It would have been nice to be provided with pool towels as we did use the pool and luckily it was hot enough on the balcony for the bath towels to dry.  Be prepared for loud bangs as tenants in the building would often let their doors bang.  It is a lovely apartment and I would stay again provided essentials etc as mentioned above were provided.

Wendy’s place is very nice. Modern and new unit with clean amenities. Very short walk to bus stop (bus no. 343) which can directly take you to the heart of the city near Westfield/Eye tower. Did not get a chance to use the pool and gym but looked really good. Wendy is a very good host, very understanding and accommodating. Will definitely book this place again. Thanks Wendy :)
Went above and beyond with our stay. Comfortable, clean, modern apartment. One bedroom but plenty of room. Will definitely be back!

Wendy was easy to get a hold of and helpful. The apartment was a 15 min walk to the train station with ample parking. House had everything expect a few kitchen basics like salt, pepper, oil. But I suppose those aren’t standard in any travel hotel with a kitchen. Just couldn’t be a nice added touch for guests. The apartment did have an incredible master bed that massaged and moved into the most comfortable reading position ever. It was a wonderful space for a weekend Sydney trip.

It has been a great experience staying at Wendy’s place. Checkin and checkout has been smooth. You will have the entire apartment on your own, highly recommended for budget travellers with family, there is a nice balcony too, and a swimming pool in the building (though I dont have time to try it out).

I am quite satisfied with the overall cleanliness of the space, bathroom water was warm and confortable. 

Location wise, its just a few minutes walk to bus stops which can take you to CBD area directly. 3 supermarkets nearby are just 2 busstops away too.

Wendy is a very kind and welcoming host. Good communication and easy check in.

Her apartment is very modern and stylish and in a nice neighborhood.  The massage bed is great ;-). 

Happy to come back next time we are down under.
房间非常整洁 入住很方便 街区很安静 房东也非常热情回复非常及时 很好的入住体验
We have a great stay at this place. Wendy is quick response. Place is clean and modern. Close to the public transport. The pool and gym facilities looks good but we don't have time to use it.
Very lovely host easy to communicate and well service. I would check again in future

A lovely place to stay, much better than I expected .
The living room is very large with a wonderful TV program.
Wendy looked after me and my partner. Place is clean, well maintained and has everything you need. Thanks again Wendy for being so hospitable.

We booked on short notice, we found Wendy's accommodation excellent.  Responses were prompt and helpful. We were flying to Canada because of a sick grandchild, the hassle free night at Wendy's was a good start to a long journey.

We had a great stay in Wendy’s apartment! She was very helpful and was always contactable when needed. The apartment was clean and spacious and was perfect for four adults. Definitely would recommend to anyone visiting Sydney!!
Clean and stylish place.  Very comfortable stay!  Wendy was terrific in her communication and check-in.  We stayed here at the end of our trip, and it was very convenient to the airport.

I booked Wendy’s place the night before! For such short notice, Wendy went above and beyond to make sure we felt we’d received value for money. The place was cleaned perfectly, her responses were extremely professional and fast which was necessary in this circumstance. I will definitely be booking this place in the future!

Wendy has a wonderful apartment - new, spacious, modern, well furnished and very comfortable. Furnishing were great.  It is in a nice and quiet residential neighbourhood, close to airport and downtown.  Wendy was very helpful and super prompt in her responses.  We enjoyed our stay very much and highly recommend Wendy's apartment.

Wendy is a very helpful host, she responded to all our queries promptly and is always willing to help more. The flat is spacious, new and clean, check in and out are easy. I would like to come back next time!

The place was enermous for the 3 of us, 
It's a new building so everything is clean and tidy
They even have the netflix

Bus station nearby, get to town in approx 20mins - 35mins, by uber to town cost 30aud
Clean and really stylish places! Wendy is being so helpful through out our journey with quick response!
Great place, nice and close to nearby restaurants and cafes. Quick enough to get a ride into the city to go out. Apartment was excellent, very clean, and the bed super comfortable

Great accommodation and great amenities..  Fast responses... Easy to check in... Everything well prepared for our check in... Near airport.. Owner is very flexible to check out timing... Location is near everything. Hassle free visit. Thanks!☺️
Good location. Can take the bus to CBD directly.
Easy to access. Very comfortable stay
Nice quiet place
Amazing modern and clean space

Had a great stay at Wendy's. Best part was the indoor pool, spa and sauna! There was a bit of a situation, because of the weather our shoes stained the carpet but Wendy was so understanding with us and let us take care of it. Will definitely stay at Wendy's again!
Perfect location and clean. Wendy is a great host. I'd love to come back.
It was a great experience so modern, clean, neat, perfect stay with friends!

Wendy is definitely a great and understanding host. She always reply quickly and try her best to fulfill our queries. Love everything about the accommodation. Very near to the bus stop, hence easier access to transportation. If I were to travel to Sydney again, I would definitely book this accommodation again! Plus the best part is, her tv (netflix of course)!
Amazing place and convenient location. Wendy is very accommodating and responsive to messages.
Great place, clean and near to airport! It would only take you 10mins to/from her place. Modern design, with a smart TV (need your own nexflix ID) which does add value to the whole experience.
Excellent location stylish aparment and Wendy is a great host
Great apartment, although no TV access the place was clean and Wendy was very responsive. Would go back there if I was in the area

Wendy’s place is very modern and stylish. Located not so far from the airport which only 10 min ride by taxi from airport. The train station were around 15 min walk but there were several bus stop that can connect you with the city. Since we are the first timer to Sydney, we are not so sure using the bus to the city. We just use the bus to get to Bondi Junction. The rest we are using train. There are quite complete cooking ware provided in the apt, so we are able to cook simple breakfast. We have lovely stay in Wendy’s apartment despite of the faucet on the kitchen sink issue that we have on our last day in Sydney which it was pop out suddenly when we use it, seems the faucet connection were not that strong so the water pressure make it pop out. Hopefully, Wendy’s husband can fix it easily. 
The communication with Wendy is also quite fast. She responded timely, no issue at all. Even her husband came on 9 pm to explain us how to use the TV. Thanks a bunch Wendy for letting us stay in ur apt and letting us leave our luggage in ur apt until 2 pm in our last day. We have great stay! Cheers!
Perfect location, close to the CBD and very confortable place!
Wendy’s place was immaculate and stylish. Was perfect for a short stay and close to public transport and the city. Wendy’s communication was friendly and prompt. Would highly recommend.
modern & spacious unit in good location
Hemos estado muy a gusto. Las instalaciones estan muy bien y el apartamento bien equipado. Con la red de autobuses nos hemos movido muy bien hasta el centro de Sydney.
What a great find for a good price. Modern apartment with special touches and massage bed. Easy check in and check out. I would stay here again
It is a lovely place! Thank you very much for having me Wendy!
Fantastic place at a great location.
Wendy was excellent with communication and making sure everything was ok. The apartment is very stylish and the massage bed we had some fun with, very firm mattress. Thank you Wendy

Perfect location and so convenient to access public transportation.The apartment  is clean and provides u great hospitality.Wendy is very helpful and will guide u throughout your stay.Overall experience was awesome.I'll recommend this apartment to every couple and families !!
沒有分享
Wendy’s room was immaculate, bathroom was big aswell as the shower! Everything was better then I expected I would definitely stay here again!
Good place to stay, nice and clean
Beautiful apartment a great location. The view is amazing especially if there is a lighting storm.
The place was spacious and well decorated with a very comfortable bed and very good amenities
Nice clean place. Major problem was no towells which Wendy was not able to rectify. To her credit she did everything in her power to make up for it.
Great apartment and location

Great little apartment for our family. Close to public transport and funky cafes. We also loved the swimming pool facilities. Wendy replies to all messages so incredibly fast as well. We loved Sydney - thank you

Really nice apartment in a great area! Super modern and tidy however make sure you bring toilet paper, hand soap, milk etc as it wasn’t provided. Also if there are more than 2 of you staying make sure you pack more bath towels as only 2 were provided.

We very much enjoyed our stay at Wendy's place. It is very clean, nicely stocked in case you want to cook some meals at home, and the building pool/whirlpool/sauna was great after long days of walking. Wendy was super accommodating! Highly recommended!
可能是墨尔本的房东太周到了,到了悉尼就感觉到落差了,房子很宽敞,位置也很好找,只是交通不是很方便,周围只有巴士站,最近的火车站走路过去要15min钟,吃东西也不是很方便,附近只有一家便利店｡因为uber故障,所以打车也不是很好打,而且卧室的枕头里面不知道装的什么,沙沙响,不是很舒适｡细节还是有很多可以改进的,希望Wendy把民宿越做越好｡
We loved Wendy’s place! Is so comfy and clean, close to everything! 100% you should stay here. Everything what we needed was there. Thank you Wendy for your hospitality, we will definitely come back!
Wendy's place is stylish and very clean. The balcony is lovely. Pool and sauna were amazing. Wendy replies to messages very fast and is flexible. I highly recommend Wendy's place.
Great place with easy access to transport and the city. Quiet neighborhood. Wendy is spot on with prompt communcation. TV remote wasnt working proper but I am sure Wendy will sort it out
Wendy’s place was stylish and immaculate. Luxurious features with a reasonable price. It’s a little bit out of the city but I would recommend staying here. Thanks again Wendy.

Clean and good location!! Comfortable place to stay at!
Value for money!

We have stayed in a few Airbnbs for our Australia trip, this is the best among all. 
-Easy to find free street parking
-clean, stylish home in a quiet area
-clear instructions for check in (we reached at 10pm!)
-responsive host
Overall, we love it very much. Will be staying here again when we come back
A clean and stylish place and modern facilities.

Home away from home! This is a great place to stay when traveling in Sydney. The place is cozy and safe! It’s a wonderful place that feels like home when you are traveling. Lots of room and clean! Great stay
Wonderful place, host is so nice and very helpful!

Wendy's place is very comfortable for 2 or 3 people. It is relatively close to grocery stores, the train station.  The bed was very comfortable and we slept well each night. Wendy responded very promptly to my texts. We enjoyed our stay there very much!

We enjoyed our two-night stay at this stylish apartment. Loved the space, the fast WiFi and the comfortable bed. Access was easy and Wendy was quick to respond to a couple of minor queries. I wouldn’t hesitate to stay there again and would definitely recommend to friends.
Everything was great and Wendy was very reactive and helpful. Thank you!
The location is fantastic and it really suited us. The bed is comfortable and shower was great. Loved the access to the pool and gym. We would stay here again.

Wendy is a great host!
She’s really nice and helpful, every time she reply promptly when I have questions or problems. I really appreciated.
The place is good and convenient, bus stops are just at the corner.
Surely I’ll stay here again when I visit Sydney again.

Place is in a great location near the trains and with a solid balcony view, the house was clean and Wendy was really solid with communicating making sure we where on the same page for check in and check out times and we had no problems getting in. Was a super enjoyable stay.

Great location for us to get to NIDA also close uber ride to airport. Apartment was nicely appointed and plenty of space for two people. Good facilities and bathroom was great. Great communication from Wendy, quick responses.
Wendy was easy to reach and check in was straightforward. Loved the amenities, excellent location and plenty of street parking available.

Wendy is an attentive host and replies are very quick. The apartment is conveniently located 1km from Green Sq station and many breakfast/lunch/coffee places are within a 100-700m radius. We enjoyed our stay.

We really enjoyed our stay at Wendy's apartment. It is a very stylish space and the aircon worked a charm when the weather became hot! I reccomend Wendy's apartment to anyone who would like to stay in a small but chic and inviting space while they explore Sydney's charms.
A nice place for a few days in a good location. Wendy was very quick to respond to any queries

Wendy's apartment is in an excellent location: bus 304 travels directly from Wendy's road to Circular Quay in central Sydney while the Green Square train station — on the line that serves both downtown Sydney and the international and domestic airports — is less than 15 minutes walk from the apartment. The apartment was clean, modern, and comfortable.  With two of us staying there, there was a double bed in the bedroom and a couch that turned into a double bed in the living room. Thus, we had plenty of space. Having air conditioning in the apartment was a real joy during a hot December. Wendy was really diligent about communicating with us. Overall, we were very happy about our stay in Wendy's apartment. The kitchen was equipped with a stove/oven and microwave. The one recommendation that we would make — based on the fact that we were there for nine nights — would be to have a full set of cooking pots and pans. But that was a minor issue that did not detract from our positive experiences in the apartment.
It's a spacious and well equiped apartment for four, much better than I've expected, and the wifi connection is very good. Less than 5 minutes walking distance to the bus stop to get to the city.

とても素敵なお部屋でした!
ｼｬﾝﾌﾟｰなどもあり助かりました!

Wendy’s place was just what we needed for our one night, post wedding stay. It was in a great spot, leafy suburb and close enough to local shops. The place was very clean and very cool on a hot summers night. Would definitely stay again!

Overall the apartment was neat and tidy and we had a good stay. Areas to be improved: 
No soap in bathroom. No coffee or tea provided. Toilet seat does not fit the bowl so when you sit on the seat the toilet lid whacks you in the back.
Good
This flat is unbeleaveble. Its clean, huge and good located. Wendy is a very nice and helpful host. She answers very quick.
Great stay, stylish and spacious place, very clean!

Very nice place! Clean and central to everything.   Although, there is no free parking on the premises.  A long story, but you need permission to park in the visitor parking and a key to unlock and lock the parking bolt, she doesn't have a designated car park!  Street parking is 2 hours "but apparently no one ever checks".  Wendy tries her best to make your stay comfortable.  I would definatley recommend her place otherwise.
Easy, stylish space and Host was very reliable
Good stay
The apartment is near the supermarket and the cafe
Nice for a quick stay!
Very tidy and well-mannered.
房子离机场有四公里左右,周围都是住宅区,坐公交门口走几步就有比较方便,但是地铁站比较远,晚上到达建议还是住机场附近就好,机场离市区比较近｡房间适合两人入住,多了睡沙发但是沙发不太舒服,厨房配备和墨尔本住的一些房子比起来确实要差许多,但是毕竟悉尼住房本身就贵些,感觉还是住机场的酒店公寓更划算方便一些｡
호스트의 친절함과 빠른답변이 좋았고, 문제발생을 고려한 배려가 편하고 좋았다. 수영장 헬스장을 마음껏 이용할수 있어서 좋고, 에어컨도 시원하고 좋았다.  또 시드니 갈때 이용할수 있겠으나, 마트가 1키로를 넘게가는것은 알아둬야할 사항.^^

name: Private Room with perfect location in Bostanci
summary: The house is the perfect choice for travelers who wants to discover and experience local side of Istanbul. . It's located at the heart of the Asian Side ''Bostanci'' where you can find all the transport possibilities for traveling all the sites.  The location of the apartment is very quiet, silence and safe. The flat is fully equipped for your comfort.
space: The kitchen is fully equipped with a owen, cooker, refrigerator,plates, forks, knifes, glass The bathroom is equipped with a shower, WC, hairdryer, shower gel, shampoo, hand soap, toilet paper. The bedrooms are equipped with comfy beds, wardrobe and desk. Living room is equipped with TV (37 cm), dining area, balcony

During your stay, you can contact with me anytime you want by mobile phone. The place is very quite neighbourhood. It has perfect transportation options to anywhere in the city. It is very close to Bostancı Gö
neighborhood_overview: The place is very quite neighbourhood. It has perfect transportation options to anywhere in the city. It is very close to Bostancı Gösteri Merkezi. My flat is 15 minutes walk to Bağdat street which is so famous for shopping and enjoying with good restaurants. You can go to Price Islands by ferry taking off in each 15 minutes. From Bostancı ferry ( Seabus ) station you can reach to Kadıköy in 15 minutes and to Yenikapı and Bakırköy in 45 minutes. You can easily reach to Kadiköy city center by yellow dolmuş minibuses in 25 minutes (It is active in 24 hours and cheap) You can reach to Taksim Square in 45 - 60 minutes with those Dolmuş busses too.  There are nice fish and meat restaurants like Cunda Balık and Günaydın Steak House. It is just 10 minutes walk. You can reach any market or restaurant in 10 minutes.
notes: You can ask anything about city (place to see, food, activities etc.)
transit: - 10 minutes walk to Metro Line.  - 10 Minutes walk to buses (24/7 minibuses to Kadıkoy and Taksim) - 10 Minutes to Bostanci ferries (Price Islands, Bakırköy, Beşiktaş, Yenikapı) - 15 minutes walk to Bagdat Avenue
access: Private Room, Living Room, Kitchen, Bathroom, Toilet
interaction: I can show around the city historical places, If I am available. During your stay, you can contact with me anytime you want by mobile phone.

host.host_about:
Hello,

I am an easy going person. I love to travel, learning different cultures, meeting with new people from all around the world. I have travelled around 40 countries. I would like to travel more.

I love to enjoy having quality time with people. I love to explore new experiences. I like going out with friends, tasting different food, participate concerts. 

I am a finance professional. I work for a multinational retail company.

reviews.comments: I had to sleep on a couch instead of private room which I booked before and paid for it. Because there were another couple who have booked room before and wanted to extend their accommodation after booking room from Airbnb. So also he was renting house to people after meeting with them on Airbnb and not keeping his promises. Entering house was horrible because he gaved room another people there were no enough keys, I had to wait for them on the door for long time and it happened couple times. Bathroom was not clean and in the shared living room which I had to sleep was noisy and dirty smelled. I am sorry that I couldn't be able to write a command about room that I've booked..

Engin's place is located in very nice neighborhood, near to all amenities, personnaly! it was a big pleasure to meet Engin, he made us to feel such as we are in our home, he's helpful, and a cultivated person! I hope I could get another trip to his beautiful city. Thank you Engin.

Engin fue muy amable y flexible con nosotros. Tuvimos una buena charla sobre la vida. Su casa es muy grande y cuenta con todo lo necesario para hospedarse.
Muy recomendado

Anadolu yakasında işiniz var ise yer anlamında ve fiyat/kalite anlamında tercih edilesi bir konaklama. Bina eski fakat evin içinde bir dökülme söz konusu değil. Banyo/tuvalet, mutfak ve yatak odası hem temizlik açısından hem de malzemeler (tuvalet kağıdı, sabun, duş, kahve, bardak, su, temiz çarşaf, havlu ve battaniye vs.) anlamında yeterliydi.

name: Luxury Sydney Escape
summary: Very close to the city, many lovely restaurants and cafe's and pubs in close proximity, 4 minute walk to Central Park shopping centre and Broad way Shopping centre, 10 minute walk to Central and Redfern station.
description: Very close to the city, many lovely restaurants and cafe's and pubs in close proximity, 4 minute walk to Central Park shopping centre and Broad way Shopping centre, 10 minute walk to Central and Redfern station.
house_rules: - Quiet hours after 10pm for courtesy of other tenants

host.host_about: Hi My name is Laura ,I am a small business owner, With a young family I love sydney so have a luxury loft where I can get away and enjoy the city.

reviews.comments: Good location. Good if you just want someone to sleep.

name: Light-filled room in Newtown beautiful terrace
summary: Beautiful single room in the heart of Newtown. The house is a gorgeous terrace house, located just off of King St, close to a wide range of restaurants, cafes and bars (as well as many buses directly to the city and Coogee beach) and a short walk to Macdonaldtown station.  The room is small, filled with light, and includes a double bed, a single loft bed + a desk.  The house, shared with 4 others, has two bathrooms, a washing machine, a backyard, and a large kitchen great for cooking.

The house, shared with 4 others, has two bathrooms, a washing machine, a backyard, and a large kitchen great for cooking.

reviews.comments: Location was perfect! Very close to train station and many restaurants and shops. Communication with Freya was good she always replied to my messages very quickly. Place is very alternative, always full of different people but also good for relax. The only thing I didn't like was cleanliness of the house. But if I had a chance I would book it back!

Great location close to the station and the city center. Quick response and great housemates. The cleanliness of the house was a little relaxed definitively encountered some roaches. But I would come back without a second thought

name: Palm Beach Penthouse by Contemporary Hotels
summary: This stunning penthouse style apartment is part of a split residence offering spectacular views of Whale Beach! A perfect couples getaway this spacious and elegant apartment is complete with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms located directly above Whale Beach.
space: With its own private access once inside you are welcomed with light and fresh interiors, the relaxed atmosphere you feel is emphasized by the stunning views that follow you where ever you go. The spacious deck is just asking for you to sit back with a wine and cheese platter and take in the spectacular view. This apartment is ideal for couples getaway, and can also work for friends and family with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms it ensures everyone can fully enjoy the apartment. With spacious living and dining and a basic kitchen (no oven) it is an easy chic getaway to enjoy Palm beach and Whale Beach in all it's beauty. Cleaning $200

host.host_about:
Contemporary Hotels is Australia's leading independent boutique accommodation provider well known for its design-conscious Beach Houses + Villas + Luxury Houses + Apartments - as well as its landmark urban boutique hotel Medusa in Sydney. The collection also encompasses a suite of luxury properties on Italy's Amalfi Coast, a sumptuous villa in Bali and a beautiful apartment in Paris.
Contemporary Hotels is the destination of choice by urban sophisticates, professionals, couples and well-travelled families looking for unique contemporary accommodation that celebrates Australia's style. We focus on providing unparalleled service, attention to detail with our properties and ensuring that you, the guest, has a wonderful holiday!

reviews.comments: Fantastic location, incredible views, and very comfortable accomodation for a short or long stay break.

name: The Geraniums
summary: This is a newly painted and furnished suite with plenty of natural light and access to outdoor area's. As well as the very private room you have access to an equiped Chefs kitchen, dining, lounge, laundry and external courtyard with barbecue. The suite is part of a large house with many facilities.  Easy walking distance to public transport and the Towers shopping centre, cinema's and restaurants. Discounts for long-term occupants.
space: What is unique about this place is its open plan but also includes private areas to read or have a private chat with chosen company. You are welcome to watch movies or Youtube videos on the smart television. This accomodation includes a lounge area as well as an upstairs sunroom and outdoor courtyard which is accessible from the room. This space is not cluttered but have been tastefully furnished.

What is unique about this place is its open plan but also includes private areas to read or have a private chat with chosen company. You are welcome to watch movies or Youtube videos on the smart television. This accomodation includes a lounge area as well as an upstairs sunroom and outdoor courtyard which is accessible from the room. This space is not cluttered but have been tastefully furnished. Access to the suite is provided through the main entrance door and wide hallway to the family room. Alternatively, you may choose to enter the suite directly from
neighborhood_overview: We have a beautiful, quiet and friendly neighbourhood with a very low crime rate  over the long period of time we have been in the area.
notes: On the desk of your suite you will find a copy of details such as wifi access and other information to help make the best of your stay here.
transit: Castle Hill is well catered for with public transport to most areas of Sydney including the north-east and south-eastern beaches, as well as public transport to the Blue Mountains, Parramatta, the City, the Opera House and the historic Rocks area.  Access to public transport is just seven minutes walk from the front gate. It is also an easy journey from the airport to Castle Hill by Public transport. Should you have  a car, off street parking is provided.
access: Access to the suite is provided through the main entrance door and wide hallway to the family room. Alternatively, you may choose to enter the suite directly from the Geranium courtyard. While enjoying the privacy, you also have access to the bathroom and all of the living areas that have been listed above.
interaction: I, Sam your host, live with my family in a separate building on the same compound. You may contact me with any concerns you may have.

host.host_about: I am a retired House Carpenter / Builder enjoying my hobbies of Sailing, bushwalking, and cycling. Also enjoy reading and keeping up with friends over coffee. My wife and I have recently completed a trip to Paris, Rome, Southern Italy, Malta, Greece Turkey and Lebanon. We stayed and enjoyed ourselves in Airbnb accomodation in most places over a seven week period and have not had one bad experience. It is great to be meeting and living among the locals. I have now become a Airbnb host myself, enjoying meeting people from over the world. My lifetime work motto has been do it once and do it well, and enjoy the fruits of your labour. Regards Sam

reviews.comments:
The room and bathroom were very clean and nicely decorated. It’s a very pretty area, close to plenty of bus stops and shops. 
Sam was very kind and helpful, I would’ve loved to get the chance to meet in person. Would definitely recommend!
Very quiet and relaxing place to stay, the Castle towers is a 10min walk . Sam and Penny are very warm and welcoming and always happy to help out. Highly recommended.
Great host in a great location. Sam is extremely kind and hospitable and the house is sparkling clean!
The room is super spacious with room to cook and Sam is a super generous and kind host.

Lovely clean and well presented accommodation. Not quite as private as the pictures depict. Children running in courtyard outside bedroom. Lack of air conditioning in Sydney summer heat was a big negative. A very large house fully booked made it quite noisy.

Sam and Penny were the perfect hosts they really made us feel so safe and taken care of. We were traveling from Ireland and they couldn't have made us feel more at home. It was like home from home. They were so friendly and generous and even entertained us a few nights, Penny cooked some traditional Chinese food for us which was to die for and offered great advice on local transport, places to go around Sydney etc and it was so lovely getting to know them. We had all the essentials wifi, TV and more, it was clean and very cosy and the bed was super comfortable! We simply loved it. It's not often you meet people as genuine and caring as Sam nothing was too much trouble for them. They were the definition of Superhosts!!. Thanks Sam & Penny
It is at great location. The room was tidy and clean.  You can get anything you need at foot step. Sam and his wife was very friendly and give a lot of help for local information.
性价比较高

Sam & Penny (His wife) are so gracious and generous with their time & hospitality. The room was as described, very comfortable space to stay in, all shared zones are clean & tidy. This place is the definition of bang for your buck, and you'll make two lovely friends along the way too.
Great host highly recommend will be staying again
2nd time I have stayed and will be staying again. Very friendly house and host. Highly recommended this place to anyone

A wonderful spacious and clean room with all standard amenities to make your stay a very comfortable one. The internet connection is great and communication with Sam is seamless. Sam is extremely helpful and goes the extra mile to fulfill any requests for you and your family. Thank you for hosting us. Cheers!

Perfectly understand why Sam is a super host. Sam's place is by far the best place I have ever stayed in terms of bnb. The place is well managed. Everything is very clean and well designed. Had a really pleasant stay there. Highly recommended!!!!
Sam was very responsive and friendly. The room was well furnished and kept clean. Enjoyed my stay here!

Wonderful and lightful home, amazing hospitality, very quiet and big room with direct access to the backyard, the other guests were very kind and friendly. Sam and his wife are the best hosts I have ever met: thoughtful, helpful, always smiling and peaceful.
Next time in Sydney will be surely at Sam's.
Sam and Penny were gracious hosts and made castle hill feel very homey!

Sam is truly a super host! very responsive to messages, and very hospitable as well. the house is neat and tidy, it is basically the same as the pictures posted online. Would definitely reccomend his place to everyone! Me and my husband love the different types of vegetables and fruits planted within the front yard of the house, most especially the strawberries!

name: fun place
summary: I live with 1 roommate very cozy place.. only for people looking to have a nice stay in the heart of montreal
description: I live with 1 roommate very cozy place.. only for people looking to have a nice stay in the heart of montreal

host.host_about: I am a part time student with a full time job. not in the apartment a lot but my roommate is here most of the time

name: Sydney City Pad
summary: *Open plan in the heart of trendy, vibrant Darlinghurst *Newly furnished and designed by Sydney-based Interior Designers *Sleeps 4 with full kitchen, laundry & bathroom facilities *Moments from Oxford Street, Hyde Park & Kings Cross Train Station *Eateries, bars, galleries, shops and more in the immediate local area *Neighbouring trendy suburbs of Paddington, Surry Hills & Double Bay
space: Designed with the traveller in mind, this inner city apartment offers the perfect balance of relaxation and excitement for your stay. Ideal for singles, couples, groups and business travellers. This space has been created by Interior Designers to strike a balance between beauty, comfort and functionality. The open-plan layout features distinct dining, lounge and work areas. There is a private bedroom with a Queen bed, a balcony, storage and the bathroom is next door. There is a fully equipped kitchen with a SMEG kettle, gas cooktop and oven, drawer dishwasher, fridge, sandwich press and all the utensils you might need to make good use of it! The pantry is stocked with condiments, plenty of tea and more. Note, if you would like eggs and milk to be provided for the beginning of your stay please let me know (or you can try one of Darlinghurst’s amazing breakfast spots nearby)! The enclosed laundry area is equipped with washer, dryer, iron board and iron. The beautiful marble dining table
description: *Open plan in the heart of trendy, vibrant Darlinghurst *Newly furnished and designed by Sydney-based Interior Designers *Sleeps 4 with full kitchen, laundry & bathroom facilities *Moments from Oxford Street, Hyde Park & Kings Cross Train Station *Eateries, bars, galleries, shops and more in the immediate local area *Neighbouring trendy suburbs of Paddington, Surry Hills & Double Bay Designed with the traveller in mind, this inner city apartment offers the perfect balance of relaxation and excitement for your stay. Ideal for singles, couples, groups and business travellers. This space has been created by Interior Designers to strike a balance between beauty, comfort and functionality. The open-plan layout features distinct dining, lounge and work areas. There is a private bedroom with a Queen bed, a balcony, storage and the bathroom is next door. There is a fully equipped kitchen with a SMEG kettle, gas cooktop and oven, drawer dishwasher, fridge, sandwich press and all the utensils yo
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is very conveniently located, less than a kilometre from Kings Cross station, just 400m from Oxford Street, around the corner from trendy Stanley Street cafes and 550m from Sydney’s iconic Hyde Park! Darlinghurst is one of Sydney’s most diverse and cosmopolitan suburbs, featuring hole-in-the-walls, galleries, bars, shops and more. Other nearby locations not to miss are the Australian Museum, the Art Gallery of NSW and the Boy Charlton Pool. Whether you’re looking for great live music, want to learn about Sydney’s history or want to shop in Sydney like a local, this is the place to be. We live locally and are always trying new places so please ask for suggestions!
notes: Please note that you will need to walk up a flight of stairs. Please also note there is currently renovations occurring in neighbouring buildings, but this is only during working hours per local council laws.
transit: To get here, you can catch a train from the airport to Kings Cross train station for $18 and walk to the apartment (if you are more than one, a cab is about $40). There are also shuttle buses to Kings Cross. Darlinghurst is very walkable, and you can always opt to get public transport to many of Sydney's best locations nearby.
access: We supply high quality toiletries, towels, linen and amenities. Cleaning services are available during your stay at an additional cost. Private, secure entrance.
interaction: I am available by phone, email or in person throughout your stay so please don’t hesitate to contact me! We live nearby and are available for check-in at your your convenience after 3pm. Please let us know your approximate time of arrival when you book and closer to your booking. Check out is 11am to allow for cleaning services.

host.host_about:
I am a Law & Business student studying and living in Sydney, Australia. I love meeting new people, reading, movies and exploring like a local!

I am a host of three beautiful apartments and take pride in helping guests have fun, relaxing stays in Sydney! I am friendly and readily contactable.

reviews.comments: Very good host, helpful and responsible, room is tidy and comfortable, definitely come back
This place is well situated and secure. Walking distance to all major transportation and the local restaurants are fantastic. Would highly recommend.
The apartment was very nice, in a great location and the check-in process was quick and easy. Had a very nice stay in Sydney for the cricket!
Great apartment, great location, would recommend it to anyone wanting to be in the middle of the city. We loved it, will definitely be back. Eleni was fantastic to deal with also!
Awesome position.  Beautifully appointed. One of the nicest Airbnb's we have stayed in.  Close to awesome bars and restuarants as well as the city.  Highly recommended and we will be back.
Good location and lovely place

If you are a foodie like my wife and I. This location is out of this world.
Rey's Place on the ground floor is the best "Suckling pig" I have ever had.
Really good Restaurants from every nation. On the corner is a great coffee shop
The Apt. was really nice. Check in was easy. Enjoyed our stay.

Eleni's place is situated in a fantastic spot in Sydney. Right amongst it. The unit is clean, chic and well decorated. A comfortable bed takes up just about all the space in the bedroom and a comfortable pullout sofa can be used  as a second bed. All in all thoroughly recommended. Cheers Paul
位置不错,房间也很好,房东回复很及时｡
Excellent place, very stylish and in a great location. Coupled with an excellent host who communicates very promptly makes for a relaxing stay in central Sydney
Nice stylish apartment in a very central location. There are plenty of options close by for food and drinks. Eleni and her mom were great hosts :)

Great location, easy to reach famous tourist spot including the Opera House, Darling Harbor, China town, etc. Also only 10min walk to supermarket. The apt is very clean with IKEA style decoration, and clothes washing machine, dish washer, oven are friendly to use. Host Eleni is very considerate and helpful, even first aid pad is also available for use in cabinet.
The location was perfect because everything that you would need is within walking distance.  Eleni was a great host and was very response when we had question.  We will definitely stay here again.
Very satisfied, everything was as expected, very good location, excelent host...
This unit was just ideal and everything and more! We cannot recommend it more highly!
Eleni’s house is very clean and comfortable. The location is very good. Eleni and her sister are very nice. Everything is very well!
Eleni’s home is beautiful and clean and welcoming for our weekend in Sydney.

Darlinghurst is an excellent location for a city stay. It's cafe and club culture makes for a fun vibe. The area is buzzing at all hours, and fortunately the apartment is nice and quiet, for when you do actually want to sleep. It's a nicely laid out and decorated apartment and I would stay again or recommend to friends.
Great little gem in the heart of every thing. Elenis place is clean and well appointed and communication is quick and easy. Would definitely stay again.

This Airbnb is akin to a good hotel suite, very clean and nicely appointed. Darlinghurst is magic and this apartment puts you in the heart of it. Quiet but super central at the same time. Fabulous host, highly recommended!
This is a really nice place to live.

The apartment was stylish, clean and super convenient. It is located within walking distance to some of the biggest attractions in Sydney, perfect for a group of tourists like us who enjoyed a lot of sightseeing. The host made everything super easy for us from check - in until the end of our stay. We had a perfect stay at Eleni's place!
Clean neat space, ideal for people wanting to be close to the city, but not in amongst the hustle and bustle. Bed was comfy! Pull out soda was good too. Thanks!
Amazing apartment close to the city and restaurant, tastefully done and warm host

Thankyou Eleni for providing such a wonderful unit.  It was perfect for our requirements, exactly as the photos showed,  in a very good location and the construction noise that you advised us of was minimal and did not impact our stay at all.  Many thanks.

The apartment was exactly as it appears in the photo's.  A lovely space, beautiful decor. Fresh and completely updated. Eleni was extremely responsive both before and during our stay. She went out of her way to make our stay comfortable. The location was great for travels all throughout Sydney, from the beaches to the opera house, harbor bridge, Darling Harbor and all surrounding areas.
집은 사진에서 보는것과 동일합니다. 깨끗하고 예뻐요. 항상 질문에 친절하게 응답해주셔서 감사했습니다.

This was the first time I have booked through Airbnb and Eleni has set an extremely high standard for all my future bookings.  Everything worked smoothly from our first communication to the last.  Her apartment was perfect for our stay.  It is situated in such a great area, close to shops and even within walking distance to the CBD and Circular Quay.  It was sparkling clean and provided all the amenities we needed.  Thanks again Eleni for being a great hostess!

사진보다 실제 공간이 더 넓은느낌이어서 예상보다 좋았습니다. 쇼파베드도 생각보다 편해 큰 불편함이 없었습니다. 주변에 괜찮은 식당도 많고 나쁘지않은 숙소입니다. 단점이라면 수압이 약해서 샤워할때 조금 불편했어요.  There was a problem(it's not Eleni's fault) and she try her best to solve it. She is kind host:) The house is lovely, and there are lots of fancy restaurants around this place. Moreover, the house is bigger than I expect.
Bell’alloggio in una posizione eccezionale per visitare Sydney
房间厨房用品齐全,房间很干净｡位置很好,距离大部分景点都能步行到达｡
Beautiful and clean apartment in a great neighbourhood, lots of lovely cafes in the vicinity. Eleni was a very helpful host. We enjoyed the stay a lot, thanks Eleni!

Perfect location for our trip to Sydney. Not too far from Museum train station for trip from airport (~$18) and also just a short walk uphill to bus stop to Bondi Beach ($3.66!). Numerous restaurants, cafés, and shops both uphill and down.  Washer and dryer were nice to have and full kitchen too. Bed and sofa bed were very comfortable. Easy access in and out.
Great place
comfotable location and clean house

This was my second stay with Eleni in a different unit of the building and it was just delightful.  Extremely clean, cute space, convenient washer/dryer, etc.  The location is amazing and I've now become friends with the restaurant downstairs that has an incredible food menu and cocktails!  Highly recommend making this your home while staying in Sydney.

Very pleasant stay, however, a few cockroaches and spiders that visited that made it a tad unpleasant. Host did have bug spray which was great. And host was a great communicator and had other people to contact in her absence. Lovely and thoughtful touches and very convenient location. And, the cleaners were very lovely as well. Thanks Eleni.
A great location, very clean bright space - perfect for a weekend getaway in Sydney!

We enjoyed staying at Eleni’s Place. It was very clean and quiet and all communication went well. If was easy to walk most places in Sydney from this location. Would stay there again if we return to Sydney.
Thanks for being a wonderful host. Great place and so central in the city. Eleni was so quick to respond to queries and made sure the stay was as enjoyable. Would happily stay again.
Great location and nice modernly well equipped apartment.  Recommended.
every thing ok

Perfect little space to start our Australian adventure. Hubby got a work out schlepping our stroller up and down the flight of stairs, but it was manageable. The bed was so comfortable and made it easy to recover from the jet lag. The location is great, with some of the best Thai food we’ve had, just around the corner at Roy Siam. Thanks eleni for letting us stay at your adorable flat.

Well located, well decorated and well equipped, a very good option to stay in Sydney. A few things could be improved on the cleaning side but sure that Eleni as a great host she is will take care of it.
Nice apartment!

Great location, was able to walk everywhere, and stylish flat. WiFi/internet was sometimes down but we suspect that was due to the poor weather we had when there! Really clean flat and Eleni was very responsive. Check in and out was super easy too! Only on street parking is available which is expensive so if you have a car could be worth finding somewhere cheap to park before arriving.
Would highly recommend close to town and and nice area to stay. Very clean and tidy and the host is exceptional

Highly recommended and had a great 3-week stay. Fantastic location near restaurants, bars and only 5 min walk to the city. Excellent quality bed with top notch pillows and nice linen. Spacious living area, nice bathroom and kitchen stocked with plenty of glasses and utensils.

The location is what this place is all about.  It’s very quiet but downstairs are fun cafes and restaurants. Walk to CBD. Run to opera house & botanical gardens. Has everything you need.  We had one request during our 2-wk stay and host was very responsive.
房间设施齐全,离市区景点比较近,走路可达｡但房屋里是窄的楼梯,提重的行李上楼有点儿麻烦,我订的是两张床,四个人,抵达时只有一张床,沙发床是自己铺的｡
Eleni's place was a great overnight stay. Will definitely keep it in mind for future business trips.
Eleni’s place
Super clean, modern and conveniently located. Bath amenities were really nice too. Above a great restaurant too (don't worry, you don't get any noise).
I thoroughly enjoyed staying at this property. It is close to many excellent places to eat and walking distance to do many landmarks meant that it was perfect for us. Thanks Eleni!

name: Oceanfront View, Immaculate 2-BR/BA
summary: Immaculate, quiet, away from the crowds, with fantastic views, in Maalaea Bay with easy access to local beaches.  Building is on a cul-de-sac so there is little vehicular traffic.  Includes high-end kitchen, bathrooms and tile floors throughout.
space: Spectacular Ocean Views at Maalaea Kai-- Clean, well-maintained Maui two-bedroom, two-bath condo away from the crowds, with fantastic views, located in Maalaea Bay with easy access to local beaches and towns.   -------------------------------------------------------------------- Quality Interior Features & Amenities-- The unit includes high-end kitchen, bathrooms and amenities, with tile floors throughout, Hawaiian décor, new furniture, bedding and linens.  Central air conditioning is provided, but you may prefer to let the trade winds breeze flow through the unit. Upgraded Custom Kitchen Includes Quality Appliances-- Beautiful cabinets, large refrigerator-freezer, range, oven and dishwasher, with blender, toaster and coffee maker are provided.   The kitchen is a chef’s dream, it has everything you need to prepare a meal that you would make from your own home kitchen—glassware, flatware, utensils, dishes, pots, pans, etc.  You can dine on the lanai and breakfast area.  Enjoy eating bre
