Includes high-end kitchen, bathrooms and tile floors throughout. Spectacular Ocean Views at Maalaea Kai-- Clean, well-maintained Maui two-bedroom, two-bath condo away from the crowds, with fantastic views, located in Maalaea Bay with easy access to local beaches and towns.   -------------------------------------------------------------------- Quality Interior Features & Amenities-- The unit includes high-end kitchen, bathrooms and amenities, with tile floors throughout, Hawaiian décor, new furniture, bedding and linens.  Central air conditioning is provided, but you may prefer to let the trade winds breeze flow through the unit. Upgraded Custom Kitchen Includes Quality Appliances-- Beautiful cabinets, large refrigerator-freezer, range, oven and dishwasher, with blender, toaster and coffee maker are provided.
neighborhood_overview: The marina with restaurants, shops and aquarium is a 5-minute walk, and the public beach for swimming, seeing turtles and walking is about a 7-minute walk from the condo.  The grounds are beautiful with a fine grass for picnics, relaxing with a glass of wine or for children to play.
notes: The Maui condo rental taxes of 14.1% are included in the fees for daily and weekly rentals, and for the one-time cleaning fee.  Owner pays the taxes.
transit: STANDARD POLICIES:   Please Read Carefully:   We Recommend Trip-Cancellation Travel Insurance. •No smoking •No pets Contact us for more information.
access: Outdoor Swimming, Snorkeling, Sunning & BBQing on the Condominium Grounds-- The complex provides the largest swimming pool in the Maalaea district, reef access to the ocean with a short walk to four-mile secluded beach.  The unit includes boogie boards, picnic cooler, beach chairs, tons of beach towels, two adult and two child snorkeling sets and sand toys. Use the cooler to keep your wine chilled while sitting out at night on the lounge chairs listening to the ocean among the Coconut Palms on the two-acre lush grounds. On weekend evenings the manager lights tiki torches near the sea wall at the edge of the beautifully manicured putting green lawn with tropical landscaping. Nearby Maalaea Harbor and Village and Access to Maalaea Beach-- A short westerly walk provides access to restaurants, stores, boats for scuba diving or Humpback whale watching (December-May), while an easterly stroll to the end of the street provides access to a four-mile long beach. --------------------------------
interaction: NATURAL, ATHLETIC & SIGHTSEEING ACTIVITIES NEARBY On secluded cul-de-sac between Maalaea Bay and Sugar Cane Fields-- The complex is conveniently located •You can walk 1/4 mile down sugarcane-lined Hauoli Street to the end of the road at Haycraft Park.  There, you can start a walking or jogging journey at the quiet and undeveloped four-mile white sandy Maalaea Beach (Maui's largest beach, sometimes called Sugar Beach due to the fine-grained sand), or  •You can walk just around the corner to the Maalaea Harbor and Village with its general store and restaurants (see below).   You can end the day with an evening sunset walk on Maalaea Beach and then dinner at one of the harbor area's excellent restaurants. Maalaea Harbor and Village-- You are within walking distance of the Maui Aquarium, the Pacific Whale Foundation whale watching cruises during whale season, snorkeling excursions, scuba diving, dinner cruises and game fishing.  Restaurants include two fine dining, one Pizza, one Deli and
house_rules: Standard Policies:  Please Read Carefully: We Recommend Trip-Cancellation Travel Insurance. - No Smoking. - No Pets. Fees and Taxes •Prepaid Cleaning Fee:  $147.44-- Renter Pays •Hawaii State Tax:  13.42%-- Included in the daily, weekly and cleaning fees. Inquire for more information.

host.host_about:
We are pleased to rent our beautiful condo when we are not visiting Maui.  We are confident that you will enjoy your visit.

•Make a reservation or inquiry by phone:  (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) •Make a reservation or inquiry by e-mail:  (Email hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.comments:
YOU MUST STAY AT THIS CONDO!!!! we were extremely happy with the beautiful condo and the immaculately kept grounds. We brought friends who had never been to any of the islands and what an incredible impression it left for them. We will definitely return and hopefully Howard's condo will be available to stay at again. Everything in the fully stocked condo to the abundant plush bath towels, we felt right at home and enjoyed the ocean breezes that flowed through the home.
Howard was most helpful and accomodating to our needs for a late check out. Check this place out, you will not be disappointed!!!
My family and I had a wonderful stay at Howard's condo. It was very clean and easy to get to. The view was beautiful. We would love to stay here again in the future!! Thank you Howard!!!

Howard was prompt and thorough with his communications with us. The condo was exactly as he described and perfect for 2 couples as we each had our own ensuite bathroom.  The full kitchen enabled us to eat at home for 80% of our meals. The master has a safe in the closet. The guest room has a cooler, beach towels, chairs, snorkels/masks for use thus saving valuable suitcase space.  The crashing waves are a mere 50 ' from the balcony and we enjoyed the daily surfers.  The condo is in the perfect spot away from the noisy tourists but close enough to everything.  The gas BBQs are new and the pool is cleaned daily. Amazing place to stay on an absolutely gorgeous island. ALOHA - Go and Enjoy

My family had a great time and enjoyed our stay here. The apt has everything we need, and is in a very convenient location. The view from the living room and master bedroom is definitely great. Though the apt is very close to the ocean, but it's pretty quiet; we all got really good sleep during our stay. (I spent a day in another ocean-front cottage hotel, there is a very big sound of waves and winds!) 

The only nitpick is the reserved parking slot is little bit narrow for our mid-size SUV. So, just be careful when parking your car.

Howard was very helpful and responsive when we needed to extend our stay in Maui on short notice. All of the necessary information regarding access to the apartment and parking, as well as contact numbers for questions and emergencies were provided as part of his initial informational communication.

Extras such as beach towels, sand toys for children and so on were provided as part of the stay. The ocean front view from the apartment was great, the sound of the waves throughout the day and at night, and the nearby beach made this a great place to spend time. The location is also convenient to much of the island, from the beaches on the west coast, to the beaches on the south coast, as well as shopping for necessities in Kahului only fifteen minutes away by car.

The beds were comfortable, easily accommodating three adults and a small child. The kitchen was stocked with dishware, utensils, knives, and pots and pans to make cooking for several people possible. Lastly, TV and internet service were solid and easy to use, and allowed me to deal with work when I had to extend my stay on Maui beyond my anticipated return date.

If you are looking for stunning views, clean elegant furnishings and  peaceful surroundings this is the place for you. Howard and Kathleen were easy to contact, they left a great manual on the condo. The kitchen had everything we needed for cooking. The condo supplied us with most everything we needed for day trips when traveling around the island. The parking stalls are tight. We loved our stay in Maui!

Perfect family accommodation. We stayed for 5 nights on a family holiday with my husbands parents & our 1 year old daughter. We couldn't have found a more perfect location. Fantastic beach front, without the busyness of Kaanapali.
Perfect ocean views from the balcony & main bedroom. We even saw turtles swimming out the front most evenings.
The condo was a great size for our busy toddler to roam & play. It was also so well stocked with everything we needed. The kitchen has every appliance you need. An abundance of beach towels. Even childrens beach toys & boogie boards.
The toiletries that were provided were an additional nice touch.
The condo has air conditioning, but it was not needed since a beautiful breeze blew up from the ocean.
We hired a car so we're able to drive around to all of the popular tourist locations. If you want to leave Maalaea you really need a car, the local convienance stores don't stock much so you also need a car to drive to grocery store.
The local residents were all so helpful & friendly also. We made a lot of friends while playing on the grass area and swimming in the pool.
All in all a perfect family holiday.
Would recommend to everyone.

My family and I were very happy to have stayed at Howard's beautiful condo for 4 days. The ocean view was an awesome treat every morning while drinking coffee on the lanai. The place was exactly what the pictures described, and I think the space was bigger in person. I loved watching the turtles hangout and eat along the rocks off the condo. The area is quiet and private. Quality of the linens, decor, and accessories were top notch! Communication with Howard was easy & quick. He made sure to provide us with information early and often! Having AC was very nice, but the breeze from the ocean kept us cool most of the time. I would recommend having a car to get around, since places to eat are limited in Maalaea; we found ourselves going into Kihei (15-20 min drive) for dinner. For my family, Maalaea was the perfect location for our planned activities, in the middle of West & South Maui. Of the three places we stayed at, including a resort, Howard's condo was my parent's favorite!

Our stay in Maui, at Howard's condo, was a fabulous experience. It was perfect!  It has everything you need. It is In a nice quiet complex that is close to the popular spots, should you want "action."  The grounds surrounding the complex were impeccably kept. The view from the lanai was spectacular!  We couldn't have asked for a better place to vacation. I guarantee we will be back!!

Howard's condo on Maui was everything and more of what we expected.the location was just what we were looking for, quite and very beautiful. The condo was very nice and was very comfortable for six of us. We had everything we would ever need, plenty of beach toys and towels, a fully equipped kitchen, just a quick walk to the beach. We really enjoyed getting up and having our coffee out on the balcony watching the sun come up. This was truly relaxing and beautiful. We will return one day and would love to be able to stay in this beautiful condo.Thank you Howard and Kathleen for sharing you wonderful piece of paradise with us.

Howard did send me a very detailed email before my arrival to find and access the condo. I had no problem to find it thanks to his explanations.
The condo is very clean with 2 spacious bedroom and 2 very clean bathrooms.
The building also is very well kept with a nice swimming pool (that I haven't tried !). The view from the condo is beautiful.
the condo is very well positioned to explore the island on both side, but there is not a lot of restaurants around so you need to drive 15min to go out for dinner or to the closest town. To be honnest it wasn't a problem for me at all as I was looking for a calm setting.
Wifi is working very well. 
Howard did also help us to find a solution to keep our luggage until the evening as we had an open windows jeep so impossible to store them in the car all day.  As his daugther was staying there just after us  she kindly accepted to keep it. That said if you have a late plane you should ask him before how you can do as the check out is at 11am.
The only thing that you might want to know is that the AC is a bit noisy on the balcony next to the bedroom with the view.
 Overall it was really a great experience.

The condo was wonderful. From the astonishing views of the ocean and mountain, to the cleanliness of the entire apartment, to the comfortable beds, to the overall convenience; we had everything we needed for our stay and much more. We were a party of three and it was nice to have two bedrooms with their own bathrooms. The place is nicely decorated. There were also plenty of beach towels, which was so useful for our Road to Hana trip. There were also some very helpful guide books and materials to explore the area. The condo is in a great location, walking distance to the harbour, where we leave for snorkeling trips, as well as to convenient stores and restaurants. Howard was very easy to communicate with and very attentive; he provided all the information and details needed for a great stay. Thank you very much Howard and Kathleen, we had a wonderful time in Maui at your condo and we hope to be back!

Unser Aufenthalt in der liebevoll eingerichteten und sehr gut ausgestatten Unterkunft ( Schnorchel, Bodyboards, Strandhandtücher, ...) von Howard war wunderschön und ließ keine Wünsche offen! Unser Gastgeber hat von Anfang an sehr viel mit uns kommuniziert und uns eine Fülle von Informationen über sein Apartment, Maui und Umgebung gegeben. Die Wohnung begeisterte uns mit ihrer Sauberkeit, landestypischen Einrichtung und dem unglaublichen Blick auf den Ozean(sehr viele Schildkröten!:-), sodass wir uns von Anfang an Zuhause gefühlt haben. Alles organisatorische war unkompliziert geregelt und zur Wohnung gehören außerdem ein Stellplatz direkt vor der Haustür, eine Möglichkeit zum Wäsche waschen und trocknen, sowie ein Pool mit direkten Blick auf den Ozean. Der Aufenthalt bei Howard hat unseren Urlaub wirklich bereichert - wir können diese Unterkunft ohne jeden Zweifel jedem weiterempfehlen und bedanken uns auch auf diesem Wege bei unserem herzlichen Gastgeber!

Howard did a truly fantastic job before, during, and after our stay. The property is equipped with every amenity you'd need, the location is perfect, and the views are absolutely beautiful. I would recommend this listing time and time again, and I'm already looking forward to my next stay!

Howard was extremely accommodating providing lots of information about the condo and the area.  The condo was exactly as descried.  We loved it and the location.  It was very clean and comfortable with spectacular views.  The grounds of the condo were very well maintained.  Staying at Howard' s started off our trip perfectly and would highly recommend this as a great place to stay while visiting Maui.  Thanks Howard for sharing it with us!

Fantastic location, easily drivable to most parts of the island. If you like being by the water, this condo is great for falling asleep with the waves crashing in the background. Also right next to the whale watching harbor. Ideal for families, seniors, or folks new to the island looking to be in a central location to explore everything. Howard also does a really good job of explaining what is available to in terms of local sites to visit. The condo is also in great shape with all the amenities you need, along with beautiful oriental antiques.

Howard's place is exactly as described in his listing.  It is a beautifully maintained property, all the amenities you could possibly want,  fantastic view.  Howard was so responsive in communicating with us, answering all our questions.  He supplies all the extra things: snorkel gear, beach towels, cooler, sunscreen, insect repellant and the welcome box of chocolates.  If you stay at Howard's place you are fortunate.  It is in a great location on the coast with great restaurants nearby.  As an added bonus we saw whales from our lanai every day.  Thank you Howard for sharing your beautiful spot.

We had a wonderul time at Howard's condo. The condo is in a quiet, low traffic neighborhood, and the view of the ocean was breathtaking: you just can't get enough of it. The lanai is a great place to sit and relax and a couple of times, we were able to spot whales! 
Howard is a great host and is very easy to get in touch with by email or text. He was very helpful long before our trip with information and tips of the neighborhood and island. In the condo, there are laminated sheets of all the information you need about everything, grocery stores, beaches, restaurants etc. What a great resource! The condo was very clean and tastefully decorated, and we really appreciated the box of chocolate covered macademia candy left for us. What a lovely and thoughtful gesture! The kitchen is well equipped and cleaning supplies are provided so you don't have to buy anything. There's plenty of beach towels, beach chairs, beach toys, mats, a cooler, body boards, anything you can think of bringing to the beach. It's made our vacation so much more enjoyable. I can't say enough good things about Howard and his condo.

Howard was very attentive, and he made sure we feel welcomed and comfortable. The place was as described, roomy with a good view of the ocean. The neighborhood was excellent. The beach was beautiful but quiet, as if we have our own private beach. We would come back again in the future.

Howard's place is just as described in his Airbnb description.  Walking in, we got everything we expected and more.  The pictures do not do justice to the actual view itself.  It is breathtaking.  Everything was in great working order also.  We have kids ranging from 7 months to 11 years old and all of them enjoyed themselves.  One thing I didn't notice on the reviews is the fact that the pool has to be heated because it is so warm and perfect!  My kids really enjoyed swimming in the evening time.  I would definitely recommend staying here anytime!

This was our first experience staying in a condo using Airbnb.  We were not sure how this would turn out specially since we were taking a trip to Hawaii and did not want to feel comprised.  However all the anxiety was over as soon as we signed this immaculate condo with our host Howard.  Right from the begining he made us comfortable by sending helpful hints reagards eating places, beaches to see and travel and packing tips.  Right till the end Howards helped us with all our questions starting from the day we signed till the end.  Very gracious host and we have nothing but all praises for the treatment and help we got.  The condo is very beautifully and tastetfully decorated and we felt very much at home after our long travel from east coast.  Everything right from kitchen to bedroom and lanai was very well furnished and amply stocked.   It was a great experience and we want to thank Howard and Kathleen for being excellent hosts and want to thank for sharing their condo or their "second home" as they call with us.  We will never forget this wonderful experience and hope to come back with our family and friends in future.  Again thanks for everything!!

Howard and Kathleen are the best. If AirBnb wants to showcase, they should use Howard and Kathleen as the perfect example.  First, they are excellent communicators. Everything you will need and much more is emailed upfront which is extremely helpful.  Once we got to the condo, it is beautiful.  Every aspect of your experience is well thought out - the new furnishings, decor, comfortable beds and all the way to the real nice soft bath towels. They also have beach towels, chairs, umbrella, snorkel equipment, beach toys for kid, mat etc for your trips to the beach.  Every thing you need to do in Maui is in nicely laminated easy to follow directions pages that is very helpful. We loved their beach recommendations and one of the beaches they liked was our absolute favorite. We saw turtles swimming right outside the condo. We had the best experience. If you are going to Maui and need a two bed room place, rent Howard and Kathleen's place.

Howard provided detailed information about all aspects of the condo and location.  Very helpful.

The condo was fantastic.  The furnishings, artwork, bedding, and towels were all new and the condo looked great.

The condo was immaculate.   Everything was clean and the white tile floors were spotless.

There is a beautiful patio that overlooks the ocean and Haleakala.  It's a picture perfect setting.  We enjoyed our coffee and breakfast there every morning and a glass of wine every night.  It's the perfect place to relax.   The condo also overlooks a pool.  The pool was used frequently by others in the condo building.  Kids used the pool but it was never too noisy and the pool emptied out by 9pm.

We cooked dinner at the condo 3 nights.  There is a Foodland about 10 minutes away, so it made shopping easy.  Everything we needed to cook was available in the kitchen.

The condo is centrally located, so it took about 30 minutes to reach the start of the road to Hana, about 30 minutes to the base of Haleakala, and about 30 minutes to Lahaina.   It's about 20 minutes from the airport.

The condo is about a 10 minute walk from a beautiful, secluded, quiet beach that stretches on for several miles.  

This place is just perfect and we are so happy we got to stay at such a nice place while we vacationed in Maui.

We thoroughly enjoyed out stay at Maalaea 206.  The condo has a picture perfect ocean front view and low key vibe ideal for Hawaii and is very comfortable and well stocked with everything you need for a beach vacation on Maui.  We especially liked the location, which made exploring all parts of the Island an easy and quick drive.  After being out all day, it was great to enjoy the warm pool and setting sun.  The condo grounds are beautiful and immaculately maintained and the only noise you hear is the soothing sounds of the Hawaiian trade winds.  It was a breeze working with Howard.  He was very accommodating and made our overall stay on Maui a great experience.

I had an amazing time staying at Howard's condo for the week. Everything was as expected and I really enjoyed our beautiful view. His recommendation cards were amazing and we found really great places to visit based on his reccomendations. I would definitely return to Howard's condo the next time that I am in Maui. 

Thanks Howard!

호스트는 도착전부터 여행에 필요한 마우이 정보 및 숙소이용에 필요한 상세설명의 메일을 계속해서 보내주었습니다. 도착 몇이전 숙소에 대한 모든 물건의 사용법을 상세히 알려주었습니다. 굉장히 친절하고 상세히 알려주었습니다.
숙소의 위치 및 분위기는 매우 좋습니다. 다시 마우이 방문시 사용할 확률은 90%이상 입니다. 인테리어 소품이 여러가지 있습니다만 저희처럼 20개월의 아이와 함께 이용하기에는 오히려 매우 위험했습니다. 그리고 생각보다 모기가 많습니다. 문단속을 철저히 해야할 것 같습니다. 그리고 두개의 화장실 중 한개의 화장실 샤워기가 고장나서 씻는것이 매우 불편했습니다. 이는 반드시 고쳐야 할 사항입니다. 테이프로 감겨진것을 보아, 오래전부터 고장이 난듯한데.. 얼른 고쳐야 할 것 같습니다. 불편했던 점은 모기와 샤워기, 총 2개 입니다. 이를 제외한 나머지는 너무 좋았습니다.
즐거운 여행 되세요.

Howard was very thoughtful to describe everything about the condo and how to access from airport, from condo to beach, restaurants. And the place was exactly like the pictures nice and clean and great view! My friends and I enjoued it very much and loved this place. We hope we can visit someday again!

It was our family's first time in Maui, and we felt ourselves lucky to stay here during our week-long vacation. We never once had to contact the host during our stay, as everything was well explained before our trip and there was detailed instructions for everything left in the condo. Amenities in the unit (including the a/c, coffee maker, TV) worked great, the beds were comfortable, and we had a great sleep every night.

The photos of the condo grounds do not do it justice! The views from the Lanai are breathtaking, and the upkeep of the grounds are truly perfection. It does get windy in this area, but it's better than the light rain that the Northern part gets, and I would welcome the wind during the hot summer months. 

Our itinerary was full of activities (less beach-only activities), and the central location was perfect to travel to all our excursions (Lahaina, Road to Hana, Halaekala, etc). After long days of excursions, the central location and short ride home was so beneficial for us. For our beach days, it was only 10 min to get to the nice sandy beaches in Kihei.  My parents have a very particular palate, so we cooked a lot at home and put the large BBQ on the condo grounds and the rice cooker provided to good use. The unit had all the essentials we needed, and grocery stores were close by (Tip for (Website hidden by Airbnb) NOT go to the Korean grocery first. Go to Foodland first as their asian products, including rice and instant ramen, are a LOT cheaper). 

We had a great time, and our stay at Howard and Kathleen's condo really helped make our stay enjoyable.

We had a FANTASTIC time at Howard's place! The location is great, not too touristy, but very convenient. The balcony and bedroom overlook the ocean, and we could hear the waves all night with the window open. There's a pool, lawn, and BBQ at the facility too. 
The condo was completely clean, has all of the kitchen amenities you need (I recommend a run to Costco when you land), and he also provided TONS of resources for us. He gave restaurant recommendations, activities, directions, and even laminated info cards on the island. 
I highly recommend using Pacific Whale Foundation for all of your snorkeling and whale watching activities. They provide a great experience, and are around the corner (5 mins walking) from Howard's place.
He is a very forthcoming host, and not only was the communication above and beyond, accessing the place was really easy too. 
My group of 4 adults (2 couples) really enjoyed our stay, and Howard is one of the best hosts I've ever had the pleasure of dealing with on AirBNB. Howard and his condo are highly recommended!

Clean condo, looks just like the beautiful pictures. Everything worked no surprises. So happy with the accommodations for the beach, chairs umbrella cooler boogie boards. If ever we get the chance to go back this is definitely the place we will check on first. Walkable close to go on excursions.

Howard's condo is in a great location. Being situated between Lahaina, Kihei and Costco makes it quick and easy to go wherever you want for your daily adventures. As for the amenities, we had breakfast and dinner at our condo using all of the great cooking appliances, tools, and BBQ. The Lanai is perfectly situated looking out at the ocean, gardens, and pool. We had a fabulous time and would highly recommend this AirBnB.

The condo was very peaceful and relaxing. The area didn't have many people so it wasn't too loud or crowded. The people who were there were kind and friendly and makes you feel welcomed. The pool was never really crowded so it was easy to swim peacefully. and the view of the ocean was beautiful. It was nice sleeping to the sound of the ocean waves. overall it was a great experience and I would come back again.

The condo is right next to the shore and very close to the beach. The beach is clean and long. Good for playing, walking, swimming and other activities. You can even see turtles. 

Howard's information by email and his website and cards when you reach house helped us a lot to plan the vacation. 

The house has everything you would need to enjoy your vacation. Howard has taken care of equipping the kitchen with all the utensils and appliances. We were surprised to find boards, snorkeling equipment, beach seats and lot of towels. We will definitely come back to this condo when we come back to Maui.

This spot is perfect for your Maui vacation. The location could not be better. We were minutes from the airport and from the popular Lahaina beach! The view from the back patio was spectacular and we had everything we need to be comfortable. I would definitely recommend this spot and will stay here again on our next trip to Maui!

Howard was very friendly and helpful! He provided us with a lot of information on different things to do around the island and made our stay very comfortable. The condo was very clean and our view was spectacular! We saw many sea turtles along the beach which was fun! There were instructions given before our trip and for everything in the condo so there was no need to contact Howard at all during our stay. He was a great host and i would recommend his condo to anyone! Thanks Howard!

This is an amazing apartment in a great location!  There are a few things that make for this 5-star review:
1. Communication - we received a lot of great information about the apartment as well as about amenities in the building, in the area and Maui in general.  Everything was very clear and much appreciated!
2.  The apartment is beautiful, comfortable and clean.  As they say, the devil is in the details and Howard and Kathleen have thought of everything that you may possibly need to know about their property that will make for a pleasant stay including:
- where to go shopping (Costco by the airport!), 
- recommendations for restaurants and places to visit (they have a whole stack of laminated cards with every possible bit of info you may want/need to know about Maui, as well as several books - all very helpful since this was our first visit!).
- plenty of beach towels, as well as beach chairs, boogie boards, sand toys, etc!
- toiletries - we came prepared since we were not expecting (Website hidden by Airbnb) thoughtful!
3. We just loved Ma'alaea (sp?) - super centrally located in the island, quiet but close to "busyness" if that's what you're after.

We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay here again!  Wonderful experience all around!

Howard and his condo get a solid 5 stars from my family! We are so happy with our decision to stay at his condo versus a hotel.  Cleanliness was of utmost important to us and the condo exceeded our expectations!  Nothing was old, dingy, or smelly. Everything was clean, beautiful, and tactfully decorated.  You can tell that Howard has gone the extra-mile to make his guests feel at home.  The kitchen is well equipped with Cuisinart pots/pans, appliances, indoor and outdoor dishware/glassware etc.  The beds, linens, and towels were all very clean and comfortable.  He has laminated directions/maps to places of interest, restaurants, etc. which makes it easy when exploring Maui.  He also provides beach chairs, umbrellas, cooler, sand toys, snorkeling gear, pool toys, etc. so no need to worry about those things.  Communication with Howard was easy.  He was prompt with his replies and provided detailed information to all our questions. The condo is centrally located so it’s a 20-30 minute drive to most destinations, including the airport and Costco. There is a designated parking spot so there’s no need to hunt around for parking. It is a bit tight though, but a mid-size four door car will fit fine. The condo itself is located on a beautiful and peaceful property that was well-maintained and clean.  We started our day with breakfast on the lanai every morning.  In the evening, we enjoyed lounging on the lawn chairs while watching the waves and sea turtles.  At night, the stars are plentiful. There is also a heated pool that the kids loved.  It was never crowded. We sincerely enjoyed our stay here and if we’re lucky enough to visit again, we will definitely rent from Howard again. If you’re visiting Maui and looking for a clean, peaceful place with a gorgeous view, this condo is highly recommended!

location of the condo very idea. airport was not far. we went to lahaina and kihei easily. instructions were very clear. condo was very well kept.
would stay at howard's place again next time.

The apartment is excellent for a family of up to six . We had great time in the condo!Clean  and quite ,  we had everything we needed , great location +  I fully agree with all the other  reviews ! Don't miss the closed by Ocean center - interesting for the all family . This will be our place for our next visit to Maui ! Thanks Howard

Beautiful view, convenient location, very well maintained and cared for property, and a HEATED pool. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend it to others. There really were no surprises or disappointments. Maalaea is kind of between the typical tourist spots on Maui so expect to do a bit of driving but we didn't find that to be a burden.

Our stay at Howard’s Wailuku condo was fantastic. Great location so you are easily accessible to all parts of the island. The space is spacious and well kept. Perfect. For our family of 5. You will not be disappointed if you stay at this condo!
Excellent location, beautiful condo, wonderful service. Thanks so much!

Howard is a fantastic host.  He has a beautiful, clean condo with a priceless view.  The decor was lovely, accented with beautiful art, the kitchen was fully equipped.  What really makes Howard stand out as a host, however, is the wealth of information he put at our disposal about the area we were visiting, both before we arrived and in the unit, everything from where to shop to places to eat to detailed information on many local beaches, as well as directions/maps to any of these places.  We really enjoyed our stay at Howard's place.

We had a wonderful Christmas stay in Maui. The condo was perfect for our trip and the location to the harbor was amazing. We did whale watching and snorkeling trips, all which departed only 1 minute walk from the Condo. And we saw turtles from our balcony every day of our stay. Loved the General Store at the Harbor, great food, even gluten free options.

We enjoyed our stay and will be back. Thank you Howard.
Really love this Airbnb!! Really nice view of the ocean. Close to the airport and the mall. Would totally recommend to other travelers!!!

Space is fabulous! Great natural light, lots of windows, easy laundry use, we saw whales flipping and flopping all day every day.  The condo overlooks the pool and the ocean but we had no noise issues with the pool!  The condo is walking distance to the harbor for excursions and shopping, we loved the Maui Ocean Center, the Deli nearby has GREAT kombucha and tacos and my kids loved the red hot dogs. I would avoid BeachBums, the service was horrific! Oh and take a walk to the right of the condo and near the hidden beach, you'll see tons of surfing and chilling turtles.

All and all, we would totally visit again. Space is great, the amenities are thoughtful and useful and we really appreciated Howard's tips.
靠近浮潜观鲸出海码头,步行5分钟｡完美的度假体验,有游泳池｡房东热情详细的给予游玩建议,非常热情｡
Great central location for driving  anyway on Maui. Quiet condo complex.  Easy, convenient parking.  Can walk to a couple of good and fun restaurants.  Good floor plan for 2 couples.
Great place, great location, great host ! Highly recommended, you will enjoy your stay

The condo unit is as advertised. Very well appointed from condiments to beach equipment. Very nice quiet setting over looking the pool and ocean. Grounds very well kept. Enjoyed the lack of tourist noise and is very close to everything you want to go see. Separate master baths is a big plus for two couples traveling.

A delightful place to stay that is clean, great accommodations with many amenities specifically needed for beach & sun enjoyment, centrally located on beautiful grounds, and easily accessible. Hosts are wonderful at communications both pre- and post visit. Had a GREAT trip and highly recommend staying at this condo.

Beautiful condo. Great ammenities. Lovely views of the bay n mountains. A bit away from shops but as most people hire a vehicle in Maui, the location adds to an advantage if you can plan a little. I would love to stay again. Great.
깨끗하고 좋았습니다. 두 가족이 묶기에 아주 적합했고 위치도 좋았습니다. 주차공간에 다른 차가 주차되어 있어서 호스트에게 전화했으나 받지않았고 메시지 확인도 하지않아 답답했습니다.

Howard's place was the perfect place for exploring Maui. My friends and I were there for a wedding in Olowalu. We got there a few days early to explore Haleakala and some of the nearby beaches. The condo is perfectly located because it was so close to the highways and central in terms of which direction you want to go.

His place had coffee maker, beach towels and toys and a communal grill. There was also a nice outdoor area where we grilled and ate and had a few drinks while taking in the views of Haleakala. We couldn't have asked for a better stay.

Howard’s unit was very well kept up and clean, newer furniture, lots of pool and beach toys/accessories. Only downside is that the whole complex is older so noise between units, mainly through the windows, is not buffered very well. Also the AC unit is pretty loud, not an issue if you can sleep with ear plugs. Great location near the nicest beaches on Maui! Not a crowded or noisy area.

Sehr zu empfehlen, toller privater Pool der Anlage, sehr gut ausgestattetes Appartment (inkl. umfassenden Strandequipement, gute Verkehrsanbindung und die Insel-Hotspots sind in 15 Min erreichbar, Maui Aquarium und Hafen in Gehdistanz)

I highly recommend staying at Howards place. Waking up in the mornings was one of the best highlights of the day. The view is spectacular, peaceful and quiet.
The perfect location in Maui.  If you’re looking for peace, happiness and harmony this is the place.
Aloha
Alfonso Michelle Maylynn

We travel a lot internationally plus use AirBnB most of the time, Howard’s place was the closest we have ever experienced as being a home away from home. We loved the 2 bathrooms and open spaces. The beach down the street was great and having a full kitchen with everything in it was a blessing. We can’t wait to go back!!! 5 stars all the way!!!!

This is such an impressive place - well appointed, beautiful views, protected from the elements and a real home away from home. It had everything we needed when a hurricane warning came into effect. So instead of beaches and eating out, we relaxed in the condo, swam in the pool, watched the turtles playing in the sea, and ate on the lanai every evening. Great facilities and lots of well put together information to find everything we needed to stock up for the week. A jewel - and if you have to limit your activity in a storm warning I can't think of a better place. Had a marvellous stay. Would definitely go back. And how Iovely to get a call from the owner Howard, concerned for our safety - that was special.

The accommodations were as listed .....clean, well appointed and nice decor.  The grounds were very well kept and the view was fantastic. We enjoyed sitting in the lawn chairs at the water edge watching green turtles playing in the surf.  Although we encountered an issue with a water leak from the A/C unit  as soon as we contacted the property manager a technician was sent over to fix it.  The attentiveness of Howard and his agents helped ensure that we had a great time. My advice is if it’s available BOOK IT 

Mahalo
Great location with beautiful view.  Howard is a good host and great communicator.  Easy to work with.  Condo is perfect for four people.

Lovely home, suitable for our family with 2 small children. Great location, with an exceptional view. The pool is very nice and there is a small cove where you can play on the beach without a strong current. There were giant sea turtles along the wall you could watch for hours. 
The extra touches were extremely thoughtful - shampoo, conditioner, lotion, snacks and lots of helpful maps and information. 
The building manager helped with baby equipment rentals and had the equipment set up by the time we arrived. 
It couldn’t have been a more perfect stay!

Our first time ever to Hawaii and Howard made it easy with his quick responses with all our questions throughout the whole process. We had a few minor issues mid week but they were dealt with promptly. The pictures of the grounds/area do not do it justice... seeing is believing!  Would highly recommend Seascape Bar&Grill in Maalaea Village... great food and friendly attentive staff

Location, awesome views and a home away from home. This house is sparkling clean and has all necessary amenities. The description for this house is accurate. Stay here definitely exceeded our expectations. The house right next to the ocean with accessible beach. Howard is a great host, best in communication and responding quickly. He kept the communication on since we booked with detailed information. We really enjoyed our stay at this beautiful place.

The condo is spectacular in many ways, with one of the nicest pools and lawns  in the area. And the views of the coastline and Haleakala were breathtaking. Howard's communications about the unit and overall facility were wonderfully helpful and thorough. One member of our group had mobility issues and the conveniently nearby elevator was critical for us to be able to choose the preferred second-floor location. We very much enjoyed our week there (and we never did feel the need to turn on the AC). A few downsides: The kitchen was fairly well supplied but the location of items was somewhat disorganized for real cooking and serving and some of the equipment wasn’t found as clean as I’d like (I’m pretty fussy). The condo decor is attractive but included some big decorative bowls and urns that were in the way and a breakage worry. We were four adults and the condo was a comfortable space for us except for eating together,  which was a bit tight - the inside tabletop is small). The closets are packed with beach equipment that we made good use of and appreciated having on hand, despite the fact that it didn’t leave much usable closet space in one of the bedrooms.

Howard is the best AirBNB Host we have ever had. He was very fast to respond to all messages, including a request for early check-in that was sent to him last-minute. The apartment was spotless and well-equipped. The view is beautiful, and you can see whales at this time of year. The WiFi is good and the AC works well. There are also sea turtles that nap behind the apartment on the shore. I could not recommend staying here more.
ﾊﾞﾙｺﾆｰからｸｼﾞﾗも見れるいい環境でした!
Great place in the best location!

Great place to stay. The location is very convenient. One minute walk to aquarium. Two minutes walk to the whale watch stores, which makes morning whale watching very easy. We spent our first day on West, the second day whale watching and surfing, third day travel the east side. The apartment is in the middle south, making our travel to each side very efficient. The view from the balcony is wonderful, as shown in the picture. Comfortable beds!

name: Luxury Waterloo Apartment - Resort Style Living
summary: The perfect base for exploring the best Sydney has to offer! Perfectly located in the cosmopolitan suburb of Waterloo, 3.5km from Sydney CBD & one stop from Sydney Airport & Central Stations. Experience a relaxing stay in our stylish apartment featuring an abundance of space & natural light. Enjoy convenient access to everything you love with resort style living. You’ll love our place for the location, the facilities & the neighbourhood. Great for a small family, couples, & business travellers.
space: Welcome to the comfort of our beautiful, stylish and spacious apartment home, with all of the amenities of resort style living.  Nestled in the cosmopolitan suburb of Waterloo, explore Sydney's most iconic landmarks from the Sydney Harbour Bridge to the Opera House, or venture out to the spectacular eastern suburbs beaches, then head home after a day of adventure for a dip in the outdoor lap pool and a sizzling BBQ on your open air private balcony. Our modern, open plan apartment features a large master bedroom with built in robes and ensuite. Second bedroom with built in robes and main bathroom. Laundry facilities, air conditioning, onsite gym and swimming pool.  There is also a 42" TV in the living room and panasonic music player. The kitchen has everything you would need to cook with. But there's plenty of eateries to tempt your tastebuds right on your doorstep!
description: The perfect base for exploring the best Sydney has to offer! Perfectly located in the cosmopolitan suburb of Waterloo, 3.5km from Sydney CBD & one stop from Sydney Airport & Central Stations. You’ll love our place for the location, the facilities & the neighbourhood. Great for a small family, couples, & business travellers. Welcome to the comfort of our beautiful, stylish and spacious apartment home, with all of the amenities of resort style living.  Nestled in the cosmopolitan suburb of Waterloo, explore Sydney's most iconic landmarks from the Sydney Harbour Bridge to the Opera House, or venture out to the spectacular eastern suburbs beaches, then head home after a day of adventure for a dip in the outdoor lap pool and a sizzling BBQ on your open air private balcony. Our modern, open plan apartment features a larg
neighborhood_overview: Location and lifestyle are at the forefront of this resort style stay and access to everything you love is at your doorstep. Around the building you'll find the Danks Street cafe and gallery strip, the East Village Shopping Centre as well as a range of Thai, Sushi, Mexican and Italian eateries, plus a gourmet grocery store on the ground floor.
notes: There is a construction site next door. Working hours are 7:30am - 4:00pm. As the apartment block is less than 3 years old the latest in insulation and design means the noise is minimal. We also dog sit my mum's cavoodle occasionally. He is hyper-allergic, but may not suit guests with extreme allergies.
transit: You'll love the convenient location of our apartment! Just 3.5km from Sydney CBD and iconic landmarks such as the Sydney Harbour Bridge, Opera House and The historic Rocks.  Buses depart from Bourke Street (directly in front of the complex) into Sydney, and surrounding beaches. Or Green Square Station is just an 8-min stroll away. Hop on the train to reach Central Station or Sydney Airport in just one stop!
access: You will have private access to the entire apartment. Plus unrestricted access to all of the onsite amenities of this resort style complex including central courtyard featuring outdoor lap pool, cabanas and picnic benches, plus air-conditioned gym.
interaction: We will be to ensure you receive a smooth check-in and check-out. We may not be available in person during your stay, however we are available via airbnb anytime to give some local recommendations for restaurants and bars in the area.

reviews.comments: Aimee & Dan's place is located in a vibrant part of the city. A walk or short bike or bus ride to many of the attractions on offer. Particularly good for attending any concert or sporting event at Alliance or Sydney Cricket ground.  The apartment is stylish providing all the comforts of home. The facilities are amazing with a gym and pool in the complex and many restaurants & cafes just downstairs. Thank you for sharing your home Aimee & Dan.

name: PRETTY ROOM IN BARCELONA-A/C-NEAR PLAZA ESPAÑA
summary: Private room with a bed (1.50x1.90) and a large closet, next to the bathroom, which is shared with me (I live in the apartment). The apartment is completely renovated recently. There is a lock on the door, linens, towel, shampoo and shower gel, hair dryer, Wifi and air conditioning of cold and heat. In this same apartment there is another room available on Airbnb. Request more information here: https://www.airbnb.es/rooms/17016924.
space: The apartment is located in the Sant Antoni neighborhood, very close to the Sant Antoni Market, the Plaza de España, the Arenas Shopping Center, the Montjuïc Park and the Barcelona Fair. You can visit the recently renovated Sant Antoni Market, the Boquería Market and the historic center of Barcelona, since there is very good communication with Metro and Bus, both day and night. Also well connected to the El Prat airport and Sants train station.
description: Private room with a bed (1.50x1.90) and a large closet, next to the bathroom, which is shared with me (I live in the apartment). The apartment is completely renovated recently. There is a lock on the door, linens, towel, shampoo and shower gel, hair dryer, Wifi and air conditioning of cold and heat. In this same apartment there is another room available on Airbnb. Request more information here: https://www.airbnb.es/rooms/17016924. The apartment is located in the Sant Antoni neighborhood, very close to the Sant Antoni Market, the Plaza de España, the Arenas Shopping Center, the Montjuïc Park and the Barcelona Fair. You can visit the recently renovated Sant Antoni Market, the Boquería Market and the historic center of Barcelona, since there is very good communication with Metro and Bus, both day and night. Also well connected to the El Prat airport and Sants train station. The apartment is totally renovated recently. It has 100 square meters distributed in: kitchen, living room and a te
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located next to the Plaza de España, Montjuic Park and the old Plaza de las Arenas now a large shopping center.  Also near of the Barcelona Fair.  Well connected to El Prat airport and Sants train station. The neighborhood has many shops, bars and restaurants.
notes: The use of the kitchen to prepare food should be very limited: prepare coffee, use the toaster, and heat food in a microwave. Making great culinary dishes is not an option. Of course, you can use the fridge. It is important not to have breakfast, lunch or dinner inside the room. Guests have the kitchen and dining room available to enjoy those moments If there is any question that does not please the guests, please contact me.
transit: To get to the historical center of Barcelona, there are two metro lines (red and green) very close to the apartment, which take you to Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter in less than 10 minutes. The apartment is very close to Gran Vía and there you can take city buses (also night) to Plaza Universidad and Plaza Catalunya. The journey takes about 10 minutes.
access: The apartment is totally renovated recently. It has 100 square meters distributed in: kitchen, living room and a terrace, two bathrooms and three double bedrooms. Two of those rooms are offered on Airbnb. The third is the one that I use, because I live in the apartment. There is hot and cold air conditioning in the bedrooms and in the dining room. There is also heating with radiators. HOUSE'S RULES -TIME OF ENTRY TO DISPOSE OF THE ROOM: 12.00 A.M.  -TIME OF DEPARTURE FROM THE ROOM: 10.00 A.M.  -YOU CAN NOT BREAKFAST. NEITHER EAT, OR DINNER WITHIN THE ROOM. THE GUESTS HAVE THE KITCHEN AND THE DINING ROOM FOR IT. -REASONABLY KEEP THE ROOM AND BATH CLEAN AFTER USE.  -PLEASE REMEMBER TO LEAVE THE LIGHTS OFF, BOTH DAY AND NIGHT.  -WE PRAY TO YOU BE SILENT AND RESPECTFUL WITH THE REST OF OTHERS WHEN YOU ARRIVE AT NIGHT.
interaction: My son Daniel lives in the apartment and he will be available to receive you and for whatever you need.
house_rules: Los huéspedes no pueden hacer uso de la lavadora. Tampoco se permite comer en el interior de las habitaciones. Los huéspedes tienen la cocina, el salón-comedor y la terraza para poder desayunar, comer y cenar.

host.host_about: Soy  Daniel y vivo en el apartamento donde tengo dos habitaciones alquiladas. Me gusta mucho tener huéspedes de todo el mundo y soy muy sociable.

name: Rattan
summary: Silent room Comfortable
description: Silent room Comfortable Interesting area Authentic Hong Kong Close to Sham Shui Po mtr station and bus stops
neighborhood_overview: Interesting area Authentic Hong Kong

host.host_about:
Sometimes this is a deal.

Sometimes this is friendship.

Sometimes this is a disaster.

This is life.

Welcome to Hong Kong.

reviews.comments: Very nice place!

Steve's directions to his place where excellent and he was very accommodating with my early check in! I stayed at his for a month whilst I looked for long term accommodation in HK . his flat mate was lovely and gave me medican when I was sick! sham Shui Po is a very convenient area for both central and new territories (where I was working) there's lots of street food and cheap shopping. It is an old building though and a relatively cheap air b and b for Hong Kong so if you remember that you won't be disappointed.

name: Ribeira Trendy Apartment
summary: Em pleno Centro Histórico do Porto, na Ribeira, situa-se o novo e recém lançado, Ribeira Trendy Apartment.
space: Pensado para quem privilegia a mais histórica localização, proximidade do rio, restaurantes e  pontos turísticos, o Ribeira Trendy Apartment, está inserido num prédio centenário, estando o apartamento totalmente remodelado e decorado com elegância, conforto e com tudo o que necessita para ter uma fantástica estadia.   Acomoda com privacidade 4 hóspedes, 2 em cama de casal no quarto principal e 2 em sofá cama, em divisão fechada.   A sala de jantar e de estar são integradas com a kitchenette, permitindo um maior convívio entre todos, estando disponível no apartamento tudo o que irão necessitar para as refeições.   Iremos recebê-lo com uma garrafa de vinho tinto do Douro, para que, desfrutando de uma magnífica vista para o Palácio da Bolsa e Praça do Infante D. Henrique, brinde, de forma inesquecível, à sua viagem ao Porto.

neighborhood_overview: A poucos passos da emblemática praça Infante D. Henrique — que rende homenagem à mais importante figura do início dos descobrimentos portugueses — que, segundo a tradição, terá nascido nas proximidades, na chamada Casa do Infante, em 1394.
notes: Check in após das 19H ás 24H, com custo adicional de €10, sendo que, após as 24H esse valor é de €25.

reviews.comments: We are very grateful for the hospitality. The location is great as it is very close to the most emblematic areas. The house was very clean and well equipped.

Love the location, near to the docks and the bridge! Thankful for the lift, especially im traveling with my elderly parents. Fantastic hidden restaurant nearby. Host Miguel is extremely responsive and hospitable, often checking on my flight arrival to allow us early check in and accomodated to our late check out. When we had drainage issues with the toilet, he came down on the same day to clean up for us! He will also give good recommendations! We all had a great stay! Thank you Miguel!

We were pleasantly surprised when we arrived at the apartment in Porto. The place is newly renovated, very clean and equipped with everything you need (including all necessary kitchen and bathroom amenities). It is also located in the perfect place, close to the Riviera and is only a short walk from the centre of Porto. Miguel was extremely helpful and a great host. 
I would definitely stay here again in the future!
Nice location, Easy access. Porto is lovely

Amazing location and beautiful apartment. It was cosy, clean and bright. At first we realised there wasn’t an air condition or fan and were a bit concern but it was so breezy and chill that we actually ended up needing a blanket. Willian was great and met us on time and when we had an issue with the WiFi he contacted us immediately and helped us. The issue was just due to the Festival of Sao Joao sothe whole town had poor WiFi. Otherwise the WiFi was great for the rest of the trip! Beautiful place to explore the city as you could walk everywhere from the location!

This apartment was wonderful for our three days in Porto. I booked it very last minute and Marta was very responsive right away! Communication was easy and we were able to check in early which was amazing after a long flight. The location is amazing- just steps to the water but also just steps in the other direction to local bars and cafes. Check in was so easy- Willian met us and gave us all the information we needed. The apartment itself is lovely and perfect for 2-4 people. A wonderful trip to Porto!
不错的房子

It was a unique experience staying in this apartment. It's just like in the photos. Comfortable, clean and close to everything the city has to offer. Marta's team was exceptional. Always present and available, making the experience even more incredible.
I will certainly return to stay in this apartment.
Thank you so much for everything.

name: Quite Family Retreat
summary: Newly renovated, comfortable family retreat. No Parties Allowed, quite hours after 10pm! Condo/Townhouse :3bdrm on the 2nd floor and the basement gives you plenty of sleeping and living space. 1 Bathroom on 2nd floor and Powder room on the 1st floor. Electric Fireplace ads up an ambiance to this cozy living area. Little backyard facing inside yard, and allowing little privacy for your family "sejour" Close by the Hwy, groceries and restaurants. 1 Parking spot in front of the entrance. Enjoy!!!
space: Cozy and lovely Townhouse,  Located In the western part of Montreal, 25 min to down town, 14 min from Airport, in quite neighbourhood. Close to shopping malls, transportation, groceries, Bois-de-Liesse Nature Park, and anything you need is nearby.

Close to shopping malls, transportation, groceries, Bois-de-Liesse Nature Park, and anything you need is nearby.
notes: 1 bedroom has queen bed 2 other bedrooms has 2 single beds(even though it looks like kid’s “car” beds- it’s a regular/ adult single bed mattresses)  In the basement you’ll find sofa-bed, making another double bed, and in the basement closet you’ll find Queen size inflatable mattress.   Parking spot is number 538
transit: There are 356 or 209 buses that could bring you to Airport or Downtown, as well as Roxboro Train Station near by. Many parks in proximity, like Bois-de-Liesse Nature Park. CF Fairview Pointe Claire- shopping mall.

reviews.comments: Lana's place was very beautiful and close to the city. We loved staying at her house and she was very helpful with any questions we had during our stay.

Though we appreciated the comfortable beds in this home, we likely wouldn't stay here again.  The home doesn't have a bathtub (it's not the host's fault.. it's not advertised as having a bathtub.. I simply assumed it would) and for our entire weeklong stay we either weren't given the key for the laundry room, or the one washing machine in the laundry room wasn't working.  For a family with 2 young kids, this was unfortunate.  The kitchen is modestly equipped, and there are a few little broken things throughout the unit.  We're grateful for Lana's hospitality, but this just wasn't the right fit for us.

This is a great space! Very clean and plenty of room to spread out. Lana is very responsive and attentive to anything that came up during our stay! The self check-in and check-out were convenient for our late arrival time. Would definitely recommend!
Lana's place was clean and as advertised. She is responsive and helpful.
Very nice space, we were 4 guys and had ample room for everything that we wanted to do.  Host was great, always quick to reply.

Lana's place was perfect for what my family needed for a long weekend trip. Communication with Lana was very easy and she always responded right away! Being that we didn't know exactly what time we would be arriving the self check-in was great! The place was clean and had lots of space for 4 adults to stay comfortably.

Lana's place was perfect. Exactly as described and super clean. Lana was awesome with answering questions quickly and her place felt like a home away from home. I would definitely recommend and would stay there myself again.
Will be back for sure.
I have been living in the place for two months. Lana is a very enthusiastic and careful host. It was a great experience for family. Thanks for everything.
Hermosa casa :)

We were disappointed with our stay in Lana's place. Although Lana was quite friendly and responsive, there were many things wrong with the place which made our stay unpleasant. First, the location is very inconvenient as it is far from downtown and in quite a bad area without many things nearby. Next, the actual place itsef did not look as nice as it did in the pictures. The bathroom and living room was smaller than expected. Worse of all, there was no drawers or tables in the bedroom forcing us to put our things on the floor. In the morning, we couldn't sleep as there were no blinds closing the window, only a sheer cloth. When we tried to cook, the dishes and pans were unwashed. Overall, we were very disappointed and would not stay again.
Amazing place! Thanks Lana!
Lana’s place was beautiful and had everything we needed. It was clean and inviting and my family and I would not hesitate to return should the opportunity arise!

We had a great stay at Lana’s place. Lana is an amazing host, who is extremely responsive.

The place was amazing and is a relatively convenient location. The place was stylish and clean. We are especially happy to have the kids room. My daughter love it.

Lana was a perfect host - provided bottled water, coffee, tea, and chocolate croissants! She responded quickly to all our needs and let us check in a few hours early. The Airbnb was extremely clean and very updated and modern. It is located about 30 mins (driving) from Downtown Montreal and wouldn’t recommend this place if you were planning to use the public transit (1.5 hours) My friends and I enjoyed our stay very much and would come back here again!

Very clean home and just as described. A bit difficult to find at first.
I would give it a 10 star if they were available!
that's a really nice house for stay, very clean and modern decoration. its close to shopping center. three bed room and big living room for family...

Thank you very much for the rest in your house! We are very happy to have chosen him. Lana is a very good housewife, there is everything necessary for living in the house, we will happily come to you again.
Maison fidèle a la description, calme, décoration moderne et très propre.

The place is very nice, exactly as advertised. 
Lana was very helpful and responsive.

It is good place as Airbnb , modern kitchen , great communication , clean , water and food as cereal coffee in place 
Well organized . Only the sofa is not really confortable to watch Tv . Good place 
Thank you Lana
Great experience!

This was our first experience with an Airbnb and Lana's place was perfect. I'm very particular about cleanliness as well as the quality of bedding and it was all perfect.  The townhouse is newly renovated and looks fabulous and the quality of the sheets on the beds as well as having duvets was very much appreciated.  My husband  along with my two teenage boys were very happy  that everyone had their own space . Lana was great with her quick responses when I had a question. I would definitely recommend Lana's place! Thank you Lana for a fabulous stay!

Lana’s townhouse was a perfect place for our family to stay while we visited family in the West Island.  Don’t be fooled by the outside of the building - the inside has been updated wonderfully. Access and location was easy and central to everything we needed. Perfect for our family of 4. Kids had their own rooms and they loved the toys and the Fooze Ball table! I can’t imagine spending more per night to stay in a tiny hotel room for 5 days. We will definitely be back!
Lanas place was great and very spacious
This was a wonderful spot close to great shopping for basics. It was clean and beautiful. Our host was responsive and helpful. The townhome complex was quiet with some green space.
The place was was very spacious, clean and confortable. The host was very responsive to everything we asked and needed. We enjoyed our stay at Lana's

Lana is a very responsive and pleasant host; and provided clean bedrooms and bathrooms. The rooms were comfortable, the Home was quiet and at a convenient location to grocery stores and other shops, located approximately 25min outside the city. The kitchen and living rooms were very spacious and updated. My family enjoyed our stay, and would definitely book again!

name: Classic Inner City Hideaway
summary: A beautiful apartment situated in a leafy gated community on the fringe of Rushcutters Bay and Sydney CBD. This peaceful inner city hideaway is securely elevated upon the top floor of a boutique building. Welcoming an abundance of natural light, the classic art deco apartment comes fully furnished. Modern kitchen with dishwasher, stunning bathroom, internal laundry with washer/dryer, built ins in main bedroom, beautifully furnished throughout.  Unmatched for convenience & close to everything.
space: The apartment is a short stroll to Kings Cross and one train stop from the Sydney CBD.  There is an abundance of coffee shops, bars, restaurants, pubs and clubs a stone throw from the apartment, yet the apartment itself is quiet and peaceful at all hours of the day.
description: A beautiful apartment situated in a leafy gated community on the fringe of Rushcutters Bay and Sydney CBD. This peaceful inner city hideaway is securely elevated upon the top floor of a boutique building. Welcoming an abundance of natural light, the classic art deco apartment comes fully furnished. Modern kitchen with dishwasher, stunning bathroom, internal laundry with washer/dryer, built ins in main bedroom, beautifully furnished throughout.  Unmatched for convenience & close to everything. The apartment is a short stroll to Kings Cross and one train stop from the Sydney CBD.  There is an abundance of coffee shops, bars, restaurants, pubs and clubs a stone throw from the apartment, yet the apartment itself is quiet and peaceful at all hours of the day. Guests are able to use the laundromat on the roof of the building. However, the apartment has its own washer/dryer combination. I live across the road from the apartment and I’m available to guests should they have any questions or hav
neighborhood_overview: The location is so convenient with so much to see and do. Sample the local wine and beers, do a Sydney Double Decker Bus tour (stop just around the corner),  check out the local markets, go and see a live band / show - it’s all within a short walking distance from apartment’s front door.
notes: Get to know the local markets, great shopping, food and culture which is all around you in what many describe as being the heart of Sydney.  Get a train or walk into the city or make your way down to Bondi Beach which is only a $15 Uber ride away.
transit: Uber, train, bus - public transport is everywhere and easy to access and cheap! But as the apartment is in the centre of everything, walking is probably the best and easiest option.
access: Guests are able to use the laundromat on the roof of the building. However, the apartment has its own washer/dryer combination.
interaction: I live across the road from the apartment and I’m available to guests should they have any questions or have issues.
house_rules: Rooftop is for laundry access only

reviews.comments: Nice & clean, great location with easy walking access to the city, harbour & train station. Thanks again.
Good spot at a great location, next to train station and a few bus stops, great restaurants and bars, 20 minutes away from the CBD.

Lachlan's place is great located surrounded by coffee shops, bars and restaurants. Train station and supermarket is around the corner. The interior has been simple. However, the entrance walk way through the tropical jungle was quite impressive and unexpected. Furthermore, the appartment includes a nice roof terrace to hang washing :) Lachlan is an awesome host and very supportive and care taking. All in all it was a great experience and I would recommend it.

Great spot - 5 mins walk to Kings Cross station, buses, 20 minute walk to City.  

Restaurants, cafes, bars all in close proximity. Lachlan the host, was obliging, friendly, helpful and checking in was easy

Was a little bit of noise from Main Street late at night (but you have to expect that in a central location) and from 7am onwards due to construction works (guess this is temporary). 

Overall enjoyed our stay and great value for money
Thanks you. Just no WiFi in apartment and the kitchen was no equipped ( no casserole, salad bowl...)
Great location only few minutes from Kings Cross station yet quiet and peaceful. Coffee shop few doors up the street is also worthwhile.
Good location and space. Lachlan was very friendly and on time when we arranged check in.

Location: It is very good location only a few minutes from Kings Cross station, so you can go everywhere in a couple of minutes. 
Apartment: Clean, comfy and has everything that you can need.
Owner: Very friendly,  has a helpful attitude and assists you in whatever you need.
So triple check = 100% recommended

Fantastic place, Lachlan (the host) is a top bloke, very helpful and accommodating. Have an awesome time

Cheers mate! :-)

El departamento es amplio y es perfecto para 3 personas que estan de vacaciones . La zona esta muy buena ya que hay buenos bares y restaurants. Esta a 15/20 min caminando del centro de la ciudad. Un supermercado esta a 200 metros. Realmente si vuelvo a Sydney, volvería al mismo lugar.

Stayed at Lachlan’s place for a work trip for a week. The location is perfect only a 20min walk to the city and after work locally there are so many restaurants and things to do that it couldn’t have been better. The place is clean and exactly as the pictures show it to be. Lachlan was available for anything we needed. I would recommend this place to anyone and would definitely stay here again!

My parents and I stayed at Lachland’s place for 3 nights to visit Sydney and the surrounding and the location was just perfect! Close to restaurant, cafes, shops and the train station. Communication with Lachlan was really good and he is very nice and friendly! The place was neat, however the kitchen was poorly equipped, we had only one toilet paper roll for the length of our stay and the beds very very uncomfortable. Generally speaking the place was good and I would recommend it for a short stay in Syndey!

Lachlan is a great host! Easy to contact and quick responses. The apartment is amazing to stay in. Close to all you need and far away to have a peaceful stay. Definitely a recommendation to enjoy your stay in Sydney!
The flat is near KingsCrossStation. Supermarket and Restaurants are near. The Host helps to enjoy the stay.

We really liked Lachlan's apartment. Lachlan was very helpful and responsive. The location is about half way between the Rocks and Bondi beach which was nice. The only complaint was we were there in winter and the nights were very cold and there was no central heating and we only had one small space heater to heat four rooms. Otherwise, highly recommended.
This apartment is a great one if you want to explore Sydney for a few days. Close to Kings Cross station and supermarkets, bars etc.
Lachlan is a terrific host. Amiable and kind. His location is right in the heart of a bustling town.  So close to everything.
The location is very nice!
Great location and amenities for a short stay very close to central Sydney. Easy check in and out plus great local shops and eateries

A perfect, central location and very clean and spacious apartment. 

Lachlan’s communication was excellent and he was really helpful and accommodating. 

Would definitely recommend as a great base for a Sydney trip!
A great apartment in a great location. It is within walking distance of the harbour and also very close to Kings Cross station. The rooms were comfortable.
Great location near Kong’s cross with plenty of places to eat nearby. I felt like I was able to escape the city and relax without really leaving the city.
Great value for money given the location. Super close to the train station and local groceries. I’d definitely live here again!
Very close to city centre!

The location was perfect, very central with great public transport near by. After some understandable complications with check in, Lachlan went above and beyond to make things up to us and ensure we had the best stay possible in Sydney. We would 100% go back.
super easy check in and a really nice spot and location, highly recommended!!

Very nice flat in a very good location .
Close to the city center.
Great location - very short walk to kings cross station. Apartment is fully furnished - nothing fancy but all you really need.

Lachlan's place is great. It's in King's Cross, which used to be the area to go out clubbing, but is now getting to be a bit more relaxed. The apartment itself is really nice, clean, and fairly large. Lachlan was extremely quick and helpful with his responses. Check in and check out were a breeze. Everything was great, except for the dryer in the apartment. If you do laundry, I recommend hanging the clothes out on the line on the roof.
Appartement très bien situé.
Really nice location and very comfortable apartment! Perfect

Great location and easy as well as friendly communication. Very supportive in terms of making sure we had everything we needed since there were e.g. not enough glasses for the three of us. Windows were not opening/closing properly but even though Lachlan offered to get them fixed during our stay, we agreed fixing them after would be alright. All in all, awesome location and great host!

Really fantastic location, super close and accessible to the city, kings cross, bondi beach, and local amenities like a super market. However, there is no proper ventilation so the room becomes very stuffy and hot during the day and evening.
Centrally located, nice host, but not quite what we were expecting.....
The bnb is conveniently located. And the host is helpful.
Très bonne localisation ! Appartement propre et équipé du nécessaire.

name: Doble room in the heart of BCN - Born
summary: El piso se encuentra en el centro de Barcelona, detras al Mercado de Santa Caterina y con vista panoramica en este ultimo. Es recien reformado con muebles nuevos y ventana doble vidrio. Tiene en tres habitaciones, baño, cocina y un salòn con vista panoramica. La habitacion es amplia y luminosa.
description: El piso se encuentra en el centro de Barcelona, detras al Mercado de Santa Caterina y con vista panoramica en este ultimo. Es recien reformado con muebles nuevos y ventana doble vidrio. Tiene en tres habitaciones, baño, cocina y un salòn con vista panoramica. La habitacion es amplia y luminosa.

address.government_area: Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera

name: COPACABANA DREAM
summary: Apartamento super novo, bem localizado, compacto e bem decorado , no coração de Copacabana, rua nobre, posto 4, vasto comercio, repleta de bares e bons restaurantes a duas quadras da praia e a duas quadras e meia do metrô. Possui internet móvel de 10MB.
description: Apartamento super novo, bem localizado, compacto e bem decorado , no coração de Copacabana, rua nobre, posto 4, vasto comercio, repleta de bares e bons restaurantes a duas quadras da praia e a duas quadras e meia do metrô. Possui internet móvel de 10MB.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Atuo na área do turismo há 12 anos e o destino me levou a investir no mercado imobiliário, pelo qual não me arrependo nem um pouco.
As duas atividades me renderam altíssimo conhecimento de vida e relacionamento com o próximo e a importância da hospitalidade .

reviews.comments: We have a wonderful vacation on Rio and Ricardo was a great host, the apartment is near a lot of interesting places, is clean,  nice and cozy,  and the price is good, looking forward for another trip to Rio

La mejor experiencia que pudimos tener, el departamento exelente como mediciones limpieza y (Website hidden by Airbnb) hospitalidad de Ricardo inmejorable y muy atento...lo recontra super recomendamos!!!
Foi otima a minha estadia ai!!! Obrigada!
Lindo lugar, recomendable 100%
Great stay! Would come here again, close to everything and the sushi bar in the street is amazing!

Excelente ubicación, organizado y  limpio, las   recomendaciones realizadas por el anfitrión son muy buenas por q habla español. comunicación excelente.  Nos gusto mucho por q esta cerca a todo restaurantes,  playa metro
La ubicación es excelente tanto así la atención de Ricardo. Lo único para mejorar es la cantidad de untensillos de cocina, lo demás todo bien
Lugar maravilhoso, bem localizado Próximo de tudo, apartamento limpo e aconchegante, tudo de ótimo gosto, ameiii. Parabéns
ótima hospedagem, tudo limpo, organizado e confortável. Além de uma ótima localização!
O apartamento condiz com as fotos, ótima localização! Bem limpo e confortável.
El departamento de Ricardo es tal cual se ve en las fotografias, esta muy bien ubicado, tiene todo lo justo y necesario para pasar una estadia de descanzo en Copacabana, lo recomiendo

Excelente ubicación, muy tranquilo. En perfectas condiciones el apartamento, quizás falta algunos utensilios de cocina, solo para mejorarla, ya que  estaba todo lo justo y necesario. Excelente comunicación con Ricardo, muy rápida y aparte habla español.

El alojamiento es tan cual como se ve en las fotos. Todo impecable, limpio y super prolijo.
 Llegamos a la madrugada y el portero nos dio las llaves sin problema.
 Lo único negativo es que la cama es muy chica y dura. Lo demás, genial. Saludos
Hospedagem em local que permite fácil acesso aos principais pontos turísticos da cidade. O apartamento estava em boas condições e o anfitrião foi flexível e disponível quando precisei.
El depto se ve tal cual las fotos! Tiene una excelente ubicación. Todo muy limpio. Lo recomiendo!

name: Sea View Ancient Chinese Style Two Rooms Suite
summary: Our Apartment is located by the sea at Lantau Island with a fantastic sea view. You can get there by a 15 minute boat ride from Cheung Chau for free. The whole apartment is furnished with Ancient Chinese style furniture.  There are 2 bedrooms each with a Queen sized bed. One of the bedrooms has a private bathroom. Guests can also use our kitchen to cook and prepare food. The whole place has air-conditioning available.
space: In this 822 sq ft apartment, there is a spacious living room and dining area with sofa, armchairs and a big dining table. There are 2 bedrooms each with a Queen size bed and a big windowsill for our guests to chill and relax with sea/mountain view.  There are 2 bathrooms in the apartment, one in the living room and the other one is inside one of the bedrooms. The bathroom is newly renovated with hot shower. There is a kitchen with fridge, microwave and electronic stove where our guest can cook and prepare meals of their choices.

The whole apartment is furnished with Ancient Chinese style furniture.  There are 2 bedrooms each with a Queen sized bed. One of the bedrooms has a private bathroom. Guests can also use our kitchen to cook and prepare food. The whole place has air-conditioning available.
