There is a kitchen with fridge, microwave and electronic stove where our guest can cook and prepare meals of their choices. You can contact us through phone or email o
notes: 1) Security Deposit for this apartment: $1000HKD, cash only Guest is required to pay a Security Deposit to cover incidental charges to your apartment upon Check-In. The Deposit will be given back to guests upon check-out if the apartment is in good condition. 2)Rental fee of towels: $20HKD per towel
transit: From the Airport, take the airport express and alight at Hong Kong Station. From there you take the F exit and you can easily walk to the Central Pier No.5 to take the ferry to Cheung Chau Island. Once you arrive at the Cheung Chau pier then our staff will be there waiting for you to take you on another 15min ferry to get to the area.  Please make prior arrangement with our staff to pick you up from the Cheung Chau pier.
interaction: You can contact us through phone or email or social media anytime and we will reply you within the next 24 hours.
house_rules: - Quite Hours between 11pm - 6am - Checkout Time is 11am

host.host_about: The Cove Hostel

address.street: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The place is an Oasis. Its quiet, unique and very rare in Hong Kong. Distance from Cheung Chau around 25 mins. The hoster and his helper are very helpful, very good communication and careful arrangement of everything. Highly recommended!!

name: Lovely Apartment
space: Travel to an amazing part of Brooklyn- Here you will find the Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, the Botanical Gardens and a slew of restaurants that will satisfy any palette. All less than a 5min walk from the apartment.  Subway lines are close by- within a 5 -10 minute walk to the 2, 3, Q, B, A, C.  The apartment is cozy and warm. It is great for couples or families. The unit is equip with Wi-Fi, Cable, TV and a full Kitchen.
description: Travel to an amazing part of Brooklyn- Here you will find the Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, the Botanical Gardens and a slew of restaurants that will satisfy any palette. All less than a 5min walk from the apartment.  Subway lines are close by- within a 5 -10 minute walk to the 2, 3, Q, B, A, C.  The apartment is cozy and warm. It is great for couples or families. The unit is equip with Wi-Fi, Cable, TV and a full Kitchen.

host.host_about: I am a costumer in theater, tv/film.

reviews.comments: We had a wonderful time at Rosalynn place. The apartment is awesome and well located. The neighbourhood is nice and just near the Prospect Park which was really cool to go running in the morning. Rosalynn was a great hostess, she really cared for our well-being, it shows in the little details that makes you feel at home.

The appartment of Rosalynn is wonderful, very cosy and nice. You feel at home. Rosalynn provided us with a lot of good tips and informations. Also the location of Brooklynn was marvalous and a verry good starting point for all who visits NYC for first time. At neihborhoods you can find shops and restaurants but also museum and botanic garden and the acadamy of music and you are very close to subway station. We hope to come back soon.

I booked Rosalynn place for my mum and sister coming to visit us in Brooklyn. She has been a perfect host and her place is beautiful, clean and cosy and located near major attraction such as the fantastic botanical  garden. Thank you very much Rosalynn

Rosalynn was such a great host! My parents got a bit lost on their way there and she sent a cab for them, and when one of the pipes leaked under the kitchen sink she had someone up to look at it within hours. The apartment was indeed lovely and beautifully decorated. It's literally a stone's throw from Prospect Park though getting to Park Slope is a bit of a hike - it's about a mile to 5th Ave. Thanks Rosalynn!

Rosalynn was so generous and helpful from beginning to end - starting with graciously making sure that our four-hour-delayed flight (landing at 1am) didn't affect us getting our key. 

The apartment is adorable and cozy and clean. Everything you could want. Rosalynn's place has all the amenities one needs - and the bed was super comfortable!

The apartment has a great location, it has two tubes with three direct lines to Manhattan, so you don´t have to be changing line and in just 15-20 minutes you are already in the heart of NYC.
The area is very quiet and safe, we were with our baby and it didn´t feel insecure at all. It has few things and places to see around; like a museum and a beautiful park. It is nice to go for a walk also. Just beside the apartment has very nice coffees and restaurants, and it is full of shops where you can find anything. It is also very alive, during the week we were in there, there were so many things to do! A carnival, a night opened at the museum, a couple of gigs... 
Rosalyn did few groceries for us, she is very friendly and responds fast when you contact her and very honest. She was also very flexible with the check out time as we had a late flight.

Rosalynn has been super nice and flexible. I modified my trip during my stay at her place cutting it by 2 weeks without problems. The apartament is located near prospect park and it took me about 25 minutes to get to Union Square from there. It was clean and fully equipped.
I can definitely recommend it.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is a great neighborhood in Brooklyn.  It is convenient to so many local activities and Manhattan.  We felt safe at all times.  Rosalynn's apartment was very clean and quiet.  There are some lovely decorative touches.  The only negative thing I have to say is directed to my husband and myself...we are getting a little old for a 4 floor walk up!

Cozy, clean, beautiful and unique home. Cool cafe right across the street (but get up early - otherwise, there will be a wait). Super close to awesome Brooklyn sites and neighborhoods, and, of course, the park - but the street is very quiet. And, Rosalynn met us when we arrived in the middle of the night! Loved our stay. Recommend!

Rosalynn was so gracious! She recommended some great restaurants & activities and check in to her place was super easy.  She really made us feel at home in her space.
The location could not have been more convenient.  It is around the corner from the Brooklyn Museum, the most beautiful library, Prospect Park, great restaurants  & the metro station. Travel into Manhattan & the airport was really straightforward. We also were able to walk through many neighborhoods surrounding ours, which was great for exploring. We really felt like we were in the middle of it all, but it wasn't nearly as overwhelming as Manhattan, and felt really safe.  We plan to stay here again on our next visit!
The appartement is really nice, and I absolutely love this neighborhood of Brooklyn!
Great location great value and great host. I highly recommend.

Rosalynn foi muito gentil ao nos receber. Tentou explicar um pouco sobre a casa e nos deixou bem à vontade. Nos sentimos em casa e pudemos vivenciar dias maravilhosos. O apartamento é muito bem localizado e bastante confortável. O único porém foram as escadas, mas nada que atrapalhe a estadia.
This is a nice, quiet apartment in a great location in Brooklyn.
This is a great place! A perfect location; clean. It's a great space. I would definitely recommend this apartment -- you won't regret it!
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I chose this spot because of its location and it did not disappoint. Easy walk to the subway, good food, Brooklyn Museum, and Prospect Park. It was comfortable and convenient. I was totally fine with the 4th floor walk up, but make sure that you are really comfortable bringing your suitcase up and down all those stairs. Folks in the building were friendly. 

When I had a little Internet problem, Rosalynn responded quickly. There were a few things in the home I couldn't figure out (how to turn on the living room ceiling fan and how to keep the bedroom fan on without lights), but they weren't a big deal and I'm sure Rosalynn would have responded quickly if I had asked her about it. The A/C worked great, especially considering the August heat and humidity. 

One thing to note is that it appears that the host lives there, and just stays elsewhere when it gets rented. I like that because it means I'm helping someone with their rent rather than renting an airbnb-only space which takes away valuable housing in a gentrifying community. The only downside is that there isn't much space for your own things. Probably not a big deal for short stays, but possibly an inconvenience for longer visits. There wasn't space for me to unpack my suitcase and the fridge/freezer are half filled.  I also felt nervous touching/disturbing any of her things  (the host didn't give me any indication that she cared, it was my own hang up). I guess I'm just trying to say that it was a good reminder that I'm renting someone's apartment, not a hotel room.

I enjoyed it overall and would totally consider coming back next time I'm in town.

Rosalynn lakása tökéletes helyen van, 4-5 percre a Brooklyni múzeumtól, parktól, metrómegállótól, mégis nagyon csöndes és biztonságos helyen. Rosalynn a leveleinkre szinte perceken belül válaszolt, az érkezéskor várt minket, ellátott a tanácsaival. A lakás tiszta, mindennel felszerelt, belértve a konyhát. Mivel Rosalynn a lakásban lakik ha nincs vendége, kicsit kevés a rakodóhely, de ez minket nem zavart.
Rosalynn köszönünk szépen mindent! Tökéletes kirándulás volt!

name: Pause_Oporto
summary: This house in a renovated building from the end of the 19th century, in Porto is located in the School of Fine Arts district.  Great for those looking for tranquility and privacy in a prime location. The house is located in a residential zone with all the facilities for a nice stay (ATM, supermarkets, pharmacy, laundry, restaurants, coffees…).
space: This house retains its original structure. As soon as we enter this house, we realize that we are in a house from the ending of the 19th century. The broad wooden stairs, the marbled walls, the high ceilings stuccoed. The living rooms on the first floor and the bedrooms upstairs. From the balcony of the living room we have access to the garden that will be of exclusive use of the guests. Originally the kitchen and the entire service area would be in the basement, the kitchen was installed in the dining room for better day to day operation.  The kitchen is fully equipped.
description: This house in a renovated building from the end of the 19th century, in Porto is located in the School of Fine Arts district.  Great for those looking for tranquility and privacy in a prime location. The house is located in a residential zone with all the facilities for a nice stay (ATM, supermarkets, pharmacy, laundry, restaurants, coffees…). This house retains its original structure. As soon as we enter this house, we realize that we are in a house from the ending of the 19th century. The broad wooden stairs, the marbled walls, the high ceilings stuccoed. The living rooms on the first floor and the bedrooms upstairs. From the balcony of the living room we have access to the garden that will be of exclusive use of the guests. Originally the kitchen and the entire service area would be in the basement, the kitchen was installed in the dining room for better day to day operation.  The kitchen is fully equipped. The house is all available for the private use of the Guests; For this reaso
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in a residential zone with all the facilities for a nice stay (ATM, supermarkets, pharmacy, laundry, restaurants, coffees…).
notes: There’s a wide range of transports near the house: - A subway station 3-min walking distance (direct to the airport) - A taxi stand 4-min walking distance - Multiple bus stops in the surrounding area For parking the car there’s at least 3 different options (3, 5 and 10-min walk from the house)
transit: There’s a wide range of transports near the house: - A  subway station 3-min walking distance - A taxi stand 4-min walking distance - Multiple bus stops in the surrounding area For parking the car there’s at least 3 different options (3, 5 and 10-min walk from the house)
access: The house is all available for the private use of the Guests; For this reason parties are not allowed.
house_rules: - Luzia put a lot of love and affection to share this space with you. This is the reason why she do not ask for a security deposit – we believe our hosts will take care of the space as if their own and will reimburse her for any damage that might occur. Thank you for leaving it as you found it and have fun! This is a non-smoking house. Parties are not allowed, only small gatherings and no later than 23:00. Quiet times: between 23:00 and 07:00. If you come with children please be especially careful with the stairs.

reviews.comments:
Lovely and helpful host, wonderful apartment, absolutely beautiful :).
Really close to the city, nice and quiet neighborhood.
Would definitely stay there a second time! Obrigada Luzia!

ENGLISH: Wonderful apartment! All so clean, organized, rich in details and excellent artistry taste. Luzia as hostess was perfect, treated us the best possible way and provided everything we needed for a lovely stay in Porto (definitely ask Luzia about the good restaurants).



ESPAÑOL: ¡Apartamento grandioso! Todo muy limpio, organizado, lleno de detalles y de muy buen gusto artístico. Luzia como anfitriona fue perfecta, nos trató de la mejor manera posible y no dejó faltar nada para una encantadora estancia en Oporto (definitivamente pregunte a Luzia sobre los buenos restaurantes).

PORTUGUÊS: Apartamento magnífico! Tudo muito limpo, organizado, rico em detalhes e de bom gosto artístico. Luzia como anfitriã foi perfeita, nos tratou da melhor maneira possível e não deixou faltar nada para uma agradável estadia em Porto (definitivamente pergunte a Luzia sobre os bons restaurantes da cidade).
Maison magnifique et aménagée avec beaucoup de goût où il fait bon vivre. La propriétaire est très sympathique et attentive et de bons conseils. Cette maison vaut vraiment le détour !

Pasamos el puente de Mayo en casa de Luzia. Éramos dos parejas y hemos pasado unos días estupendos. La casa está bien ubicada, a menos de 10 minutos caminando de la Plaza de Poveiros, en un barrio muy tranquilo.
La casa es espectacular, techos altos, grandes ventanales, arte por cada rincón y cada pared, silenciosa...Las camas nos resultaron comodísimas. En el piso de abajo está la cocina-comedor (perfectamente equipada), una sala que puede convertirse en habitación si se precisa, y un salón con acceso a un pequeño aseo, un balcón y unas escaleras que llevan a un jardín. En el piso de arriba están las dos habitaciones, una sala y el amplio baño. 
Luzia, la propietaria, nos recibió a la hora acordada. Fue muy amable con nosotros y nos dejó un pan riquísimo, vino, pasteles, fruta...además de recomendaciones de restaurantes y demás detalles para ayudarnos en nuestra estancia en Porto.
La comunicación con Luzia durante todo nuestro viaje fue muy fluida, preocupándose en todo momento por nuestra comodidad y teniendo detalles muy bonitos con nosotros, cosa que le agradecemos enormemente. 
En resumidas cuentas, nos ha encantado la casa de Luzia y si volvemos a Porto seguro que repetiremos estancia, sin duda.
Unique house and location to experience Porto with all needs like public transport nearby.

Luzia was a great host, collecting us from the airport and baking us a delicious cake. Her house was ideal - big, comfortable, in a quiet location and walkable from the centre of Porto. An ideal find for us.
Luzia's place is amazing and she is the most welcoming host. We had a beautiful 4 days in Porto and can't wait to be back.

Luzia‘s Haus ist ein Schmuckstück, toll umgebaut, mit ganz viel Atmosphäre. Wir waren sofort begeistert. Luzia hat uns sehr warmherzig empfangen und uns alles gezeigt. Sie war für alle Fragen schnell zu erreichen und hat uns liebevoll umsorgt. 
Das Haus liegt in fussläufiger Entfernung zur Innenstadt von Porto. Luzia hat umfangreiche Pläne und Listen mit vielen Tipps erstellt - sowohl für die Infrastruktur rund ums Haus als auch für die Sehenswürdigkeiten von Porto und die leckersten Restaurants. Ein idealer Startpunkt für das Entdecken dieser spannenden Stadt!

Luzia is not just running a business, she really goes above and beyond to host you.  From picking us up from the airport to thoughtful local tips to treats (she made us a fresh strawberry cake and had port, lemons & oranges, etc.)--she is an amazing hostess.  Her home is breathtaking--a creative blend of historic and contemporary, with a beautiful color palate.  It was not just a place to stay but a place to remember.  Highly recommended.

This was by far the best airbnb stay i ever had. The house is beautiful with a lot of details, the location is central and near to a metro station, but still quiet. Luzia is a perfect host, she baked a lovely cake for us, there was fresh fruit, a lot of tips for porto, fresh flowers everywhere. etc. etc. Also thanks to Mariana, who welcomed us dearly and showed us everything. Communication was super fast! If you come to Porto, you have to stay at this place!

Luzias Haus ist ein echtes Fundstück, wie man diese nur noch ganz selten auf Airbnb findet, super liebevoll und hochwertig eingerichtet, Haus noch viel schöner als auf den Bildern, eine total tolle Lage zentral, dennoch ruhig in einem upcoming Viertel.
Luzia war die perfekte Gastgeberin und wir zehren immernoch von den tollen Tagen in Luzias Haus. Es gibt keine bessere Unterkunft in Porto.
Einfach perfekt!

Merci beaucoup pour ce séjour très agréable, rendu tout à fait magique et particulier, grâce au cadre offert par cette belle maison typique de Porto. Merci également pour toutes les attentions. On a passé un super São João !

We're a family of four and we really enjoyed staying at Luzia's place. Walking in was like stepping into a work of art. Luzia was very helpful with the time and information she gave us. The house is beautiful, old with lots of individual style. The local area was good to walk around with interesting houses to look at and a local bakery/cafe  and small supermarket . Highly recommended! And if you wish to see Porto without the crowds I'd recommend Porto Sunrise walking tour(also airbnb)

The house is just a wonderful space which makes everyone comfortable. It really is awesome.
Luzia is just such an amazing hostess. She has literally thought of everything from what we could do, where we can get great coffee to where to see Porto’s fantastic art. I think Porto was an exceptional experience because we stayed here, we met her and we enjoyed her tips.

Wir haben einen großartigen Aufenthalt in Luzias Haus genossen. Besoner gefallen hat uns der gute Stil der Einrichtung und die gelungene Renovierung bei der alte Details Erhalten geblieben sind; ein wunderschönes Haus. Schön auch die zentrale Lage, zu Fuß waren es vielleicht 10 Minuten in`s Zentrum, die Metro-Station mit Anbindung zum Flughafen liegt  vielleicht 200 Meter entfernt. Auf den Bildern nicht so gut zu erkennen: es gibt 3 Schalfzimmer mit jeweils einem Doppelbett. Das der Hauptschlafraum keine Tür zum Treppenhaus hat hat uns nicht gestört.

Nice place in à typical area, close to the center, and shops for eating.
Nice House, design, with good furnitures.
Luzia have welcomed us and gave us good advices and adresses for discovering Porto!
Un séjour exceptionnel dans une demeure qui reflète pleinement l'âme de Porto. Un adresse précieuse qui invite au voyage comme à la contemplation. Merci Luzia.

We stayed at Luzia's as a family and staying in Luzia's house is leaving all your worries behind. The house is spacious, well styled with a personal touch and located in a quiet area just outside the busy city center. Luzia goes out of her way to make you feel comfortable, from picking you up from the airport to bringing you local cakes and cookies. A superhost with a superhouse! We can't recommend it enough

Luzia est une hôte formidable, un accueil chaleureux, des petites attentions tout le long du séjour et une disponibilité pour répondre à toutes nos interrogations. 
Nous avons passé 2 semaines formidables au sein de cette maison au caractère unique. De grandes et hautes pièces lumineuses, une décoration efficace, nous nous sommes senti rapidement comme chez nous ! 
Équipement, mobilier, ustensiles, vaisselle, linge... tout y est, également pour les bébés et enfants en bas âge.
Un voisinage, une rue agréable et calme. 
Proche d’une station de métro, restaurants et commerces. 
Nous ne pouvions pas espérer mieux pour découvrir Porto avec notre petit garçon.
Merci Luzia!
We had an amazing time at your place Luiza! Thank you! Great apartment and very convenient with a baby ! We recommand your house to visit Porto !

In deze volkse buurt op wandelafstand van het cetrum ligt dit pareltje verborgen. Een rijhuis uit 1920, stijlvol aangepakt door de eigenares/archtecte met een bijzondere mix van originaliteit, creativiteit en het uitzonderlijk behoud van het authentieke. Alles wordt overgoten met mooie kunst, een massa lectuur en honderden cd's. De gastvrouw is SUPER. Aanrader voor wie net iets anders zoekt.

Luzia was amazing and generous as a host. Her house is an exceptional place to stay with everything catered for. It doesn't get much better if you are staying in Porto. We loved this house, so much character and a real authentic Portuguese home! Would love to stay again. Thank you for everything Luzia it was a fantastic experience and a great memory of Porto.

Helemaal eens met de eerdere lovende recensies.
Luzia is een uitstekende gastvrouw (snelle reactie, ophalen vliegveld, attenties zoals bloemen, zelfgebakken cake, flesje wijn/port). 
Het oude pand is prachtig verbouwd met behoud van authentieke elementen en is zeer smaakvol ingericht met veel kunst aan de muren. Het is precies zoals de foto's op airbnb laten zien. Het huis was super schoon met heerlijke bedden en dito handdoeken.
De locatie is niet direct in het centrum maar in 20 min. lopen ben je bij het treinstation Sao Bento.  Op ongeveer 300 meter van het huis is een metrostation  (24 de Agosto)  en met de metro bereik je snel de mooie Luis 1 brug.
Niets dan lof dus over deze airbnb.
Luzia, nogmaals dank en ik zal je zeker aanbevelen.
Groet, ook van mijn vriendinnen.
Yvonne.
Beautiful home, great location and a super host! When visiting Porto: this is where you should stay! As a couple, family or a group; this place will make you feel at home.

Perfect stay!! If you want a spacious, beautiful house to complement your stay in this beautiful city, this is it. Such artsy and serene decor, a lot of it reminded me of my childhood. Luzia went above and beyond as a host to cater to our needs. Just a unique and unforgettable experience :)

Firstly, Luzia is the best host I have ever met. She is a very genuine and a super helpful host, who will do whatever she can to make your stay as easy, comfortable and enjoyable as possible. 

The Airbnb is better in person than online. It is extremely spacious, artfully decorated, super clean and equipped with everything you could possibly need. Wifi works perfectly! A local phone is even provided! 

Don't second guess this place. Book it immediately!

I can't imagine a nicer place to stay in Porto.  Luzia's house is spacious, beautifully decorated and full of character - no standard, bland furnishings here. It is a 10 minute walk from the centre, and Luzia is an amazing host. Nothing was too much trouble, from picking us up at the airport to baking us a cake, providing port and figs, and even bringing us some homemade quince jam. I and my 2 friends felt very lucky to have found this special place and special host, and will be recommending it to anyone we know visiting Porto.

Wonderful house in a great location. Luzia was very welcoming and helpful.
Can´t be better.

Super maison au calme , très très bien équipée , parfaitement propre et vraiment très agréable à vivre . Excellent accueil avec fleur , porto et très bon biscuits. . Nous on serait bien reste beaucoup plus longtemps !!!!
Deux resto tout à côté , très bien et vraiment à cher  et tellement copieux , demi portion vivement conseillé Si vous n'êtes pas un ogre !!!

A very arty apartment in a great location within walking distance of the old town and close to the metro. Luzia is the perfect host and thought of everything to make our stay with 2 small children really comfortable.

We had a wonderful stay at Luiza’s beautiful apartment in Porto. The location is wonderful and Luiza’s support and many tips made our stay very special. Is you like to stay in an original location, this is the place to be and from where to start your walks through Porto!

name: Work n Rest Free wifi Quiet, Family Fun Shops Cafe
summary: This cosy house, with character and charm, is located in a prestigious leafy suburb. Walk to bus and shops. Ample parking. 8 people can stay comfortably, with the total capacity of 12 persons. Ideal for Workers & families. Easy access to: - Hillsong Church - Norwest &  Blacktown Hospitals - Norwest Business Park - CBD, train, M7 & M2 - Wet 'n Wild water park - Eastern Creek Raceway - Whitewater Stadium - Featherdale Wildlife Park - Blue Mountains - Aussie NightMarkets - Parklea Markets
space: The house has three bedrooms, one very large bathroom and an extra toilet.  All three rooms have a king bed that can be separated into two single beds. The house has a large and fully equipped kitchen. Enjoy meals, tea or coffee on the large wooden deck and watch a variety of colourful birds visiting landscaped backyard.
description: This cosy house, with character and charm, is located in a prestigious leafy suburb. Walk to bus and shops. Ample parking. 8 people can stay comfortably, with the total capacity of 12 persons. Ideal for Workers & families. Easy access to: - Hillsong Church - Norwest &  Blacktown Hospitals - Norwest Business Park - CBD, train, M7 & M2 - Wet 'n Wild water park - Eastern Creek Raceway - Whitewater Stadium - Featherdale Wildlife Park - Blue Mountains - Aussie NightMarkets - Parklea Markets The house has three bedrooms, one very large bathroom and an extra toilet.  All three rooms have a king bed that can be separated into two single beds. The house has a large and fully equipped kitchen. Enjoy meals, tea or coffee on the large wooden deck and watch a variety of colourful birds visiting landscaped backyard. Guests have unrestricted access to all amenities on the property. I live nearby. I'm available on the phone. For urgent matters, I can drop by on short notice subject to my whereabouts.
neighborhood_overview: Kings Langley is a safe, quiet, green and family-friendly area. Neighbours are friendly and cheerful.
notes: Out of consideration for the neighbours, no loud music OR loud chatter after 10 pm. A penalty applies. When you are coming back from a late night event or party please come inside the house very quietly. The house must be left clean and tidy prior to checkout. See the house rules for penalties.
transit: Kings Langley shopping centre is within walking distance. It features a range of cafes, restaurants, take-aways, Medical Centre, bank, multiple ATMs, major supermarkets; Coles and Woolworths, Post Office, Pharmacy, TAB and range of boutique businesses. Frequent buses to Norwest business park and Hill Song church. Express trains to city. M7 is at the doorstep.
access: Guests have unrestricted access to all amenities on the property.
interaction: I live nearby. I'm available on the phone. For urgent matters, I can drop by on short notice subject to my whereabouts.
house_rules: - No visitors allowed - No parties or events allowed. - Quiet hours are from 10 pm to 6 am.  - House must be handed back clean and tidy. Fine of up to $200 applies for any mess left behind, inside or out in the backyard.  - Pets are only allowed outside the house. - Smoking is forbidden anywhere inside the house. The penalty of $300 applies as it can leave an unpleasant smell and can make next guest's stay uncomfortable. - Professional cleaning charges of $25 per item apply if blood or any other bodily fluids are found in towels, bedsheets, pillowcases, blankets or any other surfaces. - A penalty of $200 applies for playing music or making loud noises outside the house after 10 pm.

host.host_about: I love meeting new people. Coming from a large family I understand the needs of family and appreciate how important family gathering and sharing the joy and good times are.

reviews.comments: Leena was a very welcoming and approachable host. She was also accommodating to our needs. We really had a good time. The house was spotless clean and well equipped. The shopping centre and public transport was within walking distance and the neighbourhood was very green and friendly.

I cannot speak more highly of Leena and her property. Without going into too much detail Leena assisted me and my family far and beyond in a difficult time and we are forever grateful to her. 

I reccomend this place 100 percent.

Leena was an extremely warm and delightful host! The place was wonderfully spacious, tranquil, clean and well equiped for our stay. The personal touches on arrival made us feel very welcome and I would not hesitate to book this place again and again, absolutely loved our stay!
Fanastic place to stay if you are visiting a loved one at the Adventist Retirement Village. Leena was a wonderful host.
House was neat. 'Pet Friendly' only means animals are allowed outside, not inside. Made things difficult, and I had known this, I would have booked elsewhere.
Sleeping pattern great,walking distance to shops. Big deck to share all meals.
Leena is a great host .her place is beautiful and spacious! It's was also very clean . I would highly recommend staying here
We loved the accommodation with everything we needed for a comfortable stay.
Clean and tidy very accessible for us we would recommend it to friends Thank you Leena

Thank you ! 
the communication was great!
The children enjoyed it with a wide deck.
Supermarket and park are near and is very convenient for children.
Every morning, birds coming to the trees in the garden enjoy.
The time spent on a wide deck is a very good memory.
I borrowed it to spend the same time with many friends. Families with children also enjoyed it.    Thank you very much.
The house was everything described and perfect for our kids and dogs. The communication from Leena was great. We shall return.

Fantastic staying at Leena's place, great yard for the dogs and the aircon was so welcome on hot days, great halfway spot for our dog shows, the place has a great carport we backed the dog trailer under so dogs were comfortable sleeping..,, will come again, Leena and family are so friendly and helpful...

Overprice for a dated house with old fixtures. Bathroom not able to latch/lock. Not the best presented house. Found some dead insects on the bed and kitchen cupboard. Pictures are not very accurate. Hats off to photographer. No carpet in main bedroom, just floorboards. Not sure if wifi works. Was turned off and no instructions found. Bed arrangement were not as we had arranged. Not happy with our stay.  Won't be back.

Leena has a huge house and backyard too . But there is no hot water 24X7 . It comes at very odd hours . The bathrooms don’t have locks so it is a little problem if you are staying with your family . We had a good time but he house needs to be modernised .
Lovely quiet neighbourhood. Decent space for a small family. Nice and neat home. Will stay again!
Prompt replies, easy to organise. Beds and linen fantastic
Leena’s a great host, she replied very quickly and the house can accomodate up to 6 people comfortably.
A lovely host who is happy to help. A nice little house. Thanks for having us!

The house was a great size in a good location for our group. It had most things we needed except hot water system broke down the last morning but that is an unpredictable.
Checkin was really easy and the place was lovely and clean.
Thanks Leena.
Loved Leena's place.  Will definitely recommend this property to others.
Great host. Good spot

Leena made it a point to immediately answer every queries, and offered any help or services that we might need. And she already replied with action on some minor suggestions for further improvement of the property such as trimming of trees/branches along driveway for easier parking of vehicle, etc. 

Overall, I will recommend this place to my friends/relatives especially for big families like us. 

Thanks Leena for being a nice and great host! God bless always
A great place to stay for a few nights.
Perfect space for the 10 of us! We had great space and use of the backyard which we all enjoyed, would definitely come back.
Good location to Featherdale Wildlife Park and Blue Mountain.

In a great quiet location but still close to shops, plenty of take-aways, and the Motorway. I stayed with 2 of my dogs in a dog trailer, and it suited me to a "T" .  The trailer fitted under the carport and behind a set of gates, so the dogs were very secure. You need be confident reversing a trailer but it is do-able. The backyard is pretty much secure, but if your dog was determined, I think it would manage to escape.  This place suited me for the 3 nights I stayed there. Leena was the perfect host and very easy for a first timer to deal with.

Very quiet location and very close to shops like coles and woolies for essentials. 5 min drive to Blacktown Plaza if you feel like going shopping. The basic usual essentials are in the house for the stay and comfy beds.
All rite

nice little lovely home and a quiet area which was great for relaxing out the back enjoying the sunset :) also has a spa shower which was a bonus and not to far away from shops/restaurants, also nice and private. Great communication with host and everything was higher level than expected enjoyed my stay 

thanks Leena

I really enjoyed my stay at Leena's place. She is very friendly and accomodating, so communication was effortless.

The place is very clean and well equipped. There is a huge backyard with a variety of flowers that attract colourful birds. I really enjoyed watching the sunset sitting in the huge entertainment deck.

There is easy access to the Sydney CBD via M7/M2. Shops, cafes and takeaway restaurants are just a few minutes walk away.

I had a short stay at Leena's place, but I'm really looking forward to a longer stay with a big group. There are facilities to accommodate up to a dozen people.

I was impressed with the immaculate presentation. It is very clean and nicely decorated. The well-lit kitchen has all the facilities that one requires for cooking. Just outside the kitchen is a huge entertainment deck for family get-togethers.

The place is located in a quiet, leafy street, where there is local traffic only and heaps of free parking. 

Within 5 minutes walking distance, off James Cook Drive, is the Kings Langley shopping centre with Coles, Woolies, boutique shops, restaurants, cafes and takeaways.

Just 3 minutes walk in the opposite direction, off Sunnyholt Road, are fast-food restaurants and specialty shops.

Vardy's T-Way bus stop is a 3-minute walk away with direct buses to Parramatta, Blacktown, Castle Hill, Hillsong Church and Rouse Hill.

Less than 2 minutes drive away is M7. For Canberra, go west and bypass the city. Drive east to quickly get to Sydney CBD via M2 in an hour.
Very handy and spacious
Great communication, very clean, reliable, close to shops, quiet neighbourhood, great back yard to sit and relax after a long day. The kids had plenty of room to run around
Amazing Communication, Friendly and Helpful. Good Location for western Sydney amenities.

Absolutely loved this house over New Years 
Only a short walk to bus’s and station and housed 8 people comfortably 
Host reply’s fast and with all the information we needed 
Would stay again 10/10

name: Apartamento no Recreio dos Bandeirantes
summary: Apartamento novo bem próximo ao Recreio Shopping e estação do BRT. Ideal pra quem ama a natureza e esportes! Local perfeito pra quem quer conhecer as Praias mais belas do Rio de Janeiro e pra quem deseja fazer a trilha das Praias Selvagens. Fica a cerca de 1 km da Praia da Macumba e próximo de outras praias Pontal, Prainha, Abrico e Grumari. Perto também do Polo Gastronomico de Vargem Grande.
description: Apartamento novo bem próximo ao Recreio Shopping e estação do BRT. Ideal pra quem ama a natureza e esportes! Local perfeito pra quem quer conhecer as Praias mais belas do Rio de Janeiro e pra quem deseja fazer a trilha das Praias Selvagens. Fica a cerca de 1 km da Praia da Macumba e próximo de outras praias Pontal, Prainha, Abrico e Grumari. Perto também do Polo Gastronomico de Vargem Grande. O Recreio dos Bandeirantes foge dos roteiros turísticos tradicionais. Quem deseja contato com a natureza, busca paz, descanso e sossego este e o lugar! Quem vem conhecer o Rio de Janeiro, não deve perder a chance de passear pela orla que vai do Recreio ate Grumari.
neighborhood_overview: O Recreio dos Bandeirantes foge dos roteiros turísticos tradicionais. Quem deseja contato com a natureza, busca paz, descanso e sossego este e o lugar! Quem vem conhecer o Rio de Janeiro, não deve perder a chance de passear pela orla que vai do Recreio ate Grumari.
house_rules: Como qualquer em apartamento nao e permitido usar churrasqueira a carvão na varanda que alem de colocar em risco a todos, pode gerar incomodos a vizinhos e implicar na aplicação de multa pelo condominio.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Recreio dos Bandeirantes, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: De todos os lugares em que eu e meu esposo nos hospedamos, posso dizer sem dúvidas que foi o melhor! Os anfitriões são super receptivos, agradáveis e legais. O apartamento é melhor do que mostrado nas fotos, a piscina é excelente e o local em si maravilhoso. Só temos a agradecer por todo o cuidado. SUPER RECOMENDO
Apartamento muito limpo, moderno, próximo das melhores praias do Rio: prainha e grumari! Recomendo
Ótimo espaço! Piscina muito agradável .. e o ap uma graça
Adoramos a estadia, Anna Gabrielle e seu pai Paulo, super atenciosos. Apartamento muito limpo e cuidado, cuidaram dos mínimos detalhes. Quando voltar ao Rio, ficarei la com certeza.
Amamos o apartamento, Anna Gabrielle e seu pai Paulo, super atenciosos.

Ótimo apartamento, superou todas as minhas expectativas, família muito atenciosa, grata pela atenção e carinho...
Grata.

Nossa estadia foi excelente! O apartamento é como retratado nas fotos: muito aconchegante e limpo. Não tive o prazer de conhecer a Anna pessoalmente, mas o apartamento reflete o cuidado e atenção que ela tem com os hóspedes. Se coloca disponível para sanar nossas dúvidas sempre que necessário. A cozinha tem todos os itens necessários para se cozinhar confortavelmente. Além do básico, posso afirmar. Foi sem dúvidas uma experiência ótima. Espero ter o prazer de voltar em breve.
hospedagem foi maravilhosa , o apartamento era bem completo e os donos sempre prestativos, super recomendo !!!
Já é a segunda vez que me hospedo no apto da Gabrielle e nao tenho reclamações a fazer. Eu adorei, me sinto na minha casa e em breve estou voltando.

Le condominium est récent et bien équipé, piscine, salle de sports.
Il est abrité des bruits de l’Avenida das Americas.
Il se situe à 500 m du Recreio Shopping où l’on trouve tout le nécessaire.
De là, on dispose des transports en commun et le centre de Rio est à environ 1h30. 
Les magnifiques plages de Recreio sont à peine à 1 km.

L’appartement est très bien équipé et s’il vous manque quelque chose, Anna Gabrielle ou Paulo vous fourniront le nécessaire, dans la journée.
L’accueil est excellent et l’exactitude dans la prise des rendez-vous (arrivée, départ) exceptionnelle.

Ce séjour (7 semaines) a été formidable grâce à tous ces détails.
Je recommande fortement cette location.
Didier
Muito bom! Voltaremos en breve!!!
Esperem um ambiente bem cuidado com otima localização e muito confortavel para servidor de descanso das idas e vindas as belas praias próximas ao local.
Excelente apartamento. Limpo, arrumado, e totalmente aderente ao que eu esperava! Anfitrião com respostas rápidas e precisas. Tudo perfeito!!
Tiene todo lo necesario y es un apartamento comodo.

Ótima estadia , tudo da forma
Como foi anunciado . Recomendo
Excelente apartamento, muito bem arrumado, muito bem localizado, sem comentários!!! Tive uma ótima estadia... A anfitriã foi super solicita, sempre pronta para tirar qualquer dúvida.
Excelente Apto

Adorei os dias em que fiquei hospedada, vale
Muito a pena..tudo conforme as fotos !!
O anfitrião é muito atencioso e a estadia foi ótima. Recomendo!!!

name: The Blue Room
summary: Bright, spacious and colorful
description: Bright, spacious and colorful
house_rules: First floor has a concrete finish and is advisable to  bring house slippers for use in the first floor only.

host.host_location: Hawaii, Island of Oahu, Honolulu, Aina Haina area
host.host_about:
We are a couple of little if not no dislikes about anything, anyone or any place. We are Business Entrepreneurs and we find ourselves at home most of the time. We love to cook. Harumi in particular is a great cook and can whip up a great meal in minutes from scratch. She can cook a variety of ethnic dishes from japanese, chinese, filipino, as well as american and european dishes. We love the outdoors, we spend much of our spare time doing things like surfing, hiking, golfing driving around the island. 

From time to time we would fly to neighboring islands on impulses. We do many things at the fly of our pants. We are always on the go, but always have time for each other and our guests. Dinner is our most important meal of the day, because it is a time where we all get to sit around the table, have a wonderful meal, give thanks to God and pretty much share how our day went.

reviews.comments: Pretty good.
Nice house

No need to look any further on your search, this is IT! Not enough space or words to describe my experience at Eddie & Harumi’s home... but to give you an idea I will try. 

The house and room were super clean, organized, with ample space, and superior comfort. 

Hosts treated me with respect, they truly cared how I felt in their house, making sure I was good always, and treated me as if I were family. 

Honestly I felt as comfortable at their house than I would at one of my family members homes. Although a short stay, choosing to stay with them was the highlight of my trip to Hawaii especially with grandma greeting me with a smile and a thoughtful send off before I left the home every morning! I cannot wait to return. I’m a happy camper
とても綺麗で大きなお部屋でした､とても安全で静かに過ごせました｡大変お世話になりました｡ありがとうございました｡

I really appreciated to live in Eddie and Harumi’s house. Everything is great! Me and my friend had a amazing time! I hope we can come back in the future.

Eddie and Harumi are friendly and helpful. The neighborhood is quiet and the room has great views of the valley. There are local buses that run frequently taking you un to the city. I slept well and felt comfortable. Thank you!

とても居心地の良い場所です｡
また泊まらせて頂きたいです｡

name: Montréal en toute simplicité
summary: Petit appartement de 350 pi2. Chaleureux et sans extravagance. Très lumineux. Voisinage sympathique. Situé au centre des quartiers cool du Mile-End, Mile-Ex, Petite-Patrie, Petite Italie et Villeray.
description: Petit appartement de 350 pi2. Chaleureux et sans extravagance. Très lumineux. Voisinage sympathique. Situé au centre des quartiers cool du Mile-End, Mile-Ex, Petite-Patrie, Petite Italie et Villeray. Dépanneurs, pharmacies, boulangeries, petites épiceries de quartier, jolis restaurants sympathiques de fine cuisine et belle carte de vin à proximité. Quartier italien avec cafés et restaurants typiques à 5-10 minutes de marche. Bar sympatique où l'on sert bien à manger au coin de la rue. Station d'essence très près. À 10 minutes de marche du quartier Mile-end avec tous ses cafés, boutiques, bars, restos, artistes locaux. À 15 minutes de marche ou 11 minutes en bus du Marché Jean-Talon. 20 minutes du Cinéma Beaubien. 25 minutes du Centre-Ville et du Quartier des spectacles. Situé à 9 minutes de marche du métro Rosemont. L'autobus 55 du Boulevard St-Laurent vous ramène du Centre-Ville quasiment devant la porte. L'autobus 18 sur Beaubien se prend à 4 minutes de marche et vous amène au métro
neighborhood_overview: Dépanneurs, pharmacies, boulangeries, petites épiceries de quartier, jolis restaurants sympathiques de fine cuisine et belle carte de vin à proximité. Quartier italien avec cafés et restaurants typiques à 5-10 minutes de marche. Bar sympatique où l'on sert bien à manger au coin de la rue. Station d'essence très près. À 10 minutes de marche du quartier Mile-end avec tous ses cafés, boutiques, bars, restos, artistes locaux. À 15 minutes de marche ou 11 minutes en bus du Marché Jean-Talon. 20 minutes du Cinéma Beaubien. 25 minutes du Centre-Ville et du Quartier des spectacles.
transit: Situé à 9 minutes de marche du métro Rosemont. L'autobus 55 du Boulevard St-Laurent vous ramène du Centre-Ville quasiment devant la porte. L'autobus 18 sur Beaubien se prend à 4 minutes de marche et vous amène au métro Beaubien.
house_rules: Remettre l'appartement propre tel que trouvé à l'arrivée. Respecter le voisinage.

host.host_about: Théâtre, danse, musique de tout genre, le vin nature, rire, lire, les amis, la famille, danser, danser, danser, philosopher, l'ART performatif, installatif, plastique, photographique, sculptural, architectural, poétique, conceptuel, organique, invisible, de vivre!!

reviews.comments: Nice place, brighter than many Montreal apartments! Clean, equipped for cooking. All needed services in the neighbourhood. Very responsive and helpful host. Thanks for the great stay, Catherine!
Catherine was a great host! Very easy to coordinate with, accomodatin and flexible. The place was very clean and comfortable located in a great part of town. Would definitively stay here again

We really enjoyed our stay at Catherine‘s place. The apartment is really cute and offers everything you need. The location is also great: between Little Italy & Mile End in a quiet street. The apartment has a small balcony which is great for having breakfast or a glas of wine in the evening. Catherine is super kind and welcomed us at her place and explained everything. Would definitely stay here again.

Catherine was an excellent host. We stayed in Montréal during an extreme heat wave and she went out of her way to install an a/c and to make sure we were comfortable. She's generous and warm and answered our questions about things to do outside of the city, too. Her apartment is clean and spacious and gets good light in the front room and kitchen. It's also situated in an ideal location, very close to Little Italy and to Mile End. It's very easy to walk to where you'd like to go, or bike, or take the Rosemont métro. I would definitely recommend staying chez Catherine!
Catherine's place was perfect for our short stay!

Catherine’s space is great; good location, close to the metro and main roads should you need somewhere to eat, pharmacy, laundromat. We were in town for the Osheaga music festival so we’re out of the house most of the day, but while we were there it was perfect! Super hot outside but her AC unit did help to keep the place cool. Would stay again!

Catherine‘s apartment was a perfect place for my staying. Catherine is a very special host, super kind, warm, and she was available whenever I needed. The apartment is very clean and cozy, and it offers everything you need, plus the sunny light in all the place. It is within a great and completely safe localization, between Little Italy, Mile End, close to Plateau and it's just a walking from the metro. I definitively would love to stay here again!

Une super adresse avec une hôte très sympa. L’appartement est largement assez grand pour deux et est très bien situé proche des arrêts Beaubien et Rosemont (5 min à pied). Quartier avec de nombreux commerces très agréable ! Une adresse sûre à Montréal.

Très bel appartement, spacieux pour une ou deux personnes et très bien équipé ! C’est aussi agréable d’avoir Catherine en direct (hôte très sympa) et d’avoir un vrai appartement habité et non pas un simple business. Le quartier est top avec des commerces de proximité partout autour ! Métro Rosemont et Beaubien très proches de l’appartement notamment. 
Je conseille vivement !
Simple, clean, easy. Perfect location. Will definitely stay here again next time I come back for work. Catherine was very easy to communicate with.

name: Villa CL
summary: A Villa CL é uma casa património da cidade de Vila do Conde. Construída em 1905 foi remodelada em 2017 mantendo os traços típicos mas com um toque de modernismo! É um apart. duplex com 2 quartos amplos com vista mar e 1 suite que dispõem de todas as comodidades que necessita. A sala e cozinha, em open space, estão totalmente equipadas para que se sinta em casa! Dispõe de TV cabo e acesso à internet por wi-fi gratuito. Tem ainda um terraço onde pode desfrutar de uma refeição ou apenas relaxar!
space: A Villa CL está situada a menos de 50 metros da praia de Vila do Conde e a 2 minutos a pé do centro da cidade.

neighborhood_overview: Vila do Conde é uma pequena cidade, muito tranquila, conhecida pela história e artesanato e uma beleza natural atravessada pelo rio Ave e uma praia lindíssima. Está muito próxima de outras cidades igualmente interessantes na região Norte de Portugal, tão conhecida pela riqueza histórica e cultural como pela hospitalidade e simpatia dos seus habitantes, sem esquecer a maravilhosa e variada gastronomia.

transit: A Villa Cl, está ao lado da cidade da Póvoa de Varzim e muito próxima das cidades de Braga, Guimarães, Viana do Castelo e o Porto!  Outros pontos de interesse muito próximos são o Golfe (Estela Golfe ou Quinta da Barca-Esposende) e o Casino da Póvoa (a menos de 10 minutos). A cidade de Vila do Conde tem transporte de metro que a aproxima ainda mais quer do aeroporto (30 min.) quer da cidade do Porto (45min.).
interaction: Estaremos à sua disposição sempre que considerar necessário.

host.host_about: Sou da Póvoa de Varzim, Porto, Portugal e adoro viajar....!

reviews.comments:
Alexandra and David are very good in every aspect, the home is furnished with love and fashion, everything is working perfectly, the kitchen has everything, internet is quick, the parking is close and everything is perfectly clean. 
Alexandra and David where both extremely lovely and we really felt good with them.

Una casa antigua totalmente renovada, tranquila, con una excelente ubicación:  a 45' de Oporto en metro, al lado de la playa y muy cerca del centro de Vila do Conde. Hay buenos restaurantes en el centro del pueblo con una aceptable relación calidad/precio, y una buena pizzería al lado de la casa, lo que ayuda mucho a disfrutar de todo el tiempo disponible sin tener que preocuparte mucho de la compra y de la cocina. Los dueños son muy amables y mostraron su total disponibilidad. Nada que reprochar. Muy recomendable.
Alojamiento bien situado, muy limpio y acogedor.Facilidad para aparcar coche, la playa esta cruzando una carretera.Trato personal muy bueno.Excepcional.

Die Nutzung des Apartment ist auch ohne Auto kein Problem. In ca. 10 Minuten ist ein Lidl zu erreichen, das an sieben Tage die Woche geöffnet ist. Es gibt mehrere kleine Bäcker in der Nähe und der Strand ist nur einen Katzensprung entfernt. Zur nächsten Metrostation sind es ca 25 Minuten zu Fuß. Die Fahrt nach Porto kostet ca 2,80 € ferner gibt es preiswerte Busse in die umliegenden Orte. Die Vermieter waren sehr nett und hilfsbereit  Wohnung selbst ist sehr großzügig geschnitten, hell, freundlich, sauber und sehr gut ausgestattet. Die großen Kleiderschränke in sämtlichen Zimmern bieten viel Stauraum und auch in der Küche war sehr viel Platz um die Einkäufe zu verstauen. Das WLAN funktionierte einwandfrei. Wir haben uns in den 14 Tagen unseres Aufenthalts sowohl im Apartment als auch im Ort sehr wohl gefühlt und können es auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen.
Amazing house to stay in VDC. The house is super clean and modern. The Center is easily reachable by foot. Nearby are a lot of restaurants and cafés. We would always come back!

Alexandra et David sont charmants et l'appartement a tout pour plaire; non seulement il est très beau mais en plus il est très bien situé par rapport à la plage et pour se rendre facilement dans toutes les villes à visiter aux alentours. Pour aller à Porto c'est très pratique en métro et nous avons passé 10 jours formidables .

Superbe appartement, idéalement situé. Décoration moderne, très propre et disposant de toutes les fonctionnalités. La terrasse, avec vue sur un charmant petit jardin, permet prendre le petit déjeuner ou de profiter des  dernières heures de la journée en dégustant un Porto au calme ! L'accueil est très chaleureux et les petites attentions nous permettent de nous sentir très bien, dès les premières minutes sur place. Merci pour ce superbe séjour.

L’accueil et la disponibilité de David et Alexandra  fût très appréciable. Très réactif à nos diverses demandes.
Le logement est parfaitement situé (plage à quelques mètres et resto Le Farol quasi en bas du logement). 
Le logement est propre et décoré avec goût. 
Encore merci à A&D pour les cadeaux de bienvenus. 
Nous y reviendrons avec plaisir si l’occasion se présente.

Maison de ville conforme aux belles photos avec tout le confort nécessaire . Localisation parfaite entre le bord de mer et le centre ville.
Un grand merci à David et Alexandra qui ont été très accueillants et très attentionnés.
Je recommande vivement.

Alexandra&David очень теплые и приятные люди. И когда ты приезжаешь в их дом, то чувствуешь это тепло. В доме есть все необходимое для отдыха и для отдыха с детьми. Но кроме этого там есть великолепные книги по истории Португалии и города Vila do conde, путеводители и  настольные игры. Продуманный интерьер. На любой вопрос и пожелание гостя сразу находится ответ. Рекомендую этот дом всем путешественникам.
genial
Very nice and clean place. Very good location - near the ocean. We enjoyed our stay.

reviews.comments: Great place, wonderful location, and an amazing host. I would definitely go there again !

Mohamad’s place was exactly as expected. Very clean, spacious, and located in a good location. My only issue was that at the time of booking, I informed him multiple times I would not be arriving until after midnight but he kept on insisting keeping the check-in time at 9 pm and to update him later if anything changes. 

Eventually, closer to the date I informed him again I would not be arriving until after midnight and he told me unless I found someone to check in on my behalf I would not be able to check in until 10 am the next day. Thankfully, I had a friend in Montreal who could help me but it would’ve caused major problems for me if I didn’t. I wish he could’ve informed me of this at the time of booking as he was aware of my schedule. 

Other than that, everything else went smoothly and communication was fast. I would recommend staying here.

My friends and I stayed at Mohamad's place for a weekend in December and it was a great experience. The place is very nice and clean and is in a great location downtown. He replies right away if you have any questions just text him. We had no issues with our stay.
Excellent host experience. Great communication, amenities, and cleanliness.

name: Top location + Great Sydney Views 3 Beds Apartment
summary: The space is a newly furnished apartment. It is great for a family or a group of 2-4 persons getaway or business travelers.  Situated within 300m-400m walk to Hyde Park, Chinatown, Market City, and within minutes to Darling Harbour, major shopping precincts, bars and nightlife. 5 minute stroll to Central Train Station and to other types of public transport. This is one of few apartments in this area that has Gym, Pool and Spa. These facilities will make your holiday more healthy and relaxing.
space: This apartment is equipped with all the essentials to make your stay a comfortable one. The most special aspect of this apartment is that it is bright, spacious, with plenty of fresh air and a spectacular view of Sydney. The space consists of two bedrooms with central air conditioning. Both bedrooms enjoy splendid city views and have comfy and clean new queen beds. The larger bedroom can also be used as a family living area with a TV, dining table and sofa and connects to a large sunlit balcony that has access to splendid views of the Sydney CBD.  Note, the living space is not a traditional separated living space as it is part of the larger bedroom.  There is a separate laundry room and a kitchen with essentials.

host.host_about: Sally and Uschi (co-host) work together to provide a unique, cosy and comfortable place as your home away from home, where you can have a good rest and enjoy all the beautiful aspects of Sydney during your traveling.

reviews.comments: Super convenient location, located in Haymarket between Chinatown and Surry Hills. The building location is on the quiet side of the block, but when you walk out the front door and turn either corner there are endless casual eateries with fantastic food, many open late too. Check out Boon Cafe and Yok Yor! Tumbalong Park and Darling Harbour are an 10 minute walk, Chinatown and Market City are steps away. And one block the opposite direction is the tip of Surry Hills!

Amazing location close to centre station and china town,and about 10 minutes walk to Darling harbour and Westfield shopping mall.The room is very clean, wifi is fast, great city view from the balcony. Centre air-condition woking well, the bed is very comfortable. The host Sally is very kind and polite, i am highly recommend this accommodation  if you are travel with your families or friends.
Perfect  location and nice balcony with views

Great place to stay! Surrounded by public transport options and a wide variety of eating places. Sally’s place is Exceptionally clean, comfortable and well presented. Also loved the access to the pool, spa and gym. Sally’s communication with us was fabulous. Looking forward to coming back!
Sally’s apartment located in a very convenient area and she is a very nice host!!

Sally's apartment was close to both Museum Station & Central Station.  There is a supermarket, convenience store and lots of places to eat close by.  It is in walking distance to The National Museum,  Powerhouse Museum and Darling Harbour.  We enjoyed having access to the pool and spa too.  A great spot for a family holiday in Sydney.

If you are looking for an easy check-in and nice, central location then this is the place for you. We enjoyed the views from the balcony and the spaciousness of the place. Note this is not a two bedroom in the traditional sense as the couch, table and access to the balcony are all in the space considered the second bedroom. This worked fine for us but could be confusing if looking at the photos and thinking they are separate bedrooms from the living space. 

Sally was very easy to communicate with and was most accommodating for luggage drop off in the morning. This is in a centrally located area and very easy to get around.

On the whole, our experience of renting this apartment was really great.  
Location - fabulous, a really good, central location, so easy to walk or get transport to wherever you want to go.  And it really is only five minutes walk to Central Station!
Check in - this was so easy with absolutely minimum fuss,.  
Cleanliness - the apartment was kept very clean.
Equipment - the apartment was very well equipped.
Layout - The apartment was bright and spacious.  But please note this is not a traditional two bedroom apartment.  The lounge/tv/dining table are in the larger bedroom.  
Host - Sally was great with ongoing communication, and although we didn't need to, we felt that she would have been easy to reach had we needed her.
Just one note, although the info says that the apartment is newly furnished, there are still some aspects that haven't been upgraded.
Beautiful place, very central location, anything you need is nearby with few minutes walking distance! Would defo recommend to anyone considering their stay at Sydney!

Sally’s apartment is very cozy, got everything we need there. Just walk distance to the city. 
Easy selfcheck in and out also.

n'hésitez pas à choisir l'appartement de Sally sur Sydney, l'emplacement est ideal pour ceux qui veulent avoir la ville sans dépenser en moyens de transports.
l'appartement est tel qu'indiqué , propre, lave-linge , seche linge avec wifi et netflix  et piscine et spa à disposition , pour un maximum de 4 personnes.
les indications et communications avec Sally sont claires et nettes , à recommander!

Sally's place is in a great location with access to the Hey Market, Capital Theatre, Chinatown, central station and a short stroll to World Square.  The apartment is very spacious and has great views of the city.  Easy access in and out and it was great that Sally gave us two access keys.  We loved it and so will you.  Definitely will stay there again.
Sally is a very responsive and friendly host. The apartment is clean and cozy with very nice city view, close to central station , various restaurants nearby. Highly recommended!
Great location, great host! You get the value of your money!
Sally is very good owner. And the apartment located very well. Easy to find the room key. Room big and nice.

Good place and location
it was my first time to book thru AIRBNB and i had a good experience

Great location however photos were slightly misleading. There was no photo showing the bed in the dining room with the sofa bed. There was also some hair still left on the bed linen, sheets, and pillows.
was good location and clean flat
Great location, clean and tidy. Worth every cent!
The unit is very well located and great value. Sally is an excellent host
We stayed for 3 night here, Sally's place is so close to everything. Fast responses to questions. I would definitely recommend this apartment.
因为提前到了悉尼…所以联系房东是否可以提前入住…真的很感谢房东…满头大汗的收拾卫生…为了尽快让我们提前入住…房间不是严格意义上的两室…因为一间卧室就是在起居室放了沙发餐桌等东西…不过这丝毫不影响…房子最棒的是位置…基本步行到唐人街到coles到皮特街都可以…真的非常好…站在大阳台就可以看到中央车站…很好…
great place to stay, right in the heart of Sydney.
Great apartment, walking distance to pretty much most places in the CBD. Host was very welcoming and helpful. Would stay again.
So lucky for us.We changed hotel before we arrived one week ago.The apartment is in a good location,near the central station and city.

TLDR:  We had a pleasant stay as a family of 5, with kids ages 8-13.  It was clean and as described.  Some things were annoying but we slept well and loved the accessibility.  

Sally's place has a GREAT location for public transit. Legit <10 min walk (kid-pace) to the central train station, once we figured out the fastest route.  We used the trains and buses and also walked to many central destinations.  Perfect for our needs.  

Don't be put off by the odd configuration.  The lounge room with beds is spacious and comfortable.  We used it both for kids' bedroom and eating.  Didn't spend a lot of time in the apartment otherwise so that was just fine.  The only issue was eating over carpet; we had to vacuum to manage crumbs between meals.  

The biggest drawback here was in the bathroom.  The toilet is LOUD when it's refilling--kind of a squealing sound as if the shower is on.  Made us not want to flush after anyone went to bed.  And speaking of the shower, it was one of the worst I've encountered!!  Low pressure and the temperature would change randomly from cold to scalding hot (and NOT while anything else was using water in the apartment.) My family was amused by my yelps as I got hit by hotter water than I could stand, but I wasn't!  A bath was more pleasant, and perfect for the kids, but be aware that the tub is an odd shape.  It narrows at the upper end and anyone larger than my US-size-10 bottom can expect not to be able to sit in it for a soak.  

Kitchen is clean and minimally-adequately-equipped.  There are just enough pots & pans to do some basic cooking, but only one huge awkward knife.  I've suggested they get a better set!  There was a dishwasher but not much detergent so we mostly washed by hand.  I wish there had been a teapot--I made tea in a saucepan.  You'll find some very basic supplies (salt/pepper/sugar/tea) but otherwise pretty much bare cupboards--this isn't one of those places where you'll find some edibles left from previous guests.   That's fine; some people really prefer it that way.  Just be aware you'll need to supply most all condiments, oils etc.  if you plan to cook.  

We liked having the clothes washer and some detergent was provided.  

The shades are good in the bedroom but in the lounge/bedroom there's a slight bay window that can't be darkened as fully.  Thankfully the kids were jet-lagged enough to sleep well anyway.  

One thing that gave me a weird feeling were all sorts of ominous signs and letters to residents posted in the lobby and elevators--it sounds like the building is recently under new management and getting its financial affairs in order?  Also lots of rules about visitors and not letting people in or loaning out your key, which made me wonder if they've had problems with objectionable people?  We didn't encounter anything untoward, but it doesn't create a great atmosphere.

A very strategic location in the middle of two train stations.
One of the places that provide an exact address and place. If you're not new to the Airbnb, you should know what I mean.
Compare to the Oaks in the same building, it's at least 25% cheaper. All amenities and all facilities as per Sally's mentioned in the property details.
For the eateries, just go down and you can find the famous Yok Yor nearby but I prefer Chon Siam for daily meals.
For Indonesians, there is Toko H2O below for your daily needs, they even sells lontong oncom and es doger.
For breakfast, you can find Mist Cafe. Go there early to get the affordable breakfast set.
Nearest proper supermarket is Coles in World Square, less than 1 km.
The Chinatown and Paddy's market are in the walking distance.
In short, if you are agree with the prices, you are better directly book this property.
Well valued, clean and tidy.
Awesome location  walking distance to everything you need in Sydney.

amazing location. very clean and secure. 
communication fantastic and easy check in and checkout. 
definitely on my list each time I go to Sydney  thanks Sally.
Sally's house is in a perfect location.
Great locaction , nice host.

name: Ocean Condo @ Kuhio Shores #403
summary: Top floor, fully air-conditioned condo with a beautiful view of the ocean, where you can watch the sunrise and sea turtles.  If you love snorkeling or surfing, look no further because you are only steps away. There are many outdoor activities that Kauai has to offer for all age groups. Our condo is walking distance to Kukuíula Shopping Center where you will find restaurants, galleries &  conveniences. It is a great place to enjoy any celebration with the amenities of a home.
space: Our top floor condo has a large lanai which is easy to enjoy while drinking coffee in the mornings or a beverage in the evenings and you will be able to enjoy watching the sea turtles too.

There is a grilling area in the parking lot that is designated for all Kuhio Shore guests. There is also a washer/dryer area on each floor level for guests. Kukuíula Premier Shopping Center is walking distance from our condo where many restaurants and bars are located in addition to unique shops, boutiques and contemporary art ga
neighborhood_overview: Kukuíula Premier Shopping Center is walking distance from our condo where many restaurants and bars are located in addition to unique shops, boutiques and contemporary art galleries. Every Wednesday from 3PM-6PM, a farmer's market is set up at Kukuíula, where you will find local flavors and produce to enjoy.  You can also look up other locations, days and times where you can find farmer's market on the island.  Just remember that you will not be able to travel with any produce to/from the mainland, so enjoy what you can while on the island.
notes: There is a travel book about Kauai and the attractions that the island has to offer in our condo. Sprouting Horn, Waimea Canyon, Napoli Coast are just a few things to see while in Kauai.  Googling "36 Hours in Kauai" will also make numerous suggestions based on your interests.
transit: Renting a car is highly recommended.
access: There is a grilling area in the parking lot that is designated for all Kuhio Shore guests. There is also a washer/dryer area on each floor level for guests.
house_rules: Please leave parking pass on kitchen counter when you check out. Any keys should be left in combo box.

reviews.comments: Absolutely stunning scenery!  We spent a great deal of time out on the patio watching the sea turtles. You cannot beat this view!  We loved every minute of our vacation. The snorkeling just west of the building is great- we swam with the turtles! There's a nice sandy area to just hang out, too. The owner is super responsive to messages and very accommodating.  She provided many tourist tips and there's a Kauai book in the condo that we used for hours each day while exploring the island.  Condo is very clean and has everything you need, including beach chairs, an umbrella, beach towels, and boogie boards.  This has been my all-time favorite vacation!  Can't wait to come back :)

Had an awesome time at David and Aryana's place. They were able to accommodate us last minute and arrange for cleaning staff to come in that day (it was super clean!), which we really appreciated. View was awesome and it was located in a great place with restaurants and in between points of interest. Would definitely recommend.
This is a very nice place in an absolutely amazing location. We were extremely happy with our stay.

Beautiful condo with perfect views of the ocean, plus sea turtles and parakeets! 

The condo was clean, spacious, quiet, and had plenty of amenities.
We really enjoyed our stay, and plan to return to David and Aryana's beautiful setting for our next visit!
We stayed here for 5 nights for our honeymoon. Beautiful ocean view, great location near beaches, restaurants, and just about everything we needed in Poipu. Would highly recommend.
Beautiful space. I’m going to miss watching the turtles from the lanai.

name: Huge family apartment in the heart of the Plateau
summary: * New listing * Large fully equipped apartment with a beautiful private terrace located in the heart of the Plateau at the corner of Mont-Royal Street. - 7 min walk from the famous Lafontaine and Laurier parks - Grocery stores, restaurants, boutiques, cafés and bars within walking distance - 8 min walk from the Mont-Royal metro - Free parking on the street - Close to downtown by metro The apartment is fully equipped: private terrace, kitchen, living room, 3 bedrooms, bathroom, children's games
space: The apartment is perfect for your Montreal getaway: quiet, bright and warm. Ideal for a couple, a family or a small group. You have access to everything: - Large private terrace with BBQ - 3 large closed bedrooms - Children's games and baby accessories - High speed Internet - TV with a few channels, HDMI cable for your computer and retro video games - Fully equipped kitchen - Laptop space for working - Washer / dryer Lots of room to sleep with 3 bedrooms: - 1 comfortable queen size bed - 1 baby bed - 1 single bed - 1 sofa bed for 2 people (a little smaller than a double bed)

neighborhood_overview: It's the perfect apartment for a local experience! It is located at the corner of Mont-Royal Avenue, one of Montreal's many attractions, in the Plateau district. One of the most lively neighbourhoods in Montreal, with all the amenities nearby: bakeries, butcher shops, delicatessens, cafés, restaurants, local shops, free swimming pools, parks, etc....
notes: This is our main residence, we make the apartment available only during our trip. Thank you for being respectful with our personal belongings and taking care of our plants.
transit: The accommodation is easily accessible: - By car: free parking on the street - By metro: the Mont-Royal metro station is 8 minutes walk away - By bus: bus 97 is at the corner of our street and takes you to the metro in a few minutes (with the same transport ticket) - By bike: BIXI (city bikes) available near the apartment
access: You'll have access to everything, the accommodation is just for you! However, we keep our personal belongings there.
interaction: Feel free to contact us for anything you need. We can also give you the good addresses of the district. There's a multitude of good restaurants in the neighborhood!
house_rules: Pas de bruit après 22h / No noise after 10pm

host.host_about:
Nous sommes un jeune couple (Martine française, François québécois) vivant dans un beau et grand appartement du Plateau Mont-Royal à Montréal! Nous avons deux petites filles :)
::
We are a young couple  (Martine French, François Quebecois) living in a beautiful and spacious apartment in the Plateau Mont-Royal in Montreal! We have two daughters :)

reviews.comments: This is a beautiful and ideally located apartment in the Plateau. The serene and stylish atmosphere, the ease of being on the first floor (which was also very quiet thanks to good windows and thick walls), the family-friendly decor and proximity to some of our favorite secondhand book shops, cafes and restaurants made this a perfect place for us to enjoy Montreal. The natural light and comfortable furniture made the atmosphere so pleasant while we relaxed after an outing. The communication with the hosts was very quick, polite and helpful. I highly recommend it and I hope to return here on a future visit!

Appartement très bien placé sur le Plateau-Mont-Royal 
Très agréable 
Excellente réactivité des propriétaires et d’Antoine 
Très aisé de récupérer et de laisser les clés 
Nous recommandons
Très bonne adresse!

name: Drummoyne oasis, close to the bay
summary: Head to the City using Sydney Ferries, from Chiswick wharf. Just up the street visit local cafes and restaurants of varying cuisines, and Birkenhead Point is a famous outlet shopping centre located on the bay in Drummoyne. The local bay run is a famous 7km running track nearby. Feel free to stop along the way in Lilyfield or Rozelle at one of the many cafes, or why not have a drink at the UTS Rowing Club on the deck. Drummoyne Oval and a bay walk are located 2-5 minutes away by foot.
space: Dine outside on the beautiful deck and have a BBQ overlooking the trees, or sit inside in the loungeroom with the air conditioning. Whatever tickles your fancy, the house has all the space you need.  With a bathroom upstairs and downstairs, a kitchen with a Nespresso machine, a full laundry with dryer, our place is sure to make you feel at home within moments.  Off street parking for two cars is available on the driveway.

neighborhood_overview: The local neighbourhood of Drummoyne is set amongst a Bay Area, surrounded by water with many surrounding parklands for kids and families.  It is a trendy area with many organic and raw cafes too.  This steps up a level in the surrounding suburbs, a stone-throw away like Balmain and Rozelle.  The City of Sydney is 15 minutes away by bus or ferry.  The ferry wharf is a 15 minute scenic walk from our home. Download the TripView App for access to public transport options.
interaction: I will greet you to hand over the keys and give you a quick run down on the place.
house_rules: Please avoid long showers of more than five minutes in the upstairs bathroom, as the modern shower screen creates a flooding issue. Only open the upstairs balcony door if a breeze is required.  Before departure, ensure all dishes are washed and put away, bins are emptied and house is left neat and tidy.  Strictly no parties.  A small gathering is permitted but no uninvited Airbnb guests can attend unless prior approval.    No music after 10:30pm as it is a quiet neighbourhood. The dining table permanently stains easily. Please use the protective table cloth at all times to avoid stains. The bond cannot be released if these rules aren’t met. Thank you!

reviews.comments: Great location, very comfortable and convenient to transport, walking paths, supermarkets, restaurants etc

We stopped in Elise’s place for a couple nights as we were headed to a music festival close by, it was a perfect location and a good size house, with options to hang inside or chill out on the back deck!
A stylish abode; one if nicest I have experienced.

This place is amazing. It's just 1 minute walk to the bay and 500m from the very nice restaurants at Lyons Road.
We had a wonderful time there with our family. The backyard with a spacious wooden deck and very green lawn were perfect for having a bbq and enjoy the weekend in Sydney.

Elise was an amazing host. The location was perfect and it was really easy to get into the main parts of the city. The house was everything we wanted and more! Would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends & family.
Really lovely house with everything that we needed. It's a 15 minute drive out of the city, which worked fine for us. It really was excellent value
Well positioned for our purpose, but there were some issues with the upstairs bathroom.
