description: Flat, 55m2, quarto, sala, cozinha( equipada), banheiro, sacada com vista deslumbrante para o mar em resort 5 estrelas. Toda área de lazer do resort, academia e SPA

reviews.comments:
Flat de frente para a praia. Ótima localização é excelente para um casal com 1 criança pequena.
Tem uma pequena cozinha é uma excelente varanda como m vista para o mar.
O flat tem piscina ótima e algumas comodidades.

If I had to describe my experience at Daniel’s apartment in just one word, I would say WONDERFUL!

My wife and I had an amazing stay at his apartment!

Very well located in the beachfront. Hotel crew very polite. with many services as towels to use at the pool, on the beach and at the gym as well, chair and umbrella to be used ar the pool and at the beach, room and clean service, with laundry and health food market in the building

The apartment is fully furnished, with a cooktop, microwave, fridge, coffee machine and everything else you may need to cook your meal.

And to finish, the apartment has a wonderful view! It was a bless to see this amazing to wake up to and when I had lunch every day  we stayed there.

Daniel is a great host, gave us all the attention we needed. A nice guy!

If you wanna chill and relax for some days into an amazing place at Rio, I recommend you to stay at Daniel’s apartment!

Many thanks Daniel!

Cheers mate!
Realmente muito bom. Recomendo
situado en un inmejorable lugar, hermoso departamento, con las comodidades de un resort. Vista de primera línea de mar. Anfitrión brindando respuestas inmediatas. Excelente opción.

name: New Studio in Heart of Chelsea
summary: Gorgeous, well-located studio in the heart of Chelsea. Located above street-level in a brownstone, you'll be minutes away from great restaurants & bars, the Chelsea Gallery scene, the beautiful High Line Park, transportation & much more!
space: The studio is a clean, modern and efficient launch pad for exploring all NYC has to offer and accommodates two guests comfortably. The kitchen is equipped with the utensils and appliances you'll need to make a quick breakfast or meal.  The bed is a queen sized sofa bed with a firm feel and is quite comfortable. A sleeping pad is provided if desired. The following amenities are included: *Kitchen with the essentials, a stove, refrigerator, and microwave *A/C, heating, intercom and dimmable lights  *Wifi *Flat screen TV *HULU Plus with Live Television (50+ channels) *Netflix *Soap, shampoo, hair dryer, spices, coffee & Tea for your use *Bedding, towels, iron, and ironing board *Hangers and closet space
description: Gorgeous, well-located studio in the heart of Chelsea. Located above street-level in a brownstone, you'll be minutes away from great restaurants & bars, the Chelsea Gallery scene, the beautiful High Line Park, transportation & much more! The studio is a clean, modern and efficient launch pad for exploring all NYC has to offer and accommodates two guests comfortably. The kitchen is equipped with the utensils and appliances you'll need to make a quick breakfast or meal.  The bed is a queen sized sofa bed with a firm feel and is quite comfortable. A sleeping pad is provided if desired. The following amenities are included: *Kitchen with the essentials, a stove, refrigerator, and microwave *A/C, heating, intercom and dimmable lights  *Wifi *Flat screen TV *HULU Plus with Live Television (50+ channels) *Netflix *Soap, shampoo, hair dryer, spices, coffee & Tea for your use *Bedding, towels, iron, and ironing board *Hangers and closet space Guests will have private access to the studio. The e
neighborhood_overview: Chelsea is a unique neighborhood filled with many restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and galleries (see the map for recommended ones). Chelsea is on the border of the trendy Meatpacking District and West Village neighborhoods, the Flatiron district, and the shopping-filled Herald Square. The neighborhood is also a convenient walk, bike or subway ride, or taxi trip to Times Square, Brooklyn, Museum Mile and more - just ask for recommendations!
notes: I'm an avid traveler and Airbnb lover. I've designed this studio to have all the essentials you need. I have plenty of suggestions for things to do nearby - just ask me!
transit: 3 minute walk from the C/E and 1 trains. 5-8 minute walk to the L, A, 2/3 trains. 15 minute walk or 5 minute taxi ride to Penn Station. There are also many bus stops and Citibike stations nearby.
access: Guests will have private access to the studio. The entrance is up the stoop and the 2nd door as you enter the front door.
interaction: We're available to answer questions you have and give recommendations in the neighborhood or elsewhere (Brooklyn, Lower East Side, etc.).
house_rules: Guests are expected to respect the space as if it were their own and make sure all doors are firmly shut, ac/heat is turned off, dishes washed, and apartment is orderly upon exiting the building. No pets are allowed. No smoking, vaping or e-cigarettes of any kind are permitted.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Native New Yorker who loves to travel!

reviews.comments: We absolutely loved this studio!  The location is perfect - very convenient to the 23rd Street subway station which will take you pretty much anywhere you need to go in Manhattan. The studio is at street level on a surprisingly quiet street (at least at night) which makes getting in/out much easier than a place with an elevator or tons of stairs. The studio is small (hence the name), but doesn't fall short on the essentials - spacious bathroom with a HUGE shower and a smart kitchen in case you want to dine in (several grocery stores are nearby). The sofa bed was nice and firm which felt great after a long day. We didn't manage to turn on the TV, but it seemed as though it would have everything you want if you're into that. Overall one of the best airbnb properties we've stayed in - clean, convenient, and a modernized interior with all the big city charm you could wish for. We will definitely stay again when we come back and highly recommend Isabelle's studio to friends and family visiting the "big apple"!

Good location for Chelsea, Meatpacking areas and downtown Manhattan as a whole.  Studio was clean and well looked after, and the host was prompt and friendly.

My only issue was the studio is direcltly adjacent to the entrance for the building, so I was awakened several times by other people entering or leaving the building.  (Doors slamming and motion sensitive lights coming on) If you are a light sleeper, this would be a major issue.  

Other, a nice studio
I felt more than welcome. The host was great and was easy to get in touch with when needed. The neighborhood is safe and easily walkabout to any main attraction. Couldn't have been happier about it.
I had a great time at Isabelle's studio!  The space is gorgeous, in a great part of the city, and has all the essentials.  Isabelle is gracious and super helpful.  I would most certainly stay again!

I loved staying at this studio. It's very conveniently located in Chelsea with lots of great places to eat and drink within walking distance. The space is small, but has everything you need, including a recently renovated kitchen and bathroom. Isabelle was a great host -- very easy to communicate with and quick to respond. I would definitely stay here again!

Isabelle created a very positive experience.  She was always available and approached this with a great attitude.  
The studio was perfect for me.  I stay in AirBNBs about once a month in NYC and this was by far the cleanest place I've stayed in over the past few years.  Very clean and comfortable.  Loved the flowers in the window sill and comfy comforter.  
Thanks so much Isabelle as I appreciate your efforts to make my stay a great one.

In preparation, Isabelle was so responsive, informative, and kind to give us lots of recommendations for places to go out for different types of entertainment and dancing. Upon arriving, we were greeted with a nice welcome note, chocolates, and a very clean,  decorated, fun place that was every bit of lovely as it is conveyed in the pictures. We certainly didn't mind being able to enjoy the smart TV every morning while sleeping in and listening to the sounds of the city through the front windows. I have already recommended this place to friends!

Wow! Das war eine unvergessliche Zeit in Isabelles Studio. Die Nähe zu all den Hot Spots ist unvergleichbar und Chelsea eine Augenweide. Wer nichts mit der Menschenmenge am Times Square zu tun haben will, MUSS sich diese Gegend ansehen. Freundliche Leute und wenig bis gar keine Touristen sind hier anzutreffen.
Das Studio war in einem tadellosem Zustand und ich würde wieder via AirBnb buchen, anstatt in einem Hotelzimmer zu versauern! Die Einkaufmöglichkeiten sind vor der Tür (24/7 shops, Kleider, Sneakers etc.)
Isabelle war bestens vorbereitet und gab zu jeder Zeit Feedbacks.

Danke Isabelle :) gerne wieder!

My wife and I stayed at Isabelle's unit for two days in June 2015. It was everything that we were expecting. Great location - close to trains and plenty of bars/restaurants. The unit isn't huge but definitely big enough for a couple to spend a few days in without a problem. The studio is VERY clean - a big plus! Overall, we loved staying here and would recommend it to other travelers looking for a nice spot to rest their heads during a trip to Manhattan.

Isabelle was a fabulous host! The check-in/ check-out process was simple, and she was flexible with our times.  Her apartment was charming, well-decorated and spotlessly clean.  The neighborhood was safe, central, and very easily walkable with public transport nearby.  There were also many great shops, restaurants drugstores, etc. very close by.  We had a great experience and would surely stay again.

Isabel was very thoughtful, thourogh and accomodating from the start. The place was immaculate, cozy, and exceeded expectations.
The neighborhood is one of my favorites in NYC; the High Line, the local eats and coffee, and don't miss the Whitney!

Fuimos con mi marido por primera vez a New york, nos alojamos en el estudio de Isabelle en Chelsea. Tuvimos una comunicacion muy fluida con Isabelle a traves de mails, ante cualquier duda o consulta su respuesta fue inmediata, el estudio es impecable, ordenado super limpio y comodo. El barrio muy tranquilo con negocios y bares muy cerca, muy cerca del subte y cerca del time square si uno quiere ir a pie, todo espectacular! Gracias Isabelle por todo!
The apartment is very cosy And well located. Perfect for a couple or single traveler. Isabelle was very attencious. The only problem was the noise of open And closing doors. Anyway i recomend.
Isabelle was a great host. She's quick to respond to every request/need and very friendly. The apartment was just as in pictures would stay there again for sure!

Cozy, charming and in a great location if your travels take you in and around Chelsea.  The place was exactly as noted, neat as a pin, and was perfect for my wife and I for the two nights we were there.  All fixtures are modern and stylish (except the vintage record player and Madonna album - nice touch!).  

Isabelle had a nice note waiting for us, and the HVAC, TV, Check In/Out instructions (replete with pictures for the technically challenged) and local recommendations were a great help.  Speaking of local rec's, beer, coffee, pizza, and groceries are very, very close - we lacked for nothing.

We can easily see ourselves staying here again - thanks for a nice stay Isabelle!
Great apartment, beautiful deco. Cosy, centrally located. Highly recommended.
Isabelle was a wonderful host and the studio apartment was very comfortable and clean.  I would recommend for anyone wanting to stay in a convenient part of Chelsea for a few days.
Great experience - the apartment was spotless and comfortable. There was also central air - critical to summers in NY! Isabelle was also extremely flexible regarding check-in and out times.
Perfect location in the heart of Chelsea, with an easy walk to every convenience imaginable. The unit looks exactly like the pictures, is well-maintained, and tastefully decorated.

perfect little clean and modern space in one of the best neighborhoods in new york. 

great location near tons of awesome food, drink and scenery, but even though it's on the ground floor, it's quiet enough to relax and get work done without disruption if need be. no real bed, but the pull out sleeper couch was plenty comfortable (who sleeps in nyc, anyway?). 

the bathroom was enormous, by new york city standards, and was a very welcomed surprise. 

isabelle was very accommodating to my schedule and provided excellent communication throughout to help ensure my stay progressed without a hitch. 

i would absolutely stay here again!
Everything was great, can't complain!

Isabelle was in touch a week prior to check-in and was also very responsive to questions posed right after I booked the studio.  She left us a welcome note, candy and breakfast food - which was a nice touch!  Isabelle was helpful in letting us check-out on time yet leave our luggage at the studio for a couple hours before we had to leave to catch a flight home.

The description and pictures of the studio are spot on - and it is even nicer than it looks when seen in person!  It is cozy, yet spacious (especially for two people).  The bathroom is gorgeous and Isabelle has it stocked with what you need.

The neighborhood is very unique - in artsy Chelsea.  It is right near the action, yet tucked away on a quiet street.  The Port Authority and Penn Station are walking distance away (about 15-20 min) and several Metro line stations are just a few blocks away.  We found it was walking distance to Times Square area, down to the Financial District and to the water in south Manhattan - although we enjoy walking.

Great central location in Manhattan to explore the city and visit local universities.
Clean space, great neighborhood.
Isabelle was absolutely fantastic and the place was just as it looked, if not better! Loved our time in NYC and will definitely be back again!

Isabelle was very good at communicating with me through out the entire process. She answered all of our questions before booking the trip, before arriving and during our stay. The apartment it self was just like in the pictures and even better in person. Just enough space for 2 people. The welcome note she left for us was a nice touch along with some chocolate. The suggestions were also very helpful and tried almost all of them.
Isabelle was great with communications! This is an amazing location! Perfect!!
This is a great apartment, although not very large, but it contains all you need. Location is very good, the landlord is also very intimate. Next time you come to New York, you will live here.
Perfect.  Was a great place to come back to after a day exploring the city.

Isabelle's place was great.  She was very nice and was very quick to respond to any questions that we had.  The studio was clean and comfortable.  It was a perfect location for us while visiting the city.  Check in and check out was extremely easy as well!

I booked Isabelle's studio for my parents who were coming to visit NYC, it was clean, comfortable and in a great area. Everything was seamless and easy and they had a great stay. Isabelle was always prompt to answering any questions. I would recommend the studio  to friends and relatives visiting NYC, its a small home away from home.

We had a fantastic stay at Isabelle's apartment.  Great location on a quiet tree-lined street with very easy access to the subway.  The apartment was both clean and comfortable, and the bathroom was especially spacious.
Isabelle was very responsive and easy to communicate with...we would stay again in a heartbeat.

Terrific, prompt communication and excellent instructions about entry to the studio. Compact, nicely furnished apartment that was quiet and cozy, in a great location! Enjoyed my stay at Isabelle's place. Thanks.

There is a short way to the subway and to lots of shops from Isabelles appartment. We could walk to the Highline in a short time.
It is a very nice, bright and clean appartment.
Isabelle was very helpfull, and wenn we had questions, she answered very quickly.
We can highly recommand the appartment, and if we once again are going to New York, we would love to stay at Isabelles  appartment .

We would highly recommend Isabelle's lovely Chelsea studio. It's compact but perfect for a NYC stay. Though it's in a terrific central area, it's quiet, with good stores nearby - Foragers for groceries and lovely sourdough baguettes, and Grumpy cafe for excellent coffee. Thanks Isabelle for these suggestions. The studio was very clean with good reference books on NYC. Our queries were answered promptly. Nice big shower. Would recommend making up the sofa bed daily for more room. It's firm and comfortable, unlike some sofa beds. Thanks for your hospitality, Isabelle. Just sorry we couldn't stay longer as it was booked already.

Me and me wife enjoyed a 5 night stay at Isabelle's place in September 2015 and it was fantastic. Communication with Isabelle was easy and she was always very quick to get back to us regarding any queries. Gaining entry to the apartment upon our arrival was easy and everything went smoothly. The apartment itself was clean, tidy and beautifully furnished. It's also ideally located in Chelsea with lots of bars and restaurants just minutes away. It's also very handy for the Subway, with the closest station being just two blocks away on 23rd Street. We would definitely recommend Isabelle's place to anybody. We ourselves hope to return some time in the future. Thanks again Isabelle.

This is a great little apartment - like a new hotel room - very fresh as newly (and thoughtfully) renovated.  Felt secure (two key entries to get in, barred windows), quiet (quiet street, sound proofed windows, super quiet new AC), clean and comfortable.  Only criticism (and it's minor) is I was only left one towel and hand towel for a two night stay (for one person).  I wrote to Isabel and requested another but didn't hear back, so wonder if the message might have gone astray.

I decided to surprise my boyfriend with a trip to NY for his birthday. I had stayed in Chelsea with my friends last year so I wanted to stick to the same area because I knew my way around and it's easy to get to anywhere from there. 

Isabelle was a great host! The studio was spotless, cute and cosy. It was perfect for our needs. Everything we needed was there and convenient to use; she made it really easy and it felt like it was our own place. We had a late flight on the day that we were leaving, and she was kind enough to look after our suitcases for the rest of the day. Her communication was great too, quick responses and clearly answered any questions I had. 

We would definitely stay here again. 
Thanks Isabelle and Gary :)

Host was very welcoming and allowed me to leave my bags for the day before check-in which was very accommodating. The place was small but very clean and wonderfully located. Quiet neighborhood with good things to eat nearby, including a french bakery/pastry shop! Check-in and out was easy. Communication with Isabelle was perfect. Couch bed was comfy enough. Thanks!

Helen met us before check-in time and was very helpful and sweet! The residential feel was perfect, yet the location is so central to many things. The process of renting the studio was simple and easy. The place is exactly as described. It was spacious, modern, newer, clean and felt very safe. We will absolutely return here!

We had the greatest time at Isabelle's apartment.  The location is absolutely perfect! The apartment was clean and well organized. Check in was easy and comfortable. Also we had an evening  flight but Isabelle was very flexible and let us stay a few more hours after check out. Highly recommended!

My stay at Isabelle's studio was perfect.   The studio is perfectly organised with everything you may require.  Location is great; close to subway lines but also comfortable walking distance from Greenwich and West Village.  The High Line is a less than a 5 minute walk.Isabelle was very responsive and check in and out very easy.  I would recommend this studio unreservedly.

We felt very welcome in the apartment, there was a card left for us for our arrival which made us feel welcome. 

The apartment was very clean and had all the essentials that we needed for our short stay in NYC. The location of the apartment was great, close to the subway so accessing the rest of the city was fast and easy.

Isabelle was very easy to communicate with, very prompt replies.

We would love to stay in this apartment again when we re visit NYC.

The apartment is very cozy, for one works perfect, could be for a couple as well of course because the sofa bed is very comfortable.  Location is perfect, neighbourhood is lovely for morning walks . Isabelle was very kind and was available all the time.  If you're coming to NY for some days and want to stay close to everything in town, this is a great place.

I can highly recommend this place as it is very central in Chelsea and close by to all the nice stores and food markets. Everything in the studio is very nice arranged and very clean. I appreciate the good advices for food and coffee I received from Isabell a lot.
Check in and check out was very easy. Thx again for having us!

What a lovely welcoming studio.  Very clear instructions of how to get in, everything was as described and we even got a short personalised welcome note.

The studio is superbly located for subway access and a 15 or so minute walk from Penn Station, a great launch pad for all the major attractions.

The studio itself is cosy with all of the amenities you'd expect, loved the spacious shower especially.  It was a great base for a short NYC anniversary visit for my wife and I.

First off, I want to say that Isabelle was more than accommodating, and the unit was exactly as described (and pictured). It was a nice, small studio on the first floor. The neighborhood was a nice change in pace from the normal NYC, but only a short walk away from the craziness of Times Square, Rockefeller Center, etc., if you want to experience that. Overall, a great alternative to an expensive hotel.

The bed (couch) was not too bad, but if you are a light sleeper you might want to bring an extra pillow and some ear plugs. Like most places in NYC (hotels included!) there was a lot of street noise throughout the night. We also had one incident that I can only assume doesn't happen often. At about 1:30AM we had the buzzer for our unit rang by a young woman who had clearly been out having a good time. No big deal, it's NYC so you should have a good time, but after her friend (don't know who she was there to see, I assume there are several units above the first floor but I have no clue) came down to get her and let her in the building, she started opening our door! I wasn't concerned for safety seeing as I could see her on the screen and she was obviously just a drunk girl acting drunk and opening what she thought to be her door, but the concerning thing was that it seemed like her key worked for our door before her friend grabbed her and stopped her. I don't know if there are multiple units, and I am only speculating since the door never opened all the way, but either way it was a frustrating experience to have to deal with at 1:30 in the morning.

Back to the unit itself, the bathroom was nice and having a fridge is a nice benefit when in the city. The only real complaint that we had was cleanliness. We would have liked the unit to be a bit cleaner as we did find some hairs in the sheets they provided, but we were an early check-in so they may not have had the normal time to clean. The TV also didn't work while we were there, but you shouldn't be inside watching TV in NYC anyways.

Isabelle was really a great host and allowed to to experience the city in a new way. I recommend staying here if you want to experience a different slice of NYC life.

One of the best hosts I have ever had. Loved the personal note and chocolate. Nice touch. The location of this apartment is super convenient to everywhere. Very clean, neat and resourceful space. Super comfortable bed, which was a pleasant surprise. Side note, the water pressure in the shower was amazing. Like Niagara Falls in there! Definitely will stay here again!

We enjoyed our stay very much! The studio was just as described and very clean and fresh feeling. Isabelle was very professional and responsive.  The studio, even though small, was  very comfortable. The location was perfect right in the heart of Chelsea. Would definitely go back!

My husband and I went to NYC for sight seeing and to celebrate his birthday. We were welcomed with a sweet note, bday wishes and chocolates. The studio was clean and in a perfect location, we truly felt like locals staying there. My husband is 6'4 and we were a little concerned about the pull out bed, but after reading other positive reviews, we decided to give it a try. The reviews were right! It was super comfortable! A perfect place to crash after sight seeing in New York all day. We tried almost all of Isabelle's recommendations for the the area and they were all wonderful! She was a GREAT host and always answered any questions very quickly. We would highly recommend staying in this studio :)

My partner and I travelled to New York to spend both Christmas and New Years in this wonderful city. When we arrived we felt like locals walking up to our Brownstone and then up the stoop to our house. We were greeted by a little note welcoming us as well as a couple of chocolates (which were needed after the long flight). The studio was clean and was in the perfect location to see much of what New York has to offer with the Highline only a couple of blocks away as well as the Flatiron and many great deli’s and grocery stores near by. The Studio was comfortable and was fantastic to rest your tired feet from a day of walking.  We also tried Isabelle’s recommendations and loved the coffee at Grumpy Café! We would highly recommenced staying at Isabelle’s studio.

Isabelle's house is a perfect location for both Chelsea bars and restaurants and time square. We walked to most of the main attractions from the apartment. The apartment itself is cosy and stylish. Very clean and checkin and checkout was a breeze. We really enjoyed our time here and wouldn't hesitate to stay again!
The apartment was really clean and very well decorated. Loved watching netflix! Would recommend and stay again!

The place was exactly as described.  Clean and comfortable.  Checking in was a breeze.  Took me about a minute to get from my car into the apartment.  Isabelle was very good with communication.  The best part (in my opinion) was the neighborhood.  Many dining options nearby as well as drug stores and grocery stores.  Will definitely stay there again.
This is an amazing studio.  Definitely would stay here again.

Isabelle's apartment was clean and conveniently located in the heart of Chelsea. It's small but exactly as per the photo - toilet was clean and newly renovated with great water pressure. I arrived late at night from my flight and Isabelle was kind enough to pop down to help me find the keys.
The downside of the apartment is that it's located on the ground floor so if you're a light sleeper like me - it was quite noisy at night with a lot of street noise. I would bring ear plugs next time.
This is a really clean and convenient apartment. I like it. If I go to New York again, I will choose it again.

This place is so awesome that as soon as I checked in I immediately started looking for the next dates that I could book. Unfortunately, everyone that has previously been hosted by Isabelle thought the same thing, apparently and booked all the possible dates that I could've booked in the near future.

Need a studio with all the modern amenities and comforts of home? This fits the bill. I had a great stay and couldn't have asked for a better way to end my workday than to come back here and chill. Everything was as listed in the description and exceeded my expectations of what can be possible in a studio space like this. Crisp and comfy to be in and convenient location to so much of what NY has to offer.
Isabelle's studio was clean, convenient and well-designed. The bathroom is amazing. Unfortunately, my wife and I found the sofa-bed somewhat uncomfortable for two people.

Isabelle's place was cozy, quiet, and had everything I needed for my stay. Close to everything you could ever want. I was very comfortable on the couch, but I am not sure two people would be. Thanks Isabelle!

Had the best time in our little studio in Chelsea. It may be small but the location was priceless and it doesn't take long until you feel at home. Bed was very comfortable and the shower was great. Awesome brownstone in a typical Chelsea street - with the stairway up to the apartment to match. Isabelle was very accommodating and helpful.

Wow! Can't say anything negative about the Chelsea apartment!! Location was amazing and very close to the subway.  Neighborhood was super safe and lovely with its tree lined streets.  The apartment: VERY clean, comfy queen bed, huge bathroom and on the first floor!! Isabelle left fresh flowers and a welcome note also.  You truly feel like a New Yorker staying here.  A favorite area of the neighborhood is The Highline Park. I would highly recommend this adorable apartment!! Can't wait to come back!!
The apartment was perfect for us and in a brilliant location. Communication was good throughout. Thanks Isabelle, we'd definitely stay again next time!

Isabelle was a great host. She replied to emails in a matter of minutes and was always very kind and informative. Her apartment and it's location were just what we were looking for. The futon was really quite comfortable and the place was immaculate.

La estadia fue fantástica. El estudio es muy cómodo, muy práctico, moderno y bien decorado y la ubicación es ideal. En el corazón de Chelsea! Teníamos vs metros, restos, bares por doquier , galerias de arte, high line, el mercado... y el barrio es muy relajado, bonito, super agradable. 
Isabelle atenta y dispuesta a asistirnos de ser necesario. Volveríamos sin duda!!!!!

Isabelle gave us excellent, easy directions to locate her lovely Chelsea apartment.  This compact apartment is in a terrific location close to everything, it is stylishly decorated, very clean and tidy. The pull out sofa bed was surprisingly cosy and roomy, with good quality bedding. Instructions for using the air-conditioning would have been great as we had some very hot weather while we were in New York. Also a  toaster and kettle would have been useful however we were able to boil water for a cup of tea in the saucepan. So all in all it is a real gem, we had a terrific time in New York. Thanks Isabelle.

This is a great place in a fantastic part of the city. It's very close to many subway lines and tons of restaurants. The High Line is nearby as well. The apartment is very modern and I was surprised at how large the bathroom was. Check in and out were both simple. If you're looking for a good home base from which to explore the city, this is an excellent choice.

Isabelle was a great host. We were flying in after having spent 2 weeks in Europe and she had the sofa bed all made for us. We needed to talk to her about the AC and she was reachable and very responsive. In fact, it worked perfectly!  The compact apt was lovely, the sofa bed was very comfortable for my husband and myself and the small kitchen and lovely bathroom were just right.  In addition the location was ideal.
Extremely well located studio in the village. It was clean, comfortable, cheerful, and nicely appointed. Neighborhood had a great vibe. Would definitely recommend.

This is my second time to stay in Isabelle's apt and it was just as great this time.  Location is TERRIFIC!! I highly recommend her apt.  You won't be disappointed. Tons of restaurants and subway is very close.  Check in is a breeze and apt. is super clean.  Thank you again Isabelle!!
Clean and cozy; Isabelle has good taste in books! Instructions were clear and check-in/check-out easy. Thanks Isabelle!

Had an amazing stay at Isabelle's place. She was easy to reach, and provided everything I needed. The studio is very comfortable and clean! The location is also perfect. Would definitely recommend the studio for those looking for a place other then hotels to stay in the city.

This was my second time staying here, and once again I loved it. The location is perfect for travelers interested in exploring the city, with three major subway stations (taking you just about anywhere) in close proximity at 6th, 7th, and 8th Avenues. The air conditioning was very nice since I arrived during a heat wave. The convertible sofa bed is surprisingly comfortable. The wifi is strong and steady. And the neighborhood has charm and every convenience you'll need.
Absolutely great location! Apartment was perfect for our needs as a couple. It was modern, clean and comfortable. Check-in and check-out were seamless and hassle free. thanks for a great stay.

This was our most seamless Airbnb experience to date. Isabelle responded immediately to any questions we had. The studio was beautiful, very clean, and well appointed with a fabulous shower and very comfortablele sofa bed. The Chelsea side street was (mostly) quiet and exactly where we wanted to be! Great walking, restaurants, shops and of course the Highline close by! Can wait to stay here again.
I had a great time at the appartment. The location is amazing if you like chelsea.

Beau petit studio,extrêmement bien situé au cœur de Chelsea tout près du High Line.Quelques bémols : la petite cuisine manque de quelques équipements de base : un grille-pain, des linges à vaisselle, une machine à café. La TV n'est pas reliée à un distributeur , seul l'accès internet est possible.
Malgré tout, très propre et un sofa-lit très confortable .

The location of the studio was perfect for us; a short walk to and from the subway; many places to eat nearby; seemed close to many places we wanted to visit.  The studios was very comfortable and quiet.  Our only suggestion would be to include maybe a notebook where the host and guests could leave suggestions of good places to rent bikes, etc., something visitors could refer to to get their bearings.

We enjoyed our stay at Isabelle's studio.  It's such a cool space!  The location is perfect.  Close enough to Meatpacking and LES, and the neighborhood itself has a lot to offer. Coordinating with Isabelle was effortless.  She responds right away and provides meticulous instructions to make the check in process as easy as can be.

My stay here was perfect. The location is great--lots of great restaurants and close to several subway stops. The studio is clean and has everything you need--I felt very safe here. Isabelle was great to work with--always got back to me quickly with thorough answers to my questions. I will be back!

Staying at Isabelle's studio was a joy! It was clean, comfortable, and the location was super convenient. Isabelle was very proactive about making sure I had all the information I needed for a smooth stay.

I ended up walking to my work in Meatpacking most days and took the subway for more far-flung destinations. MTA has been doing a lot of subway construction on the weekends lately (or maybe I just have bad luck), so having all those stops nearby definitely came in handy.

The apartment itself was tastefully decorated and well-lit. You can hear a bit of noise from outside during peak hours, but it's mostly quiet at night. Nice selection of books and records available, too!

This was a great place in an excellent location!  Isabelle was fast to respond to my emails and very helpful with information about the neighborhood.  The apartment was big by New York standards and well kept... I'd definitely recommend this place and look forward to staying here again!

Isabelle was an excellent host! My friend and I stayed there for a weekend girls trip and loved it! The location was great and Isabelle always answered any questions I had about the city or stay immediately! I would definitely stay there again! :)
Everything was easy and exactly as in the pictures. Isabelle rrally thought of everything. I would come back for sure!

The apartment is very well furnished, luminous, cozy and very well positioned. Perfect to reach all parts of the city. Even if is small, you can find everything you need (shampo, conditioner, hairdryer, kitchen tools...).

Upon my arrival, everything was exactly as pictured/described. I didn't realize how close this listing was to so many cool things (like David Chang's Momofuku and Milk Bar, The Meatball Shop, the Metropolitan Pavilion, the train stop that I needed most frequently, etc.). I actually even ended up getting my dress shoes resoled at the best cobbler in the city, which was a 3 minute walk from here. 

The pullout bed was arguably the most comfortable one I've slept on, the wifi access was consistent (important for me since this was a work trip), and the place had plenty of space. 

If you're considering this listing, just go ahead and book it. You won't find a better deal in Chelsea. I'm keeping this one on my list for future travels, for sure.

Isabelle's place is a true gem. It is on a quiet and safe charming street. As soon as I entered the studio I could tell it had been freshly cleaned. The sofa bed as well as the bedding was very comfortable. The bathroom was all marble and the shower has great pressure and stays hot. The kitchen has all the supplies needed if you wish to make your own meals. It was a beautiful studio which I felt at home in and wish I could have stayed longer. I did not meet Isabelle but contacted her to find out how to use the smart tv and received an immediate response. Thank you for opening up your home to me and I hope to stay again next time I am in New York.

It was a great experience! The studio was very clean and so cute! It's also close to everything!! I briefly met Isabelle when we were checking in, she was fantastic. 

Definitely will go back if I ever visit NYC again. Thanks for the great experience :)

All previous reviews for isabelle's place were spot on! Location was wonderful, on a quiet street but close enough to everything you'd want to see and do in the area. Studio was just the right size, very cozy and great value for money for site and size. Amenities were complete. Communication with her was easy. It was a great find and recommend it without reservation

Pros: nice location, fairly quiet street especially in mornings on weekends, close to where I needed to go for business, close to Whole Foods, Foragers, nice juice bar on corner, and a block away from Blossom, my fav restaurant in the area (I am vegan), very walkable area.  It was indeed very clean, great water pressure in bath sink and shower, great hot water, but not in early morning (see below).  Didn't use the kitchen so can't comment on that.  Nice foyer entry, easy key access.  Host easily accessible, very nice and responds quickly.

Cons:  Not a lot of storage/closet space and only about 6 hangers, but it wasn't an issue for me, just an observation.  If you use a washcloth for showering you need to bring your own, there are hand towels and bath towels but no wash cloths.  I mention it as I've never run across that situation in all my years of travel....and I use a washcloth.  There was an issue with the bed sheets which owner tried to resolve but replacement sheets didn't fit so I just did the best I could.  Bed may at one time have been really nice, but it's starting to go past it's shelf life.  If it's just one person and you sleep on the outside section of the mattress you'll be fine but the bend in the mattress (from being folded into sofa position) is permanent at this point and the mattress sags into the crease which is not comfortable to sleep in.  During weekdays at around 8:00 am there is absolutely NO hot water, an hour later there is, and perhaps even earlier, but if you get up at that particular time  you might as well forget it being even lukewarm.  My biggest disappointment was the TV.  It does indeed say it's a smart TV in the listing and it's my fault for not noticing that, but...I really wanted to come back after working and watch the evening news or a fav program or two, but all you can do is a search on past news programs and watch clips....and it took waaay too much time to look around thro the available apps.  I really missed just being able to turn on the tv and watch that evenings programming.  

I really wasn't as comfortable as I would have liked and so probably won't be back, but there are some very nice things about the place and everyone's experience and expectations are different....the things that I had an issue with might not bother someone else.

As first timers we were a little apprehensive but we needn't have worried. Isabelle contacted us a couple of days before with step by step instructions on how to get in to the apartment and was easily reached during our stay. The sofa bed was very comfy and the whole apartment very clean. We loved the neighbourhood, great to come back to after a day of sightseeing. Would highly recommend.

Nice place! Great connections to explore the city, easy check in.

Neibourhood is really nice, with lots of options for lunch and dinner!

Couch is ok! Do not doubt if considering to stay because of that!

The studio is very pleasant and well located (short walk to join several subway lines).
We had a very pleasant stay at NY.
Isabelle always answer very quickly to our questions.

This is my second time staying at Isabelle's place and it was wonderful. The studio is always extremely clean and very comfortable. The neighborhood is charming and has great restaurants within walking distance. Subways are near by. Isabelle responds immediately to any questions and is very nice. I highly recommend this studio and hope to stay again next time I visit NYC.
This apartment is fantastically located, clean and well equipped for a fantastic NYC trip whatever your purpose. It is small but comfortable.
Great location with lots of excellent bars and restaurants close by. 15 minute walk to Times Square. Studio is cosy but the fold out bed is very comfortable and has a great bathroom.

I spent 4 days at Isabelle's studio. It is a lovely place. Clean, modern, well located, nice area, close to subway stations, etc. 
I highly recommend the place for a couple or if are by yourself! 
And Isabelle was a very host. She gave me all information I need, both prior to my arrival and during my stay.
Thanks Isabelle!!!

My girlfriend and I stayed at Isabelle's place over the new year period and could hardly fault it! It is clean, well appointed, modern and is the perfect escape from the crowds while being close to the subway for easy access to the attractions of NYC.
All our communication was prompt and curteous and check in/out was a breeze! 
Thanks again Isabelle, highly recommend!!
Apartment was very clean and found it exactly as described. Great location close to many restaurants and bars right in Chelsea. Highly recommend!

Isabelle's place is a basic studio in Chelsea, and in a very good location close to restaurants, stores, and public transportation. 

The unit was clean and exactly as described, and she was a great host with very quick communication and provided all the information we needed. 

It is on the first floor (but up a small flight of stairs) so there can be a little bit of noise from people walking around at night, but we didn't have any problems with it. 

The unit is basic, and feels like a hotel room. The bed is a pull-out futon but was fairly comfortable and suited our needs. 

Overall, I would recommend staying here if traveling for work or just want a simple home base for exploring NYC.

The location is great, quiet and accessible to everything you need. The apartment is very roomy by NY standards. The host was accommodating and nice. Was in town for business and would definitely book here again.
Great apartment! Very nice and clean place located in a great area close to many main attractions.

Isabelle's place was practically perfect. It's on one of the best blocks in Chelsea, and is a thoughtfully put together studio. The building and block are quiet, but right next to anything you could need or want. The unit itself is so clean, comfortable, and feels very homey. I'd highly recommend this place to anyone, and I'll definitely try to stay here again when I'm back.

This was the perfect studio to land in for my first trip to New York City.  Chelsea is a great neighbourhood and the very central location of this studio makes it easy to walk around.  Alternatively, this spot is located very close to two subway stations that service the main routes through the city.  As an added surprise, the street is also very quiet for that occasional cheeky sleep-in  :)  The studio itself is really comfortable with a large fold-out bed a great bathroom/shower and heating/cooling system.

My husband and I stayed here for 4 nights and enjoyed our stay. The apartment is nice and clean and easy access to a lot of markets/restaurants/subway. The bed was actually really comfortable and the apartment felt safe. Would stay here again next time we are in NYC.
We enjoyed our stay! The studio is very central in a calm street. Communication with Isabelle was perfect. When we arrived the laundry was not clean and we had clean sheets within 5 minutes.
Would stay here anytime! Great experience!

Isabelle's Brownstone apartment in central Chelsea is quaint and exactly as she describes. It is central to everything you need when visiting NY. I loved it, just perfect for a couple who are out and about sight seeing all day and need to rest their weary bones at night. Awesome!
The apartment is great! The location is right near the subway, making getting around NYC a breeze.  The place was really clean and had everything needed to be comfortable.  We had a great time!
A wonderful place to stay at an unbeatable price in a great part of the city! So comfy and clean and very easy to communicate with Isabelle. Highly recommend!
Excelente piso, limpio y bien decorado, muy bien ubicado, un lugar muy tranquilo y en la mejor zona de nyc. Volveré!
Great location.

If you are looking for a quiet place in NYC, but also a place where you can enjoy all the touris attractions easily, this is the place for you. The house is clean and Isabelle quickly responses to all requests and always willing to help. There is a E line subway station nearby (3-4 mins walk i think) and so it will only take about 10 mins to Mid Manhattan. Also, Penn Station & Porthauthority Bus Staion is located nearby so if you are planning to go to Woodbury outlet or the suburbs of NYC, it will be comforatble to stay in this apartment. It sure is very close to Chelsea Market, Highline Park, Soho, and Lower Manhattan. You won't regret staying here!
Convenient location and well-appointed apartment.

In town for a conference at the Javits a center and the location was perfect just a quick walk to the subway entrance and when the weather was nice a fairly quick walk along the high line dropped me right off at the conference center. Close enough to bars and restaurants but still located on a quiet residential street. The studio was clean and tue perfect size for two people. I will definitely stay here again when I'm back in NYC.
A cozy gem ideally located in Chelsea. The sofa bed was surprisingly comfortable.

This was my third time at Isabelle's place and, as always, it was top notch. A very nice apartment in a great location, close to transit, restaurants, and amenities. Simple check-in and check-out. Everything is as-advertised. I will continue to choose this place when I visit NYC in the future.

Apartment was exactly as described and extremely clean. Communication with Isabelle was excellent. When accidentally locked out of the apartment, Isabelle resolved the issue within an hour. Highly recommended.

Very nice little studio on the heart of Chelsea, close to Greenwich and tons of nice restaurants. We loved our stay at Isabelle's place ! She gave us very precise info for checkin / checkout and was very helpful.
Would definitely come back.

This was a great place with a wonderful location. It was perfect for what we needed and very clean! Isabelle was super helpful with recommendations on great coffee and places to eat! We had the chance to meet her and she was so kind. We will stay here again in the future and highly recommend her place!

Clean, very cozy apartment in a good location.  Isabelle and her husband were available to help us out whenever we needed it.  Overall, we were happy with our 6 night stay.

If you're a light sleeper, like me, consider getting some earplugs.  You will get some street noise (like just about anywhere in NYC) and there are people coming and going in the building.

This place is the definition of a charming NY studio. It is small but everything in it is up-to-date and Isabelle and Carlos have done a lot to make it comfortable and pleasant to stay in. It's the perfect place to stay when you know you'll be out most of the time but need a cozy retreat to get back to when you're ready to relax.
Lovely neighborhood, the studio was a bit too small for us

Really nice little place, just like the photos. Think nice NY hotel with the added touch of a stove top, real size shampoo, and a nice table to sit at.

The neighborhood is great - near grocery stores, shops, restaurants, and MTA. 

Check-in and check-out were so easy! 

There was some noise at night from other tennants coming and going. Would not stop me from staying again and in fact I hope to do so. Will just bring my sleeping mask and ear plugs which are NY staples!

Absolutely recommend.

GREAT location and their recommendations are definitely worth considering (particularly in terms of food!). Perfect for two people and the amenities were great. Felt safe and cozy in the neighborhood of Chelsea. Would definitely go back!

Charles was a fantastic host, he was very attentive to our needs. Traveling with an infant can be hard so it was nice to stay somewhere with a host that responds very politely and timely to requests!

The apartment is as described, very clean, very comfortable. My wife and I were pleasantly surprised with the standard of the whole apartment, the restroom in particular. The sofa bed was easy to set up, spacious, and comfortable. We didn't use the cooking facilities as there are lots of great restaurant options nearby, but the kitchen was well stocked and clean.

The next time we are looking for somewhere to stay in New York, we would love to be able to stay here again!
Great location and comfortable!!
A lovely studio in a great neighborhood. A real treat for this visitor.

The pictures looked exactly like the apartment. I loved that the apartment was walking distance to all the restaurants and the Pier. Prior before arriving, Isabelle sent me the best spots to visit near the apartment and, and during Charles followed up on my stay to see if everything was okay. I would definitely stay here again.

This spot is a perfect location for a convenient stay in the city. Very close to transit, great restaurants and stores, and its on a fairly quiet street. Not to mention they have air conditioning, a major plus for NYC in the summer. Highly recommended!
The unit was great. The location is central to almost everything and we had a great stay.
Great location abd instructions

Great location.  Very quiet street and unit.  Very modern clean studio.  Bathroom fantastic.  Extremely easy check-in/out procedure.  Excellent communication with the host.  The only minor complaint would be the bed (convertible sofa unit - not a fold out) is a little firm and is pushed up against the wall so you have to roll over the other person in the bed to get in and out during the night.  Certainly not enough to reduce from 5* rating but something to be aware of.
Perfect location, spotlessly clean and stocked with all the essentials!  I'm hoping it's available the next time we travel to visit the city!  I wouldn't want to stay anywhere else.

What a perfect location in the heart of Chelsea.  The place was clean and just what we needed in terms of space and amenities.  Charles was easy to communicate with.  He was kind enough to let us leave our luggage past checkout until we left for flight.  Highly recommend !

Beautiful, small apartment with all the necessities! The apartment was extremely clean and super easy to check in/out of. Also, it faces one of the quiet streets in Chelsea. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone wanting to stay in the area.

The studio was great for our 3 days in NYC. It was very clean and comfortable  for 2 people, a much better alternative to many hotels in the area. The location was also perfect for us as we were able to walk to most places that we needed to get to or quickly jump on the subway which was just a few short blocks away. Charles was quick to respond to all questions and very detailed with his instructions. Thanks for a nice stay!
Great location, and easy access to anywhere else in the city. Would highly recommend this spot.
Everything as described, great location,  excellent communication with the host, superfast replies, the bed was a little soft but thats a matter of taste I guess, we can recommend this place!

The studio was great, small but cosy and well-equipped. The location was excellent, in a quieter part of Manhattan, with High Line just down the block and plenty of great cafés and restaurangs around. We never met Charles but he was quick to reply when questions arose, and we felt very secure with everything while staying in the studio.

Charles's place was wonderful. Beautiful, clean space. Bathroom was a great size. Much bigger than expected. Sofa bed was more comfortable than expected. Everything we needed was provided including bathroom essentials like a hair dryer and shampoo/soap/conditioner. He even provided extra blankets for our baby to sleep on the floor. We were very comfortable here. I wouldn't stay here if you have more than 2 adults and 1 small child, but it's a perfect size space for that many people.

My parents stayed at the apartment and loved it so much...
They just kept on saying how amazed they were about the location and how clean it was.
Thanks Charles for everything :)

Charles’ place was absolutely perfect for our weekend getaway.  It was close to the subway, and some great restaurants/bars. We went to Coopers Craft & Kitchen (recommended by Charles) the night we got there. So good. Yummy craft beers and good. Perfect start to the weekend. 
The apartment was super clean and had everything we needed. Also the bed was very comfortable. 
We loved it! Hopefully we can come stay again when we visit NYC in the future!  Thanks again Charles!

Es un pequeño estudio ubicado en el buen barrio de Chelsea.
Posee todos lo que necesitas si eres un turista que va a pasar la mayor parte del tiempo fuera del apartamento, por lo que no es mu recomendable para gente que quiera pasar parte del dia en él, por lo pequeño que es, pero hay que considerar que la ubicación y cercanía al metro hace que los espacios sean asi.
No posee tv por cable, pero si posee servicio por streaming.
La cocina es pequeña pero sirve perfecto para preparar desayuno u otra comida que no sea tan elaborada.
Charles es muy atento y te da las instrucciones exactas tanto para el check in, las reglas de la casa y el check out.
En resumen, un muy buen lugar con una excelente ubicacion para turistas que deseen estar en Manhattan.

This studio is just perfect - perfect location, clean, very nicely decorated with all the essentials and using good quality fixtures, tiles and design. It was great to have the shower essentials too. Basically, just bring toothpaste! And the shower is nice and spacious. The pull out bed is comfortable and easy to make. The studio felt homey right away. The Street is pretty quiet and I had no problem sleeping. The AC was quiet and efficient. Wi-fi nice and fast. Neighbourhood is ace. Basically, super place. Highly recommend.

Perfect place to stay in Chelsea. Excellent location and value. Very clean and on quiet street (relative to what you would expect in the city). Modern walk in shower was a bonus. Quick responses on communications with host. Would be lucky to find this place available again next time around.

The apartment was exactly as pictured and the location was perfect! The bathroom was huge, the bed was super comfy, and everything you could possible need was just a short walk away. The check in process was easy and we were so pleasantly surprised at how many neat little places were within walking distance. If you get a chance to stop by the trailer park lounge on 23rd (right off of 8th) you won’t regret it! We had a great time and can’t wait to come back.

The studio is amazing! Very well located, near the subway and between midtown and downtown. Chelsea is a fantastic neighborhood for those looking for a truly New Yorker experience. The studio itself has all the amenities necessary, it is very clean and the sofa bed is quite comfortable as well. Charles is an amazing host, always ready to help and providing quick responses. Couldn’t be more satisfied with this experience. Thanks Charles!

This was the perfect "home-base" for a recent trip to NYC. The apartment is modern and tastefully decorated; the location is fantastic. You are in walking distance of many sights, shops, and stores. The pull-out bed is surprisingly comfy and the bathroom is spacious. I felt like a true New Yorker walking down the tree lined streets of Chelsea.
Amazingly clean, centrally located, and cozy place!
Fantastic studio in the heart of Chelsea. Sofa bed is very comfortable and the place is amazing.
I would stay here again for sure. Very clean, efficient, great location, and a comfortable stay. Excellent little touches. Ideal for 1 person. Highly recommend.

Great little studio in a wonderful location. Modern style and very clean. Charles was very responsive and a great host overall. I will definitely consider staying at his place again on my next trip to NY.
What a great apartment in the heart of Chelsea.  Super clean, sofa bed was comfortable.  Great for two people.  Bathroom and shower were great.  So much better than an overpriced NYC hotel room.
Great spot for a single or dual traveler. Quite by NY standards and I may have gotten the most sleep I have gotten in a couple years. Clean, great feel/vibe.

Charles' place was super-cute and a great value - particularly for the location which is right in the heart of Chelsea. We were in town to see a Broadway show and to visit our kids who live in Brooklyn and his place was perfectly located for both. This is a New York studio apartment and so you shouldn't expect it to be huge but it was just right for us and very beautifully designed.
Great place! Super clean, thoughtful host, and quiet.

Very Clean, modern, located close to everything you might want. It's on the ground floor and is a short walk to both the 7th Ave subway (Red) and the 8th Ave subway (Blue)... Fluffy towels, iron and board, lots of outlets, cable TV (though I didn't turn it on), silverware and dishes, A/C and heat controls, etc. It's a small place and the couch opens to provide the bed burns perfect for a solo or couple.  The NYC street noise is as expected. Charles took care of a small issue within minutes and answered the phone immediately when I called. Overall a great experience and I would repeat.

My husband and I stayed at Charles' apartment 3 nights and had a lovely time. It is very clean and the location is great. It's nice to have shampoo and conditioner so as not to have to bring with us. The futon bed is very comfortable and so all good.
Incredibly easy, great location, great space that has pretty much everything anybody would need for a short trip to NYC!
Very easy in and out process, Charles was very responsive to all communications. The space is clean and in a great part of town, very walkable to several great tourist attractions.
Perfect location. Space is very clean and modern. We loved it!
Great location for restaurants, Flatiron shopping, Trains, Meat Packing. Very clean and efficient use of space. Check In was easy and Charles was very responsive.
Really beautiful, stylish apartment in the heart of Chelsea. Very easy to get around the City. Very clean and homely. Little cupboard space so don't overpack. Loved our stay, thank you!
Wonderful studio! Incredibly clean and nicely renovated. The bathroom was top-notch - huge shower with great water pressure.
The studio is beautifully designed with a lot of attention to detail. We loved the neighborhood and basically enjoyed everything about it.
Nice and clean ! Would definitely book again
Great host and wonderful apartment. Would always go back there again!
Great place, highly recommend. Charles is a great host and gets back to you asap if you have any questions. Stayed 2x's already.

An outstanding experience. Charles’s attention to detail, thoroughness, flexibility, and quick communication makes him the best host we have ever had. If you have the opportunity to stay at his place, grab it!  I wish I could give more than 5 stars.

Amazing location, if you're not a fan of Midtown. Small, but modern, clean and perfect for a holiday, and so much better than a hotel. The pictures and description were accurate, and things like check-in were easy.

We had a lovely stay at Charles' place. He was the perfect host!! The neighborhood was quiet and charming and we even lucked out with on-street parking! The apartment was warm, cozy and meticulously neat. Check In, our stay, the information we were given and check out were all incredibly efficient. I will be checking to see if Charles' place is available for all my future NYC travel.
Compact studio apartment in very convenient location near several subway lines.

El estudio de charles es el típico de New York, chiquito pero hermoso el sillón es muy cómodo lo cual no extrañas dormir en una cama, es muy limpio y tiene mucho estilo, disfrute mucho la estadía sobretodo por el barrio Chelsea muy cerca del Subway cerca del centro pudimos manejarnos muy bien desde esa zona súper seguro, sin dudarlo volvería
Charles is a terrific host and the location and place are terrific. I hope to be back soon!
Great little place. Shower is wonderful. Great location
Splendid location, great tips, and impeccable communication! Would definitely book Charles' apartment in Chelsea again!

Great stylish place in the heart of Chelsea! Charles seemed to have thought of everything and the place was neat, clean, and felt like my own space since it had a separate entrance from the rest of the apartment. Added bonus that the space was very well decorated!

Perfectly located for getting around Manhattan.  A small sleeping/ living area but perfect for 1-2 people.  All modern and sparkly clean amenities.  Set up well for self catering if required.  I would definitely go back

Charles's place is exactly as shown. The space exceeded our expectations as it was comfortable, extremely clean and had all amenities provided. 

In the main living space, the pull-out sofa was comfortable and easy to assemble. The coffee table has wheels so it is easily mobile. We really appreciated the coasters provided to keep the table clean throughout our stay. The television has many interesting shows provided.  

In the bathroom space there were many towels provided and good quality toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, body wash, toilet paper, tissue paper). 

In the kitchen space the fridge was a fair size to store food and drinks. Charles provides basic kitchen tools and tea/coffee supplies. 

The most striking aspect of this place is the location. My girlfriend and I fell in love with the Chelsea area. The area is safe, the food spots are unique (especially when exploring the Chelsea Market nearby), and the neighbourhood architecture is stunning. 

We used the subway system heavily with the F, M and 1 trains being two blocks down - connecting us to all major attractions. 

The only critique of Charles's place is that depending on the day, it can get a bit noisy outside with sirens and pedestrians. However, we took this as part of the New York experience. 

Overall, we would most definitely stay at Charles's place again. Staying in the neighbourhood itself made us feel like we were integrated into the New York culture and community.

This place is awesome! Check in and check out were ridiculously easy and the place is spotless! It is small but perfect for two people. The couch turns into a bed and it was very comfortable. The bathroom is very spacious by manhattan standards and the water pressure was great. We loved the neighborhood and never felt unsafe. Charles makes sure you have everything you could need, from shampoo and conditioner to an iron and ironing board! We will definitely be back.

Couldn’t have asked for a better stay in New York! The location was central without being too near the congested areas, and a lot of our destinations were  walkable. 

As for the home, it had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Charles left crystal clear instructions on how to get into the home as well as how to get best situated once inside the home. His place was stylish and neat. The restroom was beautiful, and even the futon bed was extremely comfortable to sleep on. 

Highly recommend!

This studio apartment is located in an ideal place in Chelsea.  Even though ground floor apartment, it was very quiet (for NYC).  Easy walk from Penn Station and to lower Manhattan.   Fold out couch was surprisingly comfortable and we slept like babes.  Good temperature control so could keep unit very comfortable (cool or warm).  Felt very safe.  Close to LOTS of restaurants, coffee shops and grocery stores.  Kitchen is small, not a place you really want to cook but fine for microwave, coffee, etc.  Small frig allows you to keep leftovers, snacks, beverages.  Apartment is super clean.  Bathroom is comfortable size and shower is roomy.  Getting keys was very easy, in a lock box with code that Charles supplies so no need to coordinate exact arrival and departure times.  
Exactly what we expected.  Just remember this is a studio, and although well laid out (moveable coffee table) it is a typical NYC apartment, not super spacious.  Worked ideally for us.

Perfect location with easy access to multiple subway lines. Apartment is quite small, but met our needs since we spent most of the day out and about.  Charles was very responsive and the check in process was a breeze!

Charles was very responsive and didn’t charge us when we accidentally broke a drinking glass. He even offered to clean it up for us! Overall amazing place and amazing location. Would definitely stay here again, but I feel like this place goes pretty fast. I used it for work, and I highly recommend!
A great flat in a wonderful location, perfect base for a couple to explore the city.
Location is great , Charles suggestions were all very helpful , happy we chose this place and look forward to staying here again
Great place. Great location.
Perfect place in Chelsea.
Perfect Airbnb! Comfortable sofa bed, well equiped kitchen, surprisingly quiet inside despite the city being noisy, great local food recommendations. Would highly recommend.

Great space. Super central. Easy walk to lots if attractions and close to the Metro. Studio was clean and was stocked with goodies in the kitchen and bathroom. Check in was a breeze! Nice and clean place and access to Netflix, Hulu, and other streaming services.
Great Place!

Terrific stay! The apartment is just as the photos show. Very clean and the interior decorating is thoughtful, smart and not overdone. The location is terrific....only steps away from several good coffee shops, restaurants and Whole Foods only a 2 blocks away. The studio is small but was perfect for my husband and me. I feel it would be tight for 3 adults. When comparing the rate to that of hotels -which would be as small or smaller I felt the rate was a good value -especially considering the location. We called Charles when we checked in to ask a question and he answered right away and so we were impressed by his attentiveness. I should note that on the Fri night of our visit we woke up to some late night conversation on the sidewalk (the apartment is on the first floor) but we turned on our phone's noise screen app and never was disturbed again so it really was not an issue. Again, overall great stay and would definitely stay again! Thanks Charles!
Great place! Awesome location and super clean. Would definitely stay here again.

Great spot - super convenient, the perfect size, and felt very safe.
It was a nice, cozy place that very centrally located! We had a great stay here.
This place is in a perfect location, in my favorite neighborhood in the city! Charles was a great host and I'll definitely try to stay here again on my next visit!

Really nice place in a great location!
This apartment was everything Charles said it was. It was clean and comfortable. We enjoyed out stay and would recommend for one person or a couple.

Charles's place was cozy and comfortable for the two of us. Good neighborhood and amenities; the only issue was that because it was on the ground floor, we could hear lots of traffic and street noises throughout the night. Other than that, we had a very nice stay.

Charles makes check-in a breeze.  The studio was clean and quiet.  I stayed here for a weekend and you're not likely to find a better space if you're seeing a show at Madison Square Garden.  The location is fantastic!  Aside from getting into town and heading home, I didn't need to use public transportation.  Everything I wanted to do was within walking distance.  The host also provides great recommendations on local spots to visit for food, drinks, entertainment, etc.  Highly recommended!
Fantastic experience... highly recommend staying here for location, cleanliness, and comfort!
Stayed at Charles place in October 2018.  The place is great and the location is just amazing you are so close to everything New York has to offer.  Very happy to recommend to anyone!
Charles’s place is ideally located, spotless and has everything one needs to be comfortable.

The flat we stayed at for a week in Chelsea was just as described: clean, cozy and convenient to shops, restaurants, and public transport. Most importantly for us, it was a stone's throw from the Joyce Theater, which was our focus for the week. The sofa / bed was surprisingly comfortable and the duvet provided made getting out of bed a hard choice!  Access to the studio was easy and the neighborhood felt quite safe, though bustling. Charles was a responsive host and answered immediately when I sent him a message.  I would definitely recommend this place to a single person or a couple for a stay in Chelsea.

Loved our stay here! It was the perfect location for our activities taking place in Chelsea and was the perfect size for a little weekend escape with my boyfriend. Close enough to food and only 2 blocks from the metro! Would definitely recommend and stay again the next time we travel to NYC!

The studio is exactly as seen in the photos, no surprises. It was very clean and is in a good location. Many restaurants and shops nearby. Charles is also very easy to reach, I was very happy with the place and highly recommend it. I liked the local recommendations provided as well as all the amenities.

I've stayed here four times now, which is about the best recommendation I can give. Close to multiple subway lines, the High Line, and all the other amenities you'll need. The apartment is exactly as shown in the photos. Easy check-in and check-out. I will continue to stay here when I visit.

This is a great place for couples to stay and explore New York. My wife and I stayed here for a week for our first wedding anniversary and loved it! It is in a clean and comfortable part of the city, we never felt scared or uncomfortable walking the streets near the apartment. It is located very close to multiple subway stations, and less than a mile from Penn Station. The apartment is a great value and the perfect place to stay for exploring New York.
What a great space in a lovely neighborhood! Communication was prompt and thorough and the local recommendations were a great added bonus. Clean and quiet. I definitely recommend this space!
Great location, clean apartment, has everything you need
Great apartment in a great location.  Charles was very helpful with any questions I had about the area. I would definitely stay here again and would highly recommend it to others!
Really nice unit in great neighborhood. Comfortable and feel safe in the area. Easy access to everything you need to see in NY. Would stay again.

The studio is located in walking distance from the High Line, Chelsea Market and some nice restaurants, shops and subway.  It was easy to communicate with Charles.  He gave us a real good tip about parking.  The instructions to get into the studio were clear.  The studio was sparkling clean and nicely decorated.  Would definitely want to stay there again !

My travel buddy and I really enjoyed our stay. We loved the location. We are two girls and we never felt unsafe in the neighbourhood. It was small but it was everything we needed! Very close to a subway and lots of cool restaurants and bars! Would definitely come back!
The housek keeper is a great and kindhearted man. His studio always keeping clean and tidy. He responses to us inquiry as fast as he could. If I will go to NYC next time, I’ll try to book again.
Out standing place to stay. Great location. Quiet neighborhood. Clean and modern. Would definitely stay again.

The accommodation was exactly as advertised and very conveniently located. Charles was easy to reach and the check-in and out process was very smooth. I would highly recommend this place and would stay again for future trips.
Easy to check in and all necessities were provided!
Amazing host!  Great communication and attention to every single detail.  The location is superb and very convenient.  I'll definitely come back.

This place is perfect for 1 or 2 people. The location is awesome! Close to major subway lines, 2 blocks A,C,E, 3 blocks 1,4,6. Many stores, coffee shops, restaurants within 1-2 block area. Highly recommend! Would stay here again.

summary: Simple and clean 1 bedroom unit, high on the 24th floor with spectacular views of the ocean and Waikiki city! Full Kitchen, bathroom with a tub / shower combo, plus a stack-able washer / dryer for added convenience.
