Guests are only able to access the building lobby & elevators with the buildings security FOB & unit keys so please call when your are on your way from the airport so we can meet you in front of the building to show you to the apartment.  No trash chutes, please dispose trash and recycling in the bins on the ground level next to the parking garage. No building amenities or parking available at the property.  Best to NOT RENT a car since most of the activities are accessible via walking, taxi, shuttle, trolleys & buses (or just Rent a car for
neighborhood_overview: Venture off into Waikiki and explore the beautiful scenery and A+ shopping! The World’s most famous beach is a 5 minute walk. Watch the sunsets from nearly any vantage point along the beach and see the Friday night fireworks from the Hilton Hawaiian Village. The nearby neighborhood includes several major hotels and numerous large and small restaurants and nightlife that cater to all tourists.  Ask the kama'aina (locals) for their tips. The Royal Hawaiian Shopping Center  and outdoor outlets may be found on Kalakaua Avenue (the street fronting the beach).  A few blocks away you will find famous Kapiolani park and the Waikiki Shell, Honolulu Zoo, Waikiki Aquarium, Diamond Head, golfing and many tennis courts.
transit: If you do plan on renting, street parking is very limited here in Waikiki. No free parking. However, parking is available at Kuhio Village Towers in the parking garage at $25/24 hours. But who needs a car in Waikiki?  Everything is in walking distance.  But if you have an itch to venture out, the island's bus transit system is awesome. The major bus stops are all on Kuhio Avenue less than a 5 minute walk from the unit.
access: Guests are only able to access the building lobby & elevators with the buildings security FOB & unit keys so please call when your are on your way from the airport so we can meet you in front of the building to show you to the apartment.  No trash chutes, please dispose trash and recycling in the bins on the ground level next to the parking garage. No building amenities or parking available at the property.  Best to NOT RENT a car since most of the activities are accessible via walking, taxi, shuttle, trolleys & buses (or just Rent a car for one day to tour the island if you plan too). If you do rent a car, free street parking super hard to get & public parking runs $25-$35 / 24 hours and be careful, follow signs to AVOID GETTING TOWED.
interaction: We are always available when our guests have requests or need information about what to see and do.  Please stop in our office (Exit Realty) located on the ground floor of Kuhio Village Towers, 2463 Kuhio Ave C-1 (Hours of Operation: M-F 9:30 am-4:30 pm, S-S 9:30am-3pm) or call/message us if you need assistance.

host.host_about:
ALOHA and WELCOME to Waikiki, Honolulu on Oahu!  Thank you for your interest in one of our vacation rentals.  We are a TEAM of professionals who manage individually owned condo apartments for the owners when they aren't using them within several different condo / hotel buildings in Waikiki.   We offer a range of accommodations types from small studio apartments (with or without kitchenettes) to 2 bedroom residences with full kitchens.  

We want your stay to be an enjoyable one and finding the right match for you is key.  As a general guideline, there are many different types of buildings and hotel-type of arrangements.  For those doing Hawaii on a budget, studios offer the best of both worlds providing a clean, private place to stay within walking distance to the BEACH at affordable prices (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities).   For those looking for nicer or larger accommodations, then you should target $150/night off season to $250/night peak season (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities, building amenities, parking included).  If you are looking for an Ocean-front experience, then target $350- $400/night and for a luxury experience, $500 to over $1000/night.  Hawaii offers something for everyone at every price point!  

Our vacation rental units are privately owned and managed.  We offer an alternative to the hotel experience allowing our guests to “live like a local” in paradise whether be for a few days, a few weeks or a few months.  Our units are well maintained, repaired when necessary and treated routinely with pest control services.  We try not to interrupt our guests during their stay, and if the unexpected happens, we do our best to resolve it quickly with the least inconvenience to our guests.   Upon arrival, we try to meet all our guests personally to register, check-in, and answer any questions.  And if you’re running late don’t worry, we can make arrangements no matter the hour and register you in the office the next day.  

Stop by our real estate office, ground floor of Kuhio Village.  We are there daily to assist and share this incredibly beautiful island, local eateries, activities and entertainment found in Waikiki and around the island.  We look forward to hosting you in one of our vacation rental units and helping to make your stay a fantastic one.  A hui hou (until we meet again)!

Aloha & Mahalo nui loa (Hello/Goodbye & Thank you very much),
Hawaii Dream Realty Team, Hi’ilani, Luise & Theresa
Hawaii Dream Realty LLC RB-19373, Theresa Harden PB (R) RB-19372

reviews.comments: Great place with amazing views!  Centrally located with a 3 min walk to Waikiki beach.  Had a small problem with internet connection upon check in but Hi’ilani was quick to respond and had it solved by the time we woke up the next day : )
This place is amazing. We stayed for a week and enjoyed every second of it. We watched the sunrise from the balcony drinking coffee. I would definitely stay here again.
Amazing view, fast communication and located 5min to the beach. Enjoyed our stay and would book again.

This location is conveniently located 1-2 blocks away from the main strip where there's tons of street entertainment and shopping to do! The airbnb itself has a great view overlooking Waikiki beach. If you plan on renting a car though, know that there isn't a designated parking spot as stated. It was really difficult and frustrating for us (in a van) to find parking near Waikiki so plan ahead, find your parking garages and scout out street parking!
Very clean, very good location!  Would stay here again!

summary: L’appartement est dans un quartier tranquille près du metro sauvé. Très bien insonorisé, c’est un petit appartement avec 3 chambres, 1 salon, une petite cuisine et une petite salle de bain.
space: Une salon, 3 chambres, une cuisine et une petite salle de bain ! Voilà ce que tu peux retrouver dans notre appart. Ça et deux bons vivants qui peuvent te conseiller sur quoi faire a Montréal. Bonne vibe incluse.

Très bien insonorisé, c’est un petit appartement avec 3 chambres, 1 salon, une petite cuisine et une petite salle de bain. Une salon, 3 chambres, une cuisine et une petite salle de bain ! Voilà ce que tu peux retrouver dans notre appart. Ça et deux bons vivants qui peuvent te conseiller sur quoi faire a Montréal. Bonne vibe incluse. Toutes les pièces de l'appartement sont accessibles. C'est un 5 pièces + une salle de bain. Un salon, 3 chambres, une cuisine et une petite salle de bain ! Vous aurez l’appartement à votre disposition. Vous aurez une clée pour la durée de votre séjour. On peut donner de l'information sur Montréal sans problème, ça fait plusieurs années qu'on y habite. C'est un quartier paisible avec quelques commerces accessibles à distance de marche. Il y a une épicerie à 5 minutes de marche et quelques petits restaurants. Il y a une pharmacie et un dépanneur très près aussi. La station de métro Sauvé se tr
neighborhood_overview: C'est un quartier paisible avec quelques commerces accessibles à distance de marche. Il y a une épicerie à 5 minutes de marche et quelques petits restaurants. Il y a une pharmacie et un dépanneur très près aussi. La station de métro Sauvé se trouve à environ 6 minutes de marche.
notes: Les animaux de compagnie ne sont pas acceptés.
transit: Deux lignes d'autobus et le métro à proximité se rendent au centre-ville en 30 minutes. Les passages pour les autobus sont très fréquents autant la semaine que la fin de semaine. La station de métro la plus proche est la station Sauvé sur la ligne orange. Les lignes d'autobus sont le 31 et le 30. Il y a aussi une ligne de nuit (361) qui part du centre ville et qui arrête juste à côté de l’appartement.
access: Toutes les pièces de l'appartement sont accessibles. C'est un 5 pièces + une salle de bain. Un salon, 3 chambres, une cuisine et une petite salle de bain !
interaction: Vous aurez l’appartement à votre disposition. Vous aurez une clée pour la durée de votre séjour. On peut donner de l'information sur Montréal sans problème, ça fait plusieurs années qu'on y habite.

host.host_about:
Salut, donc c'est pas super compliqué, je suis un gars dans la vingtaine qui habite avec 3 autres jeunes entrepreneurs dans la vingtaine! 

On cherche à louer une chambre pour nous aider à payer le loyer et du même coup une partie de nos études :) 

J'aime bien le sport et le plein air. Je joue au badminton depuis de nombreuses années. 

Sinon j'ai visité quelques pays en Asie et j'ai fait plusieurs places au Québec et au Canada. Je commence à apprendre l'espagnol pour aller en Amérique du Sud prochainement.

Au plaisir de vous rencontrer bientôt :)

name: Studio idéal pour professionnel ou étudiant
summary: Petit appartement en demi sous-sol ds un quartier paisible, près d'une station de métro et à 5 min d'une rue commerçante: artère principale du quartier.  Refait au grand complet en 2017, le studio offre une chambre avec sdb privée, et son salon/cuisinette attenants ainsi qu'une porte d'entrée indépendante. Ce studio fait partie intégrante de notre maison, sachez d'ailleurs que ce type de maisons en rangée, caractéristique de Montréal, possède un petit jardin qui donne sur une ruelle.
space: Our house is located 5 minutes walk from a shopping street where flourish quality shops and proximity, you will find everything you need for your groceries, have a coffee, go out to the restaurant or have a drink.   Note that alleys are public spaces that citizens reclaim and where children make their playground, summer and winter (nothing prevents parents from accompanying them with a glass of wine or a good local beer to better fraternize !). These places of life citizens become a tourist attraction of Montreal because very characteristic. Here, no need for a guided tour: walking there and participating in a scooter ride down the alley will allow you to experience the Montreal of its inhabitants!
description: Petit appartement en demi sous-sol ds un quartier paisible, près d'une station de métro et à 5 min d'une rue commerçante: artère principale du quartier.  Refait au grand complet en 2017, le studio offre une chambre avec sdb privée, et son salon/cuisinette attenants ainsi qu'une porte d'entrée indépendante. Ce studio fait partie intégrante de notre maison, sachez d'ailleurs que ce type de maisons en rangée, caractéristique de Montréal, possède un petit jardin qui donne sur une ruelle. Our house is located 5 minutes walk from a shopping street where flourish quality shops and proximity, you will find everything you need for your groceries, have a coffee, go out to the restaurant or have a drink.   Note that alleys are public spaces that citizens reclaim and where children make their playground, summer and winter (nothing prevents parents from accompanying them with a glass of wine or a good local beer to better fraternize !). These places of life citizens become a tourist attraction of M
neighborhood_overview: Méconnus des touristes, ce quartier est pourtant une destination de plus en plus recherchée des familles qui cherchent à s'établir en ville avec de l'espace. On retrouve ici une impression de vie dans un village de par la proximité des gens et des commerces alors que nous sommes dans une grande métropole. Grands parcs, pistes cyclables, jeux d'eau, pataugeoires, piscines, glissages d'hiver, bibliothèque... vous trouverez tout ce dont vous avez besoin à part si vous venez pour du nightlife (que vous retrouverez bien plus au centre-ville, soyons francs!)
notes: Tout matériel de bébé/jeunes enfants ainsi que des jeux peuvent être fournis à la demande!
transit: You will find the subway 5 minutes walk or two minutes by bus.   Be aware that there are several Bixi bike stations in the area that will allow you to go anywhere in the neighborhood and even on the beautiful bike paths along the river!
interaction: We would be happy to help you discover alley life, local beers, community garden, walks to do ... if a bit of jasette tempts you obviously!

reviews.comments: Outstanding host! Thank you for everything

Nice place very close to a metro station and some nice breakfast places nearby. Small 20 minutes walk+subway ride to downtown. 

This is one of the best money/quality airbnb that I got!
My friends and I loved Mathilde's place. Stylish and cozy. Quick and easy communication. Merci!
Nous recommandons chaudement cet endroit.
Super accueil de Mathilde et de Max ! Découvrir Montréal à partir de ce logement fut un vrai plaisir.

Nous sommes arrivés facilement de l'aéroport chez Mathilde. Nous avons trouvé les clés dans une boite à clés, ce qui est bien pratique!
L'appartement est parfait! Tout est conforme aux photos et à la description. La salle de bain dispose d'une immense douche à l'italienne. Le lit est un 160 cm de bonne qualité. Nous avons séjourné au moment de la canicule et le logement est agréable car frais. (bien appréciable après une longue journée de visites). Pour rejoindre la station de métro "Sauvé", il faut compter une petite dizaine de minutes à peine à pieds. Ensuite une vingtaine de minutes pour rejoindre la station "Champs de Mars" et c'est 6 dollars aller/retour. Le quartier est calme et on peut se garer gratuitement devant la maison. Mathilde est une jeune maman alors on peut entendre les enfants gambader mais cela reste très convenable. En revanche on entend d'avantage les écoulements de la salle de bain du dessus mais cela reste correct. 
Nous recommandons sans réserve ce logement qui nous a donné entière satisfaction.

Le logement correspond parfaitement aux photos et est très bien équipé. Tout était propre. Mathilde et sa famille vivent au dessus mais je n’ai pas du tout été dérangée par le bruit. Le quartier est très tranquille, une station de métro pour rallier le centre de Montréal se trouve à moins de 10 minutes de marche. Il y a également un bus qui passe sur l’avenue.

Tutto e` stato oltre le nostre aspettative: posto bellissimo, pulito e profumato, e Mathilde e` un'ottima padrona di casa, accogliente ma non invadente. Per ogni necessita` riguardo al mio bambino e` stata preziosa... un soggiorno indimenticabile!
Excellent appartement, propre, refait à neuf, à quelques minutes à pied du métro. Nous y retournerons volontier lors de nos prochaines visites
Great accommodation, really spacious and private. Nice location. Highly recommended!

Mathilde & Max ont su nous aider à trouver les bonnes adresses sur Montréal ainsi que pour la suite de notre séjour. 

Très accueillante et chaleureuse, Mathilde et sa famille a su répondre a nos attentes, nous la recommandons à 100%. 

Le studio est irréprochable en terme d’équipement et de propreté. 

Encore merci & à bientôt !! 

Alex, Lauriane & Nathanaël

J’ai resté au studio de Mathilde pour une durée d’un mois. 

Pour ceux et celles qui souhaitent réserver plusieurs semaines: Sachez que mon choix s’est fait rapidement puisqu’elle était la seule dans tout Montréal qui offrait un logement entier (studio) près d’une station de métro et en plus qui offrait un grand rabais pour les booking de longue durée. Beaucoup moins cher que plusieurs locateurs ailleurs.

Mon impression: J’ai beaucoup aimé ce studio, qui était très cozy et propre. Il est situé aussi dans un quartier vraiment tranquille et facile à se garer devant en tout moment. Rénové dernièrement, vous vous y sentirez très à l’aise et confortable. Possibilité de mettre des lumières tamisées (salle de bain, chambre à coucher, etc), ce dont j’ai le plus aimé :) 

Communication: Mathilde répond avec grande amabilité et rapidité à vos messages et questions, et s’assure que vous ayez ce dont vous avez besoin. 

Je recommande pour quiconque cherche un endroit à Ahuntsic ou près d’une station de métro.

name: Enjoy the true Aloha Spirit...
summary: This cozy and charming 2 private rooms, bath and guest lounge is located in a quiet neighborhood, and perfect for people from all backgrounds.  It is located in the Waiakea area of Hilo, a few minutes away from the airport, shopping mall, stores, Downtown Hilo, waterfalls, botanical gardens, and beaches.  A 45 minute drive to the Majestic Mauna Kea and Mauna Loa, or a 38 minute drive to experience the active flows of the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park.
space: Both rooms have queen size beds.  The guest lounge has a TV for down times, a dining table, microwave, and a mini refrigerator.  It is separated from the main house to enjoy full privacy.  There is also free Wi-Fi connection.  Parking spaces are located close to the rooms for easy loading and unloading.
description: This cozy and charming 2 private rooms, bath and guest lounge is located in a quiet neighborhood, and perfect for people from all backgrounds.  It is located in the Waiakea area of Hilo, a few minutes away from the airport, shopping mall, stores, Downtown Hilo, waterfalls, botanical gardens, and beaches.  A 45 minute drive to the Majestic Mauna Kea and Mauna Loa, or a 38 minute drive to experience the active flows of the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. Both rooms have queen size beds.  The guest lounge has a TV for down times, a dining table, microwave, and a mini refrigerator.  It is separated from the main house to enjoy full privacy.  There is also free Wi-Fi connection.  Parking spaces are located close to the rooms for easy loading and unloading. You'll have complete private access to a bathroom and the guest lounge directly connected to both rooms.  Both rooms have key locks for privacy. We respect privacy, and let guests decide how much interaction they want.  We are always avai
transit: Although everything is centrally located, a vehicle is the best way to get around.
access: You'll have complete private access to a bathroom and the guest lounge directly connected to both rooms.  Both rooms have key locks for privacy.
interaction: We respect privacy, and let guests decide how much interaction they want.  We are always available through the main house or by phone for any assistance needed.
house_rules: - -Please remove your footwear before entering. - To keep geckos out of the room, please be sure not to leave any food openly laying around or place them in the refridgerator provided. - Turn off the lights and fan when you leave. - You do not have to wash dishes.  Please place your dirty dishes in the white dishpan and leave it on the table outside the door.  It will be washed and returned to the table area. - If you're here over a week, please let me know when you want clean sheets. - You may have visitors until 10pm on weekdays and 12 midnight on weekends. - ABSOLUTELY no smoking.

reviews.comments:
We really did “Enjoy the true aloha spirit!” Jon and Noe were great! Very welcoming and accommodating to our needs throughout our stay.

This air bnb itself is very comfortable and cozy. Parking is available right outside of the door of the guest room. Easy in and out with whatever you need to carry. Oh! The beds are super comfortable too. It was a 5-15 min drive depending to get to everything you would want to do in Hilo. 

This truly is a home away from home no matter where you are from!
Great place to stay, happy to stay again

Jon, Noe and his family are special people. Our stay in Hilo would be nothing without them as hosts. The accommodation is extremely well located, very close to the center of Hilo and a large shopping center. The beds are incredible and the place extremely clean with all the equipment and amenities for a great stay. The information on tours of Jon and Noe were extremely accurate and made our adventures incredible. We recommend to enjoy the hospitality of the family of the hosts to whom we spend unforgettable moments.

This place is truly a gem in every sense! The section of the house where we stayed in is newly built with tasty decorations. All the little details were thoughtfully added. We were a bit concerned about not having the AC at first but the weather in Hilo does not require AC. We slept with the windows open so at night, a little breeze would come in the room. it was perfect! There are also plenty of fans on the ceiling and portable ones for extra cooling! Jon and Noi are the nicest couple we ever met! They are genuinely the best hosts. They were attentive to our needs and were extremely rapid on accommodating them. We went up one night to Mauna Kea and Jon lent us his jacket along with a couple of tuques and gloves in case it was cold up in the mountain! We would totally recommend this place to anybody who would like a private quiet place and yet be 10-15 min away from all The main attractions in Hilo!

Maika`i LOA!! We loved it...fabulous hosts; so much Aloha. Very relaxing; laid back, `ohana feeling. Surprisingly huge for its price, awesome for kama`ainas :-)) Highly recommend and the location is perfect "central." Keiki and Kupuna friendly...
Mahalo nui for having us!
Great hosts, quiet, comfortable and clean, great location and a perfect place to stay while visiting Hilo.  We recommend Jon and Noe's place highly.

Jon and Noe were great hosts. The place was very clean and well stocked with the basics. Nice, quiet neighborhood and covered parking right by the door. We would definitely recommend staying here. Just a few minutes from Hilo Bay area. Mahalo!
Really nice and really clean private spot

Really enjoyed staying at this place. Jon and Noe are super hospitable and made everything available to us. We felt right at home and enjoyed the big back yard, basketball goal, and using the charcoal grill. Can’t find a more hospitable family. My wife and two children stayed for a week and had all of the accommodations we needed. Great memories!

Perfect place to stay! Strong recommendation if you choose to live in Hilo. Near the airport and supermarket. The most important is that you will have an amazing experience staying at Jon and Noe’s apartment just like at home.

Jon & Noe were wonderful hosts and communicated promptly.  The guest house was quiet and comfortable and located centrally.  Quick drive to everything you need.  Loved that it was exceptionally clean and had ceiling fans in every room to keep us cool. Beds were very comfortable and the quality of the linens and towels were great too. Space included a microwave, mini fridge and electric water kettle for tea and coffee. We found this to be enough for us as we ate out or with family and friends during our stay. For the price point it was a great value. Since we were traveling with a teenager having two separate bedrooms was a plus. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in this guest home and highly recommend this rental.

Bonne petite adresse chez Jon et Noe, dans un logement spacieux avec des lits très confortables (appréciés après une longue journée de marche). Tout était très propre et moderne avec tout l'équipement nécessaire, même si un coin cuisine ne serait pas de trop pour éviter à notre hôte de devoir faire notre vaisselle. Une bonne adresse très calme (avec option grenouilles chantantes) que je recommande !

My husband and I with 15 & 10 years old boys stayed couple of nights at Jon & Noe’s two bedroom guest house on July 25-27.  We totally enjoyed our stay. Though the boys can share the double bed in the second bedroom, but one of them had the option to sleep on the sofa bed in the living room, so everyone was very comfortable.  We really appreciate the  cleanness,  comfortable beds and central location of their guest house, only a short drive to Downtown Hilo.  Jon and Noe are very friendly and welcoming, quick communication by emails.  
The covered car port in front of guest suite is a brilliant idea and much appreciated since the first night we came in, it was pouring rain.  (And probably you all know, Hilo tends to rain quite a bit). The carport kept us totally dry while we unloaded our luggage, and it also kept our car cooler, out of the sun.
Thank you Jon & Noe for our pleasant stay at your guest house.
Great hosts! Everything you could need. Extremely responsive, flexible and accommodating! Very reasonable pricing and wonderful hosts.
방, 수건 등 전체적으로 다 깨끗하고 좋았어요. 방도 생각보다 넓어서 4명이 사용하는데 불편함이없었어요

Excellent stay, well located, extra comfortable beds and sheets, clean and accessible. Perfect formula for two adults and two kids, a lot of things to do in the surroundings, and many good places to eat (thumbs up to Ponds and Pineapples !). Don’t miss the botanical garden, the zoo if you have kids and Carlsmith Beach ! Thanks to John and Noe who had a comfortable place for us to rest.
jon and noe's place was clean and close to hilo. they are very kind and helpful

Très bon séjour chez Jon et Noe qui nous ont accueillis avec le sourire même un peu tardivement. Tout est très bien décoré dans l'appartement et les lits très confortables. Salle de bain au top. Meme s'il n'y a pas de cuisine, il y a le nécessaire pour petit déjeuner et plats à réchauffer au micro onde. Très bon séjour en famille, nous recommandons vivement, surtout avec un tel rapport qualité prix.

Jon and Noe are the epitome of ohana. The unit is clean, comfortable and has a lot of nice, thoughtful touches that make it very homey. It is in a convenient location but is also away from the hustle and bustle so quiet. There is parking right near the unit which is nice! The hosts are available and helpful! I would highly recommend a stay here
This is a nice location, perfect for us who are just for the weekend. The hosts were accommodating and easy to communicate. Certainly we recommend to our friends.
Awsome place.  Quiet,  clean,  exactly like the photos!  Would definitely stay here again!
停车就在门口,很方便

Jon & Noe's place is exactly as pictured. The rooms were clean and comfortable, the neighborhood was quiet, and covered parking was available. Noe was very prompt with replies. She worked with our changing arrival time and made check in easy. I needed a little sewing kit fairly late at night and Noe was kind enough to provide me with her sewing kit within minutes of asking, despite the late hour. I'd definitely stay here again!

Jon and Noe were awesome hosts, friendly and available for any questions. My mom and sister stayed for 4 nights. Everything was very clean and new. Close to town and all amenities. No A/C but fans in every room kept things pleasant.
We enjoyed our stay with Jon and Noe. The space is clean and cozy and as described. They were helpful hosts and provided local recommendations. Would stay again!
perfect place!
The space was clean, comfortable and cozy just as described. It came with a covered parking right outside our stay. Highly recommended stay in Hilo!

Convenient just 10 minutes to the heart of Hilo, quiet and private (the unit is located in the back house away from any street noise), the carport is right next to the entrance which is very convenient because Hilo rains a lot and you don't want to walk in the rain to get to your unit. The unit feels very homey, both beds are Queen size and it's softness was just right, there were many pillows on the bed, fully stocked with towels, dishes, the place feels safe and is quiet, and clean, the restroom is regular size, a big storage closet in each room to hang your clothes. One of the best airbnb places we stayed. My mom and I would like to stay here again when we're in Hilo. I would recommend this place to my friends and family.
Ce qui est offert est conforme à ce que nous avons!
房间很干净,床很舒适｡还贴心的配了防晒霜｡遗憾的是没有洗衣机和烘干机,要公共洗衣服｡这点对于早出晚归的游客来说有点不方便｡

This place is good for a couple of nights stay in Hilo.  It is accurately described.  It is not within walking distance to any sights, but the neighborhood was very quiet and the place was very clean, with comfortable beds.  Not really a place to cook any meals, but Hilo town has many options. Wifi was spotty. The hosts were friendly upon arrival, but we did not interact too much during our stay as we were out most of the day.
Jon and Noe went above and beyond on making our stay more pleasant. they provided good accommodation and even help the kids have more things to do.
beds were very comfortable, all of the items in the room were very clean!!! If i return to hilo, i will use Jon&Noe's house
Great place!

Jon and Noe were amazing hosts! Not only did they have a great guest suite (super comfortable beds, clean and very neat with lots of amenities, on a quiet residential road and a short drive to town) but they are also incredible people themselves. They gave us a number of great recommendations for places to visit and restaurants to eat at. And on the first evening when one of our group got injured Jon and Noe took us in and made sure the injury was properly cleaned up and bandaged properly. They were so kind and welcoming and such a positive aspect to our time in Hilo.

The room is spacy and very clean. Amenities are abundant and brand new.  The hosts are very kind and hospitable. The neighborhoods are quiet. Definitely we'd go back next time when we spend vacations in Big Island.
A very new, modern and clean unit, located in the suburbs but very close to the town centre
Nice spot
They are very nice, always quick response to my request. Easy to park the car and good suggestions for our plan. Will definitely stay there if I visit the big island next time.
The space is clean, quiet, modern, and had everything we needed. Best of all, the location is super central to anywhere in Hilo and Puna.
호스트분들이 매우 반갑게 맞아주시고 친절하셨어요. 힐로타운과 가까워서 위치적으로 너무 좋았어요.
Very convenient. Super clean. Very good place for family or group.

name: Stylish Room, Cosy Flat, Central Location
summary: Locates to the most famous and touristic part of the city , few minutes walking distance to Taksim Square , surrounded by recommended bars and restaurants. Comfortable and secure.
description: Locates to the most famous and touristic part of the city , few minutes walking distance to Taksim Square , surrounded by recommended bars and restaurants. Comfortable and secure.

reviews.comments:
Lokasyon mükemmel gerçekten Cihangir’in tam göbeği derler ya, işte orası...
Gruplar için de çok uygun, kalabalıktık ama çok rahat ettik...
Yeri en büyük artısı...
The apartment is very nice and super well located. Close to everything, you have a lot of nice shops around. It’s nice place to stay to discover the city and its different neighborhoods!

We had a great stay at Enes'place. We stayed four days there. He was super available, kind, and answered every of our needs(: I highly recommend it. (although if you have a very light sleep or are annoyed by daylight to sleep, you might need to bring your earplug/sleepmask)

Enes was very helpful and kind. The apartment was super clean (fresh sheets  clean bathroom etc.) The location is awesome. The apartment is in a very lovely quite street and if you want to go to the night life cafe's clubs and bars you only have to walk 5-8 minutes. The apartment itself and the furniture is wonderful build and very comfortable and enough room for more people.This was my best air bnb experience by far! We had a very nice time in istanbul it is a beautiful city. I highly recomment his apartment.

Enes' s flat is lovely and we had a wonderful stay there. The flat is super located, very easy to get from there to every corner of Beyoglu and also to get to the tramway station (to Sultanahmet and not only). It is actually in the heart of Beyoglu in CIhangir, very close to many shops, nice places to have a drink or food...the flat is very comfortable, there is everything, is very large and you feel immediately at home.
Enes was helpful and nice

The flat is really nice and the location is just perfect. The flat is in vicinity of Taskim square where are plenty nice bars and Restaurants. Also you are very close to different Metro Stations which bring you easily to Sultanahmed Mosque and so on. Unfortunatley it was a little dirty and the beds are just mattresses on the floor. But you have anything you need there.
The locator is near Taksim and nice to stay

Everything was great! Enes is a friendly and warm-hearted host. The flat is spacious and in the heart of Cihangir. Although we arrived quite late, the check-in was no problem. 
I can recommend this place!

We really enjoyed our stay in this beautiful apartment. The location is just perfect since it feels like you’re staying in the heart of Istanbul. Taksim Square and Istiklal Street are within walking distance (5-10 minutes) and the apartment is close to public transport. Enes is very kind and helpful and the place has all you need. We highly recommend this apartment!

We had a really nice stay all in all. The location of the flat is perfect, the flat itself is very stylish. Only problem was: there was no toilet paper. 
Would love to stay there again!

A beautiful place in a great location BUT the property was extremely dirty, dust everywhere and dirty clothes which I assume belonged to the owner were left in the property. Additionally, a couple of half drunk bottles of alcohol were left in the living room and I am pretty sure someone entered the property whilst we were out, which was concerning, seeing as a bottle of alcohol had disappeared by the time we got back on our penultimate day. There were other circumstances which could not be avoided and were not the owners' fault but the state of the property was not as it should be.

This trip to Istanbul was amazing, memorable and full of adventures. And most of all we have to thank Enes for this. He is amazing host, very helpful and cool.

Actually, I have been mistaken, I thought we were booking the whole apartment, but this listing appears to be for *one* private room in an apartment. But very soon we realized how lucky we've got to make this mistake :-). First of all, Enes kindly offered us the second bedroom (absolutely for free, btw). And most importantly he turned out to be very open minded and fun loving guy. He took us to very special party at an amazing place at the black sea near Istanbul, where we would never get as just a tourists. (As Enes explained, this place was closing under pressure of government :-(. So it was *the last party* for this venue. So it was really special.)

At the end, we've felt like a locals in Istanbul, and that's the best experience you can get from traveling. And now we have a friend in Istanbul. And You have friends in Tbilisi, bro. Hope to see you again soon.
Nice flat, great location and cool host with amazing tips. Thanks Enes!

name: Private Room in Copacabana  -> The Best Price! :)
summary: The accomodation is totally private - 25 m2 - in a silent and natural ligthful place at great location in Rio from 10 min walk to the most famous beach in Brazil "Copacabana" and surrounded by greenspace. Included in the final value:  - AC, Cable TV, Wifi. - Fridge, Toaster oven, Eletric Coffee maker, Cups, Dishes, Cutlery. - Hair dryer   - Heated Swimming Pool, Fitness Center and Sauna.  - Cleaning room service everyday (also in the weekends).
space: In few words: "It's a great structure of Hotel suite room with comfort and privacy unique of a Residencial Home."  - The building is safe (The police stays during all day long aside the main entrance). - The hotel reception crew is bilingual and it works 24hours a day.
description: The accomodation is totally private - 25 m2 - in a silent and natural ligthful place at great location in Rio from 10 min walk to the most famous beach in Brazil "Copacabana" and surrounded by greenspace. Included in the final value:  - AC, Cable TV, Wifi. - Fridge, Toaster oven, Eletric Coffee maker, Cups, Dishes, Cutlery. - Hair dryer   - Heated Swimming Pool, Fitness Center and Sauna.  - Cleaning room service everyday (also in the weekends). In few words: "It's a great structure of Hotel suite room with comfort and privacy unique of a Residencial Home."  - The building is safe (The police stays during all day long aside the main entrance). - The hotel reception crew is bilingual and it works 24hours a day. Every place in the building is available for the guests and it doesn't have any additional price.   Besides this, I give always my cell phone number that you can use it for receive my tips and share recomendations with me. I also offer maps about the city.  Your safety is really i
neighborhood_overview: The greatest thing is the privacy, the silence and surely the good location.
notes: I always stock the flat with water and biscuits inside the fridge for a confortable arrival.
transit: The Avenue where we are located is fantastic for public transportation in the city: there are many bus stops, taxi station or take a ride with Uber. If you across the road you can also find a public bike rental.  - The nearest subway station is called "Cardeal Arcoverde".  (15 min by walking from the room); - On the same Avenue there is a post of tourist information  (5 min by walking from the room);    - Christ the Redeemer (statue) tickets center is located in "Praça do Lido", it's a square near our place where you can easily buy the tickets.  (15 min by walking from the room); - The Sugarloaf Mountain  (10 min by Uber or cab from the room) - The iconic Copacabana Beach is also close.  (only 10 min by walking from the room). - The most traditional Shopping Mall in the city: "Rio Sul"  (only 10 min by walking from the room) On the same Avenue where the room is located, you can easily find out supermarkets, restaurants, drugstores and souveniers stores.
access: Every place in the building is available for the guests and it doesn't have any additional price.   Besides this, I give always my cell phone number that you can use it for receive my tips and share recomendations with me. I also offer maps about the city.  Your safety is really important to me. :)
interaction: I'm always at disposal for any question and solutions.  I've been living in Copacabana since I was born, so as a true "carioca" I know many places in Rio and specially in Copacabana where you can improve your brazilian experience.  I can also guide you to the places that you should visit, which it makes your stay not an ordinary trip.  :)
house_rules: 4 Small rules :) 1) Please, don't make too much noise after the 10 pm.  2) Smoking is not allowed inside the room. 3) If happen any damage, please, let me know as soon as possible. 4) Except the AC, please, turn off all the eletronics and lights inside the room.

host.host_about:
Carioca de Copacabana. 
Adoro viajar e estou sempre aberto para conhecer outras culturas e fazer amizades.  

"Para viajar basta existir." - Fernando Pessoa.

reviews.comments:
O Igor foi um anfitrião bem receptivo e atencioso desde antes da chegada. Ligou para confirmar o horário para marcar a entrega das chaves (checkin) e explicou sobre o procedimento de uso e do checkout.
Recomendo.

O Igor foi super prestativo conosco. O apartamento é como no anúncio, super bem localizado com onibus, metro, bicicletas e taxis perto. Dá para fazer um monte de coisas a pé, também.
Nosso anfitrião é super respeitoso com seus hóspedes, nos deixando à vontade e sempre perguntando se podia nos ajudar com algo.

O Hotel atendeu nossas expectativas, fiquei 2 dias no Rio e a estadia foi muito boa. O anfitrião Igor também esteve ao nosso dispor e nos passou muita (Website hidden by Airbnb) toda certeza vou indicar aos meus amigos, até porque, o hotel está bem localizado na melhor parte da Zona Sul do Rio e o Igor sempre foi solícito nos atendimentos.

O Igor foi muito atencioso e pontual. O apartamento superou minhas expectativas e me senti muito confortável, inclusive para pedir qualquer coisa que precisasse. Quando cheguei havia um cacho de bananas e algumas garrafas d'água, uma mão na roda pra quem está chegando de viagem. 
Fiquei hospedado por 9 dias e estava muito bem localizado, a 5 minutos de caminhada do metro e da praia de Copacabana e do shopping Rio Sul, numa área realmente segura. 
Vale lembrar de toda estrutura que o prédio oferece como piscina, sauna, faxina todos os dias, caso necessário, e um restaurante (eu recomendo que você caminhe um pouco e tome café em outro lugar).
Igor foi muito atencioso em nos receber. O apartamento é simples mas tem tudo que é necessário para uma estadia confortável. Experiência muito positiva.

Un placer quedarse en rio y más aún con una buena estadía. . Muy lindo lugar,muy tranquilo y muy limpio.. recomendado y con ganas de volver... gracias Igor por la bienvenida y por la estadía, estamos muy agradecidos; hasta la próxima que si o si volveremos
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Logement très convenable compte tenu du prix, chambre d'hôtel classique. Salle de sport au sein de l'hôtel, gros plus! Par contre, il ne faut pas compter sur la piscine mais étant très proche de la plage, pas de souci!
Good place at a low price. Classic hotel room, presence of a gym which was really nice. The swimming pool is not really good but you have the beach not far so it is not a trouble.

Muito bom o apartamento do Igor, as fotos mostram a realidade, a localização também é um ponto positivo!
O Igor foi muito solicito e sempre que precisei estava disponível!

Recomendo! Lugar aconchegante, confortável, seguro, muito bem localizado! O hotel é muito limpo e organizado. Os funcionários são muito atenciosos e sempre dispostos a ajudar. O anúncio cumpre o que promete. O anfitrião é bastante atencioso. Fui recebido com um café da manhã, ocasião em que orientou acerca das regras do lugar e me auxiliou com dicas de passeios e lugares para alimentação.

The room and especially the area was great. 
Igor was easy to get in touch with and helped us out with things to do in Rio!
Muy recomendada la habitación, tiene buena ubicación ,es segura,  cómoda y contiene lo necesario. Igor fue  muy buen anfitrión siempre atento y disponible ante cualquier duda o inquietud.

Great experience, considering the warm welcome, the price and the location.

It has been my sixth time in Rio and the first time I couldn't stay at a friends house, but I was so nicely received by Igor. He showed me the apartment and gave me some tips about everything. The place is not top new, but exactly like in the pictures, besides being clean and safe.

Igor was a big help from the first moment on when getting into contact with him via airbnb. He replied always very fast and tried to make our stay as joyable as possible. We felt very welcoming by him and as a local he always supplied us with good tips what to do or what is going on in the city. We could have easily stayed longer in the apartment cause everything is available either in the same building or around the corner. Even though it is very central we never felt annoyed by any noise, and also it is very safe around there. Location wise it is really convenient because many buses depart from there to various locations of Rio and also the metro is very close by. The beach is just 2 blocks away. We definitely enjoyed our stay at this apartment and would definitely come back. Thank you Igor! :)
Ich habe schon eine Gesamtbewertung für Igor geschrieben und diese fällt überragend aus, Igor war ein hervorragender, kompetenter und zuvorkommender Gastgeber, der sich sehr um mein Wohl sorgte.

Ich war insgesamt 8 Übernachtungen bei Igor unweit der Copacabana und war von seiner Wohnung und seiner Betreuung überaus zufrieden. Igor war ständig bemüht, meine Wünsche zu erfüllen und hat mich perfekt betreut. 
Ich hatte das Vergnügen einer langen Unterhaltung mit ihm und habe dabei sehr viel über ihn und sein und mein geliebtes Rio erfahren.
Die Lage der Wohnung ist sehr gut, die im Haus befindlichen Annehmlichkeiten wie Kraftraum, Hotelreception und Restaurant habe ich mehrfach genutzt und war sehr damit zufrieden.

I am very thankful to have booked with Igor. He is incredibly friendly, generous and kind. Igor is a very knowledgeable host. He was very quick to answer our questions and always offering insightful recommendations. I highly recommend him as a host for anyone staying in Rio!

Me gustó mucho la ubicación, muy estrátegico para compras y traslados. El lugar es tal cual como aparece en la publicación. A Igor muchas gracias por estar pendiente de mi llegada, mi estadia, y mis días en (Website hidden by Airbnb) verdad muchas gracias.

Tive uma ótimo experiencia no apartmento do Igor. 
O lugar tem serviço de Limpeza diariamente, é muito seguro e a localizaçao é muito boa.
O Igor é um excelente host, sempre se certificando que estavamos Bem e sempre disposto a ajudar. 
Espero Voltar la em breve.

Séjour très agréable, la chambre est comme sur les photos. A 3 minutes à pied de la plage ! Ét très bien placée. Igor est un hôte très disponible, et plein de bon conseil. 
Je recommande Se logement

Super recomendo!! Estadia, conforto, cordialidade, segurança... nota dez!! Igor é um anfitrião mto atencioso, sempre disposto a resolver oq precisar!! As fotos mostraram o local como é realmente!! Com certeza tem minha indicação e gostaria de voltar outra vez!!
Excelente anfitrión, siempre disponible. La ubicación es excelente. Muy cómodo para parejas. Las fotografías muestran lo que en realidad es. Lo recomiendo 100%
Minha estadia com o Igor foi perfeita. Ele é extremamente atencioso e solícito. Apartamento impecável e muito bem localizado. Excelente! Voltarei com certeza.
Otimo, excelente localização Igor é um ótimo anfitrião, te trata melhor que muito hotel por ae, o preço é justo.

Ótimo espaço, o pessoal do hotel é muito gente boa e solicita para o que precisarmos, a localização também é muito boa, apenas 5 minutos da praia de Copacabana a pé, o lugar é tranquilo. Gostei muito e pretendo voltar outras vezes!
Limpieza, Ubicacion, servicio, anfitrion excelente.
Ótimo apartamento. Muito bem localizado. Perto de tudo. Igor super atencioso e prestativo. Até permitiu nosso check-out um pouco mais tarde. Recomendo.
Ótimo local, próximo a praia e bastante aconchegante, as fotos retratam com fidelidade o que encontrei.
Agradeço ao Igor pela presteza nas informações. O apartamento é bem localizado em Copacabana e cumpre com o anunciado. Estadia muito tranquila. Recomendo a todos!
Ótimo espaço localizado praticamente na praia de Copacabana. Perto de bares, restaurantes, padarias. Recomendo é votaria com certeza!!

O apartamento fica dentro de um prédio residencial com recepção 24 horas e serviço de limpeza de quartos. Também há restaurante em suas dependências. A localização é excelente tendo em vista que fica próximo a praia de Copacabana e Leme (posto 2) shopping Rio Sul, mercados, restaurantes, ponto de ônibus, táxi e estação de bicicletas. Igor foi um excelente anfitrião, se colocando a nossa disposição para eventuais dúvidas e sugestões. Não temos o que reclamar! O espaço é bem fiel as fotos e esperamos voltar em breve!
Ótima localização, apartamento limpo e confortável, um ótimo preço
Boa localização, perto de tudo e fácil de achar e chegar. Estrutura um pouco antiga.
Só tenho a agradecer a Igor por tudo e principalmente pela atenção
Igor's place was comfortable, well located and convenient. He was very helpful with logistics, friendly and attentive. I would stay at Igor's place again.
Igor was very responsive and had snacks at checkin.  Great location.  Basic room.
Adorei a hospitalidade, o local é espetacular.

Igor is the best airbnb host! There was absolutely no communication problem. He went an extra mile to accommodate all my requests. He was very prompt in replying. 
If you want a great location and experience in Copacabana, Rio then Igor should be your first preference.
Otima estadia....localização excelente, perto de tudo! O igor  nos ajudou e deu otimas dicas...

El departamento esta muy bien ubicado sobre una avenida y cerca de la playa. Todo resultó tal cual las fotos. Tanto Igor como los empleados del edificio fueron muy atentos y amables. Con seguridad lo recomiendo y volveré.
Igor foi muito solícito! O local tem uma infraestrutura muito legal. Apto limpo e organizado! Voltaria a me hospedar neste local.

O Igor foi um otimo anfitrião. Atencioso, sempre em contato comigo, entregou as chaves na hora combinada e o apartamento é exatamente como mostram as fotos. Alem de tudo, muito bem localizado. Recomendo!

Para quem precisa de um aposento para passar poucas noite, este quarto é perfeito. Encontrei o quarto bem equipado e limpo, uma ótima ducha e preço justo. Além disso é bem localizado se você precisar se locomover pela zona sul. recomendo aos interessados.

Igor foi super solicito e tentando ajudar em qualquer momento, um ótimo anfitrioa. Hotel onde está o apartamento está bastante antigo e apartamento também, então se você está sem frescura pode ficar lá tranquilamente. Localização e boa, perto de tudo.
Excellent location and communication at an incredibly fair price. Safe, comfortable, and easy. Close to all necessary amenities and transportation. Walk to the beach!

Muy buena ubicación, cómodo, nos sirvió mucho un horno y un refri que hay, está cerca de la playa y mall, supermercado. D
el aeropuerto nos dejó el bus 2018 o 2016 ( el que iba a Copacabana y nos dejó justo frente al alojamiento) regreso uber pero fue algo similar la tarifa.
Cerca de los lugares turísticos.
A veces convenía más un uber que un bus. Igor nos dió tips e información útil.
Esperemos poder regresar.
Saludos desde México

Apartamento super organizado e com uma ótima localização perto de praia, metro, padaria, lanchonetes, restaurantes, bares e etc. Já tenho com toda certeza um lugar certo para me hospedar no Rio. Além de Igor ser um anfitrião muito atencioso. 
Recomendo a todos que queiram passar ferias no Rio.

Hospedagem excelente. Tudo conforme combinado, as fotos são exatamente o que é . Ambiente limpo. Não encontramos com o Igor pessoalmente  , mas respondeu todas as mensagens facilitando a nossa estadia. Valeu muito a pena. Obrigado

Para quem pensa em ir ao Rio de Janeiro conhecer os pontos turisticos e ficar em um lugar próximo a tudo, não pense duas vezes antes de fechar com o Igor. 
Ótima localização, hotel com excelente funcionários (Estacionamento poderia ser mais barato). 
Fui de carro de São Paulo para o Rio, como o hotel ficava bem proximo da praia, deixei meu carro estacionado na avenida Atlântica, pagando R$ 2,00 a diária e voltava pela manhã. 
Voltarei com certeza e indicarei à amigos. 
Obrigado Igor pela resposta rápida sempre que precisei.

*O espaço é exatamente o que mostra nas fotos.

Ótimo custo benefício.
Experiência incrível! Super recomendo! Igor super solícito e preocupado com a estadia! Obrigado e até uma próxima!
O espaço do Igor é muito confortável! Sendo extremamente bem localizado e com transporte público abundante, fica fácil se locomover. Próximo à praia e com excelente infraestrutura no condomínio.
Muy bien hospedaje, limpio, y todo en orden

O local é muito bem localizado. Próximo à Praia de Copacabana, com um posto policial ao lado do Hotel, com policiamento contínuo.  Próximo ao Shopping Rio Sul, que é Lindo. O Igor foi muito atencioso conosco. O Hotel tem piscina térmica, sala de jogos, academia e um restaurante com uma comida gostosa e preço  acessível. Enfim, super indicamos. Vale muito conhecer a "Cidade Maravilhosa" e se hospedar em um lugar tão agradável.
Abração, Igor. Obrigado pela atenção!

Excelente oportunidade para ficar no Rio! Localização ótima, em Copacabana, mas perto de Botafogo e do Leme. Metrô bem perto, shopping a alguns metros. Fomos andando para vários pontos turísticos.  O hotel tem um staff bem atencioso! O quarto é excelente, tem até cafeteira, mini-geladeira e forno elétrico. Ótimo banheiro com ducha bem forte. Igor foi excelente em tudo e flexibilizou o check-in e check-out! Super recomendado! Parabéns pelo espaço!

A estádia com o anfitrião Igor foi realmente incrível, o qual foi muito prestativo, atencioso e cuidadoso. 
Foi minha primeira experiência com AIRBNB,  qual levarei de forma muito positiva. Tudo de acordo com a descrição lugar limpo e aconchegante, de fácil acesso aos principais pontos turísticos, ao transporte público(ônibus, metrô),  shopping e praias maravilhosas. Super recomendo tanto o lugar como o anfitrião. Mais uma vez muito obrigada Igor por todo o cuidado e carinho conosco, com certeza retornarei mais vezes.

O apartamento do Igor é maravilhoso! EXATAMENTE como diz no anúncio! Minha estadia foi PERFEITA! O igor sempre muito atencioso, tirando nossas dúvidas, perguntando se estava tudo bem, etc! O igor foi bem flexível quanto ao nosso check-in e check-out. A localização é maravilhosa, próximo de supermercados, onibus, metrô, etc. Sem sombras de duvidas, das vezes que voltar no RJ, ficarei no apartamento de novo! Não tenho do que reclamar, se eu pudesse dar uma nota ao Igor, seria 1.000! Obrigado pela hospedagem maravilhosa!
Preço justo pela hospedagem. O Igor mostrou-se sempre à disposição.

O apart fica em um local muito bem localizado, próximo a ponto turísticos. O acesso ao metrô, ônibus é bem fácil. O atendimento dos funcionários é muito bom. A suíte é exatamente o que mostra no anúncio. O Igor nos atendeu muito bem, sempre solícito, nos orientando em tudo. Recomendo!!! Com certeza voltarei.
About 10 minute walk from Copacabana beach. The room is quite basic but a good location. Igor is very helpful.
Localizacao excelente , seguro e limpo . Mto bom , voltarei e indicarei

O espaço condiz com o mostrado na imagem, limpo e arejado. Além do Igor ser muito atencioso, o residencial possui recepção com funcionários solícitos, assim como o serviço de limpeza e restaurante. Bem localizado pra quem deseja conhecer o RJ via transporte público. Amei a estadia e espero retornar em breve!

Un lugar prefecto para descansar y disfrutar de Rio, muy cerca a la playa y medios de transporte. Un lugar cómodo en plena zona turística. Las fotos presentan exactamente lo que es. 
Igor siempre tuvo la mejor disposición para resolver nuestras dudas, dar sugerencias y ayudar en lo que necesitáramos. Excelente anfitrión.
Foi uma ótima experiência! Igor foi extremamente prestativo e profissional! Sua acomodação é muito bem localizada e ele está sempre disponível para tirar dúvidas. Recomendo! Muito obrigado!
Excelente apartamento, num lugar ótimo. O Igor é super atencioso e prestativo. Recomendo fortemente!

Igor, meu chará. Foi muito receptivo e atencioso, nos deu várias dicas de onde ir, inclusive um mapa. A estadia foi ótima, lugar maravilhoso, ótima localização, próximo de supermercados, farmácia, metrô , shopping e algumas quadras da praia, o apê é bem confortável, minha amiga e eu nos sentimos a vontade.

Igors stay was very pleasant. It's excellent value for money, about 10 minute walk from beach. Close to shops and public transport and everywhere via uber was cheap. Igor is a great host and so easy to communicate. I had come to rio to experience samba and was kind enough to help me find a school with classes. At any time I had a question he was very quick tonr respons. He really went out of his way. Thank you!

Ótimo apartamento, muito espaçoso, ótima localização, perto de tudo que precisamos, eu e minha esposa adoramos a estadia. Não tivemos a oportunidade  de conhecer o Igor pessoalmente, mas ele demonstrou ser muito atencioso e preocupado com seus hóspedes. Abraços!

Gostaria de agradecer imensamente o anfitrião, primeiramente por ter nos incentivado a ir, já que quase desistimos após as noticias sobre o que estava acontecendo no RJ. 
A estadia foi excelente, ótima localização, local super agradável e limpo. Indico para casais, pois mesmo sendo duas camas de solteiro não fica desconfortável juntar as camas. O anfitrião se preocupa com tudo além de super educado, quando chegamos havia até água na geladeira e um petisco. Não temos nada a reclamar e já estamos pensando quando voltar. super indico.
Mais uma vez muito obrigada.
Fui muito bem recebida pelo Igor e tive um ótimo acolhimento durante toda a minha estadia! Recomendo muito e pretendo voltar outras vezes! Correspondeu a todas minhas expectativas. :))
O Espaço é  excelente e bem localizado próximo a tudo que um turista precisa.
Good value for the money

Ótima localização,preço super justo.
Próximo a praia , bancos , shopping e restaurantes.

Simplesmente perfeita estadia. Perto de comércios, metrô, supermercado, shopping e a pouquíssimos metros a praia . Apartamento muito limpo, idêntica às fotos. Igor ótimo anfitrião, sempre se preocupando. Adorei! Espero voltar em breve
Super atencioso e prestativo. Localização ótima e ambiente muito tranquilo.
Fascinante alojamiento! Recomendable al 100%
Proprietário bastante atencioso, ótima localização. Quarto bem preparado, com frigobar, cafeteira, tv . Ótimo . Muito satisfeita.

Igor ist ein ausgezeichneter Gastgeber, den ich nur empfehlen kann. Ich war 12 Tage in Rio und habe mich in der Unterkunft sehr wohl und sicher gefühlt. Es sind nur 5 Minuten zum Strand und wenn es mal regnet, kann man im Hotel zwei Saunen (naß und trocken) und den Swimminpool kostenlos nutzen. Auch während des Aufenthaltes war er jederzeit erreichbar und sehr hilfsbereit.
lOCALIZAÇÃO PERFEITA ,PERTO DE TUDO .ESPAÇO IDEAL PARA DUAS PESSOAS.RECOMENDO.

Great central place. It is very secure and quite. You can walk to the beach from here and to many restaurants that are around. There is also a shopping mall at walking distance with other restaurants. Only $5 Uber ride (15 min) to the downtown area where all the party goes on. If you are coming alone or with friends I would encourage you to stay with Igor.

Apartamento muy bien ubicado, cerca de tiendas de todo tipo, buses y metro. Avenida de fácil acceso, zona muy segura con presencia policial.
En cuanto a comodidades, la atención del personal es muy buena. Espacio muy limpio, luminoso y cómodo. Igor tuvo la amabilidad de dejar agua para nuestra llegada.
Es un lugar para recomendar a quien quiera conocer Rio.

Apartamento muy bien ubicado, cerca de tiendas de todo tipo, buses y metro. Avenida de fácil acceso, zona muy segura con presencia policial. En cuanto a comodidades, la atención del personal es muy buena. Espacio muy limpio, luminoso y cómodo. Igor tuvo la amabilidad de dejar agua para nuestra llegada. Es un lugar para recomendar a quien quiera conocer Rio.
The room has everything you need. The location is perfect. Just 400m to the beach with lots of places to eat around.
O Igor tem todas as qualidades necessárias de um ótimo anfitrião.  Um espaço ótimo e uma simpatia/hospitalidade sem igual! Super recomendo!

Très bon séjour 
Située juste à côté de la plage, idéal
Igor est un hôte gentil et très réactif
Je recommande sans hésitation
Encore merci

A hospedagem foi ótima. O quarto condiz com as fotos, estava tudo (Website hidden by Airbnb) o frigobar e algumas louças é possível comprar alguns itens para consumo/lanche. Igor foi super solícito. O lugar é como um hotel, com portaria 24h e opção de café da manhã no lounge. Indico.
Galera. Eu e minha esposa recomendamos o local do Igor. Muito perto da praia, muito seguro e aconchegante!!

Igor fue muy amable y profesional, contestándonos cada pregunta. El cuarto y baño fue muy limpio y las  camas MUY cómodas. Además de hablar portugués, también habla inglés y español. Seguramente la próxima vez que  vengo a Río voy a buscar hospedarme en el mismo lugar. También, ¡voy a recomendar la habitación a cualquier amigo que vaya a Río!

Chambre et salle de bain privée, avec frigo, four électrique et cafetière. Emplacement parfait: à deux pas de Copacabana, des navettes pour le Christ Rédempteur et même possibilité d’aller à pied au Pain de Sucre en moins d’une heure. Quartier sûr et résidence très sécurisée. Igor a été très réactif et très compréhensif suite au retard de notre avion.

Muito bom
Apartamento e lugar ótimo
Tinha tudo
Sauna academia piscina
Bem chique, gostamos demais!!

Localização excelente, o que facilita o deslocamento para pontos turísticos. 
O fato de possuir um restaurante no prédio facilitou muito e possibilitou uma economia razoável. 
O apartamento precisa de alguns detalhes como: iluminação, ventilação extra ar condicionado, tv a cabo com maior quantidade de canais e limpeza. Mas atendeu toda as minhas necessidades.
Muy buen alojamiento y por un buen precio . A pocas cuadras de copacabana y de un centro comercial muy bueno. La seguridad es muy buena y el barrio es súper turístico.

O ESPAÇO É MUITO BEM CUIDADO, LOCALIZAÇÃO EXCELENTE,  O IGOR FOI MUITO ATENCIOSO COMIGO, INCLUSIVE ME DEIXANDO ENTRAR MAIS CEDO NO APARTAMENTO E SAIR MAIS TARDE QUANDO VOLTEI PARA MINHA RESIDÊNCIA. MUITO OBRIGADO!

name: Teknik Yapı Concord Rezidance
summary: This house is central. 2+1. Fitness✅ pool✅ carpark✅ 21.floor and city view.
description: This house is central. 2+1. Fitness✅ pool✅ carpark✅ 21.floor and city view.

name: Comfort Luxury center apartment
summary: Experience what's living in the center of Barcelona in this modern and stylish apartment.  Enjoy a wonderful visit in this two bedrooms and two bathrooms apartment and never forget your holiday in the city. HUTB-006823
space: Experience what's living in the center of Barcelona in this modern and stylish apartment.  It offers your a bright living room with double sofa bed and flat-screen TV. Kitchen with a table and chairs for up to 6 guests is fully equipped with oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker and utensils.  It also has 2 double bedrooms and two complete bathrooms with shower. The master bedroom has a double queen size bed and a large bathroom en suite. The second bedroom has two single beds which can be joined to form a double.  The apartment has been completely renovated maintaining the original modernist style with touches of contemporary décor. The floor has the original hydraulic mosaic from the XIX Cent.
description: Experience what's living in the center of Barcelona in this modern and stylish apartment.  Enjoy a wonderful visit in this two bedrooms and two bathrooms apartment and never forget your holiday in the city. HUTB-006823 Experience what's living in the center of Barcelona in this modern and stylish apartment.  It offers your a bright living room with double sofa bed and flat-screen TV. Kitchen with a table and chairs for up to 6 guests is fully equipped with oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker and utensils.  It also has 2 double bedrooms and two complete bathrooms with shower. The master bedroom has a double queen size bed and a large bathroom en suite. The second bedroom has two single beds which can be joined to form a double.  The apartment has been completely renovated maintaining the original modernist style with touches of contemporary décor. The floor has the original hydraulic mosaic from the XIX Cent. Internet WIFI.  Bed linen provided. A set of hands & bath towel per pers
neighborhood_overview: The Eixample area of Barcelona was built on the nineteenth century. It is the birthplace of the Artistic Modernist movement of Antoni Gaudi which is its main reference. In this area you can find the impressive Sagrada Familia, the two famous Gaudí houses, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló, the Manzana de la Discordia and the Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau. A large part of the appeal of the Eixample is the mythical avenue Passeig de Gràcia, one of the most famous avenues in Spain due to its importance for shopping, business and a great showcase of outstanding works of modernist architecture is compared to the Champs Elysees in Paris or Fifth Avenue in New York. This area is full of great modernist works, such as Gaudi's Casa Batlló, Casa de Puig i Cadafalch Amatller and Lleo Morera by Domènech i Muntaner well known as the Manzana de la Discordia. Also in this area you can find the University of Barcelona, which is an elegant building with beautiful gardens and House Gofverichs Boada Hous
notes: Keep the apartment in good condition and don’t accumulate garbage. Extremely important, respect the neighbours. Under no circumstances, parties or loud music are not tolerated from 22:00. The apartment has a fixed capacity. You’re not allowed to bring more people than the listed. Bed linen and towels for in-house use only. Don't use them for outside activities. The non fulfilment of any of the above points may result in expulsion from the apartment.
transit: The apartment is located in the city center. Plaza Catalunya and las Ramblas are at 12 minutes walking, and Paseo de Gracia and plaza Universitat are at 5 minutes. There are many nearby bus lines and metro stations.
access: Internet WIFI.  Bed linen provided. A set of hands & bath towel per person provided. Portable baby cot available for 25€ per stay (120x60cm) High chair available for 15€ per stay.
interaction: CHECK IN Check in from 13:00h to 20:00h Early Check in from 9h to 13h has no extra charge (not always available) Late check in from 20h to 23h has an extra charge of 20€ Late check in from 23h to 8h has an extra charge of 35€ CHECK OUT Check out until 11:00h Late check out from 12h to 16h has an extra charge of 30€ (not always available) City tourist tax not included - 2,25€ per person and night, must be paid on the arrival. (DECRETO 60/2017) Tourist license: HUTB-006823
house_rules: Extremely important: respect the neighbours. Under no circumstances, parties or loud music are not tolerated after 22:00. Keep the apartment in good condition and don’t accumulate garbage. Dispose the trash at the grey containers that you'll find at the street. The apartment has a fixed capacity. You’re not allowed to invite anyone else to stay who is not listed as staying in the apartment. Smoking at the apartment is not allowed. Please don’t lose your keys, we charge 50€ for replacements. Don't leave the keys on the lock. We won't be able to access the apartment and you'll be charged for the locksmith service. Report any damage you find or cause. Save electricity and water. The non fulfilment of any of the above points may result in expulsion from the apartment. Check in from 13:00h to 20:00h Early Check in from 9h to 13h has no extra charge (not always available) Late check in from 20h to 23h has an extra charge of 20€ Late check in from 23h to 8h has an extra charge of 35€ CHECK OU

host.host_about:
Hi everyone! I'm an easygoing person who loves to travel and to meet people all around the world. 
My apartment is ideal if you want to visit the city I know Barcelona well and will be able to help you to go to the best spots in the city.
See you soon ;-)

reviews.comments: Angel is a good host.He is very helpful with all the information needed prior to my (Website hidden by Airbnb) we arrived after midnight,we thought it would be difficult to contact them but it was very easy.We love the design of the (Website hidden by Airbnb) is clean and proper.The location is also good.Walking distance to Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla.24hr supermarket is everywhere near our (Website hidden by Airbnb) for us to do grocery shopping on the way back.Overall a very nice experience in Barcelona.Thanks Angel

The flat is wonderfully Barcelona. It is ideally located in a beautiful period building on the top floor and offers a very nice view towards the mountain and sea. You can sit on the balcony that spans the living room and main bedroom as the green parrots fly by. The interior is very nice and the beds are extremely comfortable. I highly recommend this flat to anyone visiting Barcelona.

We met with Angel's collegue the day we arrived. The building is an ancient but well kept with beautiful moisaic. The apartment was very clean and beautiful. The view from the 4th floor was breath taking!

Couldn't ask for more. Will come back soon!

Very nice place, beautiful view over Barcelona, clean and tidy. We stayed 4 people and had a great time. Location is perfect for tourists. Metro station in the immediate vicinity. Plaza de Catalunya is some 5 walking minutes away. I could recommend it warmly to everyone who wants to visit Barcelona.
We had the best time! The apartment is absolutely beautiful and the location is great! We will definately be back!

Very nice, clean and comfortable apartment. The location is great, ca 2 minutes walk from the Universitat metro station. There is an elevator in the building. Smooth and timely 'check in'. Angel was available and quick to response when we had questions.

We stayed there for 4 nights and we had a great stay at Mr. Angel's apartment. The flat is clean and comfortable. And also, it's  located in a safe area, close to the city center (Placa Catalunya is 10 walking minutes away).

Nous avons passé un très  agréable sejour. L'appartement est très confortable (bonne literie) et décorée avec beaucoup de gout. Très central à 2 pas du métro. Une location que je recommande pour 2 couples ou familles avec enfants.
An amazing apartment, central area, close to the most important spots. A very important detail: super clean and super tidy!  We hope to come back soon!

We stayed in Barcelona during 5 days / 4 nights. The place that Angel actually recommended to us was perfect. Both in terms of location (in the very hip and happening Eixample neighbourhood) and in terms of space. 2 comfortable bedrooms and bathrooms, a nice and spacy living room and 2 cute balconies from which you can see Barcelona life go by. 
Angel has been very response and helpful. 
I would definitely recommend this apartment!

We were greeted by the agent within 10 minutes of arrival and shown round, then pretty much left to our own devices which was great. Apartment was very nice on the whole and the living area is more spacious than the pictures give it credit for. On the whole the apartment is well fitted out, particularly the kitchen and bathrooms.  Bedrooms are quite small but not that wasn't a real problem. Really liked the hydraulic flooring.

The apartment is pretty much central to all the areas you need to visit and within 15-20 minutes walk from most things you will want to see. The local area is pretty safe and we had little reason to fear, even late at night.

It is on the fourth floor though so I hope your calves can take the strain. The lift works but cannot take the weight of four English folk full of cerveza and tapas. Not the end of the world though as our party loves walking!

Thanks; would recommend.

We were a group of 6 and stayed at Angel's for 4 nights. We had the most amazing experience. The house was great, very clean and well equipped.  The apartment is in a very quiet area of town, but still close to the subway and to all the main sites. Angel was always available to answer our questions and also booked us a taxi for the day we left.
Overall I greatly suggest staying at Angel's

Appartamento luminoso, accogliente e ben rifinito, in pieno centro a 10 min a piedi da Placa Catalunya. In uno stabile dei primi del 900 coniuga particolare d'epoca, come gli stupendi pavimenti, con una ristrutturazione moderna, minimale e di design. Davvero bello e piacevole.
Ho soggiornato solo 3 notti ma ne avrei fatte volentieri di più. Le foto sono tutte veritiere e per quanto mi riguarda, l'appartamento non manca di nulla. Consigliato.

Pros:
- Great location, only a few minutes walk from Universistat metro 
- Pictures capture apartment
- Clean, presentable
- 2 bathrooms 
- Working dishwasher and washing machine 
Cons: 
- We had some issues getting the sofa bed to work properly so if there are more than 4 of you planning to stay here be aware that the fifth person might not have as comfortable stay as the others. 
- No basic cooking materials such as oil, seasoning and spices
Overall, great apartment - recommended!!

Wow, what a great place! It has everything you could possible need. The kitchen was well stocked, we appreciated having coffee, sugar, salt and pepper available. Great location, short walk to the Metro and lots of great cafes. We were met by one of Angel's friends who was very helpful. He had lots of great suggestions for us. We loved having such a luxurious place to stay.

The apartment is beautifull!!!! 
We loved it! 
Very clean, beautifull balcony, full kitchen and we enjoyed every moment. 
Recomended!!! :)

A very comfortable, well-furnisdhed flat, equipped with everything that was needed during the stay. Is located in a very convenient place - many interesting sightseeing objects located nearby, good infrastructure in terms of public transportation and other facilities. Definitely a good choice for those who stay for several days - totally feels as if you are home :) Thank you very much for the good and fast service and for making our stay even more enjoyable!!

The appartment itself is great- it's beautiful and perfectly located, we enjoyed it a lot. Small supermarket just across the street, few min. walk to nearest metro station, less than 10 min. walk to Plaza Catalunia.

The only problem we had was with musquitos- the place was full of them, although we never opened a window during our stay. The host claimed it was a problem of the season and the area, which might be it.

At the bottom line, this appartment was not cheap at all, but we chose it as we were travelling with 2 little children, and this gave a perfect response to the need of enough space, comfort, and great location. Highly recommended.

Our second time at this place, because it is such a beautiful and comfortable apartment in the city. Close to Subway and walking distance to plaza catalunya and the Ramblas. We were here with two babies and the owner kindly arranged two baby cribs for us. Great pick for everyone travelling to Barcelona!

Contact with host was quick. Flat is located in the city center,  15 minutes walk from La Rambla, Boqueria. We got to the apartment without any problem. Angel's flat was  comfortable for 4 and clean. There were towels, hairdryer, iron. Value for money!

Perfect apartment! Location is great: less than 10 minutes easy walk to Pl. Catalunya, 24 h supermarket just opposite. The apartment is just like on the photos. Ideal for two couples. Although we didn't meet Angel, we had no problems. The communication with Angel is very easy, he responded in few minutes to our request for late check out. I highly recommend this apartment for your stay in Barcelona.
Beautiful, well-located apartment. Perfect for a short break and in walking distance to lots of bars, restaurants, shops and sights.

We have just returned from Barcelona staying 1 week in this wonderful apartment.

The apartment is located perfectly 5 min walk from Plaza Catalunia and the start of La Rambla.

The neighborhood is very cosy with many lively bars, good restaurants and supermarkets nearby. It can be a little bit noisy at night, but this is of course quite normal in a bigger city.

The apartment is exactly as described on the pictures and in the listing. It is a spacious 2 bedroom apartment with 2 nice bathrooms. The decor in the living room is just awesome with old spanish tiles on the floor and a wonderful ceiling.
The bathroom have been renovated within the last couple of years and are very nice. In the bathroom connected to the master bedroom the door to the shower was however missing. The owner confirmed that it would be replaced shortly!

The apartment is completely without any personal items and is probably only used commercially. The more frequent Airbnb users are probably used to this, but for us using Airbnb for the first time this was a minor surprise.

The communication with the host was perfect. We can not complain. He/she answered immediately on the few questions we had.

The check in and check out was also without any problems and happened smoothly.

Overall, we are very satisfied with our stay in this apartment and in Barcelona.

We will be back
The apartment was lovely, the location even better!

L'appartement est idéalement situé et est très beau! État de propreté impeccable également!  Nous n'avons pas vu Angel. Une petite suggestion: il n'y avait aucun savon main, pas de café, pas d'huile d'olive,... Pour un séjour de 3 jours, cela n'est pas très pratique car il y avait peu de fournitures basiques permettant de profiter pleinement de l'appartement... mais à part cela, c'est une adresse à recommander .

Myself, my mum, my brother and his girlfriend all stayed in Angels apartment last week, and we were really impressed with both the location and the apartment itself. 
It was very easy to locate, just a 2-3 minutes walk from the nearest Carre-four and the metro station. It takes about 5-10 minutes to walk to the top of La Rambla at the Plaza Catalunya. In terms of location, I really can't recommend it enough, its central to a lot of sites and generally the metro took about 10 minutes to get to La Sagrada Familia or the Picasso museum. 
The apartment itself is really lovely, the beds are very comfortable and its quite spacey, its perfect for 2-4 people. Its decorated beautifully, is very light and the balcony looks out onto a pretty street view. 
We were met by Angel's friend who was very helpful and showed us around the apartment, making us feel very welcome. There was also a pack that had a few recommendations of popular sites and places to visit which was kind. 
Overall I couldn't really fault our stay - everything was so easy and laid back, and we really enjoyed staying at Angel's apartment. Hopefully we'll be able to come back soon!

The flat at Muntaner 13 was great for 4 people, nice living room, 2 bedrooms (1 double bed and 2 single), 2 very modern bathrooms and a perfect little balcony with a view. We enjoyed our stay very much and Angel and his team were flexible with check-in and check-out times. The only thing that is worth noting is that there were no shower products, maybe ask the host to provide those.

The apartment was very nice , clean and comfortable!! We are very satisfied from our stay! The location is very closed to the center, about five minutes, and it was very easy for us to approach all the sights! Definitely, i will visit you again!!

We spent 4 nights in Angels apartment and everything was very nice. Apartment is cozy and exactly as the pictures shown on Airbnb. Location is perfect, super nice bars and restaurants close by. Easy to walk to the main sights. Person was there on time to give our keys and we had a good communication (our flight was delayed) with the host. Would absolutely stay there again and can recommend it. No complaints what so ever.
Great location, good size rooms and well furnished. Minor suggestions to top up sugar, oil and washing tablets but overall very satisfied.

The apartment is great in many ways. Brilliant location, pretty spacious, clean and tidy, lovely kitchen and bathrooms etc. The only issue was the noise from traffic and bars on the street. We had to shut all windows and put air conditioning before going to bed. Otherwise we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

I really like Angel's apartment. The location is good, close to Plaza Catalunya. There's a supermarket just about 2 min walk which was very convenient for us.
