The apartment was clean, nicely decorated and with a wonderful balcony; we really liked that it has two bathrooms; it also has an elevator which was a must for us. Check in and check out was very easy.
The apartment is lovely with a real Spanish city vibe about it, old and new combined made for an interesting view.
Traditional Barcelona apartment with a cool modern twist, in a great location for seeing anywhere in Barcelona. Only gripe is the sofa bed didn't really work! The sofa is comfy anyway.

A superb loacation and a beautiful apartment with a lovely blend of original, traditional features and modern design. Would definitely recommend and would use again if visiting Barcelona again. Location is well situated for access to La Rambla.
It would have been nice to see angel but he did send a rep which was fine

We arrived at the apartment via My Taxi ride from airport - $29 with tip - and were greeted by an employee of Angels.  She showed us around the apartment and explained where everything was.  She also provided us with a recommendation sheet of restaurants and things to do - two of them were incredible, especially the breakfast Brunch and Cake.

The apartment is very clean and plenty of space for 2-5 people.  It has a great balcony with views of the city and an elevator for easy access as it's on the 4th floor.  The wifi worked great.  Location is great with plenty of areas that are walkable - Rambla was a 10-15 minute walk.  All in all it was a great experience and I would definitely stay here again.
Great location cwalkimg distance to many attractions, bars cafes and restaurants. Host was welcoming and provided a lot of information introducing us to the city.

The apartment is exactly as described in the photographs.  The location is perfect, just a short walk to the Metro and a few more blocks to Plaza Catalunya.  There were plenty of good restaurants around (St. Moritz brewery, just around the corner), and a few small convenient stores.  Each bedroom had very comfortable beds and its own private bathroom with shower, sink and toilet. Like the fact that the bedrooms are in opposite sides so there is a feeling of privacy.  The owner was very responsive and helped us retrieve safely some electronics that we forgot in the bedroom. A big plus is that the bldg has a lift (elevator), which helped with luggage, since it's located on the 4th FL.  Lovely apartment and highly recommended.
Tres bel appartement, on peut faire tous les quartiers de Barcelon a pied... metro et bus a côté...propre looké literie parfaite

Very good. Layout of apartment was great, location was perfect. Bed in master bedroom was not really comfortable for our tastes. There was a miscommunication, I asked in advance, actually twice, that the third person in our group to be let in on Tuesday, I assumed this was acceptable since the request was not denied. When our person called for arrangements she was told that she would not be let in.

Firstly the things we loved about this apartment were:
Excellent location, a beautiful building in a very nice area closely located to lots of coffee shops and only a 15 minute walk from Plac' de Catalunya. 
A very modern little flat well equipped with most of the essentials.

Suggestions for improvement:
More lighting ( the flat is a bit too dark, especially in the kitchen)

A dryer would be nice ( the washing machine is great, but on rainy days there is no way of getting the washing dry)

The door keys do not fit properly and one needs to jiggle the key around to find the opening every time which was very annoying.

The TV channels do not really work very well. Only 2 or 3 channels that work with a lot of interference.
El apartamento está muy bien ubicado.   Tiene lo esencial para la estancia aunque no utilicé la cocina.   Lo único que nos afectó fue la poca disponibilidad de agua caliente para 4.
The apartment was exactly as described and really nice. Also the location is great. The sofa bed was not working directly but got repaired immediately. All in all a very nice place to stay.

This was an awesome apartment 
Excellent location 
Clean - spacious apartment 
Communication was great 
Several restaurants, grocery stores near by 
Could easily walk to las  ramblas
Would recommend without doubt
The apartment was very nice, clean and well located! We had a really nice stay.

We had a great weekend in Barcelona.  The apartment is central everything in walking distance.  Very clean .  Two bathrooms a plus.  Beds comfy.  It's in a great old style block with a lift which was another plus.  Bit of traffic noise in the front bedroom but nothing a pair of earplugs can't sort.  Overall a fantastic stay in a wonderful city.  Would definately recomend.

We are a family of 5 and stayed 4 nights in December. The appartment is fantastic, in a location that is just perfect for discovering the city. Many places to visit in Barcelona can be reached by foot, otherwise the metro is very close. There are also plenty of shops and restaurants near, but it's good to know it can be a little bit noisy.

The perfect location: it's very easy to get in from the airport, very close to the subway, but also very easy to walk to all the major monuments in the Barrio Gotic and Eixample.  The apartment is also extremely comfortable and well appointed.  We stayed with another couple, and we each had privacy in our own bedroom & bathroom while sharing the common space.  The apartment has wonderful light, a well stocked kitchen area for any cooking, and very comfortable furniture.  We'll definitely stay again the next time we're in Barcelona.

This was a fantastic find for us as we travel to Barcelona frequently and this is now one of our favourites.  

The apartment is exceptionally clean  and is light and airy but still has a lovely cosy feel.  Thankfully there is a lift as it is located on the the top floor.

Communication and check-in were exceptional and friendly throughout the booking experience.  Excellent location for seeing the city but pretty quiet even though it's located at the bottom end of c/Muntaner.

I would have no hesitation in recommending this apartment and will happily rebook in the future.

Thank you for an excellent stay in Barcelona!!

A truly fabulous flat in a perfect location.  The front bedroom is nosy but that is the only fault.  The decor is lovely, the bathrooms are great, the balcony and views gave you a real feel for the place.  The flat was spotlessly clean and had everything one could need.  It gave us a really wonderful experience of living in such a great city.  Highly recommended.

Great place; great part of town. Walking distance to loads of places of interest, restaurants, cafes, shops etc. Comfortable apartment with good amenities; nice decor; comfy beds - although double mattress in second bedroom might be better. Overall, great stay.

Great location. Close to University Metro stop. Central to all the major parts of the city whether walking or taking the Metro. Comfortable beds with nice linens. Modern bathrooms. (But hot water can run out with four people taking showers.) Well equipped kitchenette with full size table. Comfortable sitting area. Our party of four would stay here again without any reservations.
Great place...unique artistic decor.  The location was perfect with a wonderful view from the balcony of the area.

Siamo stati molto bene in questo alloggio, soprattutto perchè la posizione è perfetta per visitare la città e perchè l'appartamento è corredato di tutto l'occorrente. Probabilmente lo sceglieremo di nuovo quando torneremo Barcellona e lo consigliamo vivamente.

This is a beautiful apartment very centrally located. There are restaurants/cafes and supermarkets nearby. The apartment has two lovely bedrooms and two well equipped bathrooms. This apartment is ideal for a family of four. We would definitely stay here again on our next trip to Barcelona. We really enjoyed this neighborhood. It felt like a local place and not full of tourists.

We loved our stay in the apartment, full of charm and character with very comfy beds.  The balcony provides a great view of the hills behind and the street below, which wasn't as busy as some reviews suggest.  It's a great location and we enjoyed exploring El Raval, full of students, hipsters, coffee  shops and bars, in addition to the more touristy parts of Barcelona. Great location for the Airport bus and the metro too.  Too many great eateries and coffee shops to list but we were never disappointed by the service or quality.
Angel was very responsive.  Apartment is in a great location.  Interesting, fun, creative decorations.  Recommend.

O apartamento é bastante agradável, confortável e muito bem localizado. Apreciamos a decoração e a funcionalidade e o facto de estar equipado com o necessário. O único aspeto negativo que realço foi o tempo de espera para efetuar o check-in, o facto de termos esperado na rua bastante tempo e quando fomos recebidos pelo Nabil, só pudemos deixar as malas, pois ainda estavam a fazer a limpeza.

What a great appartament. The location is really good, walking distance, or short taxi ride to all the highseeing. There are many  restaurants around and food is really good. I would defenitely recomend to everyone, and I would stay at this appartament again. Thanks :)
excellent apartment and location

The apartment is amazing and clean! The position is perfect: 5 minutes walk to Ramblas, you have a bus stop close to the apartment and also a metro station near. The neighbourhood is beautiful, a little bit noise at night but no problem if you close the windows. Everything was perfect!!!

The unit is what it shows on the photos, beautifully designed -the old architectural elements mixed with the modern . We liked the balcony and the views from it, the neighborhood, the kitchen, the Roca toilet fixtures, the strong water pressure, the ACU, the bedside power outlets and lamps, the food condiments, cleaning aids, water kettle, kitchen wares. Would like some improvement on the front toilet door ( doesn't close well) , sofa (stained /looked dirty), floor pillows (bleached out/looked dirty & worn out), dust balls on the floor, toiletries (handsoap and more shampoo/shower gel), trashbins (in toilets were too small). With regards to logistics, 3 blocks walk to get to bus or metro at Placa Catalunya. Hereon, everything is within reach- tourist sites, transportation, shops, food, etc. We arrived during a taxi strike so the 4 of us were forced to take the Aeroport bus with 4 big luggages and 4 stroller bags. Angel suggested the Airport bus and it got us there easy and fast. Only difficulty was lugging all our luggages to the door. Angel does his job for the company but I wouldn't really expect much from him as a host.
Good location and clean!
Highly recommend - beautiful, central apartment!
Stayed there with friend. Great location and view from the balcony. Spacious and well equipped kitchen. Close to everything you need.
Angel's place exceeded our expectations! The location was great, the flat is beautiful, super clean and modern. It is by far, the best airb&b I have stayed in!

We stayed at this apartment with our two daughters (11&13) while on holiday and found that it perfectly fit all of our needs and was the ideal home to wrap up our trip abroad.  Centrally located, dishwasher, laundry, two bed & bath rooms, dining and living room, well appointed kitchen - check, check, check... The building is quiet during the day but we caution that the nightlifers and early morning refuse collection/commuting traffic will provide a background track to your sleep. The triple pane window/shutter combo certainly helps, paired with a pair of ear plugs and you'll be set-up for a cozy sleep. The beds were super comfy and everything very tidy and clean. Although we never met Angel he was prompt and polite in all of our communications.  We were met at the apartment by one of his associates who (albeit briefly) toured us through all of the amenities.  In short, we thoroughly enjoyed this apartment and highly recommended it.
Angel was perfect! He worked with me to check in early. He was on time and great to work with.

Angel's place is a perfect place to stay in Barcelona. It has so much charm and style. It's very close (walking distance) to the center of tourist activity, the nightlife of Xiample district and the subway. Up on the 4th floor (and there is a great elevator) you don't get much noise from the street. Communication was simple and easy. Angel even let me check in early. It's a great place, I would definitely stay here again!

The location of Angel's apartment was perfect for our stay, there are so many great restaurants and tapas to be had just steps away from the apartment. We tried one of Angel's recommendations and it was spot-on!!! The view from the balcony was picture perfect European vacation. There was a bit of street noise, but nothing that couldn't be drown out by some earplugs. The beds were very comfortable and we slept wonderfully. The apartment is well appointed, and he thoughtfully included a blowdryer as well as shampoo and conditioner. We had an amazing stay in Barcelona and we'd definitely stay at Angel's apartment if we find ourselves in Barcelona again!
Great size and location! We had a group of 5 that fit comfortably. We would book again.
Angel's place was as expected, clean spacious and well located. Everything worked perfectly and we had no problems throughout our stay. Would stay again and would recommend.
Nice place to stay in Barcelona.

nice apartment in good area, very close to everything, one nice room for sleeping, but rather loud (but that is the price of lining in the center of a big city), other room very small but nice an very quiet. very good matresses
Angel's apartment is wonderful,with excellent location.  It's a a big apart ment which is cozy enough for 4 people to live in.
Apartment was clean and in a great location

Thank you for your hospitality Angel.  Easy to find and in a great location the apartment was everything we hoped for during our first time in Barcelona.  Getting around was easy and your recommendations were perfect.  We had a wonderful family mini-break!

Angel´s Wohnung ist zu 100% empfehlenswert! Eine toll eingerichtete Wohnung in perfekter Lage! Man ist mittendrin, sodass man viel zu Fuß erreichen kann. Aber auch die Metro und der Flughafentransferbus sind gleich ums Eck an der Plaza Universitat. In der Wohnung ist man mit allem gut ausgestattet. Uns hat nichts gefehlt. Wir haben 6 Tage mit unseren 6-jährigen Zwillingen in Barcelona verbracht, sodass auch die Waschmaschine sehr praktisch war. Frühstücken waren wir jeden Morgen in einem anderen Café. Es gibt unzählige in der Nähe. Wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder!

Angel replies very quickly which made communication easy. The flat is very centrally located in the city. Flat was very clean and in a very good condition. So delighted that there was a dishwasher! Two bathrooms were great as we stayed with 4 girls in the flat ;) 2 towels each which was a great bonus. The beds were very comfortable and had a great night sleep. When I return to Barcelona, I will book this flat again!

Amazing experience in the center of everything.
Very cozy an well designed, a good balance between the original af a 1900's building and the modern elements.
We stayed there for 3 days 2 adults and our 2 daughters and had a wonderful time. They "went crazy" (in a good way) when they saw their unique room :)
Amazing view of Tibidabo to the left of the balcony and the see to the right 
The lift was a good surprise when returning after a long day of walking along the city.
The  only thing is that the apartment is a little bit lack of light.

The place is very well located, fairly central. Walkable distances to just about everything in the centre. Bus/tube links were excellent. Supermarket nearby, lots of cafes and restaurants within easy reach. The communication with the host was good, he responded really quickly and was very helpful. Overall very pleased with our choice and would recommend the apartment to anyone!

Excellent séjour dans un appartement avec beaucoup de charme. Bien décoré, très propre et vraiment bien situé. Beaucoup de commerces, bars et restaurants à proximité, nous  recommandons notamment le restaurant juste en face de l’appartement (Le Volatil). Merci également à Angel pour sa réactivité.
Excelente lugar. Bien ubicado y limpio. Lindo apartamento. Pasamos unos días excelentes.

Séjour agréable dans un appartement confortable et très bien situé. Seul petit bémol, c'est de n'avoir pu rencontrer notre hôte. Et pour cause, nous avons découvert à l'arrivée que nous n'avions pas réserver auprès d'un particulier mais auprès d'une société de location d'appartement. De fait, ce n'était pas un séjour "comme à la maison" auquel nous sommes habitués via AirnBnB, mais plutôt dans une résidence type appartel, même si l'accueil (disponibilité et présence à l'arrivée d'une personne chargée de notre accueil parlant le français) et l'appartement était de qualité.

It would  have been a wonderful holiday, but it was really ruined by two days of construction that happened right outside our door. 
Don't get me wrong, This place is very beautiful and spacious, even for four people and it is in the center of everything. You can literally walk anywhere. We loved the location. The heater worked great for warm up the room and the beds were very comfortable. It even had a full kitchen 

But for two days we had hours of drilling and hammering which was heard throughout the apartment. We would wake up to it in the mornings and when we wanted to come back to the afternoon to rest, we couldn't do so. 

It would have been nice if Angel told us about the construction ahead of time. I have an elderly father who needs his rest in between sightseeing and he was not able to. If we would have known, we would have never stayed here. Angel should have told us once he knew about the construction. When I messaged him about it, he said he knew nothing about it and was going to ask the neighbor. I spoke to a neighbor and the construction has been going on for quite some time. He never responded to me after that. He just ignored me, did not even apologize 

From the little things such as no soap in the dispenser, and lack of hot water, to the major construction, we felt neglected, which is not the normal air bnb experience. I have stayed in dozens of places and it was a bummer when we had this beautiful apartment but couldn't enjoy it. 

I rarely right negative reviews, like ever! Don't  get me wrong the place is beautiful but the construction was a huge imposition and the overall hosting was lacking.

Le logement correspond bien aux photos, Barcelone est une très grande ville et le logement reste bien placé toutefois la chambre avec le lit double est sur rue et la circulation est importante par conséquent le bruit est important. La chambre avec les deux lits simples donne sur l’arrière de l’immeuble et elle est donc bien plus au calme

Great apartment. Spacious.  The perfect location within walking distance from a lot of shopping and restaurants, close to the subway -- you really feel like you are in the middle of things.  One thing no one really mentioned that I thought was a huge plus is that the two bedrooms each have a bathroom either in the bedroom or right outside and they are located on opposite ends of the apartament separated by a nice size living room -- Couples or friends can feel they have their own part of the apartment

Super logement, très bon emplacement, très bon niveau de finition de l’appartement, très propre et bon niveau d’équipement : nous avions tout ce dont nous avions besoin.
Angel a été très arrangeant et réactif au niveau de la communication, et très arrangeant.
We loved our stay at Angel’s the place is near all the attractions. The beds are comfortable, the shower was nice, and the whole apartment was very clean. I would recommend staying with Angel.
Muy céntrico. Buena distribución del apartamento.

Casa: 
Le camere hanno rifiniture molto piacevoli e particolari, i sono letti comodi tuttavia il divano letto nella zona soggiorno è un po’ basso. Una camera ha due materassi singoli che si possono unire facilmente, l’altra invece un letto matrimoniale e bagno in camera, il divano letto in soggiorno, invece, quando aperto diventa un letto matrimoniale.
I bagni sono molto moderni tuttavia al momento non hanno una chiusura interna, questo potrebbe essere un problema se si soggiorna fra amici. Uno dei due dispone di una piccola finestra, l’altro invece di un aspiratore d’aria.
La cucina presentava il piano cottura ad induzione lesionato ma funzionante. Fornita di lavastoviglie, microonde, forno, lavatrice e altri strumenti nonché di stoviglie e kit di pulizia.
La temperatura interna è gradevole, l’appartamento dispone di climatizzazione centralizzata tuttavia gli infissi sono molto vecchi e lasciano passare un po’ d’aria.
Il palazzo è molto antico ma è tenuto in maniera decente, l’appartamento si trova al quinto piano ma la struttura è munita di ascensore (fuori servizio per un giorno durante la nostra permanenza). 
L’appartamento è soleggiato, ha due piccoli balconi ai quali è possibile accedere dalla zona soggiorno e da una delle camere, l’altra camera invece ha una piccola finestra.
L’appartamento è sufficientemente pulito.

Posizione:
Ottima! A circa 10 minuti a piedi dalla Rambla e da Plaça de Catalunya. Circa 5 minuti a piedi dalla fermata Universitat della metro e solo 2 minuti dalla fermata dell’autobus. In zona ci sono alcuni market tra cui Carrefour Express a circa 100 metri e la via in cui si trova offre alcuni cafè, birrerie e piccoli ristoranti aperti fino a mezzanotte. Il sabato sera la via è affollata di ragazzi e i locali chiudono un po’ più tardi. L’entrata del palazzo si trova accanto ad un parcheggio che potrebbe essere molto comodo nel caso in cui si decide di noleggiare un’auto (anche se noi non lo abbiamo fatto, i mezzi pubblici funzionano molto bene), consiglio il carnet di biglietti T10 (10 biglietti per bus e metro al costo di 10,20€ acquistabile nelle stazioni metro) piuttosto che acquistare i biglietti direttamente sul bus in quanto questi costano 2,20€. 

A mio avviso la casa è perfetta per due coppie di adulti oppure per una famiglia fino a sei persone. 
Consiglio vivamente questo appartamento.

L'appartamento e' grande, ben arredato e fornito, sito al piano alto (con ascensore) di una casa d'epoca. Oltre al comodo soggiorno con divano, ha 2 camere da letto con 2 bagni annessi. Ottima la posizione nel bel quartiere Example, comoda alle fermate di metro (Universitat) e bus. Vicino all'angolo della strada c'e' un minimarket fornito di tutto.
Io e la mia famiglia ci siamo trovati molto bene.

The flat was in a fantastic location! We basically walked everywhere every day that we hardly needed to use the metro. Space wise, it was larger than the pictures showed - having two bathrooms was a huge bonus! We loved the view from the balcony as well, beautiful Spanish balconies opposite you, and on clear days you could see Tibidabo on the left. Check in was a breeze, Angel couldn’t make it but he made sure to get a friend’s help to meet us and show us around. The feedback we would suggest is to look into giving guests an extra set of towel if they are staying long, as well as cleaning the floor more thoroughly. It felt a little sandy/gritty to us when we arrived. Perhaps it was the nature of the tiles, or our habit of taking shoes off in homes (Angel’s friend mentioned we can just leave our shoes on) - or both - but in any case, we easily found some cleaning supplies on the balcony to mop the floor, and all was good after.

Angel's place was great!  Beautiful apartment in a very cool building! Great location for enjoying Barcelona and sightseeing. Everything went smoothly with check-in and check-out and so on! Would definitely return!

Angel's apartment is great! I stayed there with four friends for three nights. The location was perfect, and we were able to walk or take the metro to wherever we wanted to go very easily. The apartment itself was clean and modern, and the beds were decently comfortable. We also enjoyed the balcony! Angel was a very helpful and responsive host. His friend met us on the day we checked in and allowed us to drop off our luggage early. I would highly recommend this apartment for a group planning a trip to Barcelona!
We really enjoyed our stay in this apartment! Nice and clean with everything you need in the kitchen. The location is great. I will stay here again if I go back to Barcelona!

Great location so close to everything aerobics, universidad metro, real Spanish feel. Spacious as well although pillows in the kids room not the best. 

Everything you need except: hand wash , shampoo conditioner body moisturiser (if you are weekenders) detergent if cleaning clothes. 

Absolutely quiet as well even though in middle of town
Great apartment!!!!

Great place in a great location for getting around central Barcelona. Angel left some awesome food recommendations but the neighborhood has lots to offer so you can’t go wrong. The street itself is quiet but within 5 minutes of walking there are bars and restaurants. 

As for the apartment, perfect amount of space for a small group - we were four people - with all the amenities one could need. I highly recommend Angel’s place!!

Great apartment in a very walkable and central neighborhood- was perfect for our family of 3. Would have been nice to have a few basic pantry items to cook with but all in all was a very enjoyable stay.  Check-In could have been smoother as we had to wait for host to arrive with all our bags on the sidewalk, but it worked out in the end.

This Airbnb was beautiful, stylish, it was very very clean and modern. Perfect for couples travelling together, families, or groups of friends! It was spacious! The area was great! Next to a good breakfast place (at the corner)

How to make a good stay great... the key is this place. It's convenient location is the standout, near shops, public transport and cultural highlights. The appartment is equipped to comfortably sleep 4 people. We were a family of 5 so one had to sleep on the sofa bed which wasn't the best for comfort but the two bathrooms and toilets made it comfortable for 5. Overall, a great place which we would consider re-booking when next in Barcelona.

The apartment is as advertised, good space and clean. The location worked well for getting around Barcelona - close to Metro and also walkable to many areas of interest. The front bedroom did get loud at night and at times made it hard to sleep.
Thank you for everything. Our stay in your apartment was amazing. We had a great time and enjoyed our stay in Barcelona.
Lovely stylish apartment with modern amenities but also lots traditional features. 10 min walk to La Ramblas area. Very clean. Would definitely recommend!

Good location ... but the air condition was a little weak as it was very hot, so we had problems sleeping.
Clean place and very good location, lots of good cafes around the corner and not far from the old town

Angels place was beautiful and very clean. It was in a great location. We walked everywhere . I highly recommend it. It’s in a beautiful building with an elevator. Very nice kitchen and rooms! He was a great host and always was there if we had any questions.

Wonderfull appartment that is beautifully renovated in a neighbourhood with a lifely nightlife. The balcony has an amazing view, both ways. The double bathroom is fantastic and makes it suitable for two couples traveling together

Loved the location, the style and light of the place!

Very very nice!!!

Very convenient!!
Bello, comodo, centrale, elettrodomestici moderni e funzionali. Consigliatissimo
Beautiful apartment, great location! We enjoyed our stay very much.

El lugar está súper bien ubicado . Tiene buen espacio para 4 personas . Pues la privacidad en el area de sala para dormir no hay . El piso es viejo. Yo lo renovaría . La limpieza inicial en los baños pudiese ser más a fondo .
Great location and a very nicely designed unit.
Great location.
great apartment. amazing location. we were with the kids and had a very good time. highly recommended.
wonderful stay

Angel's apartment is fabulous.  It's very stylish with original floors, it's almost on the top level of the building so you get a nice view of the street and trees below you.  If you have heavy or awkward suitcases, there is a small elevator.  Once we had ours in the apartment we just used the stairs.  The place is not big but works very well.  The two bedrooms are on opposite sides of the apartment so you have a bit of privacy.  The mattresses are very comfortable too, which is great as often when we rent through airbnb they are old and sink in the middle.  It is centrally located, close to the metro line.  There are also lots of good shops nearby too.  There are plenty of bakeries/cafes just around the block if you want to grab something for breakfast.  Angel also left some recommendations on restaurants and things to do.  He highly recommended La Flauta for dinner, we tried to go twice (1st night the line up was too long, second night was closed due to public holiday) and we finally succeeded on the 3rd night.  You must eat there.  The tapas were the best we had in Spain all for a reasonable place.  Get there early or be prepared to wait.  On the recommendations sheet, he warned us that the Gothic area has lots of pick pockets spots to be careful.  We ended up going and witnessed someone getting pick pocketed.  
We would highly recommend Angel's place.

We highly recommend the apartment. It is s beautiful apartment - with lovely details. It is clean and well suites. The area is nice and very close to everything -including metro. Christina Levinsen, Odense, Denmark

We were 2 couples staying for 5 nights at Angel’s apartment.  Perfect size for 4 and bedrooms and shower rooms at opposite ends. I like that we could slide a door at the back of apartment to make a more  private area for 2nd bedroom and shower room. The location was excellent and close to bars, restaurants,  mini supermarkets, city centre and metro stop just around the corner (L1&L3). The stairs and lift were well lit at night. Another bonus was we had 2 sets of keys. Only slight negatives were the WiFi  not being very good, the pillows could have done with being replaced and it was s but noisy in the front bedroom due to road adjacent to our street. Otherwise the apartment was excellent and the balcony and  original features were wonderful. I especially liked standing with a coffee in the mornings taking in the views from the balcony. Would go again.

We had a fantastic trip. The apartment is very clean and stylish and the location is perfect for exploring the city. Communication before our trip was excellent and the check-in very easy. The traffic noise in the front bedroom is quite loud but that is a small price to pay for such a central location. The local recommendations were great. We would highly recommend the apartment!
Very good apartment with good location and with everything you need there
Appartement superbe

Logement bien situé pour visiter à pieds Barcelone. A 5 minutes de la place de Catalogne et des Ramblas.
L'appartement est propre et bien pensé pour plusieurs voyageurs (deux chambres et deux salle-de-bains séparés). Bon accueil : rapide et précis!
Perfect location. Stylish, comfortable apartment.

We had a fabulous stay! Angel was a great host - accommodating and very responsive -  and, the space was clean and provided everything we needed as a family of 4. The location was terrific as well. We walked A LOT and also did opt for the bus when our feet got tired at the end of the night. The stops were very convenient to home base. We were quite affected by the time change so it was so welcomed to have a lazy morning and breakfast in. We highly recommend!
O apartamento é muito limpo, bonito e bem localizado. O anfitrião demonstrou ser atencioso e solícito. O único problema foi o tempo de espera na hora do check-in.

Квартира отличная соответствует всем описаниям. Единственное мы были зимой и в квартире было очень холодно. Система отопления вышла из строя. Хозяин оперативно привёз на следующий день обогреватели. Единственное на следующий день стало выбивать электричество ((( совет такой если едите зимой лучше заранее просить обогреватели . Расположение прекрасное до центра 5 мин

Our stay at this place was wonderful, thank you ! 

There was just one thing that we were not satisfied with – low temperature in flat, the apartment was really cold (we stayed there in January). It was quite an issue as our group included 2 kids. It took all night to warmed the apartment up. Just recommendation  - would be good to turn on electric radiators few hours before the visitors arrival. 

Finally, we would really recommend this place.
Great!

casa confortevole. dalle foto sembra meglio della realtà ma cmq buon livello. Palazzo un pò vecchio che non fa una buona impressione nell'entrare. host gentile via chat anche se non ho avuto il piacere di conoscerlo di persona.
지하철역과 가깝고 엘리베이터까지 있어 좋았어요~ 하지만 숙소크기에 비해 라디에이터 3대 밖에 없어 좀 추웠고 전기 차단이 자주되어 조금 불편했지만 대체적으로 만족합니다.

name: Makaha Studio w/Mtn & Ocean Views - 1 Mi to Beach!
summary: Your unforgettable Hawaiian getaway begins at this studio, 1-bath vacation rental condo in Makaha! ‘Pua Aina Hale’ is an oasis in the Makaha Valley Towers, accommodating 2 guests in the Murphy bed, making it a romantic retreat for a couple seeking a relaxing escape.  Located about 1 mile from famous Makaha Beach, you'll fill your days with sunshine, surf, and serenity. Lounge by the community saltwater pool or venture to Makua Forest for an unforgettable hike through lush tropical trails!
space: Studio: Queen Murphy Bed | Additional Sleeping: Single Futon Floor Mattress You'll instantly fall in love with the stunning natural beauty of your surroundings when you arrive at Makaha Valley Towers. The community is nestled next to the mountains, offering meticulous landscaping and breathtaking views from all angles! With 24/7 security, you'll feel truly at ease when you stay at ‘Pua Aina Hale.’ Inside, the property is tastefully newly renovated throughout, featuring an updated kitchen and bathroom for ultimate comfort and convenience. The studio floor plan makes it easy to get cozy and settle into your tropical home-away-from-home. The living area features a leather sofa and ottoman situated around a 46-inch flat-screen cable TV for a relaxing movie night at home with your companion. Floor-to-ceiling windows and sliding glass doors to the lanai fill the room with natural light and provide spectacular views of the mountains, valley, and ocean. Step into the fully equipped modern kitc
description: Your unforgettable Hawaiian getaway begins at this studio, 1-bath vacation rental condo in Makaha! ‘Pua Aina Hale’ is an oasis in the Makaha Valley Towers, accommodating 2 guests in the Murphy bed, making it a romantic retreat for a couple seeking a relaxing escape.  Located about 1 mile from famous Makaha Beach, you'll fill your days with sunshine, surf, and serenity. Lounge by the community saltwater pool or venture to Makua Forest for an unforgettable hike through lush tropical trails! Studio: Queen Murphy Bed | Additional Sleeping: Single Futon Floor Mattress You'll instantly fall in love with the stunning natural beauty of your surroundings when you arrive at Makaha Valley Towers. The community is nestled next to the mountains, offering meticulous landscaping and breathtaking views from all angles! With 24/7 security, you'll feel truly at ease when you stay at ‘Pua Aina Hale.’ Inside, the property is tastefully newly renovated throughout, featuring an updated kitchen and bathroom
neighborhood_overview: Located about 1 mile from famous Makaha Beach, you'll never miss an opportunity to soak up the sun or make the most of the excellent surfing conditions. Danny at Westside Surf Lessons will have you feeling like a pro in no time! To enjoy the Island’s natural beauty, saddle up with EO Waianae Tours Horseback Riding Adventure to experience hidden Ohikilolo Valley with a Hawaiian Family. You’ll be riding like a real Paniolo (Hawaiian cowboy) would in no time! Stop by West Oahu SUP to rent a stand-up paddleboard or some snorkeling gear for some unforgettable fun in the water.  Golfers will look forward to spending a leisurely day on the scenic greens at Makaha Golf Club West, about 1 mile from the condo! You’ll find Oahu-grown produce, tasty local foods, and crafts each Saturday at the Farmer’s Market at Waianae Mall, less than a 15-minute drive from the condo. Stop for a bite to eat at one of the local restaurants, such as Kahumana Organic Farm and Cafe.
notes: Key Residence Features: - Amenities include mountain, valley, and ocean views, a fully equipped kitchen, central air conditioning, 46-inch flat-screen cable TV, free WiFi, community saltwater pool, 6 gas grills,  on-site parking, 24/7 gated security, and more! - Convenient Makaha location - About 1 mile away from Makaha Beach and Makaha Golf Club West, 12 minutes to Waianae Mall, surrounded by endless opportunities for adventure including surfing, hiking, snorkeling, and more! - Nearest Major Airport: Honolulu International Airport (~30 miles away)
interaction: Evolve Vacation Rental Network is on a mission to make vacation rental easy for guests. Every property in our network has been vetted and verified so you can book with confidence. If you have questions prior to your trip, we are happy to assist you 7 days a week. During your stay, your designated Guest Contact will be available 24/7 to help with any issues that may arise.
house_rules: Policies: - Must pay parking deposit and parking fees in cash to  office when checking in - No smoking except in designated smoking area - No pets allowed - No events, parties or gatherings - Note that 2 guests can sleep comfortably in the bedrooms and 1 guest can sleep comfortably on the full-sized futon mattress, bringing the maximum occupancy to a total of 3 - Must be at least 25 years old to book - Additional fees and taxes may apply - A $50 refundable deposit is required for parking pass, $4/day, $80 a month (paid at office upon arrival) - Photo ID may be required upon check-in - A list of all guests staying at the property must be provided to the homeowner prior to arrival so guests can enter the gated community.

host.host_about:
Hi, we’re Evolve! We’re a next-generation vacation rental management company and we’re here to help you find the perfect home for your getaway.

All of our properties adhere to our 4 Core Property Standards, so you’ll always arrive to a home that’s Safe, Clean, Guest Ready and As Advertised.

If you have any questions about our properties (or would like help finding one), please do reach out. We’re real human beings and we’re available to assist you 7 days a week!

reviews.comments: Great place, very clean, very safe

name: Beachfront Getaway
summary: This stunning oceanfront security apartment captures magical beach views and is positioned just moments away from the sand, water and all Manly has to offer.  - Polished floors throughout,  - Combined lounge/dining flowing onto oversized balcony - Exclusive laundry facilities with second shower and storage - Conveniently located near restaurants, cafes, shops and transport - Lock up garage plus car space in front
description: This stunning oceanfront security apartment captures magical beach views and is positioned just moments away from the sand, water and all Manly has to offer.  - Polished floors throughout,  - Combined lounge/dining flowing onto oversized balcony - Exclusive laundry facilities with second shower and storage - Conveniently located near restaurants, cafes, shops and transport - Lock up garage plus car space in front
house_rules: No parties or loud music  Please wash sand off before entering the apartment.

reviews.comments:
Kate was a great host and had an exceptional apartment. Kate was amazing to deal with through her quick responses and friendly attitude. We had a wonderful time in Manly in her apartment. The apartment itself was stylish, clean, had great facilities and offered exceptional beachfront views. The garage offered safe and easy parking for our stay in Manly and the secondary car park in front of the garage was an added bonus. With the apartment being a walking distance to all main attractions, it made the apartment location a perfect stay for us.

We left Kate’s apartment with a better stay then expected, we loved the apartment and our stay in Manly. We highly recommend Kate and her apartment!
Great location
对面就是曼丽海滩,房间整洁,房东细心,交流顺畅,适合家庭居住｡
Comfortable beach front unit. Everything you need. Great view.

We had a wonderful relaxing vacation at Kate’s apartment. We didn’t have  a car and didn’t need one. The beautiful beach is across the street. We walked to supermarkets, restaurants and shopping. The bedding is amazing. It is one of the most comfortable beds I’ve slept in. 
Kate was really patient with all of my questions and always responded quickly.
Thanks Kate!

Awesome position, nice place and everything you need at your doorstep 
Thanks for having us
Great place great location

Perfectly positioned apartment at the quiet end of Manly beach but still close to everything. We loved spending time on the generous balcony taking in the beautiful view. The two car spaces were super-convenient and the friendly host was easy to deal with. Loved the decor too!
Kate was extremely helpful and the location was amazing. Highly recommend.
Amazing apartment and location!
Perfect place for a perfect week in Manly.
Splendid location, nice flat, near to shops and cafes but away from the heavy tourist traffic. Recommended.

Location was perfect. Dedicated parking spot was vital for us as we had a car and the area was super busy. The balcony with the awesome view is where we spent most of our time. I also liked the utility room downstairs which had a shower for us to clean off the sand from the beach.
What a wonderful place to start the new year. Located right across from the flags in the beach at North steyne.  Great flat , with an even better view and  very  close to restaurants . Thank you .
Epic view!!!  Love this place

The location is fantastic! Morning tea on the balcony over looking the beach couldn't be beat. Only ten minute walk to the main Manly strip and a fabulous cafe and restaurant only one block away.  I highly recommend!

name: Gorgeous designer 1br flat in the heart of SYP
summary: Comfy and finely decorated 1bedroom apartment in a fully renovated building.  Great location 1mn walking distance from Sai Ying Pun MTR.  Ideal to discover Hong Kong island, with great local food spots around as as well as hip restaurants, cafes and bar. Perfect for a couple/friends, the apartment is quiet and provides a peaceful oasis in the bustling city!
space: The place comes fully equipped: - Powerful AC - Unlimited wifi and BOSE sound system - Open kitchen with high-end appliances, and washer/dryer. The sofa can convert into a comfortable single bed if needed. The apartment is on the 2nd floor of a renovated staircase. The street is quiet as it is not on the main road side.
description: Comfy and finely decorated 1bedroom apartment in a fully renovated building.  Great location 1mn walking distance from Sai Ying Pun MTR.  Ideal to discover Hong Kong island, with great local food spots around as as well as hip restaurants, cafes and bar. Perfect for a couple/friends, the apartment is quiet and provides a peaceful oasis in the bustling city! The place comes fully equipped: - Powerful AC - Unlimited wifi and BOSE sound system - Open kitchen with high-end appliances, and washer/dryer. The sofa can convert into a comfortable single bed if needed. The apartment is on the 2nd floor of a renovated staircase. The street is quiet as it is not on the main road side. The building is easily accessible at any time through digicode. I will be happy to provide recommendation (sightseeing, bars, restaurants) and guidance on your HK stay! neighborhood_overview: Sai Ying Pun is one of HK trendies district with bery popular local restaurants as well as « hype » restaurants, bars, markets, shops comfortably located nearby the apartment. Central/LKF nightlife area are 15mn walking distance.  If you are seeking to explore more established aspects of HK the nearby MTR station will conveniently transport you to favorite destination.
access: The building is easily accessible at any time through digicode.
interaction: I will be happy to provide recommendation (sightseeing, bars, restaurants) and guidance on your HK stay!
house_rules: Welcome to a shoes-off place please :-)

host.host_about: Im a 29yo French girl working in HK and loving it !!!

address.street: Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Hélène’s flat is gorgeous! I have stayed in many places around Hong Kong island and it is very rare to see an apartment so beautifully renovated! It’s clean, modern and tastefully furnished. The bed is really comfortable and the couch folds down to a bed for one. Location is perfect, highly recommended!!
Helene's appartment is great! Fantastic deco. et really comfy in the heart of Sai Ying Pun, less than a minute away from the MTR. Shops and restaurants nearby. Would book again without a doubt!!

Helene's apartment is a gem! Didn't get to meet her but everything was great! Hassle free checking in/out, clean apartment with comfortable bed and linens, cool amenities and great location! MTR station is just a stone throw away and many things are within walking distance. Will definitely recommend and I hope to have the chance to stay at Helene's apartment again if I were to visit HK in future.
Amazing apartment. Brand new, sparkling clean and a really friendly host. So central too, walking distance to everything you want.

超級可愛的房子!照片與實際完全相符,乾淨整潔,佈置很有特色,浴廁很大,床很舒服,地點方便,房東Helene回覆即時｡
總之非常喜歡,成為這次旅行的美好回憶｡
It was wonderful place, and The communication was very fast & good with Helene. Only thing is there is no lift & it need carry on my two luggages to the third floor, other thing is very good.

name: Stunning 1BR Brooklyn Loft
summary: Come enjoy this bohemian chic alcove 1br Loft apartment in an authentic converted 100 year old Brooklyn factory. The loft features a large open dinning / living area with a brand new kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. There is a modern new bathroom with a large shower. The loft is decorated with custom made furniture and original artwork throughout. The bedroom area features a queen sized bed and window with southern exposure There is a 42" flat screen TV with free cable provided. Free Wifi is available as well. The building has a freight elevator which can be used by appointment with the buildings superintendent, a laundry facility on-site, and bike storage in the basement. Located on a quiet industrial street just steps from the more residential area of a Greenpoint and 2 blocks from the lovely McGlorick Park, where there is a farmers market every weekend. description: Come enjoy this bohemian chic alcove 1br Loft apartment in an authentic converted 100 year old Brooklyn factory. The loft features a large open dinning / living area with a brand new kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. There is a modern new bathroom with a large shower. The loft is decorated with custom made furniture and original artwork throughout. The bedroom area features a queen sized bed and window with southern exposure There is a 42" flat screen TV with free cable provided. Free Wifi is available as well. The building has a freight elevator which can be used by appointment with the buildings superintendent, a laundry facility on-site, and bike storage in the basement. Located on a quiet industrial street just steps from the more residential area of a Greenpoint and 2 blocks from the lovely McGlorick Park, where there is a farmers market every weekend. The loft is walking distance from many trendy restaurants and bars, one block to the bus, and an
notes: All NYC and NYS taxes are included in the monthly rate of the apartment.
house_rules: No Smoking, No Pets over 25lbs, No Parties, and Respect for the neighbors & the Loft.  $500 cleaning fee for smoking in the apartment.

name: Private bedroom for one person in HoMa
summary: Located in the HoMa district, the 1450 is a spacious and tastefully furnished, spacious urban apartment with two bedrooms available for up to 3 people. You will feel at home in a warm setting. Antique furniture, wood floors, open space between the kitchen and the dining room, personalized lighting, access to the garden and the terrace, I chose everything carefully to make your stay more enjoyable.
space: 1200 square feet, on the ground floor of a triplex. The 1450 apartment has undergone a major facelift while retaining its centennial cachet: open space between the kitchen and the dining room, shower with ceramic, two rooms available with comfortable bed, double or single. There is also a nice terrace at the back. The apartment is spacious. High speed Wi-Fi is included.

neighborhood_overview: The HoMa district is in full effervescence. It is very affordable and close to downtown Montreal. Visitors appreciate it for a completely french-speaking immersion in Quebec. Ontario Street is a few minutes away, where you'll find a variety of shops, starting with the marché Maisonneuve market! Delicatessen, fruit shops, pharmacy, pleasant little cafés to discover: Première Moisson and the famous Arhoma bakery for their delicious breads and pastries. The artisanal brewery L'Espace Public is our favorite to discover the atmosphere of the neighborhood in the evening. In addition, the 1448 is located next to the Denise Pelletier Theater and the excellent Chez Bouffe restaurant. The Olympic Stadium, the Biodôme, the Planetarium and the Montreal Botanical Garden are a 20-minute walk away.
transit: You can park for free on the street. Bus 34 takes you directly to the Papineau metro station. And there is a bike path nearby that takes you to the city center in 30 minutes.
access: The kitchen, the bathroom and the dining room are available to travelers.
interaction: I am discreet but I remain available for my travelers when needed.
house_rules: - Pas de bruit après 22h - Pas de musique forte

name: Welcome to He'epali Hale - He'epali Hale
summary: This newly renovated contemporary modern home mixed with Hawaiian Style is the best place to relax and unwind after a day out exploring the Big Island.  He’epali Hale has all that you need for that perfect vacation in paradise for up to six people.
space: Welcome to He'epali Hale! This newly renovated, contemporary modern home mixed with Hawaiian Style is the best place to relax and unwind after a long day exploring the Big Island.  He’epali Hale has all that you need for that perfect vacation in paradise for up to six people. Located on a peaceful street near Pahoa, this very private, beautifully furnished 3 bedroom, 2 ½ bath home is wonderfully convenient to swimming, snorkeling, dining and shopping, and all the sightseeing you can squeeze in!  The master suite with a king bed, the 2nd bedroom is a queen and the 3rd bedroom has 2 twin beds. The sizable modern kitchen, with its beautiful custom counter tops and backsplash works extremely well with plenty of room to prepare and cook wonderful island meals and there’s dining for 6 inside. There is even a gas BBQ grill for your outdoor cooking. The grounds are beautiful and neatly kept. There are some fruit trees on the property – you can pick, eat and enjoy whatever is in season! He’epal

Check in time is anytime after 3:00 PM Occasionally we accommodate checking in at other times, if you contact us Should you have any questions or concerns regarding your property please call your on island host.

name: 1400 square foot Kona Retreat
summary: We are offering a 1400 square foot two room studio.  One is a living room with dining table, couch, double bed, TV, laundry room with washer and dryer.  It also features a refrigerator, a kitchen sink, microwave, toaster oven and coffee maker.  The second room is a bedroom with a king size bed, a bathroom, closet, couch and TV.  This is a downstairs unit, with a family living in the upstairs unit.
description: We are offering a 1400 square foot two room studio.  One is a living room with dining table, couch, double bed, TV, laundry room with washer and dryer.  It also features a refrigerator, a kitchen sink, microwave, toaster oven and coffee maker.  The second room is a bedroom with a king size bed, a bathroom, closet, couch and TV.  This is a downstairs unit, with a family living in the upstairs unit. You may enjoy the attached downstairs lanai to enjoy the amazing sunsets. The neighborhood is at 1500ft elevation, allows for a bit of a cooler experience in comparison to the downtown area.  Quiet, residential neighborhood. Conveniently located within 15 minutes of downtown (Alii Drive), airport, and beaches.  25 minute drive to the town of Waimea.  30 minute drive to the town of Waikoloa. It is an hour and a half drive to Hilo. There is a small koi pond very close to the front door of the rental.  If there are small children they will need to be watched closely around this water feature.

host.host_about: I am a wife and mother of three.  My husband and I met when we were in high school and have been together ever since.  I am very family oriented and love spending time with those that I love.  I love to cook and bake and garden.

reviews.comments: This space is absolutely stunning. It’s located about 15-20 minutes from the Kona airport as well as the local downtown area. Ocean views! The unit is brand new with very nice furniture and stylish decor. Beautiful lanai. Great barbecue and wonderful hosts. Full kitchen that’s great if you want to make your own meals. Loved having a separate living room and bedroom. There is a tv in both rooms. One thing I would suggest is having ear plugs because the rooster is up every morning. That’s pretty common all over Hawaii and other islands, so nothing on the guests. It didn’t bother me at all because I had ear plugs and my boyfriend didn’t have any but he still slept through it. My boyfriend and I loved our stay here. So grateful for the basket of tasty goodies, the books, board games, toiletries, and more. We would definitely stay here again!

The space was much larger than anticipated.  I thought it looked small online but was very spacious. It was a great place.  Clean, great amenities....beach chairs and boogie boards and beach towels. She had marked her favorite spots in a book of the BIG ISLAND.  It was wonderful!  We would chose this spot again. Thank you Abby for being so caring and so sweet!

Abby was a pleasant host, and the house was great! You're staying under the family (which are early risers), if you're a light sleeper, be aware of that. Abby provided a little welcome basket and Big Island book which was great. She also had boogie boards that we made use of. Nice little place!

We really enjoyed our stay at Abby's place. It's airy, spacious, and very clean. The huge porch (with ocean views!) was a great place to enjoy meals. We appreciated the beach chairs and towels, and the snacks were a really nice touch (particularly getting in late after a long flight). We also liked being a bit away from the hustle and bustle in a cute neighborhood with lush plants everywhere. Abby was very welcoming and easy to communicate with. 

You will definitely want a car here. We weren't able to get a rental car until day 2 of our vacation. Uber/Lyft were fine until then, but we learned that Kailua-Kona isn't very pedestrian-friendly. We are very grateful to Abby and her husband for giving us a ride down to the car rental place once our car was finally ready!
Very clean, comfortable, and quiet place. Definitely would stay here again.
The Banana Tree House was a great place for my family's first time at thr Big Island. Abby

Abby was helpful and friendly and offered anything we asked. The place was fantastic, new and clean. It offered all the small touches for our use on the island. It was perfect for our family of 3. While the family lived above the unit, we rarely heard them.

Very clean and a great set-up. Kitchen has everything you will need. No oven but there is a great porch with a barbecue. Open concept  2 rooms with beds on either side. A bed on the kitchen side and 2 beds on the bathroom side. Would work great for a family or two couples.
해지는것을 집에서 바라볼수도있고 주변 환경이 아름다웠으며  여행자를 배려하는따뜻한  마음을 느꼈습니다.
It was good stay!

We were 3 guests, and we all loved Abby's place.
I highly recommend it.
Lovely place, sparkling clean, very spacious (the pictures don't do it justice!).
All the provided toiletries were organic products of high quality which truly exceeded our expectations! Beach gear was super handy as well!
To sum it up - paradise in the hills!

I stayed here with my family and all of us really enjoyed the stay. The host is great! I didn't have any problem. The room was clean and cozy. I would like to stay here again if I have a chance to come to the Big Island in future.

I recently stayed at Abby's beautiful home in Kona. It is an oasis. Calm, relaxing, peaceful and serene with a beautiful Lanai with Ocean views. Backyard so tranquil and peaceful with Banana Trees and beautiful professionally done landscape.  And, the Koi Pond with beautiful fishes. Very spacious home in a great safe neighborhood. This is the best value for a house. Perfect in every way. location is 10 minutes drive to downtown, shopping, beaches, airport,  costco, walmart, target and anything else you can think of.  Abby has a beautiful dog name Honey. She is so adorable. I am glad she introduced me to her dog. I couldn't even hear her bark or anything. Very lovely dog. I would definitely recommend anyone traveling to Kona to stay at Abby's place in order to truly experience the best hospitality in Hawaii. Mahalo Abby!

Abby's place has everything you could expect for a Airbnb place. It is in quite neighbor but less than 30 min away from Kona downtown, airport, Costco and quite a lot of famous beaches. There is a gas grill in lanai, bunch of board games, boogie boards and beach chairs. If any supplies are short, just message Abby, she will quietly come down from upstairs and leave new ones in front of your door step. I always thought renting guesthouses sitting near from their owner is not a good idea, but Abby's place changed my point of view. The place is perfectly balanced with privacy, convenience and safety. The best of this place is its size! It's huge and you will really appreciate it. In short, it would be a ideal Airbnb stay for most of the occasions.
Very spacious and clean, great location, nice deck with ocean/sunset view, very easy communication.
Abby’s place was the cleanest, best air bnb we have ever stayed at! She was so sweet, went above and beyond. Gorgeous place.
Perfect place to stay in big island.  Wonderful location and the house is just perfect , it has everything you need. We will definitely come back!
Her place is stylish and nice. Except there is no stovetop but she did provided us the electric stove. The interiors of the house and amenities are great!  Wish to stay there longer.

Abby’s home is new, clean, extremely spacious and is in a great location to explore the west side of the island. Their garden is beautiful (they landscaped it themselves!) and there’s an ocean view. It felt homey staying in a nice and quiet neighborhood. We would definitely stay here again!

reviews.comments:
Appartement très bien situé, dans un quartier calme et proche du centre ville. L’espace intérieur est tout à fait correct.
Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Cédric et son amie qui sont avenants et disponibles.

A great place for a couple or single traveller to stay in Montreal.  The rooftop patio has an amazing view of the Plateau and Mont-Royal.  Anything you need is within walking distance and if you're going further, there are two metro statios near by.
Cédric and Yuu are very sweet, and the apartment is close to restaurants, shops, and nightlife even.
Super séjour chez Cédric qui est un hôte attentionné , l'appartement est propre et a vraiment une belle localisation.
Cedric was very welcoming and accommodating! Would recommend if you're looking for a simple, clean spot close to Sherbrooke metro with a helpful host who knows the city.  Nice rooftop access too
Je recommande vraiment l'appartement de Cédric et Yuu ! Logement très bien situé, chambre très confortable, et surtout hôtes très sympathiques et chaleureux.
Great location! Would really recommend it! The room is simple, clean, and the bed is very comfortable! Cedric and Yuu are very helpful and friendly.
Emplacement génial prêt de pleins de beaux endroits sur le plateau mont Royal. Cédric et Yuu sont très accessibles et gentils. Je vous le recommande!

Cédric et Yuu sont très acceuillant et chaleureux, Cédric est prêt à suggérer des endroits à visiter (bars, restaurants, etc...). L'appartement est très bien situé, centre-ville facilement accessible à pied. Superbe terrasse donnant une belle vue sur Montréal.

Cedric is a very nice guy. The room is comfortable and the apartment is nice. Clean. Quick responses from Cedric. Location is good. Less than 10 minutes walk to Sherbrooke Metro station. Less than 10 minute walk from Saint Denis street where there are nice coffee shops

Hôtes très accueillants et sympathiques. Appartement très agréable, propre, ressourçant et bien situé. Nombreux commerces aux alentours. N'hésitez pas à profiter de la terrasse qui offre une vue imprenable sur le Mont-Royal. 
Loué, testé et approuvé +++ :-)

Un appartement très sympathique dans un quartier calme et super agréable de Montréal. On a adoré se balader à pied dans ce coin. L'accès au toit est un plus appréciable.
Cédric est très sympa et arrangeant, il a été très souple avec nos horaires d'arrivée et de départ !
Great location close to public transit. Cedric was helpful and welcoming. Also, adorable cat!
Accueil parfait! Très bon hôte. Très bon séjour.

Yuu et Cédric nous ont très bien accueilli! On a pu bien discuter ce qui était vraiment sympa. L'appartement est hyper bien situé , +1 pour la terrasse sur le toit! 
Je vous le recommande :)
Cedric est très sympathique, accueillant et disponible pour répondre à toute question! Appartement très bien situé, à un bon rapport qualité/prix

Bel appartement, bien situé, accès à tous les équipements et à la terrasse sur le toit (vue à 360°). Bon rapport qualité/prix.
Yuu et Cédric sont très sympas, accueillants et joviaux. Nous avons échangé sur de nombreux sujets et partagé d’excellentes frites et burgers faits maison;-)

We had such a delightful time at Cedric and Yuu's place! The location is very close to the Metro station, bus stops, and nearby restaurants. Cedric was extremely helpful and thorough with recommendations which I appreciate so much from a local. I appreciate the flexibility with check out time because we had an evening flight. We had a blast overall and can't wait to visit Montréal again.
Cedric et Yuu sont très sympathiques. Ils sont de bon conseil pour découvrir Montréal d’autant plus que leur appartement est très bien situé !

We had a great stay with Cedric and Yuu - they are very kind and friendly hosts, and they have the cutest cat! The apartment is super cosy, and we loved sitting out on the roof terrace as well as the great location. The access to laundry and proximity to the subway were also very useful. So many nice cafes, bars, and restaurants in the neighbourhood. We would definitely stay again!
Cédric & Yuu nous ont accueilli avec le sourire et nous étions chez eux  comme à la maison !

Nous recommandons. 
Yuu est très sympathique, nous avons passé un agréable moment avec elle sur la belle terrasse surplombant Montréal.
Bonne localisation pour se balader en ville.
Très bon séjour chez Cédric et YUu ! Nous avons été très bien accueillies, ils ont pris le temps de discuter avec nous et de nous donner des bonnes adresse, c’etait super ! Merci pour tout :)
The place is amazing, especially the rooftop terrace. It was great to stay there.
Cedric was absolutely phenomenal! He was very hospital, easy to talk to, and a genuine nice guy. I personally love to explore cities by foot and he gave great recommendations on what to explore.
Good

Nice place. Nice hosts. Really nice rooftop terace. Good location.

Cédric est très réactif, donne de bons conseils, l'appartement est propre.
Tout le monde est accueillant (même minette).

Location is very good and room is clean! Thank you

Un grand merci à Cédric pour ses précieuses indications lors de notre arrivée qui nous ont permis de trouver logement et notre chambre sans le moindre souci. 

Nous recommandons vivement.

Cedric was very welcoming and a wonderful host. The room was just as pictured and located in a beautiful neighborhood. Cedric made the check-in and the whole stay go smoothly. He also gave us some great recommendations on things to do in Montreal. I would definitely recommend staying with him.

Great price/quality. Cedric is a very friendly and social host. Some shared rooms were a bit messy but overall we had 3 good nights at the place. It is between mont royal, old center and olympics 1976 area in, so ideal if you want to see all of Montréal. Public transport is very easy and we recommend to rent a bike for $5 a day. Both options are very close to Cedric’s place.
Great location, great host, simple, quiet and clean room with a great mattress. Bonus is the adorable cat :) great value!

Cédric, Yuu et la minette sont adorables. Mon séjour chez eux était parfait. Ils sont à l'écoute et Cédric est de très bon conseil pour les bonnes adresses. Jai eu la chance de partager quelques moments très sympa avec eux. Le chat est super gentil. De plus le logement est très bien situé et la terrasse sur le toit offre une très belle vue sur la ville.
Je vous recommande fortement ce lieux chaleureux tant pour la gentillesse des hôtes que pour la fête que vous fera minette à votre arrivée !
Todo muy bien y excelente anfitrión

très bon séjour passé chez Cédric et Yuu!
Des personnes très agréables qui ont su bien nous accueillir!

Nous avons passé un superbe séjour chez Cédric et Yuu, une gentillesse remarquable avec de bonnes conversations et de super petites adresses ! L’appartement est idéalement situé, proche du métro et du centre ville à pieds, tout est accessible, l’appartement est fonctionnel, très confortable avec une super vue ! Et une minette adorable, je recommande à 100%!

Cedric was really nice to chat with and offered a lot of help pointing out places of interests. His place is located in a nice and quiet neighborhood, just 10-15 minute walk from the train station with lots of small cafes around the area.  Their cat was the first one who greeted us when we arrived. Really nice to have around :)
Cedric and his girlfriend are very nice and friendly! They are pretty good host. I must choose their room again when I arrive to Montréal in next time

Cédric et Yuu, forment un charmant couple, sympathique et discret en même temps. Sans oublier Minette ! La chambre est au calme et la literie confortable. L'accès au toit est vraiment exceptionnel avec sa vue panoramique. Cédric connait bien Montréal et donne de précieux conseils. Le quartier du Plateau est agréable avec ses jolies maisons alignées. Proche du centre et du métro.
Great place to stay. It's near Sherbrooke station and the Greyhound bus terminal. The house is very clean, the bed is comfortable and there's a cool cat to chill with.

Cédric est chaleureux, très facilitant et a un souci de bien recevoir les visiteurs. L'emplacement de l'appartement est parfait; c'est très près du métro, de la gare d'autocars, du Parc La Fontaine et d'excellents restos.

La rencontre tant attendue après 3 jours sans croiser mes hôtes a été plus que chaleureuse! J'avais le sentiment d'être chez des amis, Cédric et Yuu sont VRAIMENT accueillants et très intéressants.
La localisation au coeur du plateau est idéale, pour ceux qui souhaitent visiter le coeur de la ville et ses charmants environs.

name: Delightful Canterbury Home
summary: Inner west (10km). Central station is 8 stops away (20 min). Short walk to the train/bus, supermarkets, parks, and riverside. Open plan modern living space that opens out to covered entertainment area. Pool, garden, and BBQ setting. Fully furninshed room. Spacious built in wardrobes. Enjoy a house instead of a flat. LGBT+ friendly. LGBT+ friendly. If this room is not available then I have another in the same house at https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/22693260
space: Spacious open plan living room and kitchen with chic chandelier that opens seamlessly into a covered entertainment area. Large BBQ setting with roomy glass covered dining table to enjoy a meal with family and friends. The entertainment area adjoins the inviting salt water pool and garden. Modern fixtures throughout. This is a home to relax in and enjoy. Sheets and decorations are often updated and may differ slightly from the photos.
description: Inner west (10km). Central station is 8 stops away (20 min). Short walk to the train/bus, supermarkets, parks, and riverside. Open plan modern living space that opens out to covered entertainment area. Pool, garden, and BBQ setting. Fully furninshed room. Spacious built in wardrobes. Enjoy a house instead of a flat. LGBT+ friendly. LGBT+ friendly. If this room is not available then I have another in the same house at https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/22693260 Spacious open plan living room and kitchen with chic chandelier that opens seamlessly into a covered entertainment area. Large BBQ setting with roomy glass covered dining table to enjoy a meal with family and friends. The entertainment area adjoins the inviting salt water pool and garden. Modern fixtures throughout. This is a home to relax in and enjoy. Sheets and decorations are often updated and may differ slightly from the photos. Living room, open plan kitchen, dining table, BBQ setting, covered entertainment area, pool, gardens
neighborhood_overview: The street is quiet and beautiful rainbow lorikeets and sulphur-crested cockatoos make their homes in the native trees in the neighbourhood. During spring the Jacaranda trees bloom and the neighbourhood lights up with their distinctive purple flowers. The neighbourhood is urban living plus and is close to the city.
notes: 10km from the city. Short walk to the train station and buses. 20min train trip to Central Station. Trains run regularly. Short walk to supermarkets, parks, walking/cycling routes, Canterbury Leasure and Aquatic Centre, Ice Rink, and Cantebury Racecourse.
transit: Walking distance to trains and buses that go directly to the Sydney CBD.  1 car space availble if another guest has not booked it before you (first come first served booking), otherwise there is free on street parking.
access: Living room, open plan kitchen, dining table, BBQ setting, covered entertainment area, pool, gardens, laundry room, and toilet/shower.
house_rules: Smoking outside only. No candles/incense or any burning (Stove, BBQ is OK). Do not bring durians or strong smelling fish/seafood (mild smelling is OK). Big oven unavailable, there is a small oven to use. Living room air conditioning is only for the host to turn on by request when hot. Essentials provided. TV in the living room can be used with Chromecast and HDMI cable to watch movies (e.g. for a movie night) and shows but there is no over the air reception. No burning of anything in the fireplace as it is decorative only.

reviews.comments:
We spend a great time at Austin’s house. He is a really friendly,  always helpful and great host we received always a promptly answers when we had questions. The house is very pretty we enjoyed a pool, a wonderful open kitchen, a beautiful barbecue area everything is very clean. The house is close to the city just a short walk to the train and 20min drive. We would absolutely recommend this room and would come back if we are visiting Sydney again. 
Lisa & Timon

Staying at Austin's house is a real treat. It looks awesome, like in the pictures and you are welcome to use all the facilities, including the outside entertainment area with bbq and pool! Austin is a very polite and caring host. He wants everyone to enjoy their stay and answers all questions immediately. Canterbury train station is just a short walk away, as is Woolworths and Aldi. We would definitely stay here again. Thanks for everything, Austin.

This is a really great place. Best airbnb we've had. Spacious, modern, well presented and has everything you could possibly need. The swimming pool and bbq are the icing on the cake. 
It's a 10 minute walk to Canterbury station where you can be central in 20 mins. 
Austin is welcoming, friendly and generous. Prompt to respond and happy to help. 
Would definitely recommend his place. 

Thanks for having us Austin.

必须为Austin打call.点赞｡其实住之前没有看过评论就订了 订的时候就知道不在市区 在郊区 不过我们自己租车就觉得没关系  入住前Austin一直给我们很多指引 我们住了4天下来 都是有保持着跟我们沟通 担心我们有没有什么需要帮助 最贴心的事 入住的时候问他吹风筒在哪里 他说他平时都不用 所以家里是没有的 我就没管了 打算早上起来就出去洗头算了 结果第二天Austin特意给我准备了一个新的吹风机!当时那个感动呀 真的是快要哭了｡总之 一切都很不错的｡谢谢Austin｡

Austin's place is absolutely beautiful, so much so I've decided to stay a little longer. He's a fantastic host and is unbeatable in hospitality, lovely little touches like chocolates on the pillows. Combined with a flawless and tidy home + lovely pool!
A super host!

name: Dormitory Room in Single Bed (Mixed)
summary: Mixed dormitory room in bed,Shared shower-wc,Without Breakfast
space: ''Stay in the heart of Istanbul '' The Blue Mosque, Eminonu, and the Grand Bazaar are all within 0.6 miles of the hotel. Guests can walk 10 minutes to Sirkeci station, which connects to the south side of Istanbul. Located just a 5-minute walk to the Hagia Sophia and Topkapi Palace, Erenler Hostel offers free WiFi and private and shared accommodation. Bike and car rentals are available on site. Gulhane Tram Station is located 200 yards from the property.

space: Unique space with structure for parties, leisure, comfort, 24hr security and high luxury. Within 10 min of BarraShopping and beach bar or Recreation. House designed by architect Duda Porto, with an area of 710m2 construction. Excellent location, close to shopping, beach and on the main avenue of the neighborhood. Modern, with integrated and ready to serve groups of up to 20 people automation.  For Carnival, minimum stay of 07 days.  For the World Cup, minimum stay of 15 days and maximum 30 days. There are 4 bedrooms with double bedso, 1 of them with extra bed, a complete dependency that accommodates a single and wide open area that can accommodate mattresses.

Own staff for maintenance and fo Unique space with structure for parties, leisure, comfort, 24hr security and high luxury. Within 10 min of BarraShopping and beach bar or Recreation. Modern, with integrated and ready to serve groups of up to 20 people automation.  For Carnival, minimum stay of 07 days.  For the World Cup, minimum stay of 15 days and maximum 30 days. There are 4 bedrooms with double bedso, 1 of them with extra bed, a complete dependency that accommodates a single and wide open area that can accommodate mattresses. All areas of the house and condominium. Grillo, tennis courts and sports court co
neighborhood_overview: Belezas naturais, incriveis praias, shopping centers, teatros, cinemas, completo comércio - essa é a BARRA DA TIJUCA, o mais moderno bairro do RIO DE JANEIRO e que tem por vocação o convivio com a natureza, facilidade de praticar diversos esportes e acesso aos grandes centros culturais e de eventos da cidade, como o PARQUE OLIMPICO, o  RIOCENTRO, o PARQUE DOS ATLETAS ( que sedia o ROCK IN RIO).  Quer ser feliz no Rio de Janeiro ??? VEM PRA BARRA DA TIJUCA !!! CHEGA AI ... o melhor sentido de ser carioca !
notes: Obrigatoria a locação com o staff da casa, que inclui servente ( cuida da área externa ), empregada domestica ( 2a a 6a feira, das 8h as 16h ) , piscineiro e camareira opcional. Empregada somente para servir o cafe da manha, se desejar que cozinhe , tem um custo adicional de 130,00.
transit: Transporte no condomínio ate a balsa, que leva na praia.
access: All areas of the house and condominium. Grillo, tennis courts and sports court condominium must be booked by Host.
interaction: I can receive guests and promote sightseeing with own transport or organize events in their own club house, with additional amounts to be hired after the lease. Would be happy to participate in the stays, making the visit even richer experience to the RJ

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Comunicativas, alegres e muito dispostas a conhecer pessoas, VIAJAR E EXPERIMENTAR NOVAS CULTURAS, proporcionando  experiências agradáveis nos assuntos que mais nos interessam, que são : lazer, gastronomia, esportes e eventos.
Fui criada em ambiente receptivo a comemorações e juntei esta característica à conforto e bem estar, aprimorando minha casa para RECEBER PESSOAS. Consegui que essa característica fosse passada à minha filha YASMIN , que é "intercambista frequente", aventureira, trilheira e deseja , cada vez mais, mostrar o RIO DE JANEIRO em todas as suas   faces , da mesma forma que pretende explorar o mundo e ampliar sua rede de amigos e experiências. Nossa família deseja receber viajantes de todas as partes do mundo !!! Chegue chegando ... Chega Aí ❤️

address.street: Barra da Tijuca, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

Marché Jean Talon is a farmer's market in Montreal. It opens year round with stands selling flowers, fresh produce and hot meals. Subway Beaubien station is right at your feet.
