neighborhood_overview: The Little Italy is famous for artisan cafe shops, local bakeries as well as chic restaurants and bars in industrial spaces. Marché Jean Talon is a farmer's market in Montreal. It opens year round with stands selling flowers, fresh produce and hot meals.
notes: Be ready to be amazed by local stores, coffee shops and French culture ;)
transit: Subway Beaubien station is right at your feet.  No car or bus is needed to travel around Montreal. Surrounded by coffee shops, restaurants, and Plaza St Hubert mall is right behind the house, 2 minutes walk is all you need.
house_rules: - Important: I open the door widely to welcome you, so please treat the place nice as if it is your home.  - Maximum number of guests have to match with booked guest number. -Should you notify me in advance of other visitors during your stay.  No loud music after 11pm No loud in front terrace after 11pm No smoking in front yard ( backyard is ok) Respect this family neighbourhood. - Linens are provided for 5 beddings ( 4 queens + 1 double) + 1 sofa bed  - I am not responsible for any accident at my place during your stay. Should you have your own insurance. TAX REMINDER !   Airbnb system collected the 3% of hotel tax automatically when you booked.  The gouvernement obligation taxes ( The goods and service taxes) are not included in the price ( GST (5%) ,QST (9.975%) - Have fun, respect, and be safe :)

host.host_about:
Hi there, I'm an interior designer and event planner. That's why i like sharing my home for your well-planned events. My husband, Sonny, is a chef. We have 2 sons, 9 year-old Tevinn and 12 year-old Vorormann. Family is the most valuable thing to me. I love having family dinner every night. Hearing their "dinner conversation" makes my life more meaningful.  Oh, did I mention that I love painting too ?!! Not like real painters though. I just like the feeling of putting colors together and being messy on canvas ;)

Will I have chance to hear your stories soon ?
See you then !!!

reviews.comments: Thank you Jade for letting us stay at your place. It was truly a great night. Everything clean and pretty. Will book again for sure!

Jade was very quick to respond to any questions that we had. We were only in Montreal for one night so we didn’t cook but it looked like the kitchen had everything one would need. It was very clean and comfortable. We enjoyed our stay!
Notre séjour dans ce logement à été parfait ! Les lits très confortable et beaucoup d’espaces.

Bel appartement, très bien situé. Il manquait la laveuse et la sécheuse, ce qui nous a contraints à demander de l'aide à des amis pour laver notre linge (6 personnes dont 4 enfants, cela fait vite de grosses quantités). Les voisins sont directement derrière la porte de la chambre du fond. On entend distinctement leurs discussions et les parfums de cuisine (essentiellement brûlé/ail/oignon) embaument l'appartement à chaque repas. On s'est arrangés pour ne pas rester sur place dans ces moments-là. La propriétaire nous a accueillis chaleureusement et rapidement présenté l'appartement. Il y avait même un cahier de coloriage avec des crayons ;) Il n'y a pas de place de stationnement réservé mais on a été capables de trouver une place à max. 50 mètres de l'escalier. L'appartement est situé au niveau supérieur du duplex. Les escaliers sont déblayés et salés régulièrement en hiver. On y reviendra, c'est certain !
I loved it and clearly i would rebooked it again!!
Très belle endroit parfait pour une petite Gang et juste en face du metro. Netflix un atout à ne pas négligé

This apartment is beautiful, the rooms are spacious and was very clean, and beds were very comfortable! Little things were included that were very helpful (cooking oil, hair dryer, etc). We had a tiny issue with a thermostat and Jade responded quickly and was there to help in minutes and resolved the issue immediately. We were in town wedding dress shopping and she gave us some really great tips. It is directly across the street from a metro and bus station and cabs are always around. It was also a 5 minute walk from several restaurants and shops on St. Hubert street, including a grocery store. We loved it and would definitely stay there again!
The place was lovely and the area was awesome.
Great place and a great location !!

You could not find a better location in Montréal for super easy metro access and finding everything you need within walking distance. Apartment was spotless, beds were very comfortable and we loved the bright but cozy kitchen. Since we were a big group, another comfortable chair or 2 in living room would have been nice, but it worked out great for us. Very easy to find as we arrived at different times. Do note there are external stairs to reach 2nd floor apartment which might be tricky for some if there are any mobility issues.
Très bel appartement
Jade’ place was extremely stylish and extremely close to the metro. I would love to come back!
Very nice place, updated and modern. Great neighborhood and friendly host. Book it!

Jade was extremely accommodating. She welcomed my friends and I with open arms. I give her home a 10/10 for cleanliness, everything you needed was provided and the decoration was very unique. She's also very approaching and I always asked her many questions and she would answer right away! It was really easy communicating with her. For the location: the metro is literally right in front of the property, which is easy to get to other places. I suggest everyone who comes and visit Montreal to book this place! Jade is amazing.

Booked this place for a night with a group of 10 and and it was an amazing decision! The house is very well kept with an awesome chic design. Jade was amazing at answering questions very quickly and helping us make the most of our stay. Thanks again Jade! We all had a great time!

Jade’s place is super cozy, with good design and very acommodating for the people who travel as a group. She was also responding fast and all the pictures in airbnb was actually aligned with reality. I recommend her place to anyone :)

One of the best place to
Live in Montreal and very close to public transportation....

We were a group of nine friends getting together for a wedding and this place was an awesome home base for us. It has a large common area, and is in an interesting neighbourhood close to the metro. Jade was super-accommodating and easy to communicate with -- would recommend this place to any group looking for a Montreal apartment.

Jade’s place was clean and well-appointed. Her communication during our stay was always quick and very responsive. 

There was a mishap with our kitchen appliances leaking to the downstairs apartment, but Jade went out of her way to ensure it was as non-disruptive as possible. 

Overall, we had a great stay and would stay again!

The apartment was honestly really nice! Exactly as described and pictured. The location is flawless, 30 second walk to a metro station on the orange line which was amazing. Only problem was the parking, signs are not accurate and I did get 2 tickets. Over all, great stay.
Loved the piano in one of the rooms! Overall a great stay and fast response to my messages.
Super propre et bien équipé. On a bien  aimé.
What a wonderful place for a bachelorette weekend! Jade is a great host and our stay was so comfortable and lovely. Felt luxurious for a great price.
Great stay in a lively but quiet neighborhood
Jade's house is much more beautiful than we have expected. Everything is super clean and new. We spent 10 days in her house and now I start to miss it! Thanks Jade!
Its was a nice stay but i didn't like the fact that they didn't have a washer and dryer and a mop or a broom to cleen the floors. But everything else was really nice
Nice, very calm and clean flat, confortable beds, well equipped. And just in front of Beaubien Metro station. Easy contact with Jade. We´ll be back !
Très bonne communication
Very easy to deal with Jade ! The apartment is beautiful, very clean and spacious. Perfect for a big family or group of people.
装潢很棒 北欧风,干净整洁｡
Very very pleased with the service and place. Thank you very much for an excellent stay!!
Great space, nice appliances, comfortable beds, loved having 3 bedrooms to spread out. Perfect location near Metro, fun neighborhood to explore for markets, dining and shopping.

Jade’s apartment was very clean, had all basic amenities (towels, soap, toilet paper, cups, dishes, pans, sheets/pillows, etc), cute and stylish furniture, and in a wonderful location. It comfortably fit a bachelorette party of 10. A train station is right across the street and the apartment is walking distance to some great shops/restaurants, too. Check-in and check-out were a breeze. Jade was quick to respond to all my questions!
Great place to stay! Enjoyed it very much!
okay place.

This is a great location about a 15min uber from downtown. The neighborhood is filled with stores, cafes and good food. The place itself is better then the pictures. Real tight for 12 but 10 sharing beds is fine if you are okay with one bathroom. We had 7 and it worked great.

A great place to stay for a big group! The home is in a great residential location, very clean, has all the essential amenities, and is stylish. Everyone in our big group of 10 just love the place. Jade is also a great host---very quick in responding to our queries, made the check-in super smooth, and provided some local tips in her website. Will definitely choose Jade's place again when I am back in Montreal.
Je vous recommande le logement de Jade très  bien situé très agréable, propre et moderne
The place was exactly as it was described. Conveniently located across the street from Beaubien Station. Jade was quick to reply to any questions or concerns. Internet, Netflix was included.
Great place, would stay here again next time I’m in Montreal

We loved our stay at Jade's place! It had plenty of room for our family of 5. It's right across the street from the Metro station, which was fantastic. There are no laundry facilities, but we didn't need them, so that was fine with us! We had a couple of questions while we were there and she answered almost immediately! The only downside was temporary and not at all Jade's fault. They are doing construction right next door and they start every morning promptly at 7, so if sleeping in is a priority, it might not work out for a little while.  Would definitely stay there again though!
The place was really good I love it definitely going back there

I stayed at Jade’s condo with a few friends for the preparation of my wedding and the second I came in I already felt at home, everything was sparkling clean and it was very cosy. Communicating with Jade was very easy, she is very responsive and helpful and accomodating. My friends and I loved the place and our stay and I would definately recommend it (there is even Netflix ;) Thank you Jade for everything!

Wonderful Stay.

We had a two day stay at Jade’s place with my family.

The amenities are just great.
Location is Perfect.

Just needs little privacy locks for the rooms.

I’d rate it 5/5.

The condo was exactly what is advertised! It was clean and nicely decorated. Jade was VERY helpful in e-mailing places to visit while we were visiting! We definitely look forward to staying there when we visit again! 
From the bottom of our hearts, thank you Jade!
We loved this Airbnb and would definitely book again!
Beautiful, modern kitchen. Keyboard piano in one of the bedrooms was a lovely surprise. Great AC! Few steps from the Metro made getting around a breeze.
Very gracious and hospitable host. Spacious and clean. Location is perfect! Highly recommended
Great place to stay and location was literally right in front of the metro which was so convenient for our large group! Clean and nice decor!
the location was perfect for traveling anywhere around the city
The apartment was very clean and stylish, location is amazing. I will give it 10 out of 10. Highly recommend
Would recommend.

A very nicely appointed apartment. Walking distance to a lot of great shops and restaurants. Comfortable beds and we enjoyed the piano in the apartment.   There are steep exterior steps leading up to the apartment but this seems standard for the neighborhood.

Appartement très confortable, climatisé (ouf avec cette chaleur cette année !) très bien situé en face d’un station de Métro et proche de commerces et marchés 
À recommander
Would recommend to anyone! Gorgeous, clean and comfortable

Jade's place was perfect for us. A group of girls visiting town for a bachelorette. The space was stylish, and the layout worked for us in terms of space. We had room to have a drink together before going out, lots of room for sleeping, and the air conditioning was a nice touch. We had a great time here!

Appartement tres bien situé a 50 m d une bouche de metro. Decoration tres moderne tres confortable et tres propre. Nous etions un groupe de 11 et pas de probleme pour dormir suffisament de matelas. Le seul inconvenient: pas de coin table et chaises pour manger seulement bar et tabouret et a 11, pas l ideal. Je recommande cet appartement a ttes les personnes qui veulent visiter Montreal, d autant plus que Jade est tres a l ecoute des invités et tres reactive a toute demande.
Great location, extremely clean and comfortable space.
Jade was great host! Timely responses, accurate description and pictures of the apartment, great location!

Jade's apartment was beautiful and was a great place to stay for our girl's weekend. The beds were comfortable, the neighborhood was quiet, and it had all the amenities we needed. The apartment is located close to pubic transit and parking nearby was easy to figure out with Jade's advice. We truly enjoyed our stay!
perfect location. couldn't ask for a more affordable or convenient location that has everything a great stay requires. the Netflix account was a nice bonus!

Very stylish apartment, with plenty of room! The neighborhood has plenty of amenities, and getting around was very simple! We even found a parking spot right out front! The communication with Sonny was very simple and clear, and we very much enjoyed our stay!

Wir waren 2 Naechte in dieser wunderschönen Wohnung. Sie ist noch schöner als auf den Fotos. Alles war Blitzsauber und sehr stylisch eingerichtet. Die Betten sind sehr gut. Die Ausstattung der Kueche ist gut.
Jade ist eine extrem freundliche Person und sehr hilfsbereit. Die Kommunikation mit Jade ist unkompliziert, freundlich und sehr schnell. Das absolute Highlight der Wohnung ist die tolle Lage. Keine 100 m von der Metro, in der  Naehe viele Geschäfte und Restaurants. 15 Minuten zu Fuß vom tollen Markt Jean Talon. Ich empfehle diese Wohnung mit Nachdruck. Das Preis-Leistungsverhaeltnis ist Top. Danke Jade!!

Jade was a great host. I had my bachelorette party in Montreal, and 6 of us stayed here. It was the perfect place to hang with friends and rest between going out. Large flat screen with netflix, plenty of beds, dishes, towels etc. We would definitely stay again.

looks just like the pictures plenty of room for larger groups. perfect area everything is near by (metro, iga, shopping). clean. piano was an added bonus! jade was very understandin as one of my guests fell sick the morning of check out and jade allowed us to stay till we had to go to the airport. i would definitily recommend this space to anyone. it is well worth it!

Clean apartment that sleeps a number of people. Responsive hosts.
On the negative side, the apartment was not well provisioned for cooking  own meals (we had to request utensils to cook with) and using the dishwasher (we had to ask for washing pellets and only one tea towel had been provided - we asked for more of both). 
The access to the first floor apartment is not accurate in the description. Access is via an outside winding stair-case and some of the steps are rotted. The flooring just inside the front door may also prove tricky for those who are physically disabled as it is different to the flooring in the rest of the apartment.
The place is very well near the subway and market. the parking lot is easy finding. The neighbour area is quiet at night. Enjoy it.
Beau logement très spacieux

We stayed in Jade's place for a ladies weekend, and it was fantastic!  The place is cozy and clean, and the neighborhood is wonderful.  We were able to walk to some amazing restaurants, markets and shops, and the metro stop was right across the street with only a 30 minute trip downtown.  Jade was responsive when we had a question and check-in was easy.  We'll definitely be staying here on future trips to Montreal!

Jade’s place is a gem ! The location is great, really close to the beaubien station. There is a lot of nice bars and restaurants on the neighborhood. The house is very beautiful, with good decoration and all the amenities that you would need. We were a group of 6 and fitted perfect, even with only a bathroom.
Good location and I will come again
Un peu petit pour neuf

L'appartement est bien situé, proche des grandes avenues en direction des centres d'intérêt de Montréal. Pour ceux qui préfèrent les transports en commun, ou pour les jours de pluie, la station de métro Beaubien ligne orange est en face de l'appartement. A proximité, sur la rue Saint-Zotique, un supermarché IGA est ouvert jusqu'à 23h : pour les arrivées tardives c'est un point positif, nous avons pu faire quelques courses pour le petit-déjeuner. Pour l'accueil, les instructions données ont été très claires. Jade est très réactive aux messages. L'appartement propose des chambres spacieuses, les équipements cuisine sont suffisants.
La propreté laissait à désirer, le wifi ne fonctionnait pas et les voisins en dessous étaient extrêmement bruyants. Ne recommanderait pas pour un long séjour.
Great house. Superb location with the metro station straight across the road. Nice little area especially the bar le Vestiaire which was great for a few drinks in the evening
Jade is one of the most gracious hosts I have worked with through Air B&B. She was beyond helpful and accommodating!!
Very clean and a modern and comfortable space for you and your friends. Highly recommend!
the apartment was amazing we had a really great time. Jade was also always very fast to reply to questions. Everything was perfect
Great moment ! The location is a must for your group. Me and my girlfriend are really happy!
Great location, super clean.
très bien et propre

Logement sympa situé proche du métro !
Les hôtes sont très réactifs, communication agréable. Merci!
Had an excellent stay! Would definitely stay here again next time we visit.
A convenient location, clean and friendly hosts - heaps of room.
Very nice, stylish, and much bigger than it seems! Great place!
Très bien situé, tranquille malgré la proximité du métro et des commerces.
Great location and everything was perfect. Jade was an amazing host and was always there when we had questions. Would definetely stay there again.

Très bel appart. Extrêmement bien situé, littéralement à 1 min à pied du métro Beaubien.  Plutôt tranquille et très confortable. Bien que 10 personnes puissent dormir, il n’y a pas de place pour que 10 personnes mangent en même temps (4 chaises et un divan). A 6 personnes c’était parfait :)
Appartement joli, propre et très bien situé!
Bel appartement, très propre !

The place is in a great location. 30 seconds from the metro and  stores near by. The place is very beautiful and clean inside. I personally had an amazing stay and would recommend the place to anyone looking for a place to stay or for event-like nights.
Troisième passage pour moi, toujours aussi agréable!
Excellent and clean Airbnb
We had a quick yet pleasant stay. Good hosts and responsive with questions

Jade’s place was sparkling clean and amazingly designed. Me and my friends loved are stay there and we totally recommend for gathering with your friends. You guys will enjoy this place guaranteed!!! #1
Très bien ! Grandes chambres avec lits très confortables.

name: Gallery Seaside House at Porto
summary: Amazing house with terrace near the beach at Porto. Up to 8 guests.
space: Welcome to Feels Like Home Gallery Seaside House at Porto! This amazing house with four bedrooms and two bathrooms is ideal to explore the wonders of the north of Portugal or to enjoy some days at the beach. With capacity for 8 guests, you have two double beds, two single beds and a bunk bed, a fully equipped kitchen, and a spacious terrace.
description: Amazing house with terrace near the beach at Porto. Up to 8 guests. Welcome to Feels Like Home Gallery Seaside House at Porto! This amazing house with four bedrooms and two bathrooms is ideal to explore the wonders of the north of Portugal or to enjoy some days at the beach. With capacity for 8 guests, you have two double beds, two single beds and a bunk bed, a fully equipped kitchen, and a spacious terrace. Porto is the second-largest city in Portugal, after Lisbon. Located along the Douro river estuary in northern Portugal, Porto is one of the oldest European centres and registered as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1996. Its settlement dates back many centuries when it was an outpost of the Roman Empire. Its Latin name, Portus Cale, has been referred to as the origin for the name "Portugal", based on transliteration and oral evolution from Latin. A confirmation voucher will be sent to your e-mail with all the important details about your reservation and Feels Like Home additional
neighborhood_overview: Porto is the second-largest city in Portugal, after Lisbon. Located along the Douro river estuary in northern Portugal, Porto is one of the oldest European centres and registered as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1996. Its settlement dates back many centuries when it was an outpost of the Roman Empire. Its Latin name, Portus Cale, has been referred to as the origin for the name "Portugal", based on transliteration and oral evolution from Latin.
notes: A confirmation voucher will be sent to your e-mail with all the important details about your reservation and Feels Like Home additional services. Guests must pick-up the keys at the Welcome Centre located in Porto. Arrivals from 23:00 (11pm) to 06:00 (06am), a late check-in fee of EUR 30 shall be applied (paid in cash at check-in).  All guests must provide their ID or Passport Information at the time of check-in. Please note that a mandatory touristic tax will be included in the final price (2€/person/day). If it has not been charged at the moment of your reservation, it must be paid in cash at the check-in. All the remaining payments must be made in cash. Transfer Service - We can provide a transfer service for an additional cost. Lockers - We have lockers available at the Welcome Centre in Porto for an additional cost. Amenities - We provide toilet paper and shampoo only for the first day. Baby Friendly - We can provide a baby travel bed upon request.

host.host_about: We are Feels Like Home. We're a company born with a unique purpose: to bring you the best Portuguese experience you can imagine. We offer beautifully furnished, well located apartments and houses for your holiday or business stay. We're ideal for travellers who enjoy sleeping in comfortable homes at comfortable prices! We offer you options! Choose from more than 90 carefully selected properties in Portugal—suited for every taste and every occasion. We have a property that's right for you! From studios to castles. From Algarve to Lisbon and Porto.

address.government_area: Aldoar, Foz do Douro e Nevogilde

reviews.comments: La casa es estupenda pero se nota que lleva poco tiempo en alquiler. Hay varios complementos mal instalados (lámpara en dormitorio de literas y toallero de baño en planta superior) y en la cocina faltan tazas de desayuno y algún mantel para el salón. En cuanto esto se resuelva la casa será una maravilla.

This is a great apartment in a great location. The people of Porto were so welcoming and lovely and we had a great stay. We were two families with small children, we certainly recommend both the area and the apartment (make sure you get to the harbour a bit further north of Foz to sample the fresh local fish!)

What a disappointment!!!
The location is great but the house is poorly equiped (no dressing, no cup for breakfast...) and with very limited maintenance (inconvenience smell, broken furnitures...). The reality is far from the pictures.
Very nice apartment located very close to the beach

summary: Apartamento lindo, agradável, no coração do bairro Santa Teresa vizinho a restaurantes, cinema, centros culturais. Bem perto da Lapa, praias e do centro da cidade. Acesso fácil a transportes.

neighborhood_overview: Tradicionalmente vivem em Santa Teresa, muitos intelectuais, acadêmicos, artistas, atraídos pelas características históricas, culturais e pela qualidade de vida que o bairro proporciona.  Também há, no bairro, um polo gastronômico, principalmente ao redor do Largo dos Guimarães, área boêmia do bairro. Santa Teresa vem se firmando como uma das principais atrações turísticas do Rio de Janeiro, o que faz com que muitos a considerem como "O Montmartre carioca", devido ao grande número de artistas que possuem ateliê e residem no local.
transit: O bairro, carinhosamente chamado pelos cariocas de "Santa", é composto de várias escadarias, ladeiras e vielas tortuosas, que ligam-no aos bairros vizinhos do Centro, Glória, Laranjeiras, [[Bairro de Fatima,Cosme Velho, Catumbi, Catete e Rio Comprido. No alto, há uma impressionante vista, além dos acessos para o Parque Nacional da Tijuca e o Corcovado. O acesso já foi feito pelo bonde com tração animal e elétrica, por muares alugados, linhas de coletivos kombis e ônibus. Hoje se limita aos últimos, automóveis, bicicletas, motocicletas, táxis, veículos turísticos e pedestres.
access: Hospedes terão acesso a internet wi-fi e tv a cabo, máquina de lavar roupas, cozinha e banheiro totalmente equipados. Roupas de cama e banho fornecidas para até quatro hóspedes.
interaction: Estarei sempre disponível  a ajudar no que for (Website hidden by Airbnb) informações e dicas.
house_rules: O numero de hóspedes é limitado a 4 pessoas. Cuidar da casa como se fosse sua , manter os ambientes limpos, Colocar água nas plantas se for se hospedar por um tempo longo, respeitar o silêncio do predio depois das 22:00, e a segurança. Nao fumar dentro de casa.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Trabalho em cultura, na área de música, produtora independente, morei muito tempo na Europa.

reviews.comments: This is a great apartment, in a perfect location of Santa Teresa. clean and nicely decorated its a perfect stay. Buses are frequent to the city, there's a bus and taxi stop next to the building and you can walk everywhere too. felt very safe and happy. highly recommend. thank you Cynthia!

Cynthias apartment is absolutely wonderful!!!Its beautiful in nice,arty but quite neighbourhood.Perfect to relax from the noise in the city.Cynthia was also very helpful, good and uncomplicated host!Thanx I highly recommend!

Awesome apartment in a great neighbourhood of Santa Teresa .Nice place to come back to after exploring the city.Bus and taxi stop is right next to the building . Very easy to get to the metro.
There is also supermarket and several restaurants  close to the apartment.
Cynthia was very helpful.
Thank you Cynthia . We had wonderful time.
Highly recommend .
Nice place, cozy and strategic to visit Rio

Cynthia er den perfekte vært og tog imod os i hendes private hjem hvorefter hun kørte os rundt og viste os nabolaget. Utrolig sød og behagelig vært der gør alt for at du skal føle dig tilpas og få det optimale ud af dit ophold I Rio. Lejligheden er stor og ligger dejligt placeret i Santa Therasa. Lejligheden indeholder alt hvad man skal bruge og fremstår, pæn og ren og velholdt. Har kun positivt at sige om lejligheden og Cynthia kan kun få vores varmeste anbefaling. Perfekt til en familie på 4 som vores.

Квартира хорошая, даже очень, лучше чем на фото! Район спокойный , не было ни одного случая, чтобы кто-то пристал или грабил. Если хотите посмотреть самобытность Бразильцев, вам надо сюда, единственный минус добраться до пляжа, на такси у нас выходило 30-35 реалов до ипонемы...очень хорошая семья, нас встречала мама и кажется брат... В период карнавала, это была самая адекватная цена, мои друзья сняли квартиру в пять раз дороже!!! И ни чем не лучше.

The apartment was great clean and spacious just as it appears in the pictures. 
Cynthia was great at responding to emails and whilst sadly we didn't get to meet as she was away when we arrived (a friend showed us around, gave us the key and a free bowl of fruit). 
Santa Teresa is a great area but if you want to be near the beach, it's not ideal and takes about an hour to get to Ipanema. The apartment is near a bus stop and a road where you can catch a taxi. 
There is a supermarket around the corner and its 10 minutes from all the really nice local bars and restaurants where you can easily spend a whole day chilling out in Santa Teresa.

Accueil très agréable de Cynthia, appartement confortable pour 2 adultes et deux enfants, plus limité pour quatre adultes d'âge mûr.  Nous avons apprécié la fraîcheur  (précieuse quand il fait 30 en fin d'automne), l'exposition sur 2 côtés, la literie du lit double, le quartier de Santa Teresa, l'occasion de marcher tous les jours et surtout Rio, la magnifiquement contrastée. 
Il a fallu que nous insistions pour avoir un deuxième jeu de clef que nous avons obtenu au bout de 6 jours. Nous avons signalé que la machine à laver ne fonctionnait pas et, après nous avoir dit qu'ils la remplaceraient rapidement et nous avoir donné une date, rien n'a été fait jusqu'à notre départ. Nous sommes débrouillés en lavant à la main.
Cela n'a pas affecté notre séjour à Rio. Par ailleurs, la chasse d'eau a été réparée rapidement, alors que nous n'avions pas signalé qu'elle ne fonctionnait pas.
En résumé, un appartement agréable, des hôtes sympathiques, mais qui ne tiennent pas toujours leurs engagements, une ville magnifique.

Appartement très charmant et calme dans le plus sympa quartier de Rio, nous nous y sommes sentis tres bien tout de suite . Transports en commun en abondance et station de taxi à côté . À proximité, le Largo Guimarães, avec ses bars, restaurants, dont le Café do Alto, qui est devenu très vite notre cantine ! Ainsi que des boutiques  pour des cadeaux très sympas pour tous les budgets. C'était parfait!

We were lucky enough to stay in Cynthia's apartment during the carnival, and everything was great. The master bedroom had air-conditioning and the WIFI was OK(seems like highspeed internet is quite rare in Brazil). Had some trouble finding a taxi to take us to the neighborhood during nighttime, but Uber saved us. All in all we had a great stay.
Cynthia procuro en todo momento que nos sintiésemos muy comodos, la descripción del anuncio fue tal cual es el apartamento, el barrio de Santa Teresa es a mi entender el barrio mas lindo de todo Rio.

Un excellent sejour chezz Cynthia! Nous avons ete tres bien accueillis, l´appartement etait grand et agreable. La coupelle de fruits apres l´avion faisait plaisir. La climatisation dans la chambre est un plus. Pas de bruits le soir, nous avons bien dormi. Il y a un purificateur d´eau qui permet de remplir les bouteilles. Le quartier de Santa Teresa est sympa, on peut sortir a pied manger dehors ou prendre le tram vers le centre ville. Tard le soir il fallait bien indiquer l´adresse sur une carte aux taxis, mais pas de soucis ils nous deposaient devant la porte. Nous avons creer un probleme en rompant la vitre de la machine a laver mais Cynthia a parfaitement geree la situation et nous nous sommes arranges a l´amiable. En resume un excellent sejour, je recommande!

VVery nice week at Cynthia´s place! Great appartment, great locaisation, everything was perfect.

We enjoyed staying in Cynthia's apartment a lot! It is spacious, clean and well located in a beautiful and quiet area in Rio. Cynthia was very helpful and welcoming. I would highly recommend this apartment!
Très bien reçu, l'appartement est impeccable ! Une superbe corbeille de fruits à notre arrivée ! L'appartement est confortable, pratique et bien situé. Encore merci, on revient la semaine prochaine !

Très bien accueillis dans l'appartement avec une belle corbeille de fruit. L'appartement est très propres, spacieux et confortable. En plus de son bon emplacement, Cynthia, ou Daci sont à votre disposition pour vos questions. Ma famille a passé un super séjour sur Rio, je recommande absolument ! 
Merci encore à Cynthia !

Cynthia a ete tres disponible bien qu'elle ne soit pas sur place. Elle nous a donne toutes les indications pour nous aider et nous rendre a son appartement. Sur place, nous avons eu un ptit couac car la personne qui nous attendait pour nous acceuillir y etait le matin alors que nius arrivions le soir mais rien de genant. L'appartement est superbe, conforme aux photos, tres propre avec plein d'attention pour ses hotes (couverture, serviettes, etc). La machine a laver est un plus agreable. La corbeille de fruits est encore une attention vraiment agreable a l'arrivee. Le seul petit hic est les taxis qui ont un peu de mal a trouver la rue mais les adresses sont assez particulieres au bresil. Nous avons été globalement  tres satisfaits.

Quarto, sala, banheiro e cozinha com geladeira e microondas. Estou disponível para conversar com os hóspedes em diversos canais por meio da língua portuguesa, da inglesa ou da espanhola. Lapa é no Centro da Cidade do Rio de Janeiro. Na Rua Riachuelo tem a casa de show Lapa 40 graus. Há diversos outros bares e restaurantes na mesma rua ou a 200 metros do apartamento. É fácil se locomover pela Cidade de metrô. É fácil ir e voltar das praias de Copacabana e de Ipanema. Na Lapa a noite vai até de manhã. Pode curtir à vontade porque o porteiro vai sempre estar lá para receber você. Welcome to Rio de Janeiro. Enjoy Lapa. Pegue ônibu

O apto é muito lindinho ótimo para duas pessoas, uns 10 minutos andando para o metro e para o arco da (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltando ao Rio irei me hospedar nesse apto
Excelente!
Lugar de excelente localização. Compacto, ideal pra uma viagem mais despojada. O anfitrião muito solícito e disposto a ajudar. Portaria 24h. Experiência muito boa!

Ótima localização, check-in e check-out super flexíveis e o Marcio fora muito educado e prestativo.
Super recomendo!

Apartamento muito bacana portaria 24h no cotação da Lapa e um cuidado no receber incrível..
Toalhas limpas..
 Sabonete..  Cafeteira com café...

o espaço é exatamente como está na descrição. gostei.

name: Artists home in Paddington: Re-listed!
summary: *Re-listed!!* This grand Georgian terrace juxtaposes original historical features with a (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) s neo classical makeover. Offers charming and eclectic antique surroundings for a unique home away from home stay.  Available for some Events+Photo+Film Shoots, see also: @thepaddingtonestate on instagram https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/13318845?s=51 https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/3795958?s=51 and https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/13318845?s=51 Paddington is a great location. space: This home features sandstone fireplaces, bar, gracious kitchen, swimming pool, high ceilings, marble bathroom (including bath) and spacious bedrooms. If you enjoy a vintage style, antiques and a creative environment, this place is for you. This home is special in that it is relatively larger than most Paddington terraces. It is a timeless old-world haven complete with outdoor pool, a rare feature in Paddington. Rooms comfortably fit two people.  The home is also available for a whole house booking and comfortably fits 6 adults.  Please see 'The Paddington Estate' for more information regarding a whole house booking. The Guest Bedroom  Enjoy the comforts of the bright, high ceiling room with queen size bed, antique furniture. Ceiling fan and wall heater provided.  Featured in Vogue Living and Sydney Magazine, this home has also been the backdrop for many a photo shoot, launch party, film shoot and other events. neighborhood_overview: You will experience the essence of Paddington lifestyle - central to an abundance of cafes, restaurants, art galleries, pubs, parks, boutique shopping and Paddington markets. We are walking distance to Five Ways village, Centennial Park and Woollahra. By bus, we are minutes to Bondi Beach and the city centre. Paddington boasts a number of stylish pubs and wine bars including The London Tavern and The Grand National Hotel, both a stone throw away. Your stay could not get more central and special than this.
notes: Please be mindful that this is our home.  We love to share our unique home with people and in order for this to be sustainable, we do not allow "guests of guests" for visits, pool swims or otherwise.
transit: How to get to our place: Oxford Street is the closest main street. We are between two pubs on Underwood Street - The London and The Grand National. From the Oxford Street, walk down either William Street or Queen Street and turn onto underwood (we are a couple minutes walk from Oxford Street) From the Airport: Take the train to Museum Station and catch either one of: 380, 333, or M40 (red bus) and get off at the first stop after Paddington Town Hall (Opal cards available at the kiosk at the bottom of the stairs at Museum Station) OR Take the train to Central Station, take the Eddy Ave exit Take the 440 bus (Sydney Buses) Ask for the William St stop in the centre of Paddington, on Oxford St. Opal available from kiosk at station. Cab from airport is around $40 -$50 Uber is around $25 - $30 There are buses on Oxford Street  that take you to the city or the beaches. When arriving, the destination is: William Street, Paddington Bus Stop / Paddington  Inn Hotel (then 5 minute walk) Buses on
access: We provide tea and coffee.
interaction: Check in time is 2pm and check out time is 10am.  We like to stick to these times in order to accommodate other guests and cleaners.   There is a key-less entry to our home and we will supply you with the code prior to your arrival.
house_rules: Hello and welcome, Please enjoy your stay here!  Strictly no smoking inside or front/back of house. No parties. No guests of guests. Warm regards, Lorraine & Arnie

host.host_about:
Hello,

We are creative, down to earth and open-minded couple, who enjoy a healthy lifestyle and a vibrant home.    There are much happenings in our home, from photo shoots, to art salons to creative dinners and occasionally short film making.

We have been greeting and hosting guests from all over the world, for just over three years. We host a wide variety of people from all over the world.  Our home is a unique step into an old world reality, and we enjoy sharing it with others.
 
As an alternative,  if you are after the privacy of a one bedroom Paddington pad, have a look at our listing at: https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/3795958?preview

We hope you enjoy your time in our home!
Arnie & Lorraine

reviews.comments: We had a great time in Paddington; the house is fascinating and the room was perfect. Sadly we never met Arnie in person, instead were shown around by his easy-going and lovely friend. Paddington Market is just across the road and we walked everywhere along Oxford St. Highly recommended.

Dear Arnie and Lorraine, thank you so much for having us at your wonderful place. It was a really nice and homy place for us. Love the room, the cozy bed and also the fresh air that comes from our 2 windows. The house has a good natural light, a wonderful kitchen, and a stunning bathroom. I also give Arnie a lot of credits for his artworks that filled most of the entire house. He is truly a fine artist. Lorraine was also a good host to us, very friendly and has a lovely smile. Thanks for the wonderful experience and sharing your lovely place for us.

What a cool house!  A great way to stimulate the creative mind while staying in comfort. The bedroom was very comfortable and the hosts were really nice. Great historic area with cafes and little specialty shops just around the corner. This quickly became my favorite airbnb place.

The house was a treasure trove of colour and art. The location was easy to get to by bus. 
The bedroom was clean and fresh.
Entry and exit and wandering around the neighborhood was safe and simple.
Arnie and his partner were both easy going, polite and made the this first time using airbnb a pleasure.
Thanks guys. Highly recommend this place.

Perfect location in a truly special house. The room was lovely and very clean;  and as quiet as confortable. Arnie was very arranging and helpful. We stayed a total of 3 nights. Paddington is a great area of Sydney, very central. You can go anywhere from here, the bus stop was very close.I would highly recommend anybody to stay here.

Wow!  What a great way to experience Sydney.  A beautiful city, and a beautiful home base for your stay.  Arnie's place is funky and creative (reflecting its owner), and centrally located right in the middle of all the action.  Walking distance to great places, and all the public transport to take you anywhere else you want to go.  And Arnie is a warm host.  Totally recommended!

Once I mastered the bus system, I realized how easy it was to get to Arnie's Victorian home. 
The room assigned to me was spacious; however the bedsprings of the antique bed creaked, and made me paranoid about disturbing the rest of the occupants of the house (and other guests). After a long day exploring the city, the creaking bedsprings did not bother me as much on the second night.
The bathroom is up another set of stairs, but clean and spacious too.
Arnie was very helpful when I discovered I had lost the key to my luggage, and I really appreciated that.
The house itself is filled with Victoriana and of Arnie's large paintings.
The neighborhood of Paddington is very boutiquey and fun to wander through.  There are a number of bookshops (which I love) and many furniture and clothes stores. Went to a couple of cafes for breakfast in the neighborhood; the food was reasonably priced and the coffee was great.
All in all, a different and attractive face to Sydney, than what I was used to. I'm glad I chose this home on this Sydney visit.
Arnie's house is beautiful, it's in a great location and both him and Lorraine were very welcoming. Possibly the comfiest bed I stayed in during my time away! Highly recommend staying here.
Amazing sleep,clean great house and host loved itxxx
We only stayed one night in Arnie's house, it would have been great to have stayed longer with very friendly hosts and a comfortable bed and a super location.

I stayed here while exhibiting at a nearby trade show.  Arnie's house was just what I needed and it was a pity I didn't have time to 'put up my feet'.  Arnie was interststae for most of my stay so I didn't get much time to chat with him but I enjoyed chatting to the other guests in the evening.  They loved the house and were very interested in its history.
The lack of street parking was the only negative.  There is a small parking area leading to the house, but my parking skills were obviously lacking and I incurred a $1400 damage bill from the car rental firm due to scrapes on the vehicle.  Despite that I would certainly return because the house was well located and much more enjoyable than staying at a hotel.

Arnie's house is just like what we can see from airbnb,a piece of art.From the outside, you can see it's as normal as the other houses standing by. But when you entered in, how to describe it, a feeling of stepping in a gallary.The rainbow-coloured stair,hanged-up drawings,historical furnitures,etc.We were so glad to stayed in their house for two nights. We love it and hope more people can appreciate the beatiful house.
Friendly host, quiet neighbourhood, comfortable bed.

I made a good choice. It's walking distance to cool little cafés, quiet neighborhood right in the city, the room had the comfiest bed, charming house with beautiful artwork everywhere, and lovely host! Will def book again next time I'm back in Sydney.
Our host Arnie made us welcome.  The location is great, one street back from Oxford Street, the room is private, the bed comfortable, the bathroom generous.

I enjoyed my stay with Arnie, Lorraine and Arabella. Arnie was very welcoming and it was a delight to get to know Lorraine. The house is amazing - very creative space, as you would expect with Arnie being an artist. The location is superb - very exclusive and trendy Paddington with lots of designer shops in the side streets as well as Oxford Street. Very handy to city and transport. Thanks for your hospitality.
Thanks for a lovely stay! Wonderful place, great host and fantastic location. Would definitely be back!

Arnie and Lorraine are very nice and friendly, they gave me a warm welcome and suggested great spots for breakfast, dinner and walk around.
The house is clean, unique and looks exactly like the pics, in addition there is all what you need ie. wi-fi, adaptors, hair dryer etc...and also maps, books  and delicious ginger tea!
The place has a great location in Paddington, really close to transport,  lots of interesting little shops, cafes and restaurants. I loved it!
Very responsive, smooth checkin/checkout, some unexpected little niceties, and a very interesting house.

Arnie was very helpful but also left us to come and go as we pleased and to use the facilities in his lovely home.  He gave us good recommendations of places to visit and pubs to eat in.

It was a great location and neighbourhood with lots of shops, cafes and restaurants within walking distance.  It was also near a bus route, which meant that the city centre and beaches were easily accessible.

It was our first AirBnB experience and we would recommend it.

Staying in this lovely place was truly an amazing experience! Yes the pictures are accurate and the place is located in the perfect spot 2 min walk from the bus stop, nice/safe area and the chance to do lots of shopping. Arnie and his partner were more then welcoming and if you get the chance why not have a look at Arnie's great art work. 
The bed was soft and comfy wasn't much noise at all. I also want to say thank-you for dealing with my last minute booking. I highly recommend anyone to stay at this listing you will not regret it I promise. I can't wait to stay again!!
Lovely. What a great pad and well positioned location. Arnie was friendly and helpful.
Spectacular place on the colonial side, fantastic area with true Sydney spirit, nice and helpful host. Rather quiet, no street traffic could be heard. Good value. Highly recommended.

The listing description was accurate. The house was clean and had lovely accommodations. We loved the location. The neighborhood was off a busy street where we could easily catch a cab or take a bus. Also had cute boutiques, restaurants and pubs on the side streets. The location definitely made us want to come back and be able to explore Paddington more.

My stay at this beatutiful home was memorable & exactly what I needed. The house reflected the way the pictures looked and the room was spacious and very comfortable & also secure. 
Paddinton was a lovely suburb with friendly people & great shopping, food, cafe's and bars.
Arnie & Lorraine were welcoming & even though I didn't meet Arnie until day 3 I felt at home and welcomed based on the energy & peace in the home.  Thank you!  I will definitely be back again in the future! Tiffany
Unable to review as details on how to enter studio arrived too late.  Door and mobile not answered on arrival so did not stay.

Arnie was a good host.  We didn't see all that much of him since we were out most of the time, but he was helpful in our short interaction.  He was also gracious about us waking them at 10:30 when we couldn't figure out the lock.

The house is old and interesting, and in a great location.  Very easy to get to many great neighborhoods in Sydney from his location.

My only complaints were having a shared bathroom, and that the room was right next to Arnie's own bedroom.  The close proximity didn't cause any issues really, we just had to be extra quiet to not disturb them.  There is another bedroom on the other side of the house which would have provided better privacy, but that was occupied during our stay.  The shared bathroom wasn't a major issue, though there was a couple times when it was unavailable.

We had a lovely time in Arnie's place, the house is lovely but we simply fell in love with the neighborhood: what a fantastic area! It's very safe, beautiful and there are cafés, pubs, public transport and a convenience store very nearby. It was a great base for our days in Sydney. We definitely recommend staying here.
Great stay - Arnie and Lorraine were very welcoming and the house is just as fun as the pictures - great art! The room was comfy and in a great location, would stay here again.

Grand old house with heaps of charm in the thick of Paddington. Room was big with a real comfy bed. Hosted by a very lovely and welcoming couple, relaxed and friendly. Fresh towels and even a chocolate on the pillow!
The place was great, better than describes. Very impressive place and will definitely look at going back. Ace!

This is a destination home. You should go to Paddington simply for this majestic abode. 

Arnie and Lorraine are sweethearts - we had great chats, they allowed me space when I wanted it but were around and fun to hang out with. Though they were away when I arrived, they left clear instruction for how to get in and called me to check I was ok.

A visit to this house is worth it solely for the interior decoration - a personal art gallery of infinite intrigue. The bedrooms are plenty spacious for a short stay. The house on a quiet street just set back from where it's all happening on Oxford St. There's a plentoria of top notch and unique food and retail shops around.

The only drawback is that there's only one bathroom but the downstairs bathroom was being repaired on the last day of my stay so should be solved shortly.

Truly, I now count this beautiful family as an extension of my own and I'm certain you will too.

We were welcomed by cute little notes all over the house as the hosts were away
Really enjoyed the location and their home is very interesting
Cool house, good location, nice people, would stay again, thanks!

A beautiful house with beautiful paintings. Arnie's family is very kind, the accomodation is confortable, clean and located in a preatty and quite roundabout. The center is 30 minutes walk away and the bus to downtown stops closed to the house.
Unusual and sophisticated house, very good location in a quite street, possibility to get to the beach by bus or on foot (40 mins walk), and very hospital and lovely owner. Thank you, Lorraine :)
Arnie's house was beautiful as others have said, and he and his family were very welcoming and friendly. It takes about 15-20 minutes by bus to CBD and the Opera House.

Host was very helpful in finding the place, when I couldn't work out directions; room adequate; bathroom clean and pleasant, although shared; house has steep stairs without handrail in one section; great location, close to everything, public transport short walk away

This was our second visit to Arnie's wonderful house and it felt like coming home.  The house is gorgeous, the rooms are great with very comfortable beds and the location is excellent. Arnie and Lorraine are brilliant hosts who really make you feel welcome and couldn't be more helpful or easy going. Highly recommend!

Arnie's arty pad was as welcoming as the eclectic images on airbnb. He was very warm, happy to share stories about the unique residence and equally happy to give me complete space to do what I needed whilst I was there. The guest room I was in felt like I had gone completely back in time and the bath (as deep as the ocean), well, that will just have to wait til next time. Arnie's arty home in Paddington is a stones throw away from Oxford st which is super handy. Whether for work or play, in this pad, you must stay. I'll be back for sure! Thanks Arnie.

Amazing, beautiful and sophisticated house with beautiful paintings, fantastic kitchen, very hospital and lovely owner (Arnie and Lorraine), Very good location in a quiet and pretty street, possibility to get to the beach and city by bus, Thank you, Arnie and Lorraine :)

Arnie and his wife were both friendly and helpful. The house is in a great neighborhood and is centrally located so it is quick and easy to get almost anywhere. The home itself is eclectic, charming and elegant. Definitely a good spot to stay!

Arnie was a courteous and friendly host. He kindly accepted my booking last minute. It was a pleasure to stay in his home for my first two nights in Sydney. Pleasant surroundings, a comfy bed and delicious tea made the stay very relaxing. The local guidebooks were a welcome touch. I would return!

Arnie and Lorraine were excellent hosts. They were welcoming but not intrusive. I stayed at this bnb for 4 nights while my husband was in St Vincents Private Hospital. The bnb was in a great location a 15-20 minute walk to the hospital. It is in a safe area with plenty of cafés and restaurants in the vicinity.  The keyless entry saved the worry about carrying keys. My first time using bnb. A good experience. Thank you.
T

Wow, what a delight is was to stay at Arnie's Paddington house. Arnie made everything easy for Jacinta and I to enjoy Sydney and the local area. He suggested dining places and interesting tours. 
If the grind of Sydney wears you down, relax by the pool. If its raining, enjoy the fabulous art collection on every wall.
The house is a period gem with 18ft ceilings and with very high quality modern appliances. That's it......a gem!
Accueil discret du propriétaire qui nous a laissés nous installer et aller et venir comme nous le souhaitions. Arnie est une personne serviable.
Our host was very congenial, but owing to our travel arrangements, we only saw him briefly.  He was helpful in showing us the room, the bathroom and the front door system.

Its neighbourhoods like this that make me want to move to Sydney! The location was perfect, being between the city and Bondi with a great variety up-market of shops and boutiques. Arnie and his wife are both intelligent and friendly. I stumbled to make eye contact with them at times because I trying to take in the collective of interesting artworks. My only regret is that I didn't book another night. Thanks for having me. I would love to stay again.
Thank you Arnie and Lorraine for letting me stay in your very interesting home. Also appreciate you accommodating me a such short notice. Will be back :) much appreciated Michele

I had a brief, but very enjoyable stay at Arnie's very unique and interesting historic house. Arnie made everything about the stay very easy and provided a great introduction to the neighbourhood with very useful recommendations. Paddington is a really lovely area and the house is perfectly located in the middle of the nice shops, restaurants and bars, but on a very quiet street. Wish I could have stayed longer.
Everything was okay, friendly house

We had an amazing stay at Arnie's and Lorraine's home. The house is beautifully decorated, with a really interesting art collection. We also liked a lot the neighborhood, with charming architecture and close to public transport.
Our room was super comfortable, we had to work during our stay and everything work well, wifi connection is good and we enjoyed working by the pool or inside with a hot cup of coffee. 
We also got the chance to meet other guests and have a nice talk with them.

Definetly recommend this place , it's was our first time in Sydney and we loved it. Like other guests mentioned on her review, it makes you want to move there!

So Arnie and Lorraine, thank you!

Arnie was the best host ever! His house was amazing and not only did he open up his house to us but was also kind enough to introduce us to some of his amazing friends when we had an awesome mexican night with lots of food and cocktails galore. It was an incredible experience and I can't wait to go back again soon!

This was one of the loveliest houses I've ever seen! The decor is absolutely stunning, from the red painted living room to the walls covered in an assortment of paintings to the regal marble bathroom with gilded mirrors. We stayed in one of the double bedrooms which was very comfortable for just two nights. I think this would be a great option for renting the whole property but if you're just staying in one room it does feel a little like you're disturbing the family. Also a little odd that their daughter sleeps in a corridor outside the guest room. We found that rather uncomfortable, even if they put a door or a curtain across the corridor to block it off would have been better. There's also no mention of the fact they have a kid on their profile. Other than that, a wonderful house.
Funky 70s place. Great bed.
I really enjoyed my stay at Arnie's place. It's an amazing house in a fantastic location. Communication was easy and everything went smoothly.
The reservation was canceled 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Our stay with Arnie was a pleasure. He was responsive to our messages before and during our stay. He was home when we arrived and provided great recommendations on places to visit.

The house is very well-located. Paddington is an absolutely delightful neighborhood. We enjoyed exploring the wide-range of cafes, restaurants, and stores (we definitely recommend dinner at Eat Thai). Likewise, we enjoyed having the option of a leisurely stroll down Oxford to the CBD or choosing one of at least three bus lines to whisk us quickly to our destination.

With regards to the house itself, this is certainly a property for anyone with an appreciation for art. Arnie has a well-curated collection, including many of his own works. During our stay, there was a guest in the second bedroom, but we didn't have any issues with the shared bathroom.
Arnie and his family are wonderful hosts. Making my guest feel welcome and comfortable with the level of support received prior and during stay. Thanks

Very enjoyable and warm reception.  The unit has automatic booking, so Arnie was unaware of us coming, thus we only gained access around 3:30.  Thus, suggest you call ahead to ensure all are aware.

Lovely interesting house, I will attempt to return on my next visit.

What an interesting place to stay, and very comfortable after 23 days tenting in the Northern territory. 
I liked Arnie and I enjoyed having a good stroll all about Paddington - great location.
Arnie & his daughter were both very friendly and welcoming.  The listing was as it's described on Airbnb.  The house is in a great location in Paddington.

Nice location and very close to the bus station,  ten mins to CBD. We was really enjoying our stay. The house is so cool ! Especially it's fantastic interior design. The room was super comfortable! We love everything here!  Definitely will book again!!!

Super easy access to the beautiful home he has created. Great to talk with the entire family. It was one of the best experiences I've had with airbnb. I was even lucky enough to have a "long black" or as I would call it an Americano
The host canceled this reservation 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
I really enjoyed my stay. The location was very handy for me. The house is fantastic and a bit of a gem. My room and bathroom were very comfortable. Arnie and his family are lovely.

The house is really cool just like a art gallery.And it is very regrettable that we did not meet the host because we only stay for one night.But I think they must be very nice because our plane arrived late and the host left a lot of sticky note to help us know more about the house.That is really very sweet!

Felt welcome and allowed privacy- lovely coffee in the morning too!

Nice area and handy for Sydney
Arnie was nicely relaxed. Excellent area. Nice and quiet, but plenty of good cafes and bars. We'd definitely stay again.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Arnie家真的非常非常漂亮,非常有艺术气息｡房东夫妇两个人也非常友善,有什么事他们尽力帮助你,而且不会打扰你｡Paddington区周围有很多咖啡馆,风景也很美丽｡总之住在他们家你会觉得很值得｡
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Arnie and Lorraine's Artists Home in Paddington is a true gem. Wonderful and warm hosts with a truly unique and interesting house in the best location in Sydney. They were kind and relaxed, the place was comfortable, you didn't want for anything and though I didn't have time on this trip you could easily spend some wonderful hours in the eclectic decor of the really fantastic bohemian style lounge. The surrounding area is teaming with cafes - The Bonython is literally next door - The Alimentari down the road and tonnes of great restaurants - a few minutes to Oxford St via William St - minutes form regular buses and taxis. Paddington is a great area of Sydney. Historically, culinary and fashion wise with a market on Saturday. Believe me - a fine way to experience Sydney as a visitor. If you are a solo traveler or a pair looking for old Artistic Sydney charm on a realistic budget then this is the place. Wish I could have got to know the hosts better. Can't wait to go back. Great people doing a great thing.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Arnie and Lorraine are super sweet and hospitable. Arnie, always up for a chat and has a great knowledge of Sydney if you're a first timer or even a regular visitor looking to have some different experiences. 

The house very unique and easy to get visually lost in. It's also clean, spacious and located perfectly for those wanting to feel central to the city and not too far away from the eastern beaches for summer visitors.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It was an awesome experience staying at Arnie's place. Located at centre of Paddington great food and neighbourhood. 15 walking distance to CBD, if you want somewhere with great characters, please book this place. Bring your running shoes,  centennial parklands just 2 minutes away great running track.

Arnie and Lorraine's property is an absolute treasure! Steeped in art and history and only one street back from Oxford St (and the delightful Saturday Paddington markets) I couldn't have picked a better place to stay. There's two Airbnb rooms who share the beautiful stone bathroom but I rarely noticed the other guests, the room I had isn't pictured but had a great feel with gorgeous natural light and plenty of space. Arnie and Lorraine felt like old friends after my week there and I'll definitely be back!

Arnie and Lorraine welcomed me as part of their family. Their hospitality knows no bounds and I was met every day with tales of their adventures and their ever evolving home. I highly recommend spending time with the Arnold's if you ever get the chance
Arnie and Lorraine were great hosts who catered to my every needs. The house and location itself were perfect.
It is really artical
Fantastic location. Perfect walking distance to everything in Paddington. Our privacy was respected & the owner very kind.

My experience at Lorraine and Arnie's home was below average. When I first walked into the house to drop off my luggage, Arnie opened the doors and quickly walked away making me feel like an inconvenience.
The room that was given unfortunately looked nothing like the room that was in the photos. The house felt very cold, dark, and lifeless. The house also probably needed a proper clean, it smelt very dusty. The bathroom doors despite no opened windows would occasionally just open itself which was annoying when you're in the shower or on the toilet. I used the scales on the ground that I found and leaned them on the door so that my time in the bathroom wasn't interrupted. 
The wifi also did not connect if you were upstairs, which meant you were not able to use the internet in your own room. The pool could've used a clean, looked like nobody had swam in there for a few years. Lorraine also made a point that we weren't allowed to walk up the stairs in our shoes which is fair enough, however the manner in which she did it was like a parent lecturing a child which I thought was unnecessary. 

A highlight of our stay was Arnie's daughter Arabella, she was very well-mannered and welcoming.

Arnie & Lorraine lead a life full of love. I felt right at home in their vibrant world of eclectic art and wonderful, engaging conversation. I was lucky enough to visit when they had their engagement party and had the chance to dance into the early hours, celebrating. My week in Sydney was incredible and was made more so with the friendship and welcoming arms of them both. I intend to return and highly recommend staying.

Just back home from a wonderful 5 night stay in Sydney with Lorraine and Arnie.  loved their house, its location and most of all their care and attention.  Best coffee for miles!!! I love Paddington and their home reflects its essence - history, art, good vibes and a communal sense.
Any concerns? No but if you are older like me make sure you turn on the light for the top flight.  
Will I stay again ?  Yes please!!!!!
As picture showed, it is a creative home. Located in eastern sub, easy to access city. The queen size bed is fit for solo traveller more than the couple.
This house was phenomenal. Great location, great art, and great people. Thoroughly recommended.
What a house !! Exactly the pictures ! An artist home where you never get rid of exploring the decoration !

I enjoyed my stay at this very interesting house. Loraine's greeting and introduction to the house was pleasant. I was out early and home late so didn't see much of my hosts, in fact missed Arnie completely.  The bedroom was stylish and interesting, the bed super comfortable with good pillows and I slept really well. Nice Edwardian feel to the room but bedside lamps too weak for reading. A jug of water disappeared on the second day and never came back which was a problem because of the perilous trek to the bathroom to get a glass there and back! Which brings me to the bathroom which is spectacular and welcoming.The shower Good and reliable , the big tub looked great, I never used it. But the stairs up to the bathroom are the real problem. There's no bannister, and it is really difficult descending steadying yourself with your elbows on the walls and avoiding the art works as you clutch your clothes, towels and glass of water. Looking down the full length of the stairs with no handrail gives  me vertigo. I did appreciate the house and its atmosphere, and  the surrounding streets with the loved architecture and surprising shops was where I wanted to be .
Great neighborhood and easy place to stay (for the second time).
Great house and we loved staying in Paddington! Arnie made some great recommendations for places to eat in the area.

Super vintage style house. Really love it and we had a very good time here. Arnie and Lorrine are very helpful and gave us some suggestions as well. Thank you so much and we would definitely highly recommend this place.

Thank for Lorraine give us free parking! You were patient waiting us late arrival. Sorry about this. The house looks like an art gallery full of artistic atmosphere. All of indoor equipment are historic and modern too. It was only a night for our staying that hadn't used the amazing kitchen. I hope I can visit the house again.
这座房子座落在一个很有历史感的安静的街区,附近都是维多利亚式建筑,建议对于澳洲近代历史感兴趣的人士前往入住,你可以看到房主的收藏以及日常使用的设施(例如家具或水龙头)都体现了近代澳洲殷实之家的生活特色｡买点小酒,饮品和甜品在这房子的餐室､泳池边或者套房里的阳台消磨几小时都是不错的选择
very fancy decorated house! nice hosts as arnie and lorraine! wish to stay longer

Arnie house is realy a special place like look at the pictures. Full of interesting objects and atmosphere.
The location perfect, very central but at the same time very quite too.
Arnie is a very kind person...he did everythink to make my stay confortable. In plus he drive me around to the city showing to me the best parts of Sidney. P.s. ...Arnie has a very special studio too...full of his interesting art pieces . Thanks Arnie and Loraine nice to see you again. Raccomanded
It's a stunning house. Vintage decorations.We had a really nice stay. But parking is not convinient around.

What an extraordinary home! I had a delightful stay in the green room. Arnie and Lorraine were everything you would want from hosts - welcoming, friendly and inclusive and happy to leave you to it also. I highly recommend their home plus it is in a great location, easy to get to the beach and city.

My host was asleep when I arrived but that didn't matter - they had covered all the important bits and I fell into a nice big bed. 
I met Lorraine in the morning for a cup-o-tea.
Gorgeous Victorian-style terrace, outrageously decorated with all kinds of fascinating art, artefacts and fittings. A super creative retreat with friendly hosts  and a pool out back.

This home is truly one of a kind. I enjoyed staying at Arnie and Lorraine's unforgettable home. The room was great and the Paddington location was a great base from which to explore. Highly recommended.

I felt very at home here. Arnie and Lorraine are warm and relaxed. The bed was super comfortable and it was quiet at night. The location was perfect- my favourite part of Sydney. Loved being surrounded by all the art.

This is a fantastic central location, with loads of shops/  restaurants/ bars/ pubs within a 5 minute radius. The room I stayed in was ample for one person and the shared bathroom is amazing - both are large and kept very clean. Arnie and Lorraine are both lovely and I really enjoyed my stay. Would definitely recommend this accommodation to others looking to stay in Paddington.
Incredible place!! Wish we could have seen it in all it's glory! Thanks for having us!
The host canceled this reservation 35 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Incredible house. Incredible stay! :)
The house looks fantastic! Bus stops just at the corner and there are lots of restaurants and bars nearby. Hosts are friendly and willing to help.
This was a comfortable place to stay in the middle of Paddington -- a residential area close to the city center with pubs and restaurants nearby.
The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Had a wonderful stay at Arnie & Lorraine's place in Paddington. The house has so much charm, and I was very comfortable in one of the upstairs bedrooms. The area has loads of cool restaurants and cafes, and they provided a list of recommendations for the neighborhood, which was really helpful. Would highly recommend anyone to stay here!

Can't imagine this house is over 100 years because it's maintained so well. The room is cozy and fans and air condition are there. The highlight is the bathroom, the decoration is just amazing! Although this place is not located in the city central but still really handy.

Great artistic house in a fantastic neighborhood ! Nearby very nice restaurants, bars and shops but still quiet ! Walking distance for train and bus station. Room is beautiful and clean as the bathroom . The only missing would be aircon...
Lorraine gave us a warm welkome !
To recommand !

Exactly in the right location for me
A quirky & interesting decor and art works. 
The hosts couldn't be more helpful. Very accomodating

Place was in the midway btw CBD and Bondi beach so location was great with a car. Bedroom and living space is very clean with living necessities and utilities like towels and printer kindly prepared and available for use. Indoor decor design was classic and contentful. Host were really nice and friendly to allow us to use every utensil in the kitchen. Great stay

Excellent and unique place to stay whilst in Sydney. Arnie and Lorraine were very friendly and helpful. The Paddington area is a great place to stay. Out of the way, but very direct when going into the city.
The house is full of character and my stay was very comfortable. Recommended!
Really beautiful house in a great location
Really nice room with enough space and interesting environment :)
房子很棒
Very unique house! Enjoyed my stat

Beautiful house in a lovely neighbourhood. Great location with lots of buses on the doorstep so easy to get everywhere. Had a really comfy stay here with everything I needed. Lorraine was lovely and helpful and got back to me super fast when I had any questions. Would definitely stay here again next time I'm in Sydney.
Arnie and Lorraine are friendly and accommodating, the house is spacious with everything you'd need and it's close to public transport
Great location, easy access to the city/bondi beach. Unique interior, clean, cozy.
Een heel bijzonder huis om in te verblijven in een superieure buurt in Sydney. Prima uitvalsbasis voor een bezoek aan de stad.

Really enjoyed our nights stay in the heart of Paddington.  So close to Boutique Shops, Cafes and Iconic Paddington Pubs.  
We were made very welcome and loved the ambience of the quirky decor.
Would definitely stay again.

Katrena and David
Great place, great hosts, very friendly and welcoming
Good location, comfy bed smallish room thou. There was a semi-permanent tennant when I was there and he started work early...woke me at 5 but otherwise nice house
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Arnie and Lorraine's home is stunning and filled with wonders. Incredibly comfortable and in a great location- we highly recommend a stay!
We loved the central location, the quirkiness of the house and hospitality of the hosts.  We would return again when we visit Sydney. We couldn't have found a better place. Simple Marvellous!
Amazing house in a great location
Impressive old home in a great location. The design of the bathroom, view of the pool and massive art collection was a bit of a luxury for us. The eclectic space made us feel at home.

name: Tortoise and bird refuge at beach!#2
summary: FREE 24 hour UNLIMITED INTERNET!!...You made it!!! Parking..we have lighted gated, parking, but only for small calls. Jeeps, SUV, full size vehicles, there's lots of free street parking for the rest.  Sorry.  So NOW you're in paradise..And our veggie garden is almost ready for picking for you. NO KIDS!!  HOORAY!! Unless you bring your own, but plz keep them near you...YOUR OWN PRIVATE BATHRM! Shared shower HUGE ROOM. NO waiting for facilities.Guests kitchette on cov. porch. Consists of Fridge, hot convection plate. Coffee maker, toaster oven,  ●●We now offer fantastic Massages...let us know if this is something youd like. 85.00 hour. We'll set up this for you. Pay when you arrive.●●
space: WE HAVE 2 LiSTINGS..same location just different room same price...if this calendar is full, check airbnb for other tortise bird refuge Listing. Here you will have your own Private rm..With real comfy queensize bed 1000 sheet thread count. YOUR OWN private 1/2 bth.. a shared shower Huge room VERY unique with fudo sunken tub,.you'll see what I mean. There is now curtains in front of separate doors going in shower. No possible peeking...lol..We are a refuge, we have over 72 animals, including, 6 cats, a Whippet, A Rottymix, a terriermix 25 numerous birds, 16 chickens, 6 roosters, 7 tortoises, three over 100 lbs, very friendly, it's very cool. Btw, if you have allergies, or afraid of animals, in anyway, just maybe this place might not be for you. 3 tortises fun free on property, as well as dogs. Animals do not go in rooms. Come and enjoy. Check out pics on site. Aloha Kitchenette outside on covered screened in porch. Consisting of Small fridge..toaster oven, microwave, coffee maker, even
