My place is in the heart of the city center. I can offer transportation from and to the airport if matches with my working hours

reviews.comments: Memo is an very fast communicator which is great if you have a lot of questions. He is always willing to help and seems to know the area very well, so he is able to provide accurate information. The bedroom is spacious and the bed is large enough for 2 people (I just stayed by myself). with great windows for sunlight. He told me that he is thinking about reorganizing the bathroom and kitchen, so if those things are important to you, I would ask in detail about them. Overall very friendly individual!

His place is at the Center of the city 
He is very helpful and very friendly
Money wise his place is more than reasonable also he is very quick responsive and no time limit to cheek-in and i feel his place is like my home and he is very trustful

Walk by taksim square 5 min.

Kindness staff.

Fast answerx

Value house.

Memo is a great host. The fact that he can speak English is a blessing because most Turkish people don't know English and it's hard to community. Plus the house's environment actually felt like home. You could cook if you want and you could rest without any disturbances. Also, memo was very friendly and helped in showing around places. If you ever visit Istanbul you should definitely stay at his house. :)
It is easy to check in. Clean rooms and great location. My trip tiredness has gone away thanks to your kindness!!!

I stayed one night in Memo`s room. I arrived in Taksim Sq at 12:15 a.m and he came there to take me his home. Though the street slopped and his apartment was on the 2nd floor, he got my suitcase and carried it 4 me. He is warm and a good guide for Istanbul. Ask him for good food and places.
Nice person, very friendly helped me a lot. The price is reasonable, the location very close to taksim square.
The location is great.The price is (Website hidden by Airbnb) not a beautiul apartment but it's clean,and you can't expect anything better at rhis price.

Staying at Memos was awesome. There was nothing negative I could mention. The room was nice and big (and the bed was super comfy), the area is very very close to the city center. Actually it's part of the city center. 
Memo was super friendly. He really made me feel at home. 
So if you're planning on visiting Istanbul: this is the place to be.
best value for money , great location, excellent hospitality, would recommend without any reservations.
Nice host
Excellent location . Best place

Memo was a great host. He provided me with good tips about local places and sites to see. He was also replying very fast on all my questions. As for the location- the Memo's place is on the really good location - a few minutes from the Taksim square and metro station. Also, very near is a nice&stylish&artistic area  (we might call it hipster zone :) - which you will hardly find if somebody do not give you a tip :) As for Memo's place - it is simple and basic - and you really get what you pay. Ideal for somebody who came to visit Istanbul and spend a lot of time outside. The bed was comfortable, I sleep well and felt safe :)
All in all - I have good experience with staying at Memo's place and I would recommend it to others.
very bad flat

Mohmet (Memo) is a nice man, goes out of the way to help his guests. His flat is at a walking distance to bus station, Taksim Square and Taksim Market.
I enjoyed my stay at his accommodation.

Memo is a very friendly, happy, smiley person and an excellent host who makes you feel at home. He is available to give you information and explain you things about the city. The room is sunny, clean, airy with a comfortable big double bed. The house is clean and very close to Taksim square and instiklal street. I enjoyed my stay in Memo's place and  I felt very comfortable. Best value for money.

Although it was only for 1 night  i really enjoyed staying at Memos. The house is on a very safe and convinience area, with all the nessecities and Memo is  very kind,  friendly and helpfull. Absolutely recomendable!

Esta fue mi primera experiencia en airbnb y gracias a Memo, amo a airbnb!! Memo es un caballero, super atento, cariñoso, me ayudo todo el tiempo y gracias a el conoci lugares maravillosos y entretenidos, que sin el no los hubiera conocido. Su departamento es impecable, excelente ubicacion, exquisita la cama, silencioso, puedes descansar y reponerte como estar en tu propia casa. Gracias Memo! Fue increíble conocer Estambul cómo lo conocí gracias a ti! Ya te aviso cuando vuelvo porque ahí mismo elijo para volver a dormir.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Memo was extremely helpful and very thoughtful.  He accommodated every aspect of my stay and went far above and beyond in hosting me.  He allowed me to use his laundry and stay later on my check out day with no problems.  He knows a lot about the city and had many helpful hints about Istanbul.  Would recommend and stay again.  A+

Memo's place has an excellent location, which is perfect for first-timers in Istanbul. You will easily be able to access the main tourist area of Sultanahmet, as well as the hip Cihangir and Beyoglu areas which are known for its nightlife. It also provided me a good introduction to Besiktas, which I think is more of a second-timer place.

Mehmet's apartment is located in a very centric area, easy to transport with tramway or metro anywhere you need. There are many activities to do within walking distance. It is an ample room, with a lot of light and a double bed.  Mehmet is a welcoming host, you will experience thoughtful hospitality.

Well organized Istanbul attractions for one week are done as expected using Istanbulkart for 5 days and Museum Pass of 125TL for 5 days. Extra charge for some extra attractions, like for beautiful Dolmbahce Palace.
Hystory and good food...
My room was excellent , actualy I had privacy of using all flat myself. Clean. Quiet. TV for Football 2018, fridge, wifi, I didn't have time to use kitchen...
Very good location, 5 min walk to Taksim Square with Metro station, F1 to Kabatas or walking 10 min to Tramvay T1 to the Old City...
Great value for money - highly recomended.

Memo is a very good host, used to help tourists visiting Istanbul. He is also very friendly and you gonna feel very comfortable in is house. The location of the appartement is perfect and the room very comfortable and quiet. The area is safe, even for a woman alone.
房东人特别好,离塔克西姆广场很近｡会推荐
Memo is a great host! The room is nice and in a good neighborhood, plus you will get many good tips to make the most of your stay.

Memo is an amazing host. He knows the city very well and advised me where to go and how. He lent me a transport card to use public transport when I needed to go a bit farther. The apartment is in an excellent location and it is very clean. It was easy to get there from the airport and then most places I visited were walking distance. I would go back to his place if I went back to Istambul. Thanks a lot
호스트가 나이스합니다. 와이파이 잘되구요. 주변히 힙한곳이라 클럽 찾는 분들은 좋아하실 거에요. 다만 적혀있는 주소가 다르게 나오니 확인 한번 하시고 오세요

Memo’s place is just a minute’s walk away from the most buzzing place is town ie taksim square. Its also 5 mins away from tram station that connects to Sultanahmet (the main visiting place in IST). 
While the room is fine with all basic amenities, what stands out is Memo’s extremely helpful and hospitable nature. He has been just a call or (Hidden by Airbnb) message away for anything and spent good time with me explaining what to see in town n how to best plan my day. He even helped call few places of interest and the cab guys and also lent me his istanbul kart metro/ tram card to use. 
Memos place is apt for a short trip and has the following three things that any visitor looks for:
1. Excellent location - right in the middle of the most happening place in town with great connectivity
2. Very competitive price
3. An extremely helpful, welcoming and english speaking host. 

What more does one want!!
I have given plenty of reasons above
Good location and helpful for tourism information. Close to Taksim center.
Memo is a wonderful and caring host. His place which is centrally located and a walking distance to Taksim square has all the amenities that made my stay comfortable. I do recommend his place.
The location was great, just a couple of block away from Taksim square. He was very helpful and a kind person. I was using his bedroom, which was spacious.
Memo is a great host and very responsive. His place is comfortable and is within a waking distance to Taksim Square. I strongly recommend Memo’s place.
Memo is a great host he's fast respond to your communication and willing to help you. the room is so nice. internet fast and location is great. would love to come back there more if i visit Turkey.

Memo es un anfitrión muy amable y simpático, te facilita toda la información que necesites. La habitación está muy bien y la cama es muy cómoda. El apartamento está situado en una zona muy buena. Me he sentido muy a gusto en esa casa durante mi estancia.  Para el precio que propone, es una muy buena opción
Strongly recommend, quality host, location  and room.
이스탄불에오시는 한국분들 한테 정말 완전 추천해요!!호스트 memo 는 정말친절하고 술도 사주고 이스탄불카르트까지 흔쾌히 주셨어요!!제가 이스탄불에 다시온다면 또 들릴거에요~thank you memo

Memo is a fantastic host. Very welcoming, very knowledge about the local area, and very accommodating.

When I arrived, Memo did everything in his power to work around my awkward timing requirements - including allowing me to deliver my luggage to a safe and convenient location, he then brought it to the apartment himself, despite the fact that it was ridiculously heavy.

He looked after all my requirements and even arranged for an airport transfer on my last day, which was prompt and timely and enabled me to make the very most of my final day in Istanbul. I am very grateful and would happily stay here again.

A very warm, friendly and nice person. The place was nice, clean and in the heart of the city. All the basic amenities are available in the house and Memo is always ready to help and provide valuable suggestions if need be.

Memo is really such a good and warm person. He’s very kind and helpful. You would feel like home there and the location is just at the heart of European area. So it’s easy to access to anywhere you wanna go. Hope the next guest have fun in Istanbul.

Memo is one of the best hosts! He picked me up at the airport, even though he didn't have to, because I was concerned about not being able to get into the city. Memo was so knowledgable, nice, he invited me to meet and hang out with his friends, and he has a comfortable home in a great location. Great value and great communication, fast responses, easy to talk to and get information about. Great location.

Memo is a great host and his place as well, nearby Taksim square.
He gave me a the city map and a lot of tips and tricks related to sightseeing. He was very welcoming and friendly.

Memo is a great host! His home is in the center of Taksim and is very comfortable to get into any public transport n restaurants. He helped me suggesting places to visit in Istanbul. He is friendly, fun and a good Airbnb host. I would definitely recommend his home.
Thanks Memo! See u some other time :)
-Satish
The host canceled this reservation 47 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Thanks memo .. amazing beautiful city.. location very very good 1 minute to metro,bus,taksim square.istiklal street..memo was so helpful I highly recommend him

Memo is responsive and helpful to guide me to reach his home for check in. He works at a hotel nearby - only 8 minutes walk from home. I met him first at that hotel and walk together to his home for check in. Memo is very kind to help carrying my lugage  to the room on 2nd floor:)

Bedroom is quite large, clean, comfy, good lighting and quiet - good for rest. Shared bathroom is clean and towels provided. Kitchen and drinking water also provided. 

Despite the hilly road, I like the location which is near Taksim square!
Easy to find stores and restaurants. Metro station is also not far.  Neighborhood area is safe to me walking alone at night.

Memo is very kind to explain many tourist destination locations. how to get there and give me MRT map. 

I think I have chosen a right home for stay during my 1st visit to Istanbul. Would recommend it to other travellers who seeking budget room near Taksim square!

Memo was a great host! He is really friendly and caring, and his flat is perfectly located: really close to taksim and the center, but in a really beautiful and quiet area perfect for a nice rest. The bed was super comfortable and Memo was always there to help. Highly recommended!

Memo is amazing host! He is kind, funny and super helpful. Memo also made me delicious breakfast during my stays and gave me ton of awesome local tips. And the accommodation is right in the heart of the city, great connection to everywhere especially to those who enjoy sleepless neighborhood like Taksim. More importantly, bed is really comfortable. I would love to come back and stay at Memo’s place again. Totally recommend!!!

name: ORM - Mártires Apartment
summary: Situated in Rua Mártires da Liberdade, street with great historical denotation of the city, this fully rehabilitated studio gives you the necessary tranquility in your vacation days, but also the comfort of being just a few minutes’ walk from the main points of the historical city center. It has 1 bedroom with double bed, open to the living room, 1 bathroom with shower, fully equipped kitchen and a balcony. Ideal for 2 people. Prices vary according to the seasons.
space: If this apartment is not available on the required dates, check out our other apartments through our profile.    See also our list of additional services, which will elevate your experience in our city.    This apartment is located in Rua Mártires da Liberdade, which, after the revolt of May 16th 1828, had this date as its denomination until in 1835 it became Rua Mártires da Liberdade, in honor of the 12 Liberals condemned and executed by the court of D. Miguel. Ideal for 2 people, who prefer to stay in the heart of the historical center of Porto, within a walking distance of the main points of interest of the city.

host.host_about:
Four friends, a lot of dreams, a common path

Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends: Rosa, Tania, Igor and Nuno. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privelege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Quatro amigos, muitos sonhos, um caminho em comum

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos: a Rosa, a Tânia, o Igor e o Nuno. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Die Wohnung ist optimal gelegen, sehr zentral, zu Fuss sind alle Sehenswürdigkeiten gut zu erreichen und gleichzeitig ist es sehr ruhig. Wir hatten nie Probleme wegen Lärm o.ä. in der Nacht. Die Einrichtung ist praktisch, schön und modern. Die ganze Wohnung ist neu renoviert und das Mobiliar ist ebenfalls ganz neu. Alex hat uns im Appartment begrüsst, er war sympathisch, unkompliziert und hatte uns tolle Tipps gegeben. Einzige zwei kleine Kritikpunkte: 1. der Boden und das Geschirr waren nicht so sauber. 2. Der Taxiservice lief leider nicht wie versprochen. Auf dem Hinweg verlangte der Taxifahrer 34.- € (statt der angebenen max. 30.- €). Wir haben dies Alex direkt beim Check-in zurückgemeldet, er sagte, dass er mit dem Taxifahrer sprechen werde und wir beim Rückweg max. 25.- € bezahlen müssen. Beim Rückweg verlangte der Taxifahrer erneut mehr als vereinbart (30.- €), wir beharrten aber uf den 25.- €. Wir würden die Wohnung trotzdem weiterempfehlen. Es war ein wirklich toller Aufenthalt.

El alojamiento es tal cual sale en las fotos, nuevo, limpio y a unos 20 minutos andando del centro... el anfitrion muy amable y estuvieron muy atentos durante toda la estancia, el unico inconveniente fue el agua caliente que sin saber xq la segunda persona que se duchaba debia hacerlo con agua semifria... si bien estoy segura que le pondran remedio pues debia ser un fallo puntual...
The apartment was perfect for our visit to Porto. Filipa gave fantastic recommendations for things to do and see that made the trip extra special.

Petit appartement (pièce unique) convenant parfaitement à une personne seule ou à un couple . Très bien restauré et joliment aménagé , dans un immeuble ancien avec beaucoup de cachet . Très fonctionnel , suffisamment équipé pour faire un peu de cuisine. Petit balcon , très agréable bien que la vue soit décevante (arrière d'un hôtel de 6 étages) .Le logement est calme , car il est situé dans un petite rue peu fréquentée, à proximité immédiate d'une station de métro (ligne violette ,directement de l'aéroport) et des quartiers historiques de PORTO et des centres d'intérêt touristiques .

Agréable séjour dans cette belle ville qu'est Porto!!L'appartement est bien situé proche de tous commerces,bars,centre ville,transports en (Website hidden by Airbnb) est bien équipé et il est surtout très propre!Et même si nous avons eu un petit désagrément à notre arrivée dû à une erreur d'adresse,tout à été oublié bien vite...Alex,c'est excusé à mille reprises et cest montré réactif en nous offrant les petits déjeuners..merci à toi...A bientôt;sûrement.
Departamento impecable y bien ubicado, a pesar de estar en un barrio en donde hay bares, es silencioso para dormir. Todo funciona muy bien. El anfitrión contesta de manera rápida . Lo recomiendo.

There aren't enough good things to say about this apartment. It feels brand new, is well designed and is in the perfect location in Porto. We stayed here for a week, and it felt like home. The space is small, but for two people, if you make sure to use all the storage available it will feel larger than it is. The kitchen had all the needed supplies to cook, but why cook when there are lots of dining options within a 5 minute walk. I would book at this apartment again in an instant.
Recommendable 100%

Loved the place! Great location, right in the centre of Porto. We arrived late in the evening around 11pm, and they received us on time for check-in! They even offered us a taxi from the airport to the place.

Also, very neat and clean appartment/studio. We would definetely repeat this stay if we ever go back to Porto, we absolutely loved the city!
Ótimo lugar em todos os critérios como anunciado e anfitrião com boas indicações de lazer e gastronomia. Enfim super recomendo!

This place is as good as a hotel if not better!. Stylish apartment, just like photos, very clean and has all that you need. Place is cosy, good for 1 or 2 pax but not more. Bed was also super comfy we had such good sleep during this Porto leg. The AC was a great respite in the heat of summer where temperatures were close to 35deg. They also gave an extra set of towels for our stay which was much appreciated. 

Location was also fantastic. We didn’t even take any public transport because everything was in walking distance! Many stylish bars and cafes close by. We met with filipa who was really friendly and gave us plenty of tips for food and things to do. We wanted to do the duoro river tour and they arranged it for us wo any hassle. Highly recommended, I wouldn’t hesitate to book if I were you!
Every thing was perfect, clean, good advices and nice touches in the room, I love it, thou it’s central it was pretty quiet :) I recommend it totally:)

Het is een prachtig appartement ,goed ingericht voor 2 personen en alles beloopbaar met goede restaurants in de buurt,een bakker op de hoek en een kleine supermarkt op 5 minuten lopen .Alex heeft alles prima uitgelegd en op de kaart gezet ,zodat je snel de weg weet.Ik kan dit appartement echt aanbevelen ,het is klein maar fantastisch ingedeeld met ook nog een balkon ,alles wat je nodig hebt voor een fijne tijd
Bel appartement , bel accueuil, propre et fonctionnel. Lit comfortable, ORM s’occupent bien de leurs clients , nous recommendons!

My wife and I began our honeymoon by spending three days in Porto - and we wish we had stayed longer! This positive experience began when we arrived at the apartment. Filipa and Celso of Oporto Rental Management greeted us at the door to the condominium, escorted us to our apartment, and proceeded to give us a fantastic introduction to the city of Porto. They highlighted the city’s “can’t miss” attractions, and they did not miss on a single one. From the Livraria Lello to the São Bento Railway Station to the Douro River boat ride, all of their recommendations were well worth it. And because of the apartment's strategic location, they are all easily reachable by foot - though keep in mind that Porto is a hilly city. In addition, Filipa and Celso are kind, charming, humorous, and easy-going. We could not have asked for a better introduction to the wonderful city of Porto, and because of Filipa and Celso’s professionalism and light-heartedness, we give them, this apartment, and Oporto Rental Management our strongest and most favorable review.
absolut empfehlenswert! super Lage, modern eingerichtet und es hat alles wie abgemacht funktioniert.

Het appartement zag er hetzelfde uit als op de fotos; erg mooi en schoon en ideaal voor 2 personen. Het contact met ORM verliep goed en bij aankomst werden we goed ontvangen door Alex. Hij gaf ons een aantal handige tips over restaurants en bezienswaardigheden in Porto. De locatie was top, Porto is niet heel groot en je was met 20 minuten lopen bij de Ponte Luis I. Dit was de bezienswaardigheid die het verst van het appartement lag.

Hebben een top week gehad!

Nuestra experiencia con la vivienda de Oporto Rental Management ha sido muy buena desde el recibimiento, donde Filipa nos dió muy buenas indicaciones de todo hasta todo lo que tiene que ver con el piso, siendo el mismo un piso céntrico, nuevo, muy limpio, con todas las comodidas y tranquilo. Una experiencia muy recomendable que repetiríamos sin duda alguna.
Appartement très propre, bien équipé, calme et confortable.
Alojamiento perfecto. A 30 minutos andando del Rio y a 10 minutos de las zonas comerciales. El loft es perfecto para 2 personas, muy limpio y nuevo. Repetiremos.
Super, schönes Apparmemt! Immer wieder gerne!
Great communication, useful local tips, clean and well designed space! Thank you!

The apartment is very cosy and fully equipped with everything you may need during a city trip.
The location of the apartment is fantastic, because you can reach the city center and a lot of sights by foot within minutes.
Furthermore we got a map of Porto with hints from ORM to local bars, restaurants, places to see,...
Our stay in Porto was fantastic and we would definitely recommend the apartment.
Very nice flat, very clean. It’s very well located, I can only recommend it !
Airbnb bien situé et dans une rue calme. Petit mais très fonctionnel.
This is great! Super  clean when we came and very good location!

I had the perfect stay in Porto due in large part to this apartment. It's hard to make a list of all the things you're looking for in an airbnb until you find one that just does everything right. From the greeting, to the cleanliness, to the shower and the bed: everything just worked and exceeded my expectations. I would highly recommend staying here when visiting Porto, it is the perfect starting point to experiencing this wonderful city and I would not hesitate to book with Oporto Rental Management again.
was a really good place we stay only 2 days but was really good

We were in Porto just 2 days, but thanks to ORM and their hosts we were able to enjoy the city to the fullest.

The apartment was super clean, well located and nicely decorated. The communication with ORM was fast & easy. 

We got many nice tips from ORM for sightseeing, restaurants and bars. I would highly recommend Zenith Brunch & Cocktails for the best breakfast/lunch, Tapa Rua for tapas + live music and to eat a francesinha at Cervejaria Brasao Aliados.
Lovely and cosy apartment for a weekend in Oporto.
Proper communication! Nice appartment, clean and not far from the center.

This was our best AirBNB experience thus far. Loved working with ORM. The apartment was clean and looked exactly like the photos. Great building and location, as well. The hosts provided a map with local restaurants/tourist marks. We also took advantage of the boat tour with a free glass of port wine. 100% would recommend.
The appt is exactly as described, the reception very hospitabel and we got many useful tips for our stay in porto. Would definately recommend this appartment for your stay in wonderful Porto.

Apartment just as advertised
 Beautiful and clean. Was a short walk from the downtown core
 Easy communication and checkin.  Would definately stay here again!

This place is really fantastic. We were greeted by our host who was friendly and provided us with a map and lots of recommendations for things to see/do and places to eat.  The space itself was very clean, with a nice little balcony, fresh linen and nice bathroom soap.  The hair drier was really good too.  The place is quite small but ideal for a couple or solo traveller.  The location is good - about a 15-20 minute walk to the Ribiera and there are quite a lot of cute bars, vintage stores/op shops and local shops nearby. The neighbours were at times a bit noisy (particularly the neighbours above the apartment) this was more an issue in the mid-mornings not the night.  Really recommend this spot as a great place to stay in Porto!
Super zentrale Unterkunft und praktisch eingerichtet. Einziger Minuspunkt ist, dass die Wohnung sehr hellhörig ist.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Porto dans l' appartement conforme à la description et idéalement situé dans la ville. Alex nous a très bien  accueilli et a pris le temps de  nous  communiquer des adresses de restaurants ainsi que des  conseils de visites . Un petit soucis à l'arrivée de linge de lit et serviettes non livrés par l'équipe de ménage mais  l 'agence a tout fait pour y remédier dans les plus brefs délais. Il s'agissait d'un weekend de forte affluence touristique

reviews.comments:
离尖沙咀地铁站非常近,一条马路之隔,去哪里都很便捷,附近步行范围内有很多好吃的,海港城也很近｡
房间不大但是有洗衣机和冰箱,需要用开水房东特地送了电热水壶过来｡卫生间洗漱台很小不过冰箱上方也有水池可以用,床比较硬,习惯睡软床的朋友需要注意一下｡总体来说房间性价比很高,住得比较舒适｡
房东很主动,会询问入住情况,中途还关心了住宿体验,有需要会提供帮助,非常友善~
房间很好,特别干净｡有什么不懂的问房东都会认真耐心的回答,一开始没找到牙杯和洗发露h后来发现原来镜子可以打开,后面入住的旅客如果也有没找到洗发露沐浴露的可以打开那面镜子看一看,而且房子地理位置十分方便,附近好吃的特别多,性价比很高,建议大家入住!

Cozy studio centrally located in TST.  Perfect place to stay for myself as I explored HK.  Has all the basic needs for a place to sleep.  Moonie was very friendly and helpful over chat.  Great experience overall!
Buena ubicación.

Moonie's place is conveniently located to everything in TST and still super quiet. She's a friendly and welcoming host and I really enjoyed our interaction throughout my stay. She was able to provide early check in for me - big thanks! The home was clean on my arrival and the basic amenities were all there. The living space was a bit of a tight squeeze but manageable as this is HK standards. Would definitely recommend Moonie's home!

If you are looking for a loving and caring host, then Moonie is the one for you. She responds to all messages sent rather quickly. Whatever question I asked Moonie was there with a fast answer! A few days before my trip to Hong Kong I had asked if she had an iron/ironing board in her apartment. She told me "No, but I will try to get one for you". The day I got to the Airbnb, I see an iron there! Moonie came through with an iron! The day I arrived Moonie also sent me a note on how the shower works, so I was not confused when I woke up the next day. The price of this Airbnb is great for what you get, but I think Moonie is the real reason why my stay was so pleasant. 

As for the apartment itself, it is a great place for two people max. I went in solo and felt that I had ample space in the apartment. Then again, I really only slept and showered in the apartment. The rest of my days were filled with activities. The bed is a little on the hard side but gets comfortable once you get used to it. I am 6 foot, and it was a perfect size. The shower's water pressure was spot on! There are multiple outlets for electronics. The AC is great! All in all, this is a good place to stay with a maximum of two people.
Cozy space...if you and a friend are not very close friends, it might be uncomfortable. Very close to MTR. Lots of places in walking distance. Great communication.
Location of this apartment was perfect, so close to the metro station of one of the central areas of HK. Excellent place for tourists to stay.

Good location, v convenient - near cinema, mtr, modern mall, right above awesome bubble tea. Also more spacious than other bnbs we have seen, with segregated showering space (v impt for us)!! (: thanks moonie for being so prompt and helpful too!
The description was accurate and the area is super convenient to travel at.

The space was clean and comfortable. The location was amazing as it was located in the hub of the city center, conveniently accessible to the MTR, shops, restaurants, as well as tourist spots. Moonie was very hospitable and quick with her responses as well as being accommodating to possible earlier check-ins and later check-outs if needed. We enjoyed our stay with her.

Great location--across the street from the MTR.  Excellent directions and prompt communication with host.  A/C and clothes washer worked well.  Expect a very small space (~3.5 meters squared) and very hard/small mattress.
